Bismillahir Rahmanir Rahim

To my sister Aisha. I love you.

Episode 1: Introduction

I seek for Allah's guidance in writing this book. Allah yasa ya amfani al'ummar
musulmi baki daya. Allah yasa yadda na fara rubuta shi lafiya, Allah ya bani ikon
gama shi lafiya Ameen.
Labarin littafin nan 'kagaggen labari ne (fiction) idan yayi kama da labarin wani
ko wata to ina neman gafara, akasi aka samu amma ba dan shi ko ita nayi ba. Nayi
amfani da sunayen 'yan 'uwana, amma hakan ba yana nufin labarin su bane ba.
Wannan littafin mallakata ne ni maman maama, ni ka dai na kirkiri labarin na kuma
yi typing dinsa ni ka dai. Ban yarda wani ko wata ko wasu su dauki labarin ko wani
'barin labarin suyi amfani dashi ta wata siga ba tare da sun nemi izini daga gare
ni ba.
Kamar littafin #Maimoon, #Aisha_Hamaira sadaka ne ga duk wanda ya karantashi, na
rubuta shine saboda in isar da wadansu sakonni zuwa ga al'ummar musulmi, duk wanda
ya karanta shi ina rokon yayi min addu'ar fatan alkhairi duniya da lahira. Ban
yarda wani ko wata ko wasu su siyar min da wannan littafin ba, ta hanyar bugawa ko
kuma ta hanyar siyar dashi a matsayin document ba, duk wanda ya aikata daya daga
cikin wadannan ya sani Allah yana kallonsa.
Duk wanda ya karanta wannan littafin ya karo da wani abu a ciki, ko kuma yaji dadi
ta hanyar nishad'i, ina rokon shi daya yad'a shi ta hanyar sharing ga 'yan'uwa da
abokan arziki dan suma su 'karu ko kuma su nishadantu.
Ina neman afuwa ga wadanda suka fadi ra'ayinsu na kara romance akan na #Maimoon,
afuwan, amma va zan iya karawa ba saboda kada in wuce gona da iri, garin neman lada
kuma in dauki alhaki.
Yawan votes, comments, da likes dinku shi zai kara min kwarin gwuiwar cigaba da
muku typing, in ban samu support naku da yawa ba zan dauka cewa labarin bai samu
karbuwa ba, kuma hakan zai sace min gwuiwata.
Wanda yake da complaints ko suggestion zai iya dropping a comment box, insha Allah
zan duba kuma zamu samu fahimtar juna.
Babu tabbas d'in za'ake samun update kullum. Amma zanyi iya kacin 'ko'kari na.

Na gode.
[10.12.19]itz B Y ebrerheem.   Aisha_Humairah

Episode 2: Shimfida

A garin dutsen jihar jigawa, a unguwar da ake kira da takur aduwa, anyi wani mutum
magidanci mai suna Alhaji Zayyan. Alhaji Zayyan tsohon dan siyasa ne, dan a zamanin
daya wuce har mukamin kantoma ya rike, amma kuma a halin yanzu bashi da wani mukami
a siyasance, sai dai yana da manyan mutane wadanda suke jan ragamar gwamnatin ta
jihar jigawa. Wannan ya saka har yanzu yake da 'dan abin hannunsa, duk kuwa da cewa
a matsayin malamin makarantar secondary gwamnati yake. Alhaji Zayyan bafulatani ne,
wanda kallo daya zakayi masa kasan cewa tabbas shi 'din pure fulani ne. Matarsa
daya tun ta auren fari, Hajiya Rabi'a, wadda ita kuma bahaushiya ce usul, mutuniyar
unguwar mandawari ta jihar kano. Yayinda alhaji Zayyan ya zamanto mai zafin kai,
ita kuma Hajiya Rabi'a sanyi ne da ita sosai. Macece mai tsananin biyayya ga
maigidanta. Wannan yana daga cikin dalilin da har yau Alhaji Zayyan ya kasa yiwa
matar tasa abikiyar zama, saboda shi kansa yasan ba lallai bane ya samu wacce zata
iya hakuri dashi kamar yadda Rabi'a take yi.

Allah ya albarkaci aurensu da samun 'ya'ya guda biyu, Nana Aisha da Nana Khadija.
Daga nan kuma shikenan, tun suna saka ran samun wadansu 'ya'yan har suka hakura.
Aisha ce babba, shekara biyu ta bawa Khadija. Ranar da aka haifi Aisha, hatta
mahaifanta sai da suka yi mamakin kamanninta, dan da ace ba'a gida aka haife ta ba
da Alhaji Zayyan zai iya cewa ba 'yarsu bace ba chanji aka yi musu. Daga Alhaji
Zayyan har matarsa Rabi'a duk ba baya bane wajan kyau da cikar halitta amma Aisha
is far away from kyakykyawa. Bawai hancintane kato ba ko idonta ne kanana ba, a'a,
kusan komai a fuskar Aisha babu kyakykyawa. Mutane suka yi ta zuwa barka, kuma
Hajiya Rabi'a tana sane cewa rabin mutanen ba barka ce take kawo su ba tsegumi ne.
A bangaren iyayen yarinyar kuwa, munin Aisha bai rage ko kadan daga cikin son da
mahaifiyarta take yi mata ba, mahaifinta kuma babu yabo babu fallasa, kullum ya
kalli yarinyar yana jinjina munin nata a ransa amma kuma ya san tabbas 'yarsa ce,
dan haka yake iyakacin bakin kokarinsa gurin sauke mata hakkin daya rataya a kansa
a matsayinsa na uba. Shekara biyu bayan haihuwar Aisha aka haifi Khadija. Duk inda
aka san jariri mai kyau to Khadija ta kai nan, dan duk wanda yazo barkanta ya dauke
ta sai yaji kamar ya sace ta ya gudu saboda kyau. Ikon Allah.

A hankali yara suka fara girma a tare, kyawun khadija sai kara fitowa yake yi, wani
irin kwarjini ne da ita da farin jini. Alhaji Zayyan kullum sai ya dauke ta ya fita
majalissa da ita, wani lokacin har gurin aiki yake zuwa da ita, mutanen unguwa da
abokan aikinsa kowa yasan ta kuma kowa yana sonta, kowa so yake ya ganshi tare da
Khadija. Aisha bata da girman jiki sam, gashi kuma bata da magana sosai, amma duk
abinda yake faruwa ta sani, tana sane da cewa ko kayan sawa babansu ya sayo musu
sai ya fara zabarwa khadija sannan za'a bata sauran. Ba wai yana kinta bane ba amma
duk da kankantarta tasan yafi son khadija a kanta. Bashi kadai ba, Aisha tasan cewa
mutanen unguwa da 'yan'uwansu na barin uwa dana uba duk sunfi son khadija a kanta.
Amma lokacin tana yarinya bata san dalili ba. Da lokacin shiga makarantar Aisha
yayi sai Alhaji Zayyan yace "ita wannan da ko maganar kirki bata iya ba mai zata
koya a makarantar? Barinta zamuyi kawai ta kara girma kafin nan Khadija ta isa zuwa
makaranta sai a hada su tare" Hajiya Rabi'a bata ji dadin wannan hukuncin ba, amma
kuma sai tayi tunanin maybe hakan is for the best, tunda Aisha is extremely shy,
bata kula kowa dan haka in aka saka ta a makaranta ita kadai zata takura, gwara a
bari a hada su da khadijan, maybe zata fi sakewa tayi karatun sosai.

Duk da haka dai sai aka hada su aka saka a islamiyyar unguwarsu. Kullum suna zuwa
Aisha zata wuce karshen aji ta zauna ta rungume hannayenta tana kallon malam,
yayinda ita kuma khadija manyan dalibai zasu yi ta daukanta ana yi mata kwalliya
ana gyara mata daurin dankwali, mkuma bata biscuit da masu bata alawa, babu wanda
yake kulawa da Aisha, ta zama tamkar abinda hausawa suke kira da saniyar ware.

A gida kuma Umma (hajiya Rabi'at) tana iya kacin kokarinta gurin daidaitawa
tsakanin 'ya'yan nata dan haka Aisha tafi sakewa da ita akan kowa, itace babbar
kawarta kuma ita kadai ce kawarta, in dai ba makaranta ba to kullum suna tare. Tun
Aisha tana damuwa in Abba yazo ya fita da khadija har ta daina damuwa, tafi son ma
su fita din su barta ita da ummanta suyi ta hirar su, dan da ita kadai take yin
hira. Tun a lokacin umma ta fara lura da wani abu akan Aisha, yarinya ce mai tsafta
sosai, sam bata gajiya da aiki, duk abinda taga umman tana yi itama sai tace
zatayi, wanke wanke, shara, gyaran daki da sauran aiyukan gida, musamman kirki,
Aisha tana bala'in son girki, kullum tana kitchen tana kallon yadda Umma take
girki, a haka zata ce a bata tayi wani abun, tun umma na hana ta har ta fara
barinta tana tayata wasu kananan abubuwan. Aisha har kujera take takawa saboda
tsahonta ya kai kan gas cooker.
Khadija tana da shekara shida Aisha takwas, aka saka su a primary school. Abinda ya
faru a islamiyya shine ya kuma faruwa a boko, Aisha ta tafi karshen ajin ta zauna
ita kadai, yayinda khadija ta zauna a seat din gaba. Cikin kwana biyu kusan fiye da
rabin 'yan ajin suka zama kawayen khadija, Aisha kam babu wanda ya taba yi mata
magana ita ma kuma babu wanda tayi wa. Abin mamakin shine khadija ma ta daina
kulata, in dai suka shiga makarantar ba zata sake mata magana ba sai sun dawo gida.
Abinci ma da umma take hada musu tare khadija rigima ta saka sai dai ake raba musu,
Umma tace ba zata raba ba Abba yace "saboda me? Tunda Khadija tace a raba musu ai
tana da dalilinta, kika sani ko malaman ne suke cewa kowa yake zuwa da nashi daban
saboda gudun rigima?" Khadija tana jin haka tayi karaf tace "eh Abba, Teacher din
mu ne yace a ringa raba mana" Aisha ta san karya Khadija take yi amma da Umma ta
tambayeta gaskiyar lamarin sai tace "eh, hakane" dan haka Umma ta raba musu.
Khadija tana zuwa makaranta suka fara ciyayya ita da sababbin kawayenta.
A bangaren karatu kuwa, Aisha tafi khadija budaddiyar kwakwalwar karatu sosai,
saboda tana zaune a baya amma duk abinda akayi a aji daga ya shiga kanta baya fita
ya zauna kenan, ko menene taji ko ta gani to ta rike kenan. Amma sam bata zakewa ta
nuna tana ganewa sosai. Rannan wani teacher dinsu yana ajin tana musu karatu, sai
yayi tambaya, duk class din babu wanda ya daga hannu, Aisha ta san amsar amma ta
kasa daga hannunta sabida tana tsoro, har teacher din yace duk wanda ya bada wannan
amsar zai bashi kyauta, a hankali Aisha ta daga hannunta, amma ga mamakinta sai
taga malamin yayi dariya, wannan ya saka gaba daya sauran 'yan ajin suma suka yi
dariyar, har da Khadija. Malamin ya kira ta yace ta fito gaban ajin, nan take
jikinta ya fara karkarwa hawaye ya taru a idonta,ta fito ta tsaya ya maimaita mata
tambayar, gashi dai tasan amsar amma tsoro da kuma dariyar da suka yi mata ya saka
ta kasa magana, ta fara in ina "ummm....I.....is....." Teacher din yayi mata tsawa
yace "shut off, dama nasan baki sani ba, dan kinji nace zan bada kyauta shine kika
wani daga hannu, da wani katon kanki anan. Class ayi mata shame shame shame" nan
take 'yan ajin suka dauka "Shame, shame, shame" har da Khadija, tafi ma kowa daga
murya. Aisha sai kuka, da gudu ta karasa seat dinta ta zauna tayi ta kukanta babu
mai rarrashinta. Suna zuwa gida Umma ta gane tayi kuka, nan ta saka ta a gaba da
tambaya amma tace mata babu komai, sai ta kira Khadija tace "me akayiwa Aisha tayi
kuka a makaranta" Khadija ta yamutsa fuska tace "ba fa wani abun akayi mata ba, wai
dan anyi mata shame shame shame, kuma ita ce bata da kokari, duk ajin tafi kowa
rashin kokari, duk abubuwan da ake koya mana bata ganewa" Umma taji babu dadi a
ranta, tun daga ranar ta fara yi musu extra lesson a gida, amma sai ta lura Aishan
tana da kwakwalwa sosai, Khadija ce bata da ita, data fara yiwa Khadijan fada sai
Abba yazo yace "to dama banda takurawa, ya za'ayi sunje makaranta sun yi karatu sun
gaji sannan kuma a gidan ma ba za'a barsu su huta ba, ba dole kanta ya chushe ta
kasa gane me kike koyawa ba?"
A haka har suka gana first term dinsu akayi exams, da yake rubutu ne sai Aisha bata
ji tsoro ba ta rubuta duk abinda aka tambayeta. Ranarda zasu yi hutu aka raba musu
report card, class teacher din su Aisha yazo ajin yana rabawa, ya faro daga ta
karshe, sai ga sunan khadija ata biyun karshe, duk wanda aka bawa sai ya tsaya a
gaban allo, ana ta kira ana tashi ana barin Aisha, wasa wasa har sai da ya zamanto
ita kadai tayi saura a zaune, itace ta dauki first position. Kowa a ajin sai da
yayi mamaki, nan teacher din yace ayi ta tafa mata, ya bata report dinta sannan ya
bata kyauta, dan karamin dictionary da kuma brighter grammar. Ranar har 'yan manyan
aji sai da suka zo kallon Aisha. Aisha kuwa bakinta har kunne, yayinda Khadija ta
cika ta batse kamar zata fashe.
Suna zuwa bakin gate suka tarar da prefects a tsaye, kowa zai wuce sai sun karbi
report dinsa sun duba, idan kayi kokari suyi shaking hand dinka idan kuma bakayi ba
su rankwashe ka. Aisha tana zuwa suka karbi nata suka duba, head girl ta kira head
boy "kaga wannan yariyar na daya tayi" da mamaki head boy din ya karbi result din
ya duba sannan ya kuma kallon Aisha sama da kasa, sai ya kyalkyale da dariya yace
"ji mummunar yarinya da kokari" head girl tayi dariya itama tace "muni kam kamar a
yanka a boye wukar" ya mikawa Aisha wadda ta tsaya ta saki baki tana kallonsu card
dinta, yace "kinyi kokari, maza jeki gida ki nuna wa babanki" sai kuma yace da head
girl "baki yi shaking hand dinta ba" ta kalli Aisha ta yamutsa fuska tace "Allah ya
tsari gatari da saran shuka" gaba daya yaran gurin suka kwashe da dariya. Aisha duk
taji abinda suka fada kuma duk da kankantar shekarunta duk ta tahimci abinda suke
nufi, ita mummuna ce, tunda tafara wayo tasan mutane suna yi mata ba'a amma ba'a
taba fitowa direct ance mata mummuna ba sai yau. Tana zuwa gida direct bedroom din
umma ta wuce ta tsaya a gaban madubi tana kallon fuskata, a hankali hawaye ya fara
taruwa a idonta, tun daga ranar Aisha ta saka a ranta cewa ita mummuna ce.

#sadaukarwa ga duk masu feeling self conscious of their appearance, we are all
beautiful, we are all unique. Kar ka/ki yarda da duk wani abu da wani zai gaya miki
akan halittar ki, wanda ya halicce ki yafi kowa sonki, kuma ya halicce ki ne
special because you are special.

Episode 3: The Sisters
Kwanci tashi asarar mai rai. A hankali shekaru suke tafiya har sisters din suka
girma suka zama 'yammata. Kamar yadda mutane sukayi tsammani haka ce ta kasance,
Khadija grew up to be a very beautiful lady, kyakykyawa sosai, irin kyan da in ka
kalle ta sai ka sake kallonta, komai nata tamkar ita ta yiwa kanta. Fara ce tas,
doguwa mai doguwar fuska da dogon hanci, da siraran pink lips masu daukar
hankali.Sexy eyes ne da ita matsakaita masu jan halkalin duk wanda ta kalla.
Khadija tana da girman jiki, dan komai da ake bukata a jikin mace khadija tana
dashi, duk wanda ya kalleta zai dauka tafi shekarunta. Ga farin jini da Allah ya
bata, dan Khadija tun tana jss1 take da samari, sai da Abba ya ajiye son da yake
mata yayi mata fada sosai sannan aka daina zuwa zance gurinta, abinda basu sani ba
shine ba wai daina samarin tayi ba, a'a daina kawo su gida tayi. Tun tana jss2 wani
saurayinta ya saya mata waya, amma kaf gidan in banda Aisha da suke kwana tare babu
wanda yasan tana da wayar, dan kashe ta take sai dare in Umma ta tafi dakin Abba
sannan zata dauko tayi ta wayar ta, ta raba dare tana hira da samari wani lokacin
har sai Aisha tayi bacci khadija tana waya. Aisha tayi kokarin yi mata fada sai
tace "ba'kin ciki kike yi min? Dan ke baki da saurayin da zai sai miki wayar?" Tun
daga nan Aisha bata kuma kulata ba. Har suka girma kan Khadija babu komai na
karatu, boko da islamiyya duk zero, sai kwalliya da iya daukan wanka, wannan kuwa
in da ace ana grading da A zata ke samu kullum. Sanda aka kai su senior class aka
dinka musu sabon uniforms, Khadija sai ta dauki nata ta kai gurin tailor akayi
shaping rigar, wandon kuma aka mayar mata dashi pencil, umma tayi ta mata fada daga
karshe ta bata dogon hijab tace take sakawa akan kayan, amma Khadija sai ta zame ta
je gurin tailor yayi mata dan karamin hijab, kullum sai ta saka babban ta fita daga
gida, tana barin layinsu zata cire tasa ka karamin ta tayi tafiyar ta. Makarantar
su mixed ce mata da maza, dan haka Khadija samari ne da ita a cikin students da
kuma cikin staff, dan har fada ake yi akanta. Aisha abin yana damunta amma da zaran
tayi mata magana zata hauta da masifa, a karshe ma ta hada ta da daya daga cikin
samarin ta na malamai tasa ya zane ta wai ta saka mata ido da yawa. A zahirin
gaskiya Khadija is ashamed of having Aisha as her sister, tana ganin kamar munin
Aishan yana reflecting on her, dan haka duk yadda zata yi bata son wani abu ya hada
ta da Aishan a waje yadda za'a gane cewa sister dinta ce. Dan haka ko makaranta
basa tafiya tare, Aisha da wuri take tafiya ita kuma Khadija sai ta tsaya ta jira
kawayenta sun biyo mata. Hatta yasaiyyadin islamiyyar su saurayin Khadija ne. A
cikin samarinta akwai mai bata kudi, mai saka mata kati, mai kaita shopping (bada
sanin Umma take zuwa ba, duk abinda ta siyo kuma sai ta boye a dakin su inda tasan
umman va zata gani ba) dan haka kullum jakar Khadija da kudi, a makaranta sai
abinda take so zata ci.
A bangaren Aisha kuwa tun ranar da su head girl suka yi mata dariya suka kira ta da
mummuna tun a ranar ta saka a ranta cewa ita din mummunar ce. Dan haka ta kara jan
jikinta baya daga cikin mutane, ta zama very self conscious of her appearance, gani
take yi kamar duk abinda tayi za'ayi mata dariya ne. Aisha bata da girman jiki sam,
'yar karama ce, baka ce sosai, kuma kankantar jikinta shi yasa kanta ya zama kamar
yayi girma da yawa. Tana da manyan idanu farare tas, dan idonta har yafi na Khadija
fari, hakan yasa kana kallonta idon zaka gani fari tas a cikin bakar fuska.
Fuskarta doguwa ce, hancinta yana da girma sosai, too big for her small face.
Tun daga primary har secondary Aisha bata taba daukan second position ba, kullum
ita ce first, amma kuma sam bata da zakewa a aji, dan da wahala ayi tambaya ta daga
hannu ko kuma ita tayi tambayar, saboda sam bata son abinda zai jawo hankalin
mutane kanta ballantana suga munin ta suyi mata dariya. Bata da kawa ballantana
aboki, in kaga Aisha tare da wani ko wata to ka tabbatar karatu suka zo ta koya
musu. A gari bata yawo sam, sai dai in aikenta umma tayi, shima da sauri zata je ta
dawo. Ranar nan taje siyan kayan miya a kasuwa, ana cikin zuba mata taji wani a
kusa da mai kayan miyan yana magana kasa kasa shi da dan'uwansa "Allah yayi halitta
a gurin nan, kaga wani hanci kamar na botorami?" Dayan yayi dariya har da
kyakyatawa yace "ko kyauta aka bani wannan ba zan karba ba" Aisha ta fahimci da ita
suke amma bata kalle su ballantana su san taji su, sai dai tana barin gurin su
hawaye ya farazubo mata tana tafiya tana gigewa har tazo gida. Aisha ko gidan kitso
bata zuwa, rabonta da taje tun suna primary school rannan sunje ita da Khadija,
Khadija tana bude kanta mutanen gurin suka fara yabawa "masha Allah, kaga jinin
fulani" wata tace "Khadija wannan gashib naki kamar in sace in gudu" Khadija sai
fari take da ido tana gyada kai cikin jin dadi, mai kitson ta yarfa mata kananan
kitso masu kyau, a gurin harda mai daukan hoton kan Khadija saboda kyan da yayi.
Ana gama yi mata aka ce Aisha ta bude ayi mata, tana bude kanta kusan duk mutanen
gurin suka kwashe da dariya "Aisha ya haka? Wannan gashin haka kamar hammatar dan
dako? Ke dai kam baki yo gadon fulani ba, ke ba fari ba ke ba kyau ba kuma gashin
ma baki dashi?" (Sai kace ita tayi kanta). Haka mai kitson ta bubburkuta mata manya
wai ita ta gaji. Tun daga ranar Aisha ta daina zuwa gidan kitso, ta roki Umma tace
dan Allah ta ringa yi mata kayanta a gida, Umma tace Khadija itama take zama tana
yi musu tare amma Khadija tace tafi son zuwa gidan kitso, ko ba komai ai ta samu
license din fita yawo.
Tun Aisha tana karama Allah ya bata baiwar iya girki, dan har tafi Umma iya girki,
in tayi maka abinci ko waye kai in kaci sai ka yaba, dan yanzu gaba daya ita take
yin abincin gidan, shi kansa Abba idan va ita tayi girkin ba sai ya danyi 'yan
kunkunai kafin yaci. Ba girki kadai ba, duk wani abu daya danganci aikin gida ta
iya shi, gata da tsafta dan haka kullum gidansu in ka shiga zaka ganshi tas, itama
jikinta tas, sai dai sam bata kwalliya, dan ita a ganinta bata da amfani, she
believed that she will always look ugly, dan haka in tayi kwalliyar ma ba zata yi
mata kyau ba.
A lokacin da suka fara shirye shiryen SSCE ne hankalin Khadija ya tashi. Rannan
suna zaune a daki suna karatu, Aisha tana koyawa Khadija duk kuwa da cewa ba abinda
take gane wa. Tayi tsaki tana kokarin mikewa tsaye tace "ni wallahi bana ganewa
abinda kike yi, kai na har ya fara ciwo" Aisha tayi dariya tace "saboda hankalinki
baya gurin shi yasa ba kya ganewa" Khadija tace "gobe fa birthday din Zainab,
kinsan kuma yadda muke da ita, gashi wannan sakaran yace zai sayo min gift din da
zan bata amma ya jirga ni, I should have known dama babu kwandala a hannunsa ya
saka na bata lokaci na a gurinsa. Sannan takalmin da nake so in saka shima ban siyo
ba, abubuwa duk sun taru sunyi min yawa" tunda ta fara maganar Aisha ta ke murmushi
tana kallonta, ita mamakin khadija take yi, komai a gurinta abin tayar da hankali
ne, me akayi akai wani birthday party ballantana takalmin sakawa da har zata kasa
karatu akan sa. Khadija ta bata fuska "au dariya ma na baki ko?" Aisha tace "to ai
kece kike saka ni dariyar, duk abinda kike so ki gaya wa Umma, in tana dashi ai
zata baki, amma ke sai kice lallai a hannun samari zaki samu abin duniya, ki zo ki
daga hankalinki a banza, har gashi nan kin kasa karatu" Khadija tayi ajjiyar zuciya
ta dawo ta zauna kusa da Aisha tace "Aisha, ina son karatun nan wallahi, amma bana
ganewa kin sani, I am not cut out for this. Bakin ciki na shine nasan ba zanci ssce
ba, hakan kuma yana nufin ba zanje jami'a ba, ni kuma a rayuwata bani da burin da
yafi in ganni a jami'a, acan ake rayuwa, kawayena duk zasu tafi su barni, aji na
zai ragu a cikin friends dina, irin waye zai yi 'kawance da wacce bata yi
university ba" ga mamakin Aisha sai taga hawaye ya taru a idon Khadija, abinka da
'yar uwa, kawai sai taji tausayi ta ya kama ta. Tana kallonta ta fara wani tunani a
ranta, ita bata da burin cigaba da karatu, ba wai karatun ne ba zata iya ba a'a
rayuwar jami'ar ce ba zata iya ba. Tana gani a gari yadda 'yan jami'a suke, da kuma
irin labaran da take ji a gurin mutane, ita tasan ba zata iya ba, she has the brain
but she is not cut out for university. Tasan bakin ciki zatayi ta 'kunsa. Ita kuma
sister d'inta babu brain din amma kuma tana son zuwa. Ta dago kai tana kallon
khadija tace "I will write the exam for you, in dai har kinyi al'kawarin in kinje
university din da gaske karatun zaki yi" da sauri Khadija ta gyara zama tace "ban
gane ba?" Aisha tace "in mun tashi yin ssce zan ke rubuta sunan ki da reg no dinki,
ke kuma sai kike rubuta nawa, kinga result d'ina sai ya fito da sunanki, in Allah
yasa an dace result din yayi kyau sai ki nemi administration dashi, tunda ni ba
zuwa university din zan yi ba" Ba tare da Khadija ta tambayi Aisha dalilin ta na
rashin son zuwa university ba, sai ta kama murna, ta rungume Aisha tace "na gode
'yar'uwa ta, kin gama yimin komai, Allah ya bar min ke" Aisha tana dariya tace
"Ameen, kema Allah ya bar min ke, 'yar 'uwata rabin jikina".
Tun daga lokacin Khadija ta watsar da batun karatu ta cigaba da harkokinta
hankalinta a kwance, kullum zata yiwa Umma 'karya tace zasu yi extra lesson a
school, tana fita zata cire hijab din jikinta ta saka karamin mayafi ta tafi gidan
'kawaye, daga can za'a hadu da samari a fita yawo, sai ta dai daici lokacin dawowar
Abba gida sannan zata koma. Samari ne da Khadija kamar jamfa a jos, cikinsu akwai
manyan mutane, akwai 'yan kasuwa, akwai 'yan siyasa, akwai kuma yara matasa 'yan
makaranta, kowa da akwai dalilin da yasa take kulashi, su manyan saboda su bata
abin duniya, su kuma matasan saboda su fita da ita yawo ta nuna wa 'kawaye su.
Kwanci tashi har aka gama ssce, lokacin har party su Khadija suka shirya a 3 star
hotel, da kyar umma ta matsawa Aisha taje, amma tana zuwa ta samu guri ta zauna
bata kuma tashi ba sai da aka gama. Khadija kuwa sune iyayen taro dan haka tunda
aka fara bata zauna ba har aka gama, shigar da tayi kuwa in ka ganta kai kanka sai
kaji kunya amma ita ko a jikinta tana ganin wannan shine birgewa.

Zan danyi tunatarwa da jan hankali ga iyaye da malaman makaranta dama sauran
al'umma akan d'abi'ar mu tayin ba'a ga halittar mutane. Kai da ba zaka iya halittar
koda kiyashi ba ina kai ina kushe cikakkiyar halitta irin ta mutum? Kowa ka gani to
Allah ya halicce shi yadda yake ne for a reason, ba wai dan baya son shi ba sai don
yana son shi, kuma shi kadai yasan me ya tsara masa a rayuwa, da ace ka kasance
kyakykyawa but cursed gwara ka zama mummuna but blessed. Shi kyawu na fuska is
nothing ni a ganina, kyan zuciya shine kyau. Kyau na fuska a gurin mace zai yi
saurin samar mata miji, amma kyawun zuciya shine zai zaunar da ita a gidan mijin.
Ba'a da muke yiwa mutanen da halittar su bata yi mana ba, ba karamin cutarwa bane
ba a gare su, yana cire musu confidence dinsu, yana cire musu self love dinsu, zasu
ji sun tsani kansu sun tsani shiga cikin mutane, wanda hakan ba karamin tawaya bane
ba ga rayuwarsu. Kuma in dai har kaga mutum kayi masa dariya da kuma mugun furuci
akan halittarsa to kuwa ka tabbatar sai Allah ya jarabceka ko iyalinka da irin
halittar da kayi wa dariyar dan kai ma ayi maka dariyar kaji yadda suka ji.

Episode 4 : The Admission

Result ya fito, Khadija Zayyan (Aisha) ta sami 7 credit 2 passes, ita kuma Aisha
Zayyan (Khadija) ta sami 1 credit a hausa, da kuma 1 pass a Islamic studies, sauran
kuma duk fail ne. Daga Umma har Abba sunyi mamakin wannan lamarin, dan duk sun san
Aisha ce mai kokari ba Khadija ba, Abba yace "haka Allah yake lamarinsa, dama kuma
ita SSCE sa'a ce, wanda ake saka ran zai ci bashi yake ci ba" yace da Aisha "kiyi
hakuri, wata shekarar in Allah ya kaimu sai kiyi resitting, in Allah yasa kina da
rabo sai kiga kin ci" Aisha tayi shiru bata ce masa komai ba amma a zuciyarta bata
so, saboda bata son ace zata cigaba da makaranta. Khadija kuwa ranar kamar zata
sume dan murna, nan da nan ta dauki waya ta fara kiran 'kawayenta tana basu labari,
kowa sai da yayi mamaki tunda babu wanda yasan abinda suka yi ita da Aisha.
Da yake Abba yana da hanya a sama, bai sha wahala ba wajan samarwa Khadija
administration a federal university, dutse. Amma kafin ta fara zuwa sai ya saunar
dasuita da Aisha yace "ni a sona so nayi kuna yin candy in aurar daku, dan haka ke
Khadija shiga makarantar nan ba wai yana nufin shikenan babu maganar aure ba, ina
son a cikin samarin da suke ta yi mana zarya a gidan nan ki fitar da miji, ayi miki
aurenki kina karatunki. Ke kuma Aisha kema ba zama zakiyi kuma jerawa ke da Rabi'a
ba, kema miji zaki fito dashi inyi miki aure in huta, in da rabon zakiyi karatun
sai kiyi a gidan mijinki" Khadija ta turo baki tace "ni fa Abba duk masu zuwan babu
wanda nake so, su kadai suke abinsu, ni babu wanda yayi min a cikin su" Abba yace
"to duk wanda ba kya so ba sai ki sallame shi ba? Ni bana son neman magana. Gaba ki
dayanku na baku shekara daya, lokacin da Aisha zata sake zana jarabawa ke kuma zaki
shiga level 2 a lokacin nake so in aurar daku gaba ki daya". Ita dai Aisha bata ce
komai ba, amma gaba daya hankalin ta ya tashi. Suna komawa dakinsu Khadija ta fara
mita "yanzu ya za'ayi ace wai aure za'a yi min, ni gaskiya tauye min rayuwa za'a
yi, wanne irin aure kuma ana zaune kalau? Ni wadannan kuchakan samarin nawa babu
wanda zan iya aura a cikin su". Aisha ta saki baki tana kallonta, a ranta tace "
kukan dadi kike yi Khadija, ni da babu wanda ya taba zuwa gurina zance ina zan iya
fitar da mijin aure?" A fili kuma tace "haba Khadija, ke kuwa yanzu duk samarinki
kice babu wanda zaki iya aure?" Aisha ta tabe baki tace "duk babu wanda yayi min da
aure, perfect mr right nake nema" Aisha tayi murmushi tace "kar ki manta Khadija,
no body is perfect, babu yadda za'ayi ki samu miji perfect tunda dai kema ai you
are not perfect" sai kuma Khadija taji haushi wai Aisha tace she is not perfect, ta
mike tsaye tana juyi tana girgiza jikinta tace "gaya min me na rasa a matsayina na
mace? Ko da yake ke tunda bashi be dake ba ba zaki fahimta ba, ke babu wanda ya
taba cewa yana sonki ballantana ki fahimci mai maza suke so a tattare da mace. Duk
hassadar mai hassada sai dai ya ganni ya kyale" daga haka ta juya ta ficewar ta.
Aisha taji zafin maganar Khadija amma in da sabo ta saba, kullum a haka suke,
kullum sai Khadija ta fadi wata maganar da zata nuna wa Aishan cewa ita ba
kyakykyawa bace ba.
A ranar da daddare Khadija ta fita zance, Aisha kuma tana daki ta idar da sallah ta
gama karatun alqur'ani, ta nade sallayar ta fita da niyar zuwa dakin umma, dama
haka take yi kullum in Khadija ta fita zance, Abba kuma yana majalissa, sai ta tafi
dakin umma su zauna suyi ta hirar su har sai Abba ya dawo sannan zai koro Khadija
gida sannan suje su kwanta. Tana zuwa kofar palon umma kafin tayi sallama sai taji
maganar ummansu "ni Aisha nake tausayawa maigida, ita ba saurayi ne da ita ba,
Aisha bata taba yin saurayi ba, gashi kace mata ta fitar da miji" Abbansu yace "ai
shi yasa na basu shekara daya, duk da dai nasan ba lallai ne ta samu miji a cikin
shekara daya ba, bana so ne taji babu dadi ace an fara yiwa kanwarta maganar aure
ita ba'ayi mata ba, amma na tabbatar sai na aurar da Khadija kafin Aisha" umma tace
"addu'ah zamuyi ta yi musu, Allah ya fito musu dana gari gabaki dayansu, ai abin
va'a tara samarin yake ba, sai kaga ita mai samarin bata samu mijin aure ba ita
wacce bata dasu ta samu" Abba ya danyi dariya yace "Rabi'a kenan, ke baki san
abinda duniya take ciki ba. Ai juma'ar da zata yi kyau tun daga laraba ake gane ta,
in bamu dage da addu'ar ba Aisha tare zamu tsufa da ita a gida, a karshe ma in ba
Allah ne ya rufa mata asiri ba sai dai mu samu wani a dangi mu lallaba shi mu hada
su" Umma tace "insha Allah zata sami miji da kanta, ai ba kyan fuska kadai ake
dubawa a aure ba, har da kyan hali, kuma Aisha tana da hali mai kyau" Abba yace "a
zamanin yanzu maza basu fiya duba halin ba, sunfi son macen da zasu ke jin dadi in
sun kalleta, sunfi son macen da zasu ke jin dadin harkar auratayya da ita, Aisha
kuma bata cikin wadannan matan" da sauri Aisha ta saka hannu ta toshe kunnuwanta, a
take hawaye suka fara sauko mata wani na bin wani, da sauri mai hade da gudu ta
koma dakinsu ta fada kan gado ta fara rera kuka, zuciyarta tayi mata bakikkirin,
sai da tayi kuka mai isarta sannan ta mike ta tsaya a gaban mudubi tana kallon
kanta, sai taga cewa kamar duk duniya babu wanda ya fita muni, a hankali ta furta
"am ugly, babu wani namijin da zai taba cewa yana sona da aure, hatta mahaifina ma
ya san haka".
A ranar kusan kwana tayi ba tayi bacci ba tana lissafin rayuwarta da kuma abinda
zai je yazo, she is already twenty years old, dan ma karamin jiki ne da ita.
Khadija ta fahimci ranar akwai abinda yake damun yayar tata, amma data tambayeta
sai ta ce mata babu komai, dan haka ta daga kafadar ta ta cigaba da al'amuranta.
Washegari Aisha ta tashi fuskarta babu yabo babu fallasa, tun da ta idar da sallah
ta fita ta fara aikin gida kamar yadda ta saba. Khadija ma yau da wuri da tashi,
saboda yau ne zata fara zuwa makaranta, tayi wanka ta shirya tsaf da ita, ta saka
sabon hijab a cikin hijaban da umma ta dinka mata saboda makaranta. Kafin ta fito
Aisha ta gama gyara gidan tas ta kunna turare wuta, ta jera musu kayan breakfast a
palo, Khadija tana fitowa Aisha ta shiga daki ta shiga wanka itama. Sanda ta gama
da dawo palo ta tarar duk suna palon suna cin abincin data shirya musu, ta durkusa
ta gaishe da Umma da Abba sannan ta fara zuba nata abincin itama. Suna dan hira
sama sama umma tana yiwa Khadija nasiha akan makarantar da zata fara zuwa, Abba
kuma yana ta yi mata dariyar yadda ta kasa rufe baki saboda murnar ta zama 'yar
jami'a. Sai hirar su suke suna rahar su amma Aisha sam takasa manta abinda taji
jiya, su kuma Umma da Abba sai suka dauka tana jin babu dadi ne saboda tafiya
makarantar da Khadija zata yi ta barta a gida. Bayan sun gama karyawa Abba ya tafi
kai Khadija daga nan kuma zai tafi office shima. Suna fita Umma ta fara yiwa Aisha
nasiha akan yadda da kaddara, ta cire komai a ranta ta cigaba da addu'a, idan tana
da rabon yin karatun nan da shekara mai zuwa itama sai taga ta fara zuwa. Kawai sai
Aisha taji hawaye ya sake dawo mata, a ranta tace "Allah sarki umma, da ina son
zuwa makaranta da yanzu nice na fita ba Khadija ba, amma bazan iya shiga cikin 'yan
gayun jami'a suna yi min dariya ba kamar yadda bazan samu mijin aure ba saboda muni
na" nan take hankalin Umma ya tashi saboda ganin hawayen Aisha, dan tasan Aisha
yari ya ce mai dauriya, da wahala abu ya saka ta kuka, wannan ne ya saka itama Umma
gaba ki daya ranar a cikin rashin walwala tayi ta, tana ta lissafin hanyar da zata
farantawa 'yar tata rai.
Da yamma suka yi ba'kuwa. Hajiya Maryam, wacce suke kira da Mama, aminiya ce a
gurin Umma, dan tare sukayi secondary school kuma Allah ya hada su zama a gari
daya. Hajiya Maryam asalinta ba bahaushiya bace, asalinta ma ba musulma bace, Igbo
ce kuma Christian, sec sch din da tayi a arewa ne ya saka Allah ya haskaka ta da
hasken musulunci har ta karba, kuma malamin daya musuluntar da ita ya aure ta, dan
haka bata koma kudu ba tayi zamanta a arewa har ta hayayyafa, daga baya Allah ya
karbi ran mijinta ita kuma ta cigaba da rainon 'ya'yanta tana basu tarbiyya sosai a
cikin addinin musulunci. Mama tana da kirki sosai, dan wani abinda zata yi maka
wani bahaushen ba zai yi maka irinsa ba. Harkar abincin siyarwa take yi yanzu a
cikin cafeteriar makarantar FUD, kuma tana samun bud'i sosai a harkar. Da murna
Aisha taje ta taryeta, itama ta rungume ta a jikinta, dama jininta yafi haduwa da
Aisha akan Khadija, musamman saboda ita macece mai addini sosai dan haka bata jin
dadin wasu daga cikin halayen khadijan.
Tana zama Aisha ta gaishe ta, ta amsa mata da fara'ar ta, Aisha ta kawo mata dambun
shinkafar da tayi dazu da rana, wanda yaji albasa mai lawashi da kifi, sai kamshi
yake yi, tana ajjiyewa ta koma ta dauko mata zobon da shima itace tayi, yaji kayan
kamshi gashi ya dau sanyi. Mama tayi mata godiya tace "Allah ya nuna min aurenki in
yi rawa in juya son raina" yadda ta kwatanta rawar ne ya saka Aisha da Umma suka yi
dariya a tare, Aisha ta dan zauna kadan sai kuma ta tashi ta basu guri. Tana tafiya
Mama ta zuba abincin ta fara ci, ta tsiyaye zobo ta kurba tace "kai Rabi'a, wannan
yarinya Allah yayi mata baiwa mai tarin yawa, dan ba sai kin gaya min ba ma nasan
wannan abincin ita ce tayi ba ke ba" Umma tayi dariya tace "bara in dauko pillow
inyi miki waigi, dan naga alamar santin abincin 'yar taki kike yi" Mama tace "yo va
dole inyi santi ba, ko ni da nake abincin sayarwa ban kai Aisha iya girki ba" suka
cigaba da hirar su sannan Mama tace "ina Khadija ne? Ko tana can tana mulkin nata"
Umma tayi murmushi tace "Khadija kin baro ta a FUD ai. Ta samu administration yau
ta fara zuwa makaranta" Mama tace "Aisha kuma fa?" Umma tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace
"Aisha bata ci jarabawa ba Maryam. Ina tausayin Aisha" sannan ta bata labarin
zancen auren da babansu yace zai yi musu nan da shekara daya, ta kara da cewa "ita
Aisha babu inda take zuwa, nan muke wuni tare da ita, ko 'kawaye bata da su, bata
taba yin saurayi ba ko da wasa, gashi kuma 'yaruwarta ta samu admission ta barta,
dazu har kuka tayi data tafi makaranta ta barta" Mama ta danyi shiru tana tunani, a
zuciyarta tana tausayin Aishan, sai tace "Ni kuwa Rabi'a da Zayyan zai yarda da
Aisha ta ringa zuwa cafeteria gurina muna zama tare mana, kinga zata zama busy a
can bazata ke yawan tunani ba, zata shiga cikin mutane maybe ma tayi friends, kuma
idan ma maganar samun mijin ne idan tana fita zai fi mata sauki akan idan tana
zaune a gida" Umma tayi shiru tana lissafa maganar Mama, Mama ta cigaba da cewa
"kuma yadda Aisha take son girki kinsan zata yi enjoying kanta. Zata fara sakewa da
mutane ta daina hiding kanta a daki, she will gain self confidence tunda zata ke
dealing da different customers kullum. Besides, zata saba da rayuwar university tun
kafin ta samu admission itama" still umma batace komai ba, Mama tace "ba wai zan
dauketa aiki bane ba, zata ke taya ni aiki ne kamar yadda Binta da Sa'adatu
('ya'yanta) suke yi" Umma tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace "to Maryam, nagode da shawarar
ki, zanyiwa babansu magana in ya dawo in ji ko zai amince, ita ma kuma zan tambayi
ra'ayinta inji". Da haka sukayi sallama ta tafi.

Episode 5 : Federal University, Dutse.
Har bayan kwana uku Umma tana ta tunanin maganganun aminiyar tata, bata son Aishan
taga kamar basa santa ne ya saka zasu tura ta aiki a gurin siyar da abinci, saboda
mutanen mu suna yiwa duk mai harkar sayar da abinci wani kallo na daban, amma ita
tasan Mama tana daga cikin mutane masu ruko da akidar musulunci sosai, dan tasan ko
ita ba zata gaya mata addini ba, kuma tasan yadda 'ya'yanta suke da tarbiyya. A
rana ta ukun ne dai ta daure ta gaya wa Abba shawararda suka yi da Mama. Tayi shiru
tana jiran taji ta ina zai fara yi mata fadan zata mayar masa da 'ya kamar 'yar
talla, amma ga mamakin ta sai taji yace "in dai hakan zai taimaka mata wajan samun
mijin aure na amince ta fara zuwa d'in" sai kuma umma taji babu dadi, taso ya
d'anyi mata fada ko yayane ya nuna mata ya damu da 'yar tasa, tace "ai ba zancen
mijin aure bama Alhaji, yadda zata koyi shiga mutane itama ta ke jin dadin rayuwa
irin na sauran mutane shi muke nema mata" ya 'bata rai yace "ku mata karamar
'kwa'kwalwa ne daku, wanne irin jin dadin rayuwa kuma? Wanne irin shiga mutane kuma
kike so ta koya, me ya rage a rayuwar Aisha kuma in banda muyi ta mata addu'a ta
samu miji tayi aure? Ke kullum ana nuna miki annabi kina runtse ido" ya tashi ya
dauki hularsa ya saka ya fice. Duk jikin Umma babu dadi ta rasa sanin in abinda
take yi dai dai ne ko ba dai dai bane ba, tana neman shawara. Ta dauki wayarta ta
kira sister dinta aunty Bilkisu, wacce take aure a kano unguwar gwauron dutse,
aunty bilki tana da zafi sosai, dan haka itama tafi shiri da Aisha akan Khadija.
Tana d'auka suka gaisa cikin raha kowa yana tambayar lafiyar iyalin kowa. Umma tace
"Bilkisu shawara nake nema" Aunty Bilki tace "ina jinki yaya" nan umma ta bata
labarin duk halin da ake ciki da kuma amsar da ta samu daga maigidan nata. Sun jima
suna tattauna maganar, suna lissafa good sides da bad sides din aikin da Aisha zata
fara zuwa, a karshe dai suka ga cewa the good outweigh the bad, dan suna ganin
Aisha tana da tarbiyya sosai da kuma kamun kai, dan haka da wahala a samu
gur'bacewar tarbiyyarta wanda hakan shine bad side d'in da sukayi considering,
maganar mutane sun ajiyeta a gefe tunda dai duk abinda zakayi ba zaka ta'ba yiwa
mutane dai dai ba.
Da wannan shawarar umma ta kwana, washegari suna breakfast tayi breaking news din
tace "Aisha ina son zaki fara bin Khadija makaranta, zaki ke zama a gurin Mama kina
taya ta aiyuka a cafeteria, da yamma sai ki dawo gida". Aisha jin maganar tayi wani
iri, ta kasa yanke hukuncin me take ji a ranta, Khadija ce tayi retaliating, ta
ajiye chokalin hannunta tace "Umma? Me kike cewa? Aikatau zaku tura Aisha
cafeteria?" Abba ya hade rai yace "waye yace miki aikatau zata yi? Kinji ance za'a
ke biyan ta kudi ne ko makamancin haka? Zuwa zata ke yi kawai saboda ta rage zaman
gida" nan take hawaye ya taru a idon Khadija, tace "gaskiya ni dai ba'ayi min
adalci ba, wannan ai zubar min da class d'ina za'a yi, kawai kuma muna tare da
friends d'ina sai kuma ace ga sister ta can tana siyar da abinci a cafeteria? Da
wanne idon zan kalli 'yan ajin mu?" Wani haushi ne ya kama Aisha, Khadija tana da
son kanta da yawa, she cares about no one but herself, kawai sai ta samu kanta da
cewa "Umma na yarda zanke zuwa, zan fara daga gobe" da sauri Khadija ta mike ta
turo baki tana bubbuga kafa ta shige daki, Umma tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace "Allah ya
shirya min ke Khadija" Abba kuma yi yayi kamar baisan me suke yi ba.
Washegari kamar yadda Aisha ta saba tashi da assuba haka ta tashi, cikin sauri ta
fara aiyukan gida, tayi shara tayi mopping ta shiga kitchen ta dama kunu ta fere
doya ta dora sannan ta koma daki da sauri tayi wanka ta dawo kitchen ta fara soya
doyar sai ga Umma tazo ta karba tana karasawa ita kuma ta koma daki ta shirya, sai
a lokacin Khadija ta tashi, tana ta faman 'bata fuska ta shiga wanka. Sai da suka
gama breakfast sannan ta fito, ta ci kwalliya kamar mai zuwa gidan biki, amma ta
zura dogon hijab har kasa, tana bude kwanon abincin tayi tsaki, "jiya naci doya yau
ma ace doyar zanci?" Umma tace "uban wa yace kar ki tashi ki dafa abinda kike so?
Kina bacci aka dafa miki abinci maimakon kice kin gode sai kiyi complain?". Khadija
kunu kawai tasha, Abba ya dauko dari biyar ya vata yace ta ci abinci a makaranta,
ba kunya ba tsoron Allah ta karbe duk kuwa da cewa jakarta fal take da kudin
samari. Abba yana gamawa yace su tashi ya ajiye su ya wuce gurin aiki, da sauri
Aisha ta shiga daki, minti biyu sai gata ta fito, duk suka saki baki suna kallonta,
hijab ne a jikinta itama dogo, amma ba shi ne abin mamakin ba, nikab ne a daure a
fuskarta, babu abinda kake gani sai idanuwanta, ta tsaya tace " Abba na fito" Umma
tayi ajjiyar zuciya. Sai a lokacin Khadija ta dan saki fuskarta, taji dadin saka
nikab din da Aisha tayi saboda tasan babu wanda zai ganeta ballantana ya dangantata
da ita. Tunda aka sauke su a bakin gate kowa ta kama hanyar ta, Aisha tayi hanyar
cafeteria Khadija kuma tayi hanyar hostel.
A haka rayuwa ta cigaba da tafiyar musu, kullum zasu fita tare amma suna shiga kowa
zai kama gabansa. Da farko Aisha ta fara zuwa gurin Mama ne kawai saboda Umma tace
mata taje, kuma ba zata iya yi mata musu ba, a hankali kuma sai ta fara jin dadin
abin, dan sosai Mama take janta a jikinta, Sa'a da Binta kuma sun zama tamkar
kannenta, sosai take jin dadin aiki a gurin, in ta shiga tun safe suka fara abinci
bata tafiya gida sai karfe biyar, shima Mama ce take cewa ta tafi gida bawai dan
sun gama aiki ba ko kuma dan ta gaji ba. Zamanta a gurin ya saka ta kara 'kwarewa a
harkar girki, dan yanzu ta iya dishes na different tribes, duk girkin kuma da aka
koyawa Aisha in tayi sai kaji yafi na wanda ya koya mata din ma dad'i. Amma har yau
bata iya bude fuskarta, kullum da nikab take zuwa kuma har ta tafi bata cire shi.
Yanayin cafeteria din hall ne madaidaici, da tables da kujeru a jere, sai doguwar
kanta a karshe, inda tanan ake bada order d'in abinci, d'an corridor ne a bayan
kantar, a hannun damansa kitchen ne, sai hannun hagu kuma daki ne mai hade da
toilet inda su Aisha suke zama su huta kuma suyi sallah. Sosai Aisha ta fara sabawa
da customers d'insu, har wasa suke yi da dariya, yawancinsu sun san 'kwarewar Aisha
akan harkar girkin dan haka in sunzo sai suyi ta nemanta, ayi ta wasa da dariya
dasu Binta suna cewa suma sun iya abincin ai. Amma duk da haka Aisha bata cire
nikab dinta ba, har yanzu ta kasa samun confidence d'in facing mutane da fuskarta,
gani take suna ganin cewa ita ba kyakykyawa bace ba zasu fara 'kyamarta. Ta riga ta
saka a ranta cewa ita bata da kyau kuma mutane sunfi son kyakykyawa.
Khadija sam bata zuwa cafeteria din da Aisha take aiki, dan bata son abinda zai
dangantata da ita. Wannan ya saka sam basu taba haduwa a cikin makaranta ba, in sun
rabu a bakin gate sai dai kuma in sun koma gida suke sake haduwa.
Wata rana su Aisha suna cikin aikinsu sai ga order daga office din vc, emergency
ana bukatar abinci za'a kaiwa ba'kin vc, ba tare da shakkar komai ba Mama ta ce
Aisha ta hada abincin, nan take Aisha ta kira su Binta dan suzo su taya ta hadawa.
Ta bud'e freezer din su ta tabbatar tana da duk abinda take bu'kata. Ta yanke
shawarar zatayi grilled catfish, buttered macaroni da kuma coconut kisses as
appetizer. Farko suka yanka cabbage da carrots da albasa da attaruhu, yanka mai
kyau. Ta dauko katon catfish ta wanke ta cire kayan ciki. Ta debo yankakkun
attaruhu tumatir tafarnuwa da albasa ta zuba a tukunya ta zuba ruwa dan kadan ta
rufe, sai ta yayi laushi sannan ta bude ta zuba gishiri dan kadan da maggi, ta saka
mai kadan ta dan soya masa masa. Ta dauko kifin da ta wanke ta dan tsaga samanshi
da kasanshi yadda kayan hadin zasu ratsa shi. Ta samu karamin bowl ta hada maggi,
onga, magic seasoning, nutmeg powder, kitchen magic (fish flavor), big mama (fish
flavor) da curry, dai dai yadda tasan zasu ishi kifinta. Daga nan sai ta dora
kifinta akan foil paper ta barbadeshi da hadin maggin da kuma souce din attaruhun
ta tayi, ta tabbatar ko ina ya samu sannan ta nannade foil paper din ta saka shi a
oven din da ta kunna tun dazu.
Daga nan sai ta koma kan macaronin ta, tafasa daya tayi mata ta tace ta ta ajiye.
Ta debi yankakkun wankakkun cabbage, carrots, green beans, peas ta tafasa su,
tafasa daya, ta tace ta ajiye. Ta tafasa kwai shima ta yayyanka kanana ta ajiye.
Dama suna da tafashashshen nama, shima ta dauko ta yayyanka kanana ta ajiye. Ta
dora empty tukunya akan wuta ta zuba butter mai yawa a ciki, sannan ta zuba
yankakkiyar albasar ta mai yawa tare da attaruhu da kayan 'kamshi a ciki, ta ringa
juyawa har sai da albasar tayi brown sannan ta dauko yankakkun kayan lambun nan da
nama da kwai duk ta zuba a ciki, tayi ta soya su a tare har sai da suka hade jikin
su sannan ta zuba ruwan nama kadan akai, ta zuba gishiri da maggi da curry. Sannan
ta kawo tafasashshiyar macaronin ta ta zuba a ciki ta juya ta rufe. Minti biyar ta
kara juyawa ta sauke. A lokacin ta duba kifinta shima taga yayi sai ta sauke. Daga
nan sai ta dauko kwai guda hudu ta fasa a bowl, ta cire kwanduwar ta ajiye a gefe,
ta zuba gishiri kadan sugar kadan, ka rinka kadawa har sai da taga ya narke yayi
ruwa sosai sannan ta dauko gogaggiyar coconut guda biyu ta zuba akan kwan ta juya
har ya hade jikinsa. Ta saka tea spoon ta ringa jerawa akan farantin gashi sannan
ta saka a oven ta barshi 5 minutes sannan ta sauke.
Tana gamawa ta hada komai ta jera ta bayar aka kai Senate building inda office din
vc yake. Hatta Mama sai da tayi mamakin dadin abincin. Tace "Aisha Allah yayi miki
baiwa, kuma insha Allah wannan baiwar zata kaiki inda baki taba tsammani ba".

guda biyu techno w3 second hand ya kawo wa su Aisha, Aisha ta durkusa ta karba tace

Umma, nan umma ta zauna ta yi tayi musu nasiha akan kar su bari samun waya ya zama
sanadiyyar lalacewar tarbiyyarsu. Aisha ta daga kai ta kalli khadija taga yadda ta
wani nutsu tana sauraron nasiha tamkar tana shigarta da gaske.
Mu sani ya 'yan'uwana, idan Allah yayi maka baiwar kyau, to yana jarrabaka ne yaga
yadda zakayi dashi. Kyawun mutum sau da yawa yakan jefa shi a bala'i (duba tarihin
annabi yusuf). Jarabawar da Allah yake yiwa kyakykyawan mutum kwatankwacin
jarabawar da yake yiwa wanda ya bawa dukiyane, ya danganta da kyawun zuciyarka,
wani lokacin zai iya zamar maka bala'i wani lokacin kuma alkhairi. Allah ka bamu
ikon cin duk kanin jarabawowin da ka tanadar mana a duniya. Ameen.

Episode 7 : The Promise
Tun daga ranar da Aisha taga Khadija a love garden, shikenan ta kasa sakawa zuciyar
ta nutsuwa a kan 'yar'uwar tata, kullum cikin zulumi take, kullum cikin tunanin me

mummunan abin Khadija take aikatawa. Kuma abinda yafi damunta shine gani take kamar
duk abinda khadijan ta zama laifinta ne, tunda tun suna yara ita ce take boye duk
wani laifi na khadija bata fadawa iyayensu, kuma ita ta rubuta mata jarabawar da
har ta kaita jami'ar, komai Allah yana yinsa ne a bisa tsari, Allah ya san nufin

ganin ta ba. A gida kuma kullum sai ta yi mata nasiha, amma kuma Khadija daga bakar
magana sai cin fuska shine amsar da take bata. Ranar nan tace mata "wai ni Aisha
ina ruwanki dani ne? Naga alama fa kwanan nan duk kin bi kinsa min ido, in zunubin

sani. In kana magana irin haka in wani yaji ai sai ya dauka irin wani friendship ne
a tsakanin mu" ya dafe kanshi yace "kash, amma kin yanke ni da yawa, wato kina
nufin ni ko layin friends dinki ban shiga bako?" Tace "you are my customer" yace
"that's it? Customer ko? To mun 'bata dake daga yau, na ma daina zuwa cin abincin
ki daga yau" tace "sauka lafiya, yadda ka fita da kafafuwanka haka zaka dawo da
kafafuwanka" ya dan juya kamar zai tafi sai kuma ya dawo ya dora hannun sa akan

gidan mu ita da mamanta, ashe mamanta kawar Umma na ce, ina tayi mata kallon sani
sai naji tace a FUD take karatu. Baka ganta ba nutsatstsiya sosai wallahi, kuma
mamanta ma mutuniyar arziki ce. Yanzu me kake tunanin ya kamata inyi akai?" Yayi
tunani kad'an sannan yace "it depends on yadda kuke da maman nata, kinsan wad'ansu
iyayen ba sa son laifin 'ya'yansu, idan kinsan maman zata yarda ki gaya mata
gaskiya kawai, Allah zai baki lada kuma zaki kara dan'kon zumunci a tsakanin ku,
idan kuma kinsan maman ba zata yarda ba, to ina ganin kar ki nuna kinsan komai a
kanta, dan zaki bata zumuncin tsakanin ku ba tare da kuma an sami gyara ba, in kika
barta dan kanta ma wata rana asirinta zai tonu" Aisha ta gyada kai kamar mai auna
maganarsa sannan tace "amma yanzu kasan inda zan same ta? Ina gudun kada daga gani
d'aya in yanke mata hukunci akan abinda ba dai dai ba" ya d'anyi dariya yace
"wannan yarinyar komai kika fada akanta baki yi 'karya ba, a hostel fa samarinta ba
zasu 'kirgu ba, kuma dukkan su bana kirki ba, a malamai ma duk wani lecturer da
yayi kaurin suna a neman mata sai ka ganshi tare da ita. Ita fa ko lectures ance
bata shiga amma kuma last exam bata da c/o ko daya" Aisha taji kamar ruwan zafi
yake kwara mata, nan take ta kara yadda da cewa abinda zata yi dai dai ne. Sun gama
hirar su har ya fita sai kuma gashi ya dawo yace "zo ga mutuniyar ki a gurin cin
abincin kusa da naku" da sauri Aisha ta fito kirjinta yana bugawa, ta bi Nura a
baya zuwa gurin da yake opposite nasu, ta window ta hango ta, khadijan ce dai, riga
da skirt ne a jikinta, hatta shape din pant dinta ana hangowa ta cikin skirt din,
rigar kuma wuyanta ya kai har tsakiyar bayanta, yau ko dankwalin ma babu, dan gaba
daya ya sauko daga kanta ta nannadashi a wuyanta, wani in ya ganta zai dauka
actress ce a cikin Nigerian film. Tare suke zaune da wani saurayi, different from
wanda ta gansu tare a garden, suna cin abinci suna dariya, har yana kai hannu yana
shafa bayanta. Da sauri Aisha ta juya, nura ya bita a baya yana cewa "yanzu kin
gama samun tabbas ko?" Ta juyo da d'acin rai kamar zata yi masa masifa sai kuma ta
tuna ba laifinsa bane ba, laifin tane amma itama ta d'auki al'kawarin gyara
kuskurenta. Tace "ni abin mamakin shine, a ina take samun wadannan 'yan iskan
kayan? Ni dai na tabbatar ba daga gidan su take zuwa dasu ba" nura yace "maybe daga
can take sakawa ta rufe da hijab ta fito, maybe kuma a hostel gurin 'kawayenta take
ajiyewa in tazo ta saka".
A ranar da daddare suna zaune suna cin abinci kamar yadda suka saba. Sai da Aisha
ta tabbatar kowa ya nutsu sannan ta daga murya tace " Umma da Abba ina son ayi wa
Khadija fad'a akan irin shigar da take yi da kuma yadda take mu'amala da maza a
makaranta" daga Umma har Abba shiru suka yi suna kallonta, saboda yadda maganar
tazo musu kai tsaye. Khadija ce tayi magana "yanzu yaya Aisha dama da gaske kike yi
da kika ce sai kinyi min sanadin barin makaranta? Yanzu daga nayi miki magana sai
ki shirya min wannan sharrin?" Abba ya ajiye chokalinsa yace "ku, bana son zancen
banza fa, wanne irin iskanci ne wannan zaku saka mutane a gaba kuna maganganu kamar
wasu sa'annin ku? Me yake faruwa?" Khadija tayi charaf tace "abbana wai fa akan
nayi mata maganar bana jin dadin yadda take zama da maza a cikin cafeteria din nan
suna hira, duk makaranta sai gulmar ta ake ni kuma bana jin dadin hakan, ga maganar
abincin vc din nan, cewa fa ake yi ita yarinyar sa ce shi yasa ya sakata take yi
masa abinci kullum, to shine dan nayi mata magana tace na raina ta saboda ina ganin
ni ina karatu ita batayi, shine tace tayi alkawarin sai tayi min sanadiyyar daina
karatu na" a fadace ya juyo kan Aisha "ke Aisha yanzu kanwar taki kike yiwa 'bakin
ciki? Ashe dama ke ba mutuniyar arziki bace ina ganin ki simi simi kamar ta gari?"
Aisha ta sunkuyar da kanta kasa a take hawaye ya fara bin fuskarta, lallai khadija
makira ce, lokaci daya ta juyar da maganar ta koma kanta, Umma ce tayi magana tace
"Alhaji ka bari kaji ta bakin Aishan mana, na tabbatar da akwai wata maganar a
kasa, muji nata bayanin sannan mu yanke hukunci" da fada ya juyo kanta "wanne
bayanin kuma bayan kina jin abinda Khadija tace, sharri zata yi mata?" Sai kuma ya
juya gurin Aisha yace "to fadi muji, menene ya hada ku har kika ce zakiyi mata
sanadin karatun ta?" Aisha ta goge hawayen fuskarta tace "ni bance zanyi mata
sanadin barin makaranta ba, kuma ni babu abinda ya hada ni da ita. Bani da shaida
sai Allah. Amma in baka yarda ba kasa ayi maka bincike, umma ta kira Mama yanzu ta
tambayeta idan abinda Khadija ta fada a kaina gaskiya ne ni na yarda daga yau na
daina zuwa cafeteria" yace "yo ita maman fadan gaskiya zatayi? Bayan tana samun
alkhairi a tare da ke? Ai baki daya zakuyi ita da ke, amma zansa a bincika min, duk
cikin ku wadda na samu da laifi sai ta gane kurenta" daga nan ya ture plate din
abincinsa ya fice. Yana figa Khadija ta mike ta shige daki. Umma da Aisha sun jima
a zaune, Aisha tana ta sharar kwalla, Umma tace "Aisha ki gaya min gaskiya, me ya
hadaki da 'yar uwarki" nan take kuwa Aisha ta kwashe labari kaf ta gayawa Umma,
hankalin Umma ya tashi tace "amma Aisha me yasa tun farko da kika ganta baki zo kin
gaya min ba?" Aisha tace "Umma na yi tunanin maganar zata bata miki rai ne kawai,
kuma na dauka in na yiwa Khadija fada zata ji shikenan maganar ta tsaya a tsakanin
mu ba tare da kunji ba ballantana ranku ya baci, sai yanzu dana tabbatar ba zata
daina ba sannan na yanke shawarar gaya muku, amma kinji abinda ta fada akaina kuma"
Umma tace "shikenan. Babanku ko me zan gaya masa ba zai dauka ba, musamman akan
Khadija, amma ni na yarda da duk abinda kika fada, nasan kuma abinda zaki aikata
nasan abinda ba zaki aikata ba, haka ita ma Khadija. Yanzu tunda yace zaiyi bincike
ki barshi yayi binciken, ai shi ramin karya kurarre ne".
Aisha bata kuma yiwa khadija maganar ba, gaba daya ta fita a harkar ta, ta na jiran
abinda babansu zai binciko. Ita kuwa Khadija a nata bangaren cigaba tayi da
shagalinta, babu abinda ya dame ta, saboda ta riga tasan wanda Abba zai saka
binciken. Abokinsa ne wanda shi lecturer ne a makarantar, shine ma ya shigewa Abba
gaba wajan nemarwa khadijan admission. Amma abinda Abba bai sani ba shine, tun
sanda ya hada abokin nasa da 'yar tasa dan yayi mata jagora a wajan registration,
tun a lokacin suke tare, dan har daukanta yake suna fita daga makaranta, shine kuma
ya harhada ta da duk malaman da suke 'kara mata maki a exams dinta. Dan haka Abba
yana samunshi da maganar bincike yace babu komai shi zai bincika masa, sati daya
bayan nan yazo har gida ya samu Abba yace "na saka an bincika min maganar nan.
Maganar da Aisha ta fada akan Khadija ba gaskiya ba ce ba, dan har students na saka
suke binta a baya amma sunce ba su taba ganinta da shigar banzan da Aisha ta fada
ba, kullum tana harkar karatun ta. Maganar Aisha kuma, ba zance maka completely
gaskiya bace ba, amma reports din dana samu ya nuna tana zama suyi ta hira da maza
a cikin cafeteria, dan akwai wadanda ma ba cin abincin ne yake kawo su ba gurinta
suke zuwa" Abba ya gyada kai alamar gamsuwa yace "nagode, Allah ya bar zumunci"
(Allah ka raba mu da munafukan abokai).

Episode 8 : The Promise 2
Ranar weekend ne dama, dan haka duk suna gida, Aisha tana kitchen tana girki, umma
da khadija suna palo a zaune, Khadija tana ta chatting dinta a waya. Abba ya shigo
suka gaishe shi ya amsa yace "ina Aisha?" Umma tace "tana kitchen" daga haka ya
juya ya fice, sai ihun Aisha suka jiyo daga kitchen, da sauri umma ta fita ta tarar
Abba ya saka Aisha a gaba sai jibgar ta yake tamkar Allah ya aiko shi, abinda bai
taba yi ba, da kyar Umma ta kwace ta dan sai da ita ma ta samu nata rabon dukan.
Aisha kuka take kamar ranta zai fita, Khadija kuwa ko fitowa tsakar gida ba tayi ba
dan tasan abinda ya faru, tunda tana da labarin zuwan abokin Abba tun kafin yazo
din. Ana cikin haka suka ji sallama, yakumbo Sadiya, yaya ce a gurin Abba, su biyu
iyayensu suka haifa. Tana shigowa da salati ta ajjiye 'kullin ledar hannunta ta
karaso tana rike Abba. "Zayyan baka da hankali? Me tayi maka zaka kasheta?" Yana
huci yace "gwara in kasheta in huta Yaya, da ace 'yar cikina ta jawo min abin kunya
gwara ace babu ita a duniyar baki daya" Gwoggo tace "me yayi zafi haka? Wanne abin
kunya zata jawo mana?" Sama sama ya bawa gwoggo labarin abinda ya faru da kuma
rahoton da aka kawo masa, ta saka salati tana tafa hannaye "yau na ga abinda yafi
'karfina ni Halima, yanzu yarinyar nan dama ashe munin ki ba'a fuska kadai ya tsaya
ba, yanzu dama har zuciyar ki mummuna ce? To wallahi ki gyara tun kafin lokaci ya
kure miki. 'Yar uwar taki zaki yiwa bakin ciki? To mu dai wannan ba halin mu bane
ba, daga kamannin har halin ba namu kika dauko ba" Umma ta bita da kallo dan tasan
abinda take nufi, amma da yake ita ba mai son rigima ba ce sai tayi shiru bata
tanka mata ba. A lokacin Khadija ta fito daga palo da gudu ta fada jikin gwoggo
tana kakalo hawayen 'karya tace "gwoggo kinga abinda Aisha tayi min ko?" Nan gwoggo
ta fara jijjiga ta alamar rarrashi tana cewa "rabu da ita 'yar arziki irin albarka,
aniyarta ta koma kanta, shi munafunci ai dodo ne mai shi yake ci, gashi nan tun
yanzu ta fara gani a kanta". Aisha ranar har dare tana kuka, ba wai dukan da akayi
mata ne ya saka ta kuka ba, bakin cikin sharrin da akayi mata ne, yanzu ta tabbatar
da cewa ko ta fadi cewa ita ta rubutawa khadija ssce ba za'a yarda ba, cewa za'ayi
bakin ciki take yi mata, wanda shine abinda yafi komai bata mata rai.
Ranar Monday suka shirya zasu fita Abba ya kalleta yace "ina zakije? Ai kin gama
zuwa gurin abincin nan kenan har abada, da wani nikab dinki na munafurci" ya tasa
keyar khadija suka fice. Da Mama taji shiru Aisha bata zo ba sai ta kirata a waya,
Aisha tana ganin kiran taji hawaye ya taho mata, ta katse kiran dan ba zata iya
dauka ba. Sai ga Mama ta kira a wayar Umma, umma ta dauka suka gaisa tace "Aisha
kuwa lafiya? Allah yasa dai ba rashin lafiya take ba" Umma tace "hmm, ai Aisha bana
jin zata sake zuwa gurin ku" nan ta bawa Mama labarin duk abinda ya faru. Nan take
Mama hankalinta ya tashi tayi ta rantsewa Umma cewa karya Khadija take yi, Umma
tace "na sani, amma yaya zanyi? Kiri kiri nasan Aisha ce da gaskiya amma babansu ba
zai saurare ni ba" Mama tace "amma kuwa kin bani kunya, shi din waye da mace ba
zata juya shi ba? Kuma yanzu shiru din da kikai kamar kin bawa ita Khadija lasisin
cigaba da abinda take aikatawa kenan, idan ta lalace ai tare zaku yi kukan ke da
shi". Aisha tana gefe duk tana jin hirar da suke yi, ranta yana kara yi mata zafi
saboda tasan ummansu ba zata iya tabuka komai ba sai dai ta shiga daki tayi kuka.
Aisha ta tashi ta koma dakin su ta zauna tana lissafi, nan take ta yanke shawara,
ta dauko wayarta ta kira number din Nura, har ta katse bai dauka ba, ta sake kira
still bai daga ba, sai ta ajiye wayar ta kwanta a gefe, bata jima ba sai ga kiransa
ya shigo, ta dauka da sallama yace "ranki ya dade, sai yau kika tuna da cewa na
baki number ta ko?" Direct tace masa "Nura kace kana so ka zama friend dina ko?"
Yayi dariya yace "ai na riga na zama ma, ke ce har yanzu baki sani ba" tace "to in
da gaske kake ina so kazo gidan mu in an jima, akwai maganar da nake so muyi da
kai" da sauri yace "Allah ya kaimu. Amma bansan address dinku ba" tace zata turo
masa a text, daga nan sukayi sallama. Suna ajiyewa kuwa ta rubuta masa text ta tura
masa.
Ana yin sallar magrib kuwa sai gashi yazo, ya kira ta a waya ya gaya mata, sai kuma
taji wani iri a ranta, shekararta kusan ashirin da daya, amma bata taba zuwa zance
ba, yau ma kuma ba wai saurayinta bane ba, kawai dai alfarma take so ta nema a
gurinsa, abu na biyu kuma Nura bai taba ganin fuskarta ba, tana tsoron kar yaga
bata da kyau ya ci mata mutunci ko yayi mata dariya, amma haka ta daure, ta saka a
ranta cewa mistake dinta zata gyara, kuskurenta ne ya kai khadija jami'a, dan haka
ita zata fitar da ita. Doguwar rigar atamfa ta saka, ta dan gyra fuskarta amma ba
kwalliya tayi ba, a ganinta menene amfanin kwalliyar? Ta saka hijab dinta ta fita.
A kan machine dinsa ta ganshi, ta tsaya kawai tana kallonsa dan taga reaction
dinsa, farko da ya kalleta sai ya dauke kai ya cigaba da danna wayarsa, sai kuma ya
dago da sauri ya sake kallonta, ga mamakin ta sai taga ya washe baki yana murmushi
ya karaso inda take "yau dai naga fuskar nan da ake ta boye wa kullum" ta sunkuyar
da kanta kasa tana jiran comments, sai taji ya sake cewa "yanzu dai tun da an barni
naga fuskar hakan yana nufin na shiga layin friends kenan?" Ta danyi murmushi tace
"eh, congratulations" yayi murmushi yace "thank you. So what's up? Kince wata
magana ce ko?" Tace "eh wani taimako nake so kayi min don Allah. Ina rayinyar da
muka taba maganar ta? To ba 'yar 'kawar Umma bace ba, 'kanwata ce, uwarmu daya uban
mu daya" ya saki baki yana mamaki, nan ta bashi labarin duk yadda al'amura suka
kasance har abinda ya faru ranar Saturday. Fuskar Nura cike da tausayin Aisha yace
"yanzu me kike so inyi akai, I will do anything for you in dai akan gaskiya ne"
Aisha taji dadin maganar Nura har cikin ranta, ta gaya masa duk plan dinta, yayi
dariya yace "wannan duk mai sauki ne, an gama" daga haka suka yi sallama suka rabu.
Ko sati ba'ayi ba sakon Nura ya iso, tunda Aisha naji messages suna shigo mata ta
WhatsApp tasan sakonta ne yazo, dan saboda su ma ta bude WhatsApp din, kuma tunda
ta bude babu wanda tayi wa magana in banda nura da ta gayawa ta bude WhatsApp d'in,
ta bude tana dubawa, pictures din Khadija ne da maza iri-iri, duk babu wanda take
da sutturar kirki a jikinta, wasu kayan ma sunfi wanda Aisha ta ganta dasu muni, ga
manyan wayoyi a hannunta, harda video dinta wani yana ta yi mata chakulkuli tana ta
dariya. Taji zafi a ranta har saida hawaye suka zubo mata, yaushe Khadija ta zama
haka? What has gone wrong a tarbiyyarta? Tasan dai Abba yana shagwaba ta amma bai
kai yadda zatayi wannan lalacewar ba. Abu daya da tafi zargi shine 'kawaye, wayewa,
da kuma uwa uba social media, dan tun Khadija tana 'yar mitsitsiyarta take rike
waya, dan haka babu irin social media d'in da bata dashi. A social media kuwa babu
irin 'kawaye ko abokan da ba a hadu wa dasu, musamman ga kyakykyawar budurwa irin
Khadija. Sai wanda Allah ya kare kawai.
Kamar ranar nan, haka ta bari sai da suka hadu suna cin abincin dare sannan ta
dauko wayar ta ta bude pictures din ta ajiye wa Abba a gabansa, yana fara dubawa ya
watso wa khadija wani mugun kallo, ita kuma ta juya da sauri ta kalli Aisha, irin
kallon nan na what have you done? Ai tun kafin ya gama ganin hotunan ya sauke wa
Khadija mari mai kyau a fuskarta. Ta rike kuncinta tana jiran abinda zai biyo baya,
Abba magana ma kasa yi yayi, Umma ce mai cewa "lafiya Alhaji, mai ya faru? Menene a
wayar?" Bakin ciki bai bar Abba magana ba har sai da ya kai kan wani hoto, nan ya
yar da wayar yana salati "Alhaji Muntari? Yanzu harda abokina a lalata min
yarinyar?" Da sauri umma ta sunkuya ta dauki wayar, itama sakinta tayi kasa tana
salati, Aisha ta sunkuyar da kanta 'kasa tace "banso ku gani ba, amma naga maganar
fatar baki ba zata yi tasiri ba, shi yasa na nuna muku hotuna" da sauri Khadija ta
mike tayi hanyar daki da gudu, ai kuwa kafin ta kai daki Abba ya dam'ko ta, jikinta
sai karkarwa yake yi, dama can ita matsoraciyar duka ce tun suna yara, tun kafin a
fara dukanta ta fara kuka "Abba na tuba kayi min rai, wallahi ba zan sake ba, dan
Allah Abbana ka yafe min kar ka dake ni" ai kuwa sai da ta samu rabonta, dan da
kyar Umma da Aisha suka kwace ta, ya cika ta yana haki yace "yanzu Khadija abinda
kike aikatawa kenan ashe? Abinda na kaiki makarantar kiyi kenan? Likitan da kika yi
min alkawarin zaki zama kenan? Ki gaya min a gidan uban wa kike samun wadannan
kayan da kike sakawa?" Ta kasa bashi amsa tana kuka, ya jawo waya zai cigaba da
jibgarta, tace "Abba wallahi siya nake yi, wadansu kuma 'kawayena ne suke bani, a
hostel gurin 'kawata hannatu nake ajiyewa" Umma dai ta rike baki kawai tana hawaye,
Abba yace "yanzu wannan hoton dana ganki a motar wani, gidan uban wa kuka je?" Tace
"Abba wallahi ba inda muke zuwa, supermarket muke zuwa wani lokacin kuma gurin cin
abinci" Abba yace "daganan kuma sai su tafi dake gidajen su ko, da gidan wa da
gidan wa kika taba zuwa?" Da sauri tace "wallahi Abba ban taba bin kowa gidansa ba"
ya shake ta yace "sai office d'insu kike binsu" tace "Abba dan Allah ka yarda dani,
wallahi ban taba yi ba" da mamaki ya sake ta yace "baki taba yin me ba? Wato kinsan
maganar da nake yi ma har kinsan ki ce min baki taba yi ba ko? Inna lillahi wa inna
ilaihir rajiun. Ni Zayyan yau me nake gani a gidana?" Ya zauna a kan kujera kawai
yana kallon khadija da take ta gursheken kuka, ya jima yana kallon ta sannan yace
"daga yau kin gama karatu. Kuma ban yarda ko kofar gida ki sake fita ba" daga nan
ya kama hanyar fita, Umma tace "ina zakaje haka kuma alhaji? Ka bari ka huce
tukunna" ba tare daya kalleta ba yace "gidan Alhaji Muntari zanje, sai yasan cewa
dani yake zancen" ya saka kai ya fita. Khadija dai tana durkushe tana ta kukanta,
jikinta duk yayi burdi abinka da farar fata, Umma ta zauna tace "kinga irinta ko
Khadija? Kinga cewa karya babu inda zata kaiki? Yanzu ke abinda kike yi kin dauka
cewa dai dai ne kenan?" Khadija ta matso ta dafa kafar umma tace "dan Allah umma ki
bawa abba hakuri ya barni in cigaba da zuwa makaranta, wallahi na tuba na daina,
bazan sake kula kowa ba ummana, wallahi ina son karatun nan fiye da komai umma, dan
Allah kar ki bari a rabani da karatu na"
Aisha dai ta tashi ta shigewarta daki ta bar su anan. Tana dakin taji dawowar Abba
sannan ta jishi yana ta banbamin fada a tsakar gida. Har ta gama shirin kwanciyarta
sannan sai ga Khadija ta shigo, har yanzu sheshshekar kuka take yi. Ta tsaya a
tsakiyar dakin tana kallon Aisha tace "Ban taba tsammanin cewa kamar yadda fuskarki
take mummuna haka zuciyarki take ba. Kin yi nasarar rabani da abinda nafi so fiye
da komai a duniya. Ki rike wannan a zuciyarki, ni Khadija nayi miki alkawari yadda
kika raba ni da abinda nafi so fiye da komai nima sai na raba ki da abinda kika fi
so fiye da komai" daga haka ta juya ta fice. Aisha ta jima idonta biyu ba tayi
bacci ba, tasan cewa abinda tayi dai dai ne, amma kuma why is she feeling bad
inside?
Hmmm. Bara mu danyi magana akan lalacewar Khadija. Me kuke ganin ya lalata ta? Ni
dai ina ganin lalacewarta ta faro ne tun tana yarinya, yadda mutane suke kuzanta
kyanta, sannan ake muzanta 'yar'uwarta a gabanta, wannan ne ya sa ta saka a ranta
cewa she can do anything she wants saboda ita kyakykyawa ce, yawan kyawaye barkatai
shima ya kara taimakawa wajan lalacewarta, dan duk sanda mutumin da bashi da
zuciyar kirki ya hadu da 'kawa ko aboki lalatacce to tabbas zai rinjayeshi ne
shima. Abu na uku rashin saka ido daga bangaren iyayenta, abba ya shagwaba ta, Umma
kuma ta zuba mata ido tana yin abinda taga dama, wannan ne ya saka tun kan ta
tafasa har ta 'kone, dan kana yiwa yaronka nasiha ba shi kadai ne tarbiyya ba, sai
ka saka idonka sosai akan shige da ficensa da kuma irin mutanen da yake mu'amala
dasu, dan rana daya za'azo a warware maka duk tubkar da kayi. Kuma shi itace tun
yana danye ake tan'kwarashi, in ya bushe sai dai ya karye. Allah yasa mu gane.

din. Ana cikin haka suka ji sallama, yakumbo Sadiya, yaya ce a gurin Abba, su biyu
iyayensu suka haifa. Tana shigowa da salati ta ajjiye 'kullin ledar hannunta ta
karaso tana rike Abba. "Zayyan baka da hankali? Me tayi maka zaka kasheta?" Yana
huci yace "gwara in kasheta in huta Yaya, da ace 'yar cikina ta jawo min abin kunya
gwara ace babu ita a duniyar baki daya" Gwoggo tace "me yayi zafi haka? Wanne abin
kunya zata jawo mana?" Sama sama ya bawa gwoggo labarin abinda ya faru da kuma
rahoton da aka kawo masa, ta saka salati tana tafa hannaye "yau na ga abinda yafi
'karfina ni Halima, yanzu yarinyar nan dama ashe munin ki ba'a fuska kadai ya tsaya
ba, yanzu dama har zuciyar ki mummuna ce? To wallahi ki gyara tun kafin lokaci ya
kure miki. 'Yar uwar taki zaki yiwa bakin ciki? To mu dai wannan ba halin mu bane
ba, daga kamannin har halin ba namu kika dauko ba" Umma ta bita da kallo dan tasan
abinda take nufi, amma da yake ita ba mai son rigima ba ce sai tayi shiru bata
tanka mata ba. A lokacin Khadija ta fito daga palo da gudu ta fada jikin gwoggo
tana kakalo hawayen 'karya tace "gwoggo kinga abinda Aisha tayi min ko?" Nan gwoggo
ta fara jijjiga ta alamar rarrashi tana cewa "rabu da ita 'yar arziki irin albarka,
aniyarta ta koma kanta, shi munafunci ai dodo ne mai shi yake ci, gashi nan tun
yanzu ta fara gani a kanta". Aisha ranar har dare tana kuka, ba wai dukan da akayi
mata ne ya saka ta kuka ba, bakin cikin sharrin da akayi mata ne, yanzu ta tabbatar
da cewa ko ta fadi cewa ita ta rubutawa khadija ssce ba za'a yarda ba, cewa za'ayi
bakin ciki take yi mata, wanda shine abinda yafi komai bata mata rai.
Ranar Monday suka shirya zasu fita Abba ya kalleta yace "ina zakije? Ai kin gama
zuwa gurin abincin nan kenan har abada, da wani nikab dinki na munafurci" ya tasa
keyar khadija suka fice. Da Mama taji shiru Aisha bata zo ba sai ta kirata a waya,
Aisha tana ganin kiran taji hawaye ya taho mata, ta katse kiran dan ba zata iya
dauka ba. Sai ga Mama ta kira a wayar Umma, umma ta dauka suka gaisa tace "Aisha
kuwa lafiya? Allah yasa dai ba rashin lafiya take ba" Umma tace "hmm, ai Aisha bana
jin zata sake zuwa gurin ku" nan ta bawa Mama labarin duk abinda ya faru. Nan take
Mama hankalinta ya tashi tayi ta rantsewa Umma cewa karya Khadija take yi, Umma
tace "na sani, amma yaya zanyi? Kiri kiri nasan Aisha ce da gaskiya amma babansu ba
zai saurare ni ba" Mama tace "amma kuwa kin bani kunya, shi din waye da mace ba
zata juya shi ba? Kuma yanzu shiru din da kikai kamar kin bawa ita Khadija lasisin
cigaba da abinda take aikatawa kenan, idan ta lalace ai tare zaku yi kukan ke da
shi". Aisha tana gefe duk tana jin hirar da suke yi, ranta yana kara yi mata zafi
saboda tasan ummansu ba zata iya tabuka komai ba sai dai ta shiga daki tayi kuka.
Aisha ta tashi ta koma dakin su ta zauna tana lissafi, nan take ta yanke shawara,
ta dauko wayarta ta kira number din Nura, har ta katse bai dauka ba, ta sake kira
still bai daga ba, sai ta ajiye wayar ta kwanta a gefe, bata jima ba sai ga kiransa
ya shigo, ta dauka da sallama yace "ranki ya dade, sai yau kika tuna da cewa na
baki number ta ko?" Direct tace masa "Nura kace kana so ka zama friend dina ko?"
Yayi dariya yace "ai na riga na zama ma, ke ce har yanzu baki sani ba" tace "to in
da gaske kake ina so kazo gidan mu in an jima, akwai maganar da nake so muyi da
kai" da sauri yace "Allah ya kaimu. Amma bansan address dinku ba" tace zata turo
masa a text, daga nan sukayi sallama. Suna ajiyewa kuwa ta rubuta masa text ta tura
masa.
Ana yin sallar magrib kuwa sai gashi yazo, ya kira ta a waya ya gaya mata, sai kuma
taji wani iri a ranta, shekararta kusan ashirin da daya, amma bata taba zuwa zance
ba, yau ma kuma ba wai saurayinta bane ba, kawai dai alfarma take so ta nema a
gurinsa, abu na biyu kuma Nura bai taba ganin fuskarta ba, tana tsoron kar yaga
bata da kyau ya ci mata mutunci ko yayi mata dariya, amma haka ta daure, ta saka a
ranta cewa mistake dinta zata gyara, kuskurenta ne ya kai khadija jami'a, dan haka
ita zata fitar da ita. Doguwar rigar atamfa ta saka, ta dan gyra fuskarta amma ba
kwalliya tayi ba, a ganinta menene amfanin kwalliyar? Ta saka hijab dinta ta fita.
A kan machine dinsa ta ganshi, ta tsaya kawai tana kallonsa dan taga reaction
dinsa, farko da ya kalleta sai ya dauke kai ya cigaba da danna wayarsa, sai kuma ya
dago da sauri ya sake kallonta, ga mamakin ta sai taga ya washe baki yana murmushi
ya karaso inda take "yau dai naga fuskar nan da ake ta boye wa kullum" ta sunkuyar
da kanta kasa tana jiran comments, sai taji ya sake cewa "yanzu dai tun da an barni
naga fuskar hakan yana nufin na shiga layin friends kenan?" Ta danyi murmushi tace
"eh, congratulations" yayi murmushi yace "thank you. So what's up? Kince wata
magana ce ko?" Tace "eh wani taimako nake so kayi min don Allah. Ina rayinyar da
muka taba maganar ta? To ba 'yar 'kawar Umma bace ba, 'kanwata ce, uwarmu daya uban
mu daya" ya saki baki yana mamaki, nan ta bashi labarin duk yadda al'amura suka
kasance har abinda ya faru ranar Saturday. Fuskar Nura cike da tausayin Aisha yace
"yanzu me kike so inyi akai, I will do anything for you in dai akan gaskiya ne"
Aisha taji dadin maganar Nura har cikin ranta, ta gaya masa duk plan dinta, yayi
dariya yace "wannan duk mai sauki ne, an gama" daga haka suka yi sallama suka rabu.
Ko sati ba'ayi ba sakon Nura ya iso, tunda Aisha naji messages suna shigo mata ta
WhatsApp tasan sakonta ne yazo, dan saboda su ma ta bude WhatsApp din, kuma tunda
ta bude babu wanda tayi wa magana in banda nura da ta gayawa ta bude WhatsApp d'in,
ta bude tana dubawa, pictures din Khadija ne da maza iri-iri, duk babu wanda take

dariya. Taji zafi a ranta har saida hawaye suka zubo mata, yaushe Khadija ta zama
haka? What has gone wrong a tarbiyyarta? Tasan dai Abba yana shagwaba ta amma bai
kai yadda zatayi wannan lalacewar ba. Abu daya da tafi zargi shine 'kawaye, wayewa,

waya, dan haka babu irin social media d'in da bata dashi. A social media kuwa babu
irin 'kawaye ko abokan da ba a hadu wa dasu, musamman ga kyakykyawar budurwa irin
Khadija. Sai wanda Allah ya kare kawai.
Kamar ranar nan, haka ta bari sai da suka hadu suna cin abincin dare sannan ta
dauko wayar ta ta bude pictures din ta ajiye wa Abba a gabansa, yana fara dubawa ya

Khadija mari mai kyau a fuskarta. Ta rike kuncinta tana jiran abinda zai biyo baya,
Abba magana ma kasa yi yayi, Umma ce mai cewa "lafiya Alhaji, mai ya faru? Menene a

mike tayi hanyar daki da gudu, ai kuwa kafin ta kai daki Abba ya dam'ko ta, jikinta
sai karkarwa yake yi, dama can ita matsoraciyar duka ce tun suna yara, tun kafin a

"Abba wallahi ba inda muke zuwa, supermarket muke zuwa wani lokacin kuma gurin cin

ya shake ta yace "sai office d'insu kike binsu" tace "Abba dan Allah ka yarda dani,
wallahi ban taba yi ba" da mamaki ya sake ta yace "baki taba yin me ba? Wato kinsan
maganar da nake yi ma har kinsan ki ce min baki taba yi ba ko? Inna lillahi wa inna

dani yake zancen" ya saka kai ya fita. Khadija dai tana durkushe tana ta kukanta,
jikinta duk yayi burdi abinka da farar fata, Umma ta zauna tace "kinga irinta ko
Khadija? Kinga cewa karya babu inda zata kaiki? Yanzu ke abinda kike yi kin dauka
cewa dai dai ne kenan?" Khadija ta matso ta dafa kafar umma tace "dan Allah umma ki

Allah kar ki bari a rabani da karatu na"
Aisha dai ta tashi ta shigewarta daki ta bar su anan. Tana dakin taji dawowar Abba
sannan ta jishi yana ta banbamin fada a tsakar gida. Har ta gama shirin kwanciyarta
sannan sai ga Khadija ta shigo, har yanzu sheshshekar kuka take yi. Ta tsaya a
tsakiyar dakin tana kallon Aisha tace "Ban taba tsammanin cewa kamar yadda fuskarki
take mummuna haka zuciyarki take ba. Kin yi nasarar rabani da abinda nafi so fiye
da komai a duniya. Ki rike wannan a zuciyarki, ni Khadija nayi miki alkawari yadda
kika raba ni da abinda nafi so fiye da komai nima sai na raba ki da abinda kika fi
so fiye da komai" daga haka ta juya ta fice. Aisha ta jima idonta biyu ba tayi
bacci ba, tasan cewa abinda tayi dai dai ne, amma kuma why is she feeling bad
inside?
Hmmm. Bara mu danyi magana akan lalacewar Khadija. Me kuke ganin ya lalata ta? Ni
dai ina ganin lalacewarta ta faro ne tun tana yarinya, yadda mutane suke kuzanta
kyanta, sannan ake muzanta 'yar'uwarta a gabanta, wannan ne ya sa ta saka a ranta
cewa she can do anything she wants saboda ita kyakykyawa ce, yawan kyawaye barkatai
shima ya kara taimakawa wajan lalacewarta, dan duk sanda mutumin da bashi da
zuciyar kirki ya hadu da 'kawa ko aboki lalatacce to tabbas zai rinjayeshi ne
shima. Abu na uku rashin saka ido daga bangaren iyayenta, abba ya shagwaba ta, Umma
kuma ta zuba mata ido tana yin abinda taga dama, wannan ne ya saka tun kan ta
tafasa har ta 'kone, dan kana yiwa yaronka nasiha ba shi kadai ne tarbiyya ba, sai
ka saka idonka sosai akan shige da ficensa da kuma irin mutanen da yake mu'amala
dasu, dan rana daya za'azo a warware maka duk tubkar da kayi. Kuma shi itace tun
yana danye ake tan'kwarashi, in ya bushe sai dai ya karye. Allah yasa mu gane.

Episode 10: Kano (ta dabo ci gari, yaro ko dame kazo an fika)
A hankali Aisha ta sunkuya ta dauki tray din abincin da ta kawo masa ta juya zata
fita daga dakin sai kuma taji ta kasa fita ta ajiye trayn ta kifa kanta a kan
kujera ta ringa rera kuka, menene laifinta a duniya, me tayi wa mutane suka tsane
ta basa sonta, ita ba ita ta halicci kanta ba, da ace sanda za'a halicceta an bata
zabi da sai ta zabi siffar da tafi kowacce kyau a cikin mata, amma ita ma kawai
haka ta ganta, saboda haka Allah yake so ya ganta, kuma tasan wannan shine babbar
jarabawarta a duniya. Sai da ta gama kukanta ta rarrashi kanta sannan ta goge
fuskarta ta dauki abincin ta koma dashi cikin gida.
A palo ta tarar da Abba da Umma suna hira, Abba yana jin shigowarta ya kwalla mata
kira, ta shiga ta durkusa daga can nesa yace "ba dai har ya tafi ba? Har kun gama
cike takardun?" Ta sunkuyar da kanta tace "ya tafi Abba, tun dazu, yace an fasa
maganar tafiyar tawa, yace zai kira ka a waya yayi maka bayani" Abba ya mike tsaye
da sauri yace "ban gane me kike cewa ba, an fasa kamar yaya? Bayan naga takardun a
hannunsa da sunanki a jiki kuma ki ce min an fasa?" Bata bashi amsa ba sai hawaye
da yake zuba a idonta, yana ganin ta fara kuka yace "me kika yi masa? Wani abun
kika yi masa ko? Yarinyar banza yarinyar wofi, ana kokarin a rufa miki asiri ke
kuma babu abinda kike so irin ki tona wa kanki asiri" Umma tace "Aisha me ya faru?"
Aisha tace "wallahi Umma babu abinda nayi masa" Abba ya juya gurin Umma yace "ai ko
menene tayi masa nasan da hadin bakinki, kece zaki shirya mata abinda zatayi saboda
a fasa tafiyar, dama tun farko ai kin nuna ba kya so. Bara in kira shi a waya inji
gaskiyar abinda ya faru, idan abinda zan iya bada hakuri ne ni sai in bayar, tunda
ku ba abinda kuke so irin ku zubar min da mutunci na" ya dauki wayarsa yana bambami
ya fita. Suna nan a zaune sai ga khadija ta shigo, ga mamakin Aisha sai taga babu
alamar kyalliya a jikinta, wanda bai sani ba ma zai iya dauka daga bacci ta tashi,
tana shigowa Umma ta fara yi mata sannu tana amsawa sannan ta zauna take tambayar
Aisha "lafiya naga kina kuka?" Aisha dan haushi ko kallonta ba ta yi ba, sunanan a
zaune Abba ya sake dawowa, tun daga tsakar gida ya fara magana "amma wannan mutumin
akwai dan rainin hankali, shikenan dan yaga mu ba masu dukiya bane sai ya dauka
wulakantattu ne mu?" Yana shigowa umma ta gyara zama tace "me yace?" Yace "wai dan
rainin hankali wai ya fasa daukan Aisha wai tayi kankanta, sai dai a bashi Khadija"
da sauri Umma tace "wacce khadijar? Ba dai wannan ba?" Yace "ita mana yake nufi, in
shekaru ne ai Aisha shekara biyu ta bawa Khadija, ko dan ya gnta kamar kazar gidan
mayu shine zai dauka yarinya ce. Yo ni ko daga dawanau aka sakoni ai ba zan bar
Khadija ta tafi kasar waje karatu ba, yarinyar da makarantar jeka ka dawo ma sai
hakura nayi na cireta na barta a gida ina kallonta ballantana ace in tura ta wata
uwa duniya karatu?" Da sauri Khadija ta sauko daga kan kujera ta durkusa a gaban
Abba "abbanah na tuba nabi Allah, dan Allah ka barni inje, wallahi abba zan nutsu
inyi karatu, duk abinda nake yi a da na daina shi yanzu" ya harare ta yace "ai kin
riga kin shani na warke khadija, babu inda zaki dara ki bar kasar nan sai dai in da
mijinki. Nace masa in zai dauki Aisha to, amma in ba zai dauke ta ba to mun hakura.
Kalas" Khadija har da kukanta, Umma tace "kayi dai dai alhaji. To ni abin mamakin
ma a ina yaga khadijan, Aisha ko kinyi masa maganar ta ne?" Aisha tace "taje
gurinsa ai" da sauri Khadija tace "na taya ta kai masa abinci ne" Aisha ta juya ta
kalli Khadija tana mamakin yadda take iya yin karya kanta tsaye ba tare da tsoro ko
inda inda ba.
Da daddare Nura ya kira Aisha a waya yace "so, how did it go? Yaushe ne tafiyar?"
Tace "babu tafiya Nura, it is over before it even begins" sannan ta bashi labarin
duk abinda ya faru, ba ta boye masa komai ba na daga makircin Khadija, har ta gama
bai katse ta ba, sai da ya tabbatar ta gama sannan yace "kin san abinda nake
tunani? I think all this is for the best,dama ni sam hankali na vai kwanta da
tafiyar nan taki ba, you are a good person, tunda kika ga baki samu wannan abin ba
then it is not Allah's choice for you. Yanzu ki tsayar da hankalinki ki yi kokari
ki sake rubuta exams dinki, sai kiyi applying medicine din da kike so a nan, i am
