Wasa wasa magana ta wuce, babu Dr abdulrazak babu labarinsa. A lokacin ne kuma
akayi zaben siyasa, inda jam'iyyar su Abba ta fadi, wanda ya saka sosai samun sa ya
ja baya, kudi suka yi masa 'karanci a hannunsa, dan ma Allah ya sa bayan harkar
siyasar yana yin teaching wanda a yanzu shi ya zamo rufin asirinsu baki daya. Aisha
ta cigaba da aikinta, kuma tana samun alkhairi sosai, duk kudin data samu kuma Abba
take kawowa shi kuma yana ajiye mata. Nura ne ya taimaka mata wajen registration
din neco da jamb, ya kuma sai mata past questions and answers ya bata kyauta, ita
kuma ta dage da karantawa saboda ta kwana biyu bata zuwa makaranta duk ta manta
wasu abubuwan. Ana cikin haka akayi hutun 'yan jami'ar. Ranar da akayi hutun suna
zaune a gida Umma tana yi mata kitso sai ga Khadija ta dawo.daga satar fitar da
tayi, da leda a hannunta tayi sauri ta shiga dakin su ta boye sannan ta shigo palo
ta tsaya tana kallon gashin Aisha da akeyiwa kitso tace, "wai yaushe kika yi gashi
ne ban sani ba?" Umma ta dago tana kallonta tace "babu sallama zaki shigo mana?"
Tace "nayi, baku ji ba" ta zauna tana kallon kitson tace "ni dai bansan sanda Aisha
tayi wannan gashin ba", umma tace "lokacin da kike iyayin relaxing, steaming,
stretching da sauransu, lokacin ita kuma ta hada man alayyadi, man kwakwa, man
zaitun da man kadanya nake mata kitso kuma duk sati, ke kuwa yaushe rabon da inga
kitso a kanki? Gashi nan yanzu gashinta ya kamo naki, kuma a ido ma yafi naki kyau,
dan yanzu da zan kama naki ince zanyi miki kitso duk kakkaryewa zaiyi saboda
chemicals da ake lafta masa kullum" Khadija tace "gaskiya to in haka ne nima a hada
min man inke shafawa" Aisha tace "waye zai hada miki, ke zaki hada kayanki da
kanki" suna zaune suna hirar gashi Abba ya shigo, ya tsaya a bakin kofa yace
"uhumm, kullum dai sai ki saka yara a gaba kuyi ta 'barin baki, ba zaki ke musu

bai amsa ba ya shigo ya zauna, Khadija ta tashi ta kawo masa ruwa, yana sha yana

ko wacce ta fito da miji inyi mata aure, kwayi karatun a gidajen ku" Khadija ta
fara magana cikin shagwaba tace "haba abbana, dan Allah ka bar mu mana mu samu a
hankali, yanzu ni fa ko shekara ashirin banyi ba kawai sai ayi min aure kuma?" Yayi
mata dakuwa yace "'kaniyarki, baki isa aure ba amma kin isa tara samari ko? Ina
sane dake fa, na hana ki fita zancen nan amma kullum sai kin fita, to maganin ki
zanyi duk wanda na kuma gani tare dake zance masa ya fito" ya juya yana kallon
Aisha, suna hada ido ta sunkuyar da kai kasa, yace "ke kuma ustaziyyar 'karya, kina
faman yawoda nikab waye zai ganki ballantana yace yana sonki, sai anyi magana ki
sunkuyar da kai kamar munafuka, in anyi maganar aure ki ce baki da saurayi, you are
not getting any younger fa" da sauri Khadija tace "abba tana da saurayi fa yanzu,
sunan sa Nura, ina jinsu suna waya dashi a daki" da sauri itama Aisha tace "laa
bafa saurayi na bane ba, kawai dai muna gaisawa ne, he is my friend" Abba yace
"munafuki ne shima kenan, in banda munafunci ina na taba ganin friendship tsakanin

bata saka musu baki ba, har ta gama wa Aisha kitson ta, ta daura dan kwalinta ta

fita waje kake yi ba, muna gida kamar matan kulle, da zaka barmu muje kano gurin
dangin Umma mu dan kwana biyu, may be mazajen namu suna kano" abba yace "kuma kin
kawo shawara fa, amma nasan dabarar ki kafar yawo kike son ki samu ko?" Umma tace
"wallahi kuwa da zaka barsu da naji dadi, suje su dan gaisa da mutane, dan yawanci
ba'a san su ba, ni bama samun mijin ba zumuncin nake so, miji kam in lokacin samun
sa yayi ko a ina yake zaizo da kansa" Abba yace "to shikenan, kunci nasara, sati
mai zuwa ina sa ran wasu 'yan kudade, in na samu sai ku tafi, kuyi sati biyu a can
sai ku dawo. Gidan Bilkisu zaku sauka, daga nan sai kuke zuwa sauran gidajen kuna
gaishe su kuna dawowa gidanta kuna kwana". Hatta Aisha taji dadin wannan maganar,
dan ita a ranta tafi son dangin ummanta akan na abbanta, tunda su sunfi jan ta a
jiki basa kyamarta, dangin abba kuwa da yake duk farare ne kyawawa irin Khadija
inta shiga cikinsu sai ta zama kamar 'yar tsintuwa.
Sai da lokacin tafiyar su yazo kuma sannan taji bata son tafiyar. Umma da kanta ta
taya su hada kayansu, kowa dan karamin akwati da kuma jaka, tana yi tana musu
nasiha musamman akan kamun kai da kuma rayuwa in general, sai Aisha taji bata son
tafiya ta bar umma, ita ce babbar 'kawarta duk duniya, da ita kadai take iya zama
tayi hira tun tana yarinya, sai yanzu da ta samu Nura. Tace "Umma ni ina ganin na
fasa tafiyar nan ma. Gwara Khadija ta je ita kadai" Umma ta rike baki tana kallonta
tace "saboda me?" Tace "umma in muka tafi fa sai ke kadai zaki zauna, waye zai ke
taya ki aiki?" Umma tace "yo aikin har nawa ne da sai an taya ni? Dama dan kina yi
min ne ya saka nake zama in mike kafa, in kun tafi fa daga ni sai babanku, babu
wani aiki da zaiyi min yawa" Aisha ta sake cewa "kin san Abba ba zama yake yi a
gida ba, in mun tafi fa sai ke kadai zaki ke zama" umma tace "ai gwara in koyi zama
ni kadai din, in kunyi aure ai dole in zauna ni kadai" sai kuma Aisha taji kunya ta
sunkuyar da kanta. Khadija tace "ni Aisha wannan makale wa Umma da kike yi ai wani
sai ya dauka kece auta, ni kullum gani nake kamar Umma tafi sonki a kaina" Umma ta
riko hannunta tace "haba shalelen Abba, duk ina son ku gaba ki dayanku, kuma bana
jin dadi idan naga kuna samun matsala, ku kadai Allah ya bamu, dan haka bayan mu
duk duniya baku da wanda yafi junanku, burina kullum da addu'ah ta shine Allah ya
hada min kanku, so nake ko bayan raina ku zama tamkar tsintsiya madaurinki daya, ku
ringa yiwa junan ku nasiha, kar ku bari wani mutum ko wani abin duniya ya shiga
tsakanin ku, burina shine ku bawa marada kunya" Khadija ta mike tana cewa "Umma
yanzu kawai daga zamu tafi kano sai ki fara zancen bayan rai? Ni bana son inga ana
ta nasiha nasihar nan duk sai inji hankali na ya tashi. Bara inje in karbo takalmi
na a gidan su shema'u" ta juya tayi tafiyar ta, Umma ta bi bayanta da kallo sannan
ta juyo kan Aisha data ke zaune kanta a sunkuye, ta dafa ta tace "Aisha na san kina
hakuri da kanwarki, ina rokon ki ki kara hakuri da ita, kiyi ta yi mata nasiha ko
da kuwa ba zata zauna ta saurara ba dole zataji wani abun, kuma kiyi mata addu'ah.
Kar ki bata goyon baya akan abubuwan da take yi, ki kula da ita dan Allah ko da
bayan raina ne. Yanzu zuwan da zakuyi kano nasan zatayi ta yi miki abubuwan da zata
bata miki rai, zata yi haka ne dan ki rabu da ita tayi abinda ranta yakeso, dan
Allah Aisha karki rabu da ita, komai dacin gaskiya ki gaya mata ita, duk abinda
zatayi wanda ba dai dai ba ki yi kokarin hana ta, in kin yiya kokarinki taki
dainawa ki kira ni a waya ki gaya min, kar kice zaki boye mana saboda kar ranmu ya
baci, rashin sanin sai yafi bata mana rai akan sanin. Kuma ina so ku zama zasu rike
sirrin junan ku, kar kuke gayawa kowa abinda yake tsakanin ku sai ku iyayenku, dan
wasu kokari zasuyi su hura wuta a tsakanin ku ba wai su kashe ba" Aisha dai sai
gyada kai take yi. Sai da akayi sallar azahar sannan Abba yace suzo ya kaisu tasha,
sai a lokacin sannan jikin Umma yayi sanyi kamar zata hana su tafiyar, Khadija sai
d'oki take yi, Aisha kuwa da za'a ce an fasa tafiyar da sai tafi kowa murna. Suna
fitar da kayan su mota Khadija ta shige gaba tayi zamanta tana taunar cingam, Aisha
kuwa komawa tayi ta tsaya a tsakar gidan kawai sai kuma ta rasa me zata yi, sai ta
tafi da gudu ta rungume Umma tana hawaye, itama umman sai hawaye, nan Abba ya fito
yana kallonsu yace "ji wani sakarci kuma, to nono kike so ta baki kisha ko menene?
Dalla wuce muje kar dare yayi muku a hanya, wannan ha yar ba kyau ne da ita sosai
ba". A haka dai Aisha ta cika Umma kamar ba ta so ta tafi mota, Khadija kuwa daga
motar ta daga wa Umma hannu suka tafi. Suna zuwa tasha abba ya fito da kudi dubu
goma ya bawa Khadija yace " ungo wannan rike muku, dan wannan yayar taki tana can
tana kauyanci sai ta zubar da kudin ma bata sani ba, ya ishe ku kudin motar zuwa da
dawowa da kuma kudin zirga zirgar da zaku ke yi a cikin gari, bani da ishashshen
kudi ne shi yasa ban baku wanda zakuyo tsaraba in zaku dawo ba" Aisha tace "wannan
ma ya isa Abba, mun gode Allah ya kara budi" Khadija ma tayi masa godiya sannan
suka fita suka shiga mota.
Karfe biyar motar su ta sauka a tashar kano line, suka sauka Khadija ta biya kudi
ta mayar da sauran jaka. Suka jawo akwatinan su suka fito waje da niyar hawa
adaidaita zuwa mandawari gidan anti Bilkisu. Basu dade a tsaye ba wata mota ta
tsaya a gabansu, kallo daya Aisha ta yiwa na cikin motar ta ja baya, saurayi ne
irin masu ji da naira din nan, ya leko da kansa ta taga yace "psss, 'yammata ina
zaku je ne haka?" Khadija ta washe baki tace "mandawari zamu je wallahi, abin hawa
muke nema" yace "gashi to kun samu, kyakykyawar budurwa irinki ai bai kamata ace
kina tsayawa a rana ba bayan akwai samari irin mu a duniya" ta juya idonta tace
"Allah ko?" Yace "sosai ma, menene amfanin mu wanda ya wuce mu faranta muku?" Ta
juya tana kallon Aisha tace "kinga mun sami mota ma, mun huta da hawa napep" Aisha
ta rike hannunta tace "Khadija daga ganin mutum kawai sai mu shiga motarsa? For all
we know zai iya zama dan yankai kai ko kidnapper ko worst" Khadija ta kwace

ba zan kyale ba" ba tare da wata kalma ba ta bude gaban mota ta shige, mutumin yace

'yar uwata bace ba, dama hado ni akayi da ita saboda ta tare min abin hawa, tu da
na samu yanzu ita komawa zatayi" yaja mota suka tafi suka bar Aisha a gurin, Aisha
taji zafin maganar Khadija sosai, sai da ta tari mai adai daita sannan ta fahimci
Khadija ta bar mata kayanta, jakar hannu ta kawai ta dauka, sannan kuma ta tafi da
kudin motar da Abba ya basu. Allah ya taimake ta ma tana da sauran chanji a
jakarta.
Da murna Anti Bilkisu ta tare ta, dama ta san da zuwansu, tana tambayarta ina
Khadija ta bata labarin duk abinda ya faru, ai kuwa Aunty tace khadija zata zo ta
same ta. Sai da Aisha tayi sallah ta ci abinci sannan suka zauna hirar yaushe gamo.
Aunty Bilkisu 'ya'yanta uku, mace daya wacce take boarding school sai maza guda
biyu da suka yi candy, babban Hafeez yana karatu a legal ta nan kano, karamin kuma
Aminu bai samu makaranta ba tukunna, yana dai bin babansa kasuwar kwari inda suke
da shagon atampopi. Babu laifi gidan aunty bilki suna da rufin asirinsu dai dai
gwargwado. Khadija bata dawo gida ba sai bayan sallar magriba, sai gata niki niki
da kaya, kazar yahuza da fruits da drinks, ai kuwa bata ji da dadi ba a gurin aunty
bilki, sai da ta wanke ta tas, kuma tace babu wanda zai ci abinda tazo dashi, haka
ta zauna taci kayanta ita kadai, sai Aminu da yazo daga baya ya taya ta.
List aunty bilki ta rubuta musu na guraren da zasu je ziyara, yadda zai zamanto
kullum da akwai inda zasu je har su tafi gida. Ranar farko sunyi wanka sun fito
suna shiryawa, Aunty bilki tana zaune tana kallonsu, Aisha ta ji ta duka takure dan
haka ta dauki kayan sakawarta ta tafi toilet ta saka, tana fitowa ta saka hijab
dinta ta zauna tace "na gama" aunty ta bita da kallo tace "kin gama me?" Tace
"shiryawa" dariya sosai aunty bilki tayi tana kallon yadda fuskar Aisha take maiko
da yadda tayi daurin dankwali kamar 'kullin magani tace "wai kina nufin a haka zaki
fita?" Ita Aisha bata gane menene abin dariya ba, khadija ma ta juyo ta kalleta
tayi dariya ta cigaba da shafa foundation dinta. A dole aunty bilki ta saka khadija
ta yi wa Aisha kwalliya, har da su jambaki da jagira aka yi mata, ita dai Aisha
kamar zata yi kuka, gani take in tayi kwalliya mutane dariya zasu yi mata, ana gama
kwalliyar aunty bilki tace ta tashi ta gani, ta kare mata kallo daga sama zuwa kasa
sannan tace "wannan wanne irin dinki ke akayi miki kamar buhu? Waye yayi miki?"
Aisha tace "kawar umma ce take min dinki dama" Khadija tayi dariya tace "tun a
zamanin jahiliyya na daina yarda ana kai min dinkina tare da nasu, ni karbar nawa
nake in kai shago ayi min dinkina mai kyau" aunty tace "yanxu har ita Rabi'an irin
wannan dinkin ake yi mata? To ba dole babanku yake gaya mata magana son ransa ba?
Kalli yadda aka tashi aka dinka miki purple din atamfa, ya za'ayi a dinka wa bakar
mace purple din atamfa, ke kuma babu ruwanki a haka kikesaka wa. To ni kam ba'a
gidan nan ba. Bara in dauko miki kayan zahra ki saka, wadannan kayan naki duk sai
na hau keke na gyara miki su" ita dai Aisha bata ce komai ba, dan ita sosai take
jin dadin kayanta, ko babu komai basa bayyana tsiraici kuma suna kara mata girman
jiki. Aunty tana bata wani material light blue da pink din flowers, ta dauka zata
koma toilet auntu tace ta saka a gabanta ta gani, nan Khadija ta kama dariya, aunty
ta kore ta palo, Aisha dai kamar zata nutse a wajen haka ta fara cire kayanta, sai
da ta gama zata saka riga sannan aunty tace "I knew it! Dama sai da nayi zargin ba
kya saka brazier, shi yasa kike ta fama da hijab kullum kamar matar liman" Aisha
dai kunyar duniya ta ishe ta kamar zata nutse a gurin, aunty ta saka ta gaba da
fada "yanzu ke baiwar Allah haka kike zama dama? Ko anyi miki rigar mai shape ta
yaya zata yi miki dai dai in baki saka bra ba? Dan baki da su irin na Khadija

fito kamar sauran mata" ita kam aisha jin ta kawai take yi, ita a gurinta duk
wannan cikon bashi da amfani, kawai in kana dashi kana dashi, in baka dashi baka
dashi. A dole aka bata brazier zahra aka ce ta saka, ga mamakinta da ta saka din ka
sai taga tayi mata dai dai, ashe dai raina kanta take yi, ko dan tana ganin na
khadija ne? Tazo saka kayan kuma sai skirt din yaki sakuwa, sai da anyi ta hau
kekenta ta dan bud'a mata shi sannan ya shiga, duk da haka kuma ya kama ta sosai,
ashe dai ramar tata ba duk jikin bane ba, ashe dai itama tana da hips din nan, duk

"yanzu ya kika ganki?" Ta juya tana kallon kanta a madubi sai taji duk kunya ta

kyalliya ne.
Daga Khadija har Aisha sosai suke enjoying kano, kullum xasu fita su je gidan 'yan
uwan Umma su wuni acan, amma kuma kullum sai Khadija ta kirkiri zuwa gidan 'kawa,
dan haka da sunje inda zasuje zata fita, sai la'asar zata dawo sannan su koma gidan
aunty bilki tare. Aisha kullum sai tayiwa khadija fada amma sam bata ji, dan haka
kusan kullum sai sunyi fada a hanya. Kullum a mota ake dawo da khadija daga gidan
so called 'kawayenta, wanda hakan ba karamin 'kona ran Aisha yake ba. Wani lokacin
sai tayi niyyar ta gayawa aunty bilki abinda yake faruwa amma in ta tuna nasihar
Umma akan kar ta bari wani yaji sirrinsu sai su da suka haife su, sai ta fasa fada.
Ranar da suka kwana goma a kano, ranar sunje gidan 'yan'uwan su kamar yadda suka
saba, basu dade a can ba aka kira Khadija a waya, tayi musu sallama tace da akwai
gidan 'kawarta anan bayan layi zata je, tana kallon hararar da Aisha take yi mata
amma tayi tafiyar ta. Kamar kullum in dai Khadija ta fita Aisha tayi ta zagaye
kenan ta kasa nutsuwa tana so taga wanda zai dawo da ita. Ta yafa mayafinta ta leka
waje, abinda ta gani shi ya daure mata kai, Khadija ce tare da wani a zaune a mota,
amma wannan bashi ya bawa Aisha mamaki ba, wanda suke tare da khadijan shine ya
bata mamaki, har sai da ta 'kara matsala sosai dan ta tabbatar da shi din ne, kallo
daya yayi mata ya dauke kai, Dr AbdulRazak. Ganin idon Aisha bai sa khadija ta taso
ba, sai da ta gama abinda take yi dan kanta, Aisha tana kallo dr ya dauko envelope
ya mika wa Khadija n ita kuma ta karba ta saka a jaka. Sannan ta fito ta shige ciki
ba tare da ta kalli inda Aishan take a tsaye ba, da sauri Aisha tabi bayan ta ta
riko hannunta tace "Khadija menene hadinki da mutumin nan?" Khadijata kwace
hannunta tace "ina ruwanki? An baki ajjiya ta ne?" Aisha tace "ko ba'a bani ajjiyar
ki ba ni 'yar uwarki ce, kuma dole in gaya miki gaskiya. Khadija mutumin nan fa
d'an iska ne, kowa yasan d'an iska ne, menene hadin ki dashi da har zaku fita a
mota kuma ya debi kudi ya baki?" Khadija tace "to tunda kin matsa lallai sai kinji
to aure na yace zai yi" da mamaki Aisha tace "aure?" Tace "eh aure, na gaya masa
abba yace ba zai barni inje 'kawar waje ba sai dai tare da mijina, shine yace zai
aure ni sai mu tafi mu zauna acan" Aisha taji hawaye yana taruwa a idonta tace
"kuma ke yanzu sai kika yarda da hakan, yanzu kin yarda da gaske aurenki zai yi?'
Khadija tace "sosai ma kuwa. Kinga yadda ya zauce gaba daya akaina kuwa? Duk da dai
yayi min girma amma na yarda zan aure shi saboda in cimma muradai na. I have big
dreams a duniyar nan. Ke kina gida baki san abinda duniya take ciki ba, komai fa na
duniyar nan yanzu sai da kudi, in baka da kudi ka zama banza koda kuwa a cikin
'yan'uwanka ne, ko cikin abokanan ka, kowa yanzu a duniya so yake yaga ya fi sauran
mutane d'aukaka. Ni gaskiya tsarin da nake yiwa rayuwata tsarin hutu ne, ni bazan
iya rayuwar wahala ba. Kinga yanzu ke kinyi registration dinki zaki sake ssce ki yi
applying medicine, kuma kina da kwakwalwar karatun nan dan haka na tabbatar zaki
iya, ni kuma fa? Kowa Allah yayi masa kyauta a duniyar nan, ke sai ya baki
kwakwalwa, ni kuma sai ya bani kyau, why is it OK for you to use your brain to get
what you want and not OK for me to use my beauty?" Yanzu kam sosai hawaye yake zuba
a idon Aisha, ta gama fahimtar cewa 'yar uwar tata tayi nisa ba zata ji kiranta ba,
tana goge hawayenta taga Khadija har ta shige gida.
Ranar har suka je gidan aunty babu wanda yayi wa wani magana, kowa da abinda yake
lissafawa. Suna zuwa Aisha ta wuce daki tayi alwala tayi sallar magrib, tana jiyo
hayaniyar Khadija a palo tare da Hafeez, dama sallah akan lokaci ba damunta yayi
ba. Ta dauko wayarta tana tunanin abinda zata yi, bata son bata wa Umma rai amma
kuma dole ta gaya mata halin da Khadija take ciki dan a dauki mataki da wuri, dan
ta tabbatar har cikin ranta cewa Dr 'karya yake da yace zai auri Khadija, da akwai
abinda yake so a tare da ita daya samu kuma shikenan zai watsar da ita ya nemi
wata. Bugu daya Umma ta dauka, sai da sula gaisa sannan Aisha ta fara yi mata
bayani a nutse, ta gayaata gaskiyar abinda ya faru ranar da Dr yazo gidan su, da
yadda Khadija ta samu number dinsa da kuma halinda suke ciki yanzu. Duk da cewa a
nutse tayi mata bayanin amma ba 'karamin tashi hankalin Umma yayi ba, sai da Aishan
tayi ta kokarin kwantar mata da hankali sannan tace "shikenan Aisha, kinyi dai dai
da kika gayamin, na gode Allah yayi miki albarka. Zan gaya wa abbanku sai mu san
abinda za'ayi" daga haka sukayi sallama suka ajiye wayar.
Can dare har Aisha ta kwanta bacci Khadija ta shigo ta d'aka mata duka a hannu, ta
farka a firgice tana kallonta, a take ta karanto 'bacin rai a fuskar khadija, tace
"hankalinki ya kwanta, munafuka, kin hada ni da Umma da Abba kinji dadi, kin hanani
karatu a nan kasar kuma wajen ma ba zaki barnu in fita ba, to ta Allah ba taki ba,
in dai nice wallahi nan gani nan bari, sai dai kici kanki ki sha ba'kin ruwa, dan
sai na samu cigaba a rayuwa fiye da yadda kike tunani. Kuma Umma tace zata taho
gobe, to tazo din, in tazo ku hadu ke da ita ku kwadanta ni ku chinye"
Aisha ranar ta jima bata yi bacci ba, hankalinta taji duk ya tashi, kuma deep down
tasan ba akan maganganun khadija bane ba, ba kuma akan halin da Khadija ta saka
kanta a ciki bane ba, it is something totally different, but what is it? Ya Ilahi

Post din jiya two episodes ne, 10 and 11, yanzu kuma ga 12

Episode 12 : The Tragedy

Washegari suna tashi aunty ta gaya musu maganar zuwan umma, tace "ba sai kunje ko
ina yau ba, kar tazo kuma ba kwa nan. Ban san dai me zai kawo ta ba amma tace maybe
a yau din zata koma". Nan fa Aisha ta zage ta shiga kitchen ta shirya wa umma towon
shinkafa miyar taushe, duk gidan duk wanda yaci sai da yayi santi, Aunty da ta ji
dadin abincin har da dauko flask ta debar wa mijinta ta ajiye masa, tace "wannan
girkin naki Aisha in kika yi aure ai sai kin siye mijin da danginsa, kai har
abokansa sai sun tattaro sun dawo gidan ki" ana ta dariya amma ita Aisha zuciyar ta
bata yi mata dadi sam. Har suka gama abinda zasuyi suka yi wanka suka shirya, suka
dawo palo suna kallo tare da Hafeez wanda yau baije makaranta ba, Aisha ta duba
agogo taga 12:30, ya kamata ace su umma sun iso yanzu tunda da wuri tace zata taho.
Aisha ta kalli Khadija tace "Khadija kira Umma kiji ya suke, waya ta babu kudi"
Khadija ta tabe baki tace "nima banni dashi" Hafeez ne yayi dialing number din
Umma, tana ta ringing ba'a dauka ba, yace "maybe suna hanya, dan kinsan ku mata
saiku saka waya a jaka, wani lokacin ayi ta kira ba zaku ji ba". Wasa wasa har
karfe biyu babu Umma, yanzu hankalin Aisha gaba daya a tashe yake, da kanta ta yafa
mayafi ta fita shago ta siyo kati ta saka ta kira number din Umma, wannan karon a
rufe taji layin, ta kuma kira a rufe, aunty tace mata " gwada number din abbanku
kiji yaushe ta taho? Maybe bata samu tahowa da wuri ba kuma wayar babu charge,
jikin Aisha yana ta rawa ta kira abban, bugu daya ya dauka yace "ta karaso ko? Nayi
ta kiranta wayar a kashe" a hankali Aisha tace "bata karaso ba Abba, muma ita muke
ta kira yawar bata shiga" yayi tsaki yace "yanxu haka bata da chaji, ace mutun zai
yi tafiya amma ba zai cika wayarsa da chaji ba? In ta karaso kwa kira ki fada min"
Aisha tana kokarin ta tambayeshi time din da suka taho amma har ya katse wayar, ta
ajiye tayi wa anti bayani. Har karfe uku tayi shiru, a yanzu kam har Khadija ta
fara daga hankalinta, suna kokarin su sake kiran abba sai ga baban su Aminu ya
shigo, aunty tana ganin shi tasan babu lafiya dan in ya tafi kasuwa tun safe baya
dawowa sai anyi sallar magriba. Tsaya wa sukayi duk suna kallonsa, shima kallon
nasu yakeyi, sai kuma ya sunkuyar da kai yace "ku dauko hijabanku zamu tafi dutse"
wani irin jiri Aisha taji ya debe ta, tayi sauri ta zauna akan kujera ta dafe kanta
da yake barazanar rabewa biyu, Khadija da sauri ta sha gabansa tace "me zamuyi a
dutsen? Ba mune zamu je dutse ba Umma ce zata taho kano, ta taho ma tana hanya
yanzu" bai bata amsa ba ya shige daki, da sauri aunty ta bishi, kawai sai kukanta
suka jiyo, Khadija kam afka musi tayi dakin tace sai sun gaya mata me yake faruwa,
kuka kawai aunty take yi, ta jawo Khadija ta rungume ta, itama sai kuka, Aisha
hawaye babu shi a idonta sam, sai maimaitawa take a ranta, "babu abinda ya samu
ummanta, babu abinda ya samu ummanta" tana nan a zaune kawai taji aunty ta saka
mata hijab sannan ta kama hannunta, daya hannun kuma tana rungume da khadija wadda
take neman shidewa saboda kuka, a haka ta saka su a mota itama ta shiga, Baba yana
gaba Hafeez yana tukawa suka dauki hanya.
A hanya Umma ta dauko waya ta kira tana kuka, tace "yaya Sadisu kaji abinda ya same
mu yau? Allah yayi wa Rabi'a rasuwa dazu. Accident sukayi a hanyar...." Sai kuma
kuka yaci karfinta ta kasa karasa maganar. Wannan shine mugun jin da Aisha ba zata
taba mantawa ba. Ta jin gina kanta a jikin murfin mota ta rufe idonta amma har
yanzu babu hawaye, tana jin Khadija da aunty suna ta kukansu umma ita ta kasa,
addu'ah kawai take yi a ranta akan Allah yasa a kira ace ba haka bane, ko ace dogon
suma tayi amma yanzu ta farka tana nemansu, ko kuma suje su tarar da ita tana
jiransu da dariya a fuskarta tace "wasa ake muku fa, so muke ku dawo gida saboda
gidan duk babu dadi in bakwa nan". Amma ina, suna yin packing suka tarar da taron
mutane fal a kofar gidan su, duk da haka Aisha fada wa kanta take cewa "'yan dubiya
ne, yanzu zasu ce mana ai ta tashi tana ta neman mu" tsakar gida ma a cike yake da
mutane, yawanci kawayen Umma da kuma makotanta, suna shigowa kusan rabin mutanen
gurin suka saka kuka, Mama ta taso da sauri ta rike Aisha, gwoggo kuma ta rike
Khadija suka shiga shiga dasu dakin Umma, anan suka ganta, a kwance akan tabarwa a
tsakiyar dakin, kamar wacce take baccin rana, amma kuma me yasa zata kwanta tayi
bacci bayan gidan a cike yake da mutane. Khadija tana ganinta ta sulale a gurin
tana gunjin kuka "wayyo ummana, dan Allah kiyi hakuri ki tashi, wallahi na daina
kulashi, na daina kulasu gaba dayansu wallahi. Dan Allah Umma kiyi hakuri, don't
purnish me like this, na miki alkawarin duk abinda kika ce min zan ke yi. Dan Allah
Umma ki tashi" daga haka ta yanke jiki ta fadi a jikin gwoggo, dole aka fita da ita
aka mayar dakin su.
Aisha kam tunda ta durkushe a gaban Umma ta kura mata ido ko kiftawa bata yi, kawai
jira take yi taga ta bude idonta, amma ina babu ko alamar numfashi a tare da ita,
ta saka hannu a hankali ta shafa fuskarta, sai taji fatarta sanyi kalau, a hankali
ta dora goshinta a kan nata tana shakar kamshinta, sai a sannan hawaye ya fara
zubar mata yana sauka akan fuskar umman, a hankali kamar mai rada tace "umma wa
kika tafi kika barni dashi a duniya? Ke kadai nake dake, bani da kowa bani da
komai, babu wanda yake sona sai ke, yanzu kin tafi ta yaya zan cigaba da rayuwa?"
Mama ce ta dafa bayanta tace "da Allah ta barki Aisha, Allah yafi Umma sonki, kuma
yafi Umma kasancewa a tare dake, dan haka shi zai cigaba da zama gatan ki bayan
ranta". Anan dakin aka shirya Umma, 'yan uwanta da dama daga kano sun sami halartar
zana'izar ta. Aisha tana zaune a kusa da ita har aka gama shiryata, har lokacin
khadija bata farka ba, sai da akazo daukan gawarta sannan Aisha taga Abba, tayi
mamakin yadda taga ya fita daga hayyacinsa lokaci daya, yazo ya durkusa a gaban
gawar Umma yayi mata adduoi sosai, sannan yace " na yafe miki Rabi'a, dama baki
taba yi min laifi ba sai ni da nake miki kullum, amma baki taba nuna min bacin
ranki ba, ki gafarce ni nima, insha Allah ina saka miki ran cewa ke 'yar aljanna
ce, tunda dai aljannar mace a karkashin mijinta take ni kuma na daga miki. Allah ya
sada fuskokin mu a aljanna" sai kuma kuka, abinda Aisha bata taba gani ba.
Har soro Aisha ta raka gawar umma, da ace za'a barta ma da har makabartar zata raka
ta, amma babu dama dole ta chika makarar maza suka karba ita kuma ta dawo gida tana
tsananta kukanta. Sai a lokacin khadija ta tashi, tana fitowa ta lura cewa har an
tafi da gawar umma dan haka tayi hanyar waye da gudu, sai da aka riko ta aka dawo
da ita, aunty bilkisu da sauran 'yan'uwa suna tayi mata fada.
Shikenan kuma, ta faru ta kare an yiwa mai dami daya sata. Aka kai Umma gidanta na
gaskiya aka dawo. Ana yin sadakar uku mutane suka fara watsewa, sai 'yan uwa na
jiki ne suke zaune. Kowa yazo gaisuwa sai Aisha ta bashi tausayi, ta kara lalacewa
tayi zuru zuru sai ido, duk wanda yayi mata gaisuwa sai dai kawai ta daga masa kai
amma bata iya amsawa. Bata cika yin kuka ba, yawanci sai da daddare, inda anan take
kwana sallah tana nemarwa Umma gafarar ubangiji. In tana zaune sai taji kamar umman
tana kiranta, in kuma tana daki sai taga kamar umman ta wuce ta window, sai ta fito
taga babu kowa.
Ranar da akayi sadakar bakwai, a ranar ne kuma sauran 'yan'uwa zasu koma gida. A
lokacin ne anty bilkisu ta aika aka kirawo mata Abba, suka zauna palo da ita dashi
da gwoggo dasu Aisha. Tace "dama in anjima zan tafi, shine nace bara in nemi
alfarma a gurinka ina so in tafi da yaran nan, tunda dai babu uwa ai ba zasu zauna
su kadai ba, ina so ka bani su su zauna a gurina kafin Allah ya fito musu da
mazajen aure mu aurar dasu" tun kafin yayi magana gwoggo tace "haba 'yar nan, kema
wasa kike yi. Ya za'ayi mutum matarsa ta mutu sannan 'ya'yan ma a kwashe su a
barshi shi kadai? So kike ciwon zuciya ya kamashi ya mutu shima?" Aunty tace "ba
haka bane ba yaya, yaran nake ji, in na tafi dasu ai zai ke zuwa yana ganin su"
gwoggo tace "a'a. Dama tunda akayi rasuwar nan nayi wannan tunanin kuma na yanke
hukunci, ni zan dawo nan gidan in zauna dasu. Tunda can din inda nake babu abinda
nake yi, babu miji yaran kuma duk sunyi aure, ni ma zaman kadaicin dama ya ishe ni,
bana so ince zan dawo nan kuma in takurawa iyalinsa, to yanzu tunda babu iyalin
dole zan dawo nan d'in, kinga shikenan, su yaran sun sami mai kula dasu shi kuma
gidansa bai mutu ba" aunty tayi shiru tana tunani, tasan an fi karfinta, amma kuma
ita Aisha take tausayawa, musamman dan babu wanda bai san gwoggo bata son Aisha ba,
dan a gaban kowa nuna wa take yi Khadija ce tata, tace "hakan ma dai dai ne yaya,
amma ni dai in za'a taimaka min ina son a bani Aisha, in yaso khadija ta zauna anan
din" Abba ne yayi magana yace "Bilkisu ba wai baki Aisha ne bama son yi ba, dake da
Rabi'a ai abu daya ne yayi ku, amma ni bana son ganin an raba yaran nan, ace basu
da uwa sannan kuma an raba su ai abin zaiyi musu yawa, ina ganin a bar su anan din
tare da Yaya, musamman ita Aisha kinga kwanan nan zata sake jarabawarta, sannan
kuma anan zata fara karatu, dan haka ina ganin a bar su anan din kawai" dole aunty
bilkisu ta hakura, amma tana cikin hada kayanta ta kalli yadda Aisha ta rakube a
loko ta zuba tagumi da hannu biyu, kawai sai taji hawaye yana zubo mata, tace
"Aisha Allah zai zama gatanki. Ki bar masa komai a hannunsa, na tabbatar wata rana
daga mu har ke sai munyi mamakin yadda zai chanza rayuwar ki".
Aisha tana kallo haka aunty bilki ta hada kayanta ta saka a mota ta tafi, daga ita
har khadija sai da suka yi kuka, dan ita suke gani a gidan kamar Umma. Tana tafiya
gwoggo ta saka Abba ya kaita gidanta ta dauko kayanta. Kayan sakawa kawai ta dauko
dan komai na amfani akwai a gidan. Farko cewa tayi a dakin Umma zata zauna, amma
sai abba yace su Aisha su koma dakin umman ita kuma ta zauna a dakin su Aisha, bata
ji dadin haka ba, amma sai abba ya nuna mata cewa yayi haka ne dan yaran kar suga
kamar anyi replacing mahaifiyarsu ne, dan yanzu sam baya son abinda zai bata musu
rai. Dan haka suka debe kayan sakawarsu suka mayar dakin umma. Khadija ta koma tana
taya gwoggo shirya kayanta ita kuma Aisha ta zauna tana gyara musu nasu kayan. Ta
bude wardrobe din umma taga kayanta a jere kamar yadda take ajiye su, kayan
sakawarta, takalmanta, da komai nata. Sai tayi sauri ta rufe, ba zata iya fitowa
dasu ta saka musu masu ba. Daya side din da babu kaya sosai ta samu ta dan gyara ta
zuba musu kayansu, duk da dai gurin bai isa ba dan haka ta bar sauran kayan a cikin
akwati. Ta koma ta zauna tana kallon dakin tana lissafin ta yaya zata cigaba da
rayuwa babu Umma?

Episode 13 : New Customer
Tana nan a zaune har Khadija ta shigo, ta tsaya tana kallonta sannan tace "wannan

baki tace "OK bara ni in dauke kayana in mayar can dakin, tunda da akwai guri acan,
dama yanzu gwoggo take cewa in koma can mu ke kwana tare" Aisha bata ce mata komai
ba, kawai ta bi ta da kallo, ta debi fiye da rabin kayan ta, ta mayar dakin gwoggo.
Tun daga ranar rayuwa ta chanja wa Aisha, ita kadai take wuni a daki, ko palo bata
zama, saboda data zauna sai gwoggo ta samu wata bakar maganar ta gaya mata, khadija
kuma tayi mata dariya. Dan haka kullum da tayi sallar assuba take fitowa ta fara
aikin gida, duk abinda da takeyi lokacin umma tana da rai babu abinda ta rage, zata
share dakinsu da palo da kitchen da tsakar gida, sannan ta shiga kitchen ta hada
musu abin karyawa, sai ta debi nata ta koma daki. Wani lokacin tana jiyo su suna
hira suna cin abinci, amma ta gwammace tayi zamanta a daki akan ta fita a gaya mata
maganar da zata bata mata rai. Duk sanda Abba zai fita yakan shigo dakin ya tambaye
ta ko akwai abinda take bukata, amma kullum ce masa takeyi babu komai, saboda tasan
ba zai iya bata abinda take bukatar ba.

ko kallonta bata yi ba, Khadija ta ce "yanzu ai na tabbatar kinyi learning lessons

zero, kin raba ni da ita kamar yadda kika raba ni da karatuna" Aisha taji zafi

Wato dan kinga babu ran umma shine zaki ke gayamin magana son ranki ko? To ni na
barki da Allah saboda bazan hana uwa ta kwanciyar kabari ba saboda ke" sai ga

Khadija "yi hakuri 'yar baba, kar ma ki kulata ki bata ranki a banza, bakin ciki ne

ki a yadda kike, saboda ya nuna mutane kiri kiri cewa ke bakin hali ne da ke" ta ja

Khadija bata jin magama ta, Umma kiyi hakuri ki dauke min wannan nauyin da kika
dora min dan ba zan iya sauke shi ba".
Tun da akayi sadakar bakwan Umma, khadija ta samu kafar yawo, kullum da zarar Abba

fahimci abinda yasa gwoggo ta daure gindin yawon Khadija, kullum sai ta kawo mata

Abba sam bai san abinda yake faruwa ba, dan yanzu in ya fita tun safe sai dare yake
dawowa gida, dan sosai mutuwar Umma ta dake shi, ga karayar arziki da take samun
sa, tunda jam'iyyarsu ta fadi shikenan kudi suka yi masa karanci, a dole ya sayar
da motar sa ya sayi babur saboda ba zai iya cigaba da managing motar ba.
Lokacin exams din su Aisha yana ta matsowa amma sam yanzu ta daina samun nutsuwar
yin karatun, gaba daya spirit din karatun ya fita daga kanta, in ta dauko.takardun

Nura. Kawai sai Aisha taji zuciyarta tana bugawa da sauri, tayi sauri ta dauke

dan yau bata son magana. Ta gyara nikab din fuskarta ta sannan ta fito a hankali ta

Episode 14 : My Sister
Tun daga soro Aisha ta fara jiyo fadan Abba, daga dukkan alama kuma Khadija yake

Episode 15 : Love Struck

Abba fda yake yi har muryarsa tana sarkewa, khadija kuma kuka take yi kamar idonta
zai fado kasa. Yayinda gwoggo take ta faman rantse rantse cewa abinda Aisha ta fada
karya take yi, amma Abba ko sauraronta baiyi ba, dan yaji a jikinsa cewa ba karya
bane ba, kawai babu yadda zaiyi da yayar tasa ne, amma ya san ta riga ta cuceshi,
yasan Dr AbdulRazak ya riga ya cuce shi babu yadda zaiyi dashi, babu abinda zaiyi
masa sai dai yayi masa Allah ya isa, wadda kuma yasan Allah sai ya isar masa din,
ko ba jima ko ba dade kamar yadda yazo har gida ya dauki 'yarsa ya lalata masa ita
to shima sai anyi wa tasa 'yar haka. Garin fadan ne ya shiga dakin gwoggo, anan ne
yaga lodin kaya a tsamar daki, ya tsaya kawai yana kallon kayan yana jin wani bakin
ciki yana taso masa, ashe shi sayar da mutuncin 'yar tasa akayi bai sani ba. Ya san
kuma shima mai laifi ne, shi ya fara bude wa yarinyarsa ido da duniya da kuma son
abin duniya, shi ya nuna mata cewa she can get anything she wants, har ta saka abin
a ranta kuma har kuma yanzu gashi ya zama rayuwarta.
Aisha ranar bata kuma fitowa ba, dan tasan yadda gwoggo ta zuciya zata iya ballata,
ita dama jiki ba jiki ba. Tana nan a kwance a daki har ta daina jin maganganun su,
har bacci ya fara daukanta taji an bugo kofar dakin da karfi an shigo, ta tashi
zaune da sauri taga khadija a tsaye tana huci kamar wata zakanya, idonta ya kada
yayi jawur, ta fara magana cikin dacin murya mai cike da tsana da kyama, tace "I
hate you. Na tsane ki fiye da komai a duniya. You are a curse to my life. Duk wani
abu na ke ce kike ruguza min shi. Da ace ina da damar chanza 'yar'uwa da tun sanda
na bude ido na na ganki a matsayin 'yar uwata da tuni na chanza ki. Bansan laifin
me nayi wa Allah ya hada ni da jaraba kamar ki ba. To ki sani, daga yau you are not
my sister, babu ni babu ke, ko a ranki kar ki kuma sakawa cewa ni na hada
dangantaka da ke" ta juya ta fice daga dakin. Aisha ta koma ta kwanta, a hankali
hawaye ya cigaba da bin kuncinta. Wannan wacce irin rayuwa ce tsakaninta da 'yar
'uwarta? Gudan jininta? Anya kuwa da akwai 'yan'uwa irinsu a duniya?
Washegari duk suka tashi kamar babu abinda ya faru, sai Abba da lokaci daya ya wani
irin fadawa kamar marar lafiya. Abincin karyawa ma da kyar ya danci kadan ya barshi
yace ya koshi. A ranar ne kuma result din su Aisha ya fito, 9 credits take dashi,
murna kamar ta zuba ruwa a kasa ta sha, amma ita kadai tayi murnar ta, daga gwoggo
har Khadija harara suke binta da ita, babu wanda yace mata ci kanki ballantana a
taya ta murna. Nura ne dama yaje ya karbo mata ya kuma kawo mata har gida, ta nuna
wa Abba shima yayi murna sosai, sati daya bayan nan admission list ya fito, ana
kafewa Nura ya kira ta a waya ya sanar da ita sunanta ya fito, kuma an bata
medicine din da take nema, ranar Aisha har da kukan dadi tayi a daki, yayin da
Khadija kuma tayi kuka bakin ciki a daki, tana ganin ya za'ayi Aisha mummuna ta
tafi makaranta ta karanci medicine yayinda ita kuma take gida a zaune tana zaman
banza? Har yanzu kuma Prince charming bai zo ba, serious masu neman nata ma duk sun
fara ja da baya dan sun lura va auren nasu zata yi ba, duk yawanci masu nemanta
yanzu masu son taba jikinta ne. Aisha ta kira Aunty Bilkisu ta gaya mata labarin
admission dinta, itama tayi murna sosai, washegari sai ga kudin registration nan ta
aiko mata dashi, ta nuna wa Abba shima yaji dadi sosai, yace "dama ina ta lissafin
yadda zan samu kudin da zan biya miki dashi, har ina tunanin ko kudinki da nake
ajiyewa zan dauko in baki kiyi amfani dashi, amma tunda an samu wannan din
shikenan, zan cigaba da ajiye miki sai bikin ki ayi amfani dashi" Aisha ta sunkuyar
da kanta tana jin nauyin kalmar bikinta, amma kuma tana mamakin kudin da yake cewa
ya ajiye mata, dan ita ta dauka duk kudin da take bashi kashewa yake yi, shi yasa
yanke hukunci ba tare da facts ba, babanta ne shi, he may not like her as much as
he likes her sister, but he is still her father.
Nura ne ya taya Aisha registration, har ta gama gaba daya, sannan ta fara zuwa
lectures. Ranar da zata fara zuwa har zazzabi tayi saboda tsoro, wannan shine
asalin abinda ya sa ta bawa Khadija takardun ta tun farko, saboda tsoron facing
mutane, amma gashi yanzu Nura yayi convincing dinta har ta sake exams kuma gashi
yanzu zata fara zuwa makaranta. Bata san yaya mutane zasu karbeta ba, bata san kuma
yaya zata karbi mutane ba, but she is sure of one thing, she is not going to show
her face, saboda ta fahimci itace take repelling mutane daga gurinta. Dan haka tana
gama shiryawa ta saka nikab dinta ta fito. Ta shiga dakin gwoggo ta gaishe ta ta
gaya mata yau zata fara zuwa makaranta, abinda gwoggo tace shine "to Allah yasa ayi
abin kirki, Allah yasa ba asarar kudinsa zaki saka shi yayi tayi ba, tunda dai
yanzu ba kudin ne dashi ba lallabawa kawai ake yi" Khadija kam rufe idonta tayi

yanzu tayi mata fatan alkhairi kuma tayi mata nasiha akan rayiwar jami'a.
Kamar yadda tayi a secondary school haka ma yanzu tayi, ta tafi can baya ta zauna

Wannan ne yake kara bashi mamaki, dan yasan shi kam da wahala yayi wa mace magana

Aisha kuwa sai data san ta bar inda zai ganta sannan ta tsaya, ta jingina da bango

Har gaban shagon aka kaita, ta sauka ta biya mai adaidaita ya tafi. Sai a lokacin

facing dinta ya sunkuyar da kansa yana dinki, ta sake sallama ya amsa ba tare daya

nan? Kar dai shine mai shagon. Kamar ta juya ta fita da gudu sai kuma ta tuna cewa

gabanta, yazu sai ya zamanto hasken ranar fuskarta yake haskawa, tayi sauri tasa

Humairah ba" yace "exactly abinda kike ce min kenan kullum, ai ko daga bacci aka

ya bar kauna. Jiki na kuma Alhamdulillah. Masu yimin magana ta private kuyi hakuri.

Episode 16 : The Proposal
Emotions Aisha taji yana shigarta, the likes of which she has never known. Tunda
take babu wanda ya taba yaba wa kamanninta, ko da a cikin mata ne kuwa ballanta
namiji, namijin ma kuma as handsome and as fit as Kamal. Ta sunkuyar da kanta kasa
tana jin kamar hawaye yana taruwa a idonta, ko da haka Kamal ya barta ya gama mata
komai, just appreciation din ya bar ta ya gama mata komai.
Appreciation abu ne mai muhimmanci sosai a dangantaka, dangantaka ta aure ko
kawance ko saurayi da budurwa ko tsakanin 'ya da uwa ko d'a. In kawarki ta sayi
sabuwar jaka misali, in ta nuna miki, ko da kuwa jakar bata yi miki ba, please kar
ki kushe mata, kice "kai jakar nan taki tayi kyau, gashi tayi matching da kayanki"
idan mijinki ya siyo wani abu ya kawo miki, ko da kuwa abin bai yi miki kyau ba, ki
ce "amma baban maama wannan atamfar daka siyo min tayi kyau sosai, dama ina ta
ganin irin ta ina sha'awa, nagode Allah ya kara budi ya kuma raya mana zuri'ah"
idan matarka tayi wanka tayi kwalliya "masha Allah, ni kullum kara kyau kike yi" ko
da kuwa ba kara kyau din take yi ba. Yabo yana kara wa mutane kwarin guiwa, kushe
kuma yana sacewa mutane guiwar su, in ya siyo miki kaya kika kushe su ba lallai ne
gobe in yaga wadansu ya siyo miki ba, idan wanda ya siyo yau basu yi miki ba na
gobe maybe zasuyi miki. Ko 'ya'yanki ne suka yi abu ki ringa yaba musu, abinda
basuyi dai dai ba sai ki gyara musu ba tare da kin kushe wanda suka yi ba. Dan
Allah mu ke kokarin yaba wa junan mu, you have no idea how much a simple 'you look
beautiful today' means to someone.
A hankali Aisha tace "thank you" yayi dariya mai sauti yace "wai kunyata kike ji ne
naga kina ta wani sunkuyar da kai? Ko fuskar ce ba kya so inyi ta kallo ina jin
dadi?" Ta ja mayafinta ta sake rufe fuskarta, tace "dama haka kake da surutu? You
don't look like mai surutu" yace "and am not, bani da magana sosai, amma ke kike
saka ni, i don't know why I always want to talk to you, ji nake kamar mu zauna in
yi ta baki labarina har sai kinsan komai game dani, kema kuma ina so ki bani
labarinki har sai na san komai a kanki" tace "ni bani da wani labari ai, there is
nothing to tell, I am me and that's all" yace "no, ban yarda ba, wayo kike so kiyi
min, kowa da kika gani a duniya have a story to tell. Irin labarin yadda kuke da
siblings dinki, rayuwar makarantarki da kawayenki, samarinki da dai sauransu" tayi
shiru tana lissafin duk abinda ya lissafa bata da ko daya. Bata da siblings din sai
Khadija, which equals to zero, bata da kawaye ballantana samari, kawarta daya umma,
sai kuma Nura.
A lokacin suka karaso kofar gidan su, ta sauko shima ya fito, yana kallonta yace
"naga gida, yanzu kuma ina neman a bani izni inke zuwa muna gaisawa" bata ce komai
ba yace "ko ba kya so inzo?" Tayi saurin girgiza kanta tace "bance haka ba, you are
always welcome" yayi godiya yayi mata sallama ya koma adaidaita sahu suka tafi. Ta
jima a tsaye a gurin, a ranta tace 'what just happened? Me yake shirin faruwa ne ni
Aisha? What am I getting myself into? Amma babu mai bata amsoshin tambayoyinta dan
haka ta juya ta shige gida. Tana shiga gidan gwoggo ta fara yi mata fadan taje tayi
zamanta bata dawo da wuri ba, ita kuwa ko a jikinta, dan yau yadda take jin
zuciyarta fari kal kamar takarda, bata jin akwai wani abu da zai bata mata rai.
Kwana biyu bayan nan. Aisha tayi lecture da safe ta safi cafeteria tana aiki kafin
yamma kuma ta sake wata lecture din. Tana cikin aikin Kamal ya shigo, tana sallamar
wasu, sai daya bari ta gama sallamarsu sannan ya matso, tayi kamar bata ganshi ba,
yace "Humairah" batare data kalleshi ba ta amsa, yace "Kamal ne" tace "I know" yace
"i know you know, kawai ina son inji dalilin da yasa kike ja min aji da yawa haka,
jiya fa ina nan ina jiran ki gama muyi magana kawai sai ce min aka yi har kin tafi,
na rasa me yasa kike ture ni ne ba tare da kin bani dama kin sanni ba" bata bashi
amsa ba, sai ta juya ta shiga cikin kitchen, ta rike kanta tana jin wani iri a
zuciyarta, tabbas ta san one day one time, Allah zai kawo mata miji, amma ba irin
wannan ba, dai dai ruwa dai dai tsaki, wannan ba kalar ta bane ba, he will end up
breaking her heart, wannan kalar irin su Khadija ne. A lokacin ne wani tunani yazo
mata, Khadija, Khadija da Kamal, they will make a perfect match. Daga ganin kamal
ba sokon namiji bane ba, he is very handsome also, he will make a perfect husband
for Khadija, he is so charming that Khadija will surely fall in love with him.
Maybe Kamal zai zama sanadin shiryiwar Khadija, maybe zata cika alkawarin da tayiwa
Umma na kula da Khadija ta hanyar hadata da Kamal. Tana cikin wannan tunanin kawai
taga Kamal a gabanta, ya sunkoyo kamar mai leka fuskarta, tayi sauri ta matsa baya
tace "ba'a shigowa kitchen din nan fa, customers basa shigowa" yace "am not a
customer" tace "in Mama ta shigo ta ganka ba zata ji dadi ba" yace "in ta tambaye
ni me nake yi anan sai in gaya mata cewa na zo ne inga fuskarki" ta fara jera
plates din data wanke tana cewa "keep on dreaming, amma ba zaka gani ba, not today"
yazo yana tayata yace "ni kuwa in tambaye ki mana?" Bata ce komai ba ya cigaba "me
yasa kike saka nikab?" Tace "bangane ba" yace "I know your reason is not religious,
saboda in zaki zo makaranta ne kawai kike sakawa, a gari ba kya sakawa. Why are you
hiding your face?" Tayi mamakin boldness na tambayar sa, tace "I have my own
reasons" yace "which are?" Sai kuma tayi shiru. Ya juya kamar mai shirin tafiya,
sai kawai ya juyo ya kunce nikab din daga baya, yana kuncewa ya fadi kasa, yayi
sauri ya dauke ya saka a aljihunsa, a tsorace ta juyo tana kallonsa, idonta kamar
zasu fado kasa, yayi murmushi yace "you look much better now. I want you to hold
your head high a cikin mutane, I want you to have confidence in yourself, show
yourself a duk inda kika samu kanki, you are special because you are you, you are
beautiful, you have a very beautiful soul, wanda kyawunsa yake fitowa har fuskarki,
ba kowa ne yake ganinsa ba sai wanda Allah ya zaba, I am proud to be one of those
that saw it" ya juya ya kai bakin kofa sannan ya juyo yace "na karbi nikab dinki ne
ba wai dan isa son mutane su gane min fuskarki ba, sai dan ina son kiyi facing
mutane with the real you". Sai da ya fita sannan ta sauke numfashin da take rike wa

mahaifinta, ba zai yiwu ace na fasa ba" yakumbo tace "ni ma ba zanso ka fasa din

kuma sai ayi maganar Maryam din, ko ya kika gani?" A take yaga fuskar ta ta washe,

Episode 18: The Devil

Aisha bata yi mamakin kalaman Khadija ba, saboda ta riga tasan halin Khadija, a
rayuwa kanta kadai ta sani, bata damu da kowa ba. Sai da ta bari Faruku ya tafi
sannan ta bude kofa ta fita, har daki taje ta sami shema'u ta bata hakuri, ta
kwantar mata da hankali sosai ta nuna mata cewa Khadija ita kadai take haukanta,
babu yadda za'ayi Abba ya goyi bayanta, dan haka ta saka a ranta cewa wannan abin
ba zai yiwu ba. Ranar sai ga Aisha suna hira da gwoggo, har gwoggo tana bawa
shema'u labarin neman auren Aisha da za'a zo gobe, shema'u tayi mata murna suka
fara shirin abincin da za'a yiwa baki. Aisha ce ta roki gwoggo cewa kar a gayawa
Abba maganar Khadija tukunna, yanxu hankalinsa gaba daya yana kan ba'kin da za'ayi
gobe, a bari sai ya nutsu tukunna, tunda yanzu ba lafiya ce ta ishe shi ba.
Washegari tun safe Aisha da shema'u suke shirin abinci, fried rice sukayi musu mai
kyau, duk dadai babu nama amma taji kayan lambu tayi shar da ita, sai kuma suka
hada kunun aya mai kyau shima, shema'u ce tace fried rice din nan zata fi shiga da
couslow, dan haka daga cikin jakarta ta fitar da kudi ta bayar aka siyo kayan
couslow, an sami komai amma kudin ba zasu isa a sai salad cream ba, dan haka Aisha
tace zata iya hada wa da kanta, tace a siyo mata kwai da lemon tsami. Ana kawowa ta
fasa kwan ta chire kwanduwar, ta zuba farin a cikin blender, ta matse lemon tsami
akai, sannan ta zuba sugar teaspoon daya gishiri rabin teaspoon, ta kunna blender
din tayi blending dinsu har sai da suka hadu suka yi kumfa, sannan ta dauko man
gyada tana zuba wa kadan kadan tana blending, nan take sai ga mayonnaise ya hadu
sosai, ga dadi har yafi na company ma, ga kuma lafiya tunda ba'a saka masa
chemicals ba, tana gama wa suka hada couslow dinsu suka rufe da foil paper.
Duk abinda suke yi khadija tana daki tana jinsu, sai da suka gama komai Aisha ta

wai kenan 'yar uwata uwa daya uba daya, amma ba zaki tayani yakin neman abinda nake

na ya kare wajan nemo miki shi, amma ni ba zan taya ki kokarin raba aure ba" daga

yi ta wasa da dariya gwanin ban sha'awa. A cikin gida kuma bayan Aisha ta yi wanka

masa body spray din tace "to gashi na baka ni" ya karba ya fesa itama ya fesa mata
sannan ya saka a aljihu yace "na ringa jin kamshin ina tunawa dake" sannan ya mika
mata wata babbar ledar kuma yace "ga tawa tsarabar nan" ta karba shima tayi masa
godiya sannan suka yi sallama, sai data ga tafiyarsa sannan ta shiga cikin gida.
A palo ta tarar da Khadija ta saka gasashshiyar kaza a gaba tana yaga tana zuba wa
su gwoggo zance, su kuwa sama sama suke amsa mata tace "wallahi in kunga kayan da
muka siyo sai kunyi mamaki, wannan matar bata jin zafin kudi, fitar dasu kawai take
yi kamar bata sonsu, sai dai in sun kare ta bawa ya Kamal ATM dinta yaje ya chiro
wasu, ga kanwarsa Maryam baku ga yadda muka saba da ita ba, har munyi exchange din
number" sai da ta kusa chinye namanta sannan tace "ga nama fa in zaku ci" ta tashi
ta shige daki tana 'yan wakokinta.

Washegari aka fara yiwa Aisha gyaran amare, a shafa wannan a turara wancan a jika
wancan a dafa wancan, ita dai duk abinda aka saka ta yi take yi babu musu, kullum

Kwanan ta biyu a kano aunty tayi musu register ita da Zahra a wani beauty center,
five days training zasuyi. Kwalliya ake koya musu tun daga shafa mai zuwa saka
kaya, Aisha dama ga kwakwalwa dan haka ta bude kanta ta ringa koyan abubuwa tana

ta da irin shade din kayan kwalliyar daya kamata take amfani dasu. Kwana biyu ana

kaga bata yi kyau ba sai ka sake a haka har zaka sami abinda zaiyi maka kyau.
Rannan suna cikin yi supervisor dinsu tazo gurinta tana kallonta tana kokarin zana

Nafisa, a can zan ke shiryawa, kinsan harkar biki yanzu sai kiga kayan mutum sun

Episode 21: The New Bride

Tunda aka tashi daga event din Aisha take jiran kiran Kamal, amma shiru, tana ta so
ta kirashi ita amma kuma yawan mutane ya hanata, bata so aga tana waya da angonta
ake tsokanarta. Khadija ranar bata kwana a gidan ba ma, da daddare ta shigo ta kuma
daukan wadansu kayan da zata bukata ta tafi gidan Nafisa zata kwana a can, tace
gidan ya cika da yawa ita kuma bata son takura. Sai wajan 11 duk ana daki ana ta
hira sannan Aisha ta saci jiki ta fito tsakar gida ta kira number Kamal. Sai da ta
katse sau biyu sannan ya dauka, yace "Humairah" taji wani dadi a ranta saboda jin
muryarsa da tayi, tace "na'am, ko kayi bacci ne?" Yace "na dauka ai kinyi bacci ke,
tunda kunsha taro na san kin gaji" tace "a'a banyi bacci ba, ina son in kira ka dai
kafin inyi bacci" yayi shiru for sometimes sannan yace "na kasa bacci Humaira,
zuciya ta babu dadi" tace "anticipation ne, taron gobe ka saka a ranka shine har
zai hana ka bacci" nan ma bai ce komai ba, ta sake cewa, "insha Allah za'ayi lafiya
a gama lafiya" yace "Ameen. Kina yi min addu'ah dai ko?" Tace "eh ina yi maka mana,
kullum in nayi sallah sai na yiwa duk wadanda suke close to my heart addu'ah sannan
kuma inyi wa musulmai baki daya" yace "that means I am close to your heart Humairah
ko?" Tace "of cause you are, bayan mahaifana, sai kai da Khadija" ya danyi shiru
sannan yace "nagode Humairah, na gode sosai da soyayyar ki gareni, kuma ina so ki
saka a ranki cewa no matter what happens in our life, Kamal yana sonki, ina sonki
sosai Humairah, dan bayan mahaifana da yakumbo ke ce next position a zuciyata, kuma
nasan zan cigaba da sonki ne har karshen rayuwata" ta sunkuyar da kanta tana wasa
da 'yan yatsun kafarta tace "nima haka" yayi murmushin data jiyo sautin sa daga
cikin wayar, yace "nasan da a gaba na kike da yanzu kin rufe fuskarki da hannunki,
saboda kunya ko?" Ai kuwa sai ta rufe fuskar tata kamar yana kallonta tana dariya,
yace "ina son kunyar nan taki Aisha, ina son komai naki, please no matter how much
hard our life will become, don't change, kar ki bar zaluncin azzalumai ko cin
amanar maciya amana ya chanza maki innocence dinki" tace "ni kam waye zai zalunce
ni? Waye zai ci amana ta? Koma waye ban damu ba tunda ina tare da kai, ka fiye min
komai a duniya kamal, as long as ina tare da kai bana jin akwai abinda zai taba
zuciyata" yace "and you will always be mine, you will always be my Humairah,
forever and ever" sun dan jima suna hira sannan yace bara ya kyale ta taje tayi
bacci, kar gobe ta kasa tashi, ita ma tace masa yaje yayi bacci kar gobe ya makara
zuwa gurin daurin aurensa.

Washegari tunda Aisha ta tashi ta assuba bata koma ba, tana kallon anata shirye
shiryen abincin baki da kuma abincin breakfast amma bata tashi ta taya su komai ba,
kawai jin ta take babu dadi, wani irin missing ummanta take yi, taje can karshen
daki ta hade kai da gwuiwa ta fara rera kuka a hankali marar sauti, wai yau za'a
daura aurenta amma babu ummanta, ta ringa lissafo abubuwan da umman zata yi da ace
tana da rai, gaskiya maraici ba karamin ciwo ne dashi ba musamman rashin uwa. A
haka aunty bilki ta shigo ta same ta, ta zauna ta dafa ta taji jikinta har ya fara
zafi tace "Aisha? Lafiya kike wannan kukan haka? Wani abin kike so?" Tayi shiru
bata ce mata komai ba, aunty bilki tace "ummanki kika tuna ko?" Nan ta gyada mata
kai a hankali, aunty bilki tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace "nasan yanzu da ace tana ganin
ki da babu komai a zuciyar ta illa farin ciki, farin cikin yadda rayuwa take
tafiyar miki, farin cikin cewa yau za'a daura miki aure a kaiki gidan mijinki. Babu
abinda kowacce uwa take buri akan 'yarta irin wannan ranar, ranar da zata kai ta
gidan mijinta lafiya lau. To ki saka a ranki cewa kamar ummanki tana kallonki ne
kamar tana tare dake ne kuma zata rakaki har dakin ki, kinga kuwa ai ba zata ji
dadi ba kuma in taga kina kuka. Nafi son ki zama mai godiya ga ubangijinki, ki
ringa tuno abubuwan alkhairin da suka same ki a rayuwa sai kike godiya akan
abubuwan da kika rasa, sai kiga Allah ya kara buda rayuwar ki" haka tayi ta mata
nasiha har sai da taga ta daina kukan ta share hawayenta, ta saka ta ta tashi ta
shiga wanka ta fito ta shirya tayi kwalliya dai dai misali da wani jan lace dinta
mai adon fari da baki, dinkin yayi mata kyau sosai, tayi murmushi data tuno cewa
Kamal ne ya dinka mata, ta yafa farin mayafi ta saka sarka da dan kunne na fararen
stones, ta fesa turarenta sannan ta koma ta kwanta ta rufe idonta kamar mai bacci
amma ba baccin take ba, tunanin sabuwar rayuwar da zata shiga take yi, tana jin
tsoro a ranta amma kuma in ta tuna da cewa Kamal will be by her side sai taji ta
manta da damuwar. Zahra ce ta kawo mata breakfast dinta ta ci kadan, tana jin a
tsakar gida ana mitar Khadija bata zama anan yin aiki tare da ita, Aisha tayi
murmushi a ranta tace 'Khadija inta zauna ma ba zata taya ku aiki ba, gwara ma da
bata nan da yanzu anyi fada da ita da shema'u ko 'yan'uwan shema'u, dan duk da cewa
Murtala yazo har gida ya bada hakuri amma har yanzu shema'u bata manta cin amanar
da khadija tayi mata ba. Kuma Aisha ta fahimce ta dan tasan cewa somethings are
unforgettable.

Karfe goma ne daurin auren, kuma anan masallacin kofar gidan su Aisha za'a daura
dan haka tun wajan tara da rabi gurin ya fara cika da mutane, Abba sai kaiwa da
komowa yake yi yayi kwalliyar sa sosai, kana ganinsa kaga uban amarya, gashi tunda
wannan shine taro na farko da zai fara yi duk ya gayyaci manyan mutanen sa, manyan
'yan siyasa, kwamishinoni, har da tsohon governor na jigawa. Saboda kusancin
masallacin da gidan duk abinda ake yi suna jiyo wa a cikin gida, Aisha kam tana
daki a zaune, duk jinta take wani iri, tayi ta kiran number din Khadija tazo su
zauna tare amma bata shiga, at least tana ganin in Khadija ta zo zata danfi jin
dadin zaman. Tana nan a zaune Mama ta shigo, tazo ta zauna kusa da ita tana
tsokanarta, Aisha taja mayafinta ta rufe fuskarta tana murmushi, Mama tace "ina
kawayenki ne Aisha? Ai kamata yayi ace su zasu zauna tare da ke tunda ita waccan
gallafirin ta tafi ta barki ke kadai" sai kuma ta fara yi mata nasiha mai ratsa
zuciya akan zaman aure, yadda addini ya tanadar da komai na harkar zamantakewar
aure, da yake ita Mama macece mai addini sosai.

Sunanan a zaune suka jiyo muryar Faruk a tsakar gida yana cewa "ina amaryar ne ta
buya? Na gano miki angonki, yayi kwalliya sosai yayi kyau, bara inga taki sai in
tantance waye yafi kyau a cikin ku" nan ya dauko wayarsa yana ta nuna wa mutane
hoton da suka yi da Kamal yanzu a waje, kowa ya gani sai ya yaba, ya shigo har
dakin Mama ta kore shi tace kar ya damu Aisha, amma duk da haka sai da yazo ya nuna
mata hoton, ta dago kai ta kalla, Kamal ne yayi kyau sosai cikin farar shadda da ta
sha orange din aiki, ya saka orange din hula, fuskarsa tayi fes daka ganshi kaga
ango, ta sauke kanta kasa tanajin bugun zuciyarta yana karuwa, Kamal angonta. Da
sauri faruk ya koma waje dan yaji an fara magana ta loudspeaker kar aje a daura
baya nan. Aisha ta baza kunne tana sauraron daurin aurenta. Suna ji aka gabatar da
siga amma basa fahimtar abinda ake cewa, har aka gama aka bada sadaki, Aisha ta
sunkuyar da kanta tana wasa da yatsun hannunta, Mama tana zaune a gefenta, sai suka
ji mai sanarwa yace "Alhamdulillah, an daura auren Kamaludden Usman da amaryarsa
Khadija Zayyan, akan sadaki naira dubu ashirin".

Numfashin Aisha ne ya tsaya chak, sannan tunaninta ma ya tsaya, ta dago idonta ta

Tunda Aisha ta shiga dakin Abba gwoggo ta ganta, sai ta rabu da ita saboda tayi

amsa, ta matsa kusa da ita taga idonta a rufe, a zuciyarta tace " ikon Allah,
wannan wanne irin bacci ne kike yi Aisha?" Ta zauna akan bedside kenan taji kafarta

mutane suka yo dakin, kowa yazo yaga Aisha sai ya bi layin shema'u gurin ihu ko

nan, ta jima tana kunsar bakin ciki a rayuwarta, she is deeply depressed, haduwarta

ajiye wa, sai yanzu kuma da hakurin nata ya kare sai ta huce a kan kanta" aunty
tace "doctor to yanzu menene mafita? Wacce shawara zaka bamu akanta?" Yace "shawara
daya itace a kula da ita sosai da sosai, a guji bata mata rai, a guji duk wani abu
da zai bata mata rai, ku jata ajikinku sosai ku ringa nuna mata soyayya. Sannan abu
na gaba kuma shine idan mun sallame ta daga nan ku kaita gurin doctor da zai cigaba
da kula da lafiyarta saboda gudun kar ta kuma samun wani attack din irin wannan"
aunty ta bata fuska tace "ban gane ba doctor, yanzu ku anan ba zaku iya bata magani
ba ta warke completely?" Ya girgizs kansa yace "kinsan kowanne likita da bangaren
da yafi kwarewa, wani ba zai iya aikin wani ba, ni consultant ne dan haka abinda
zan iya yi mata shine zan ceci rayuwarta a yanzu, zan kara mata jinin data rasa in
tabbatar ta dawo normal physically sai in sallame ta, bayan na sallame ta zaku
kaita gurin psychiatrist shine zai cigaba da kula da mental well being dinta har
sai ta warke completely, but I warn you, it is going to be a very long journey"
aunty ta fara goge hawayenta tana cewa "doctor yanzu kana nufin Aisha tana da
mental disorder kenan?" Yace "she is mentally instable, yes, but with due
medication, she is going to be fine".

Ba'a barsu sunga Aisha ba sai da Abba ya dawo tare da police guda biyu, suka zo
suka yi magana da doctor suka tabbatar cewa yarinyar bata mutu ba sannan suka tafi.
Har rige rigen shiga gurin Aisha akeyi amma doctor yace sai dai a shiga day bayan
daya, kuma kar a tashe ta, sannan kar a bata abinci. A lokacin da Abba ya shiga ya
ganta a kwance da bandage a hannunta ga kuma karin jini an daura mata a daya
hannun, sai yaga kamar ta kuma kankancewa ta zama 'yar mitsitsiya dan duk kankantar
gadon asibitin sai yaga gaba daya bata fi rabin gadon ba. Ya jawo kujera ya zauna
ya kama hannunta yana kallon sirirantar 'yan yatsunta. He never realizes hiw thin
she is sai yau, ya san auren Kamal da Khadija zai vata wa Aisha rai amma bai taba
tsammanin zata iya kokarin daukan ranta akan haka ba. A hankali ya fara yi mata

rai fiye da duk yadda ake tunanin uba zai bata wa 'yarsa, banyi miki adalci ba a
matsayina na uba a gareki, amma ina rokonki ki yafe min kar alhakin ki ya hadu dana
mahaifiyarki ya hallaka ni. Idan baki yafe min ba alhakinki ba zai barni ba Aisha.
Amma ina so ki sani cewa ba'a son raina nayi miki abinda nayi miki ba, babu yadda
zanyi ne, ina son 'yar uwarki itama kamar yadda nake sonta, bana son in rasa ta
kamar yadda bana son in rasa ki, kuma kinsan halin da take ciki na dauka in na aura
mata mijin da take so din hakan zai zama sanadiyyar shiryuwarta, nayi kuskure ban
duba ke kuma mai zai faru dake ba. Kiyi hakuri Aisha ki yafe min" Hawaye yaji yana
zubo masa, wannan shine karo na biyu da yayi kuka tun girmansa, daga mutuwar Umma
sai kuma yau. Har cikin zuciyarsa yayi nadamar abubuwan da ya ringa yiwa Aisha, ya
ringa tuno yadda rayuwarsu take tun tana yarinya babu wani abu daya taba yi da zai
nuna cewa yana sonta, sau va adadi yana nuna fifikon soyayyar Khadija akan ta Aisha
kuma bata taba complain ba, sai yanzu yake realizing how sad she has been tun tana
yarinya, how withdrawn from the people she has been.

Sai da Aisha ta kwana ta wuni sannan ta farka da daddare. A hankali ta fara kokarin
bude idonta, tana jin sanyi a jikinta kamar mai zazzabi, ta bude idonta ta sauke su
akan ledar jinin da take daure a hannunta, "oh no, am alive" ta fada a ranta, sai
kuma abubuwan da suka faru suka fara dawo mata a ranta tamkar a mafarki, Kamal ya
fasa aurenta da bakinsa ya furta yace baya sonta 'yar uwarta uwa daya uba daya yake
so, amma kuma ga mamakin Aisha sai taji babu wani feeling da take ji a ranta a game
da abinda ta tuno, bata jin haushin kamal ko Khadija, bata son kamal bata son
Khadija, bata tsani kamal ba bata tsani Khadija ba, bata son komai ba kuma ta kin
komai sai rayuwarta, she hates herself. Amma ba zata kuma kokarin daukan ranta ba,
tunda bata samu duniya ba tana son ta sami lahirar ta, wancan ma bata san me yazo
kanta ba, zata cigaba da rayuwa har sai randa numfashin da aka rubuta zata yi a
duniya ya kare. Ta juya gefenta taga Shema'u tana bacci akan tabarma a kasa ga kuma
aunty tana sallah a gefen ta, ji tayi sam bata da wani feelings for them, they can
all disappear for all she care. Ta rufe idonta ta koma baccinta. Da assuba ta sake
farkawa, duk su biyun taga suna sallah, sallah, Allah ne kadai yasan yawan sallar
da ake binta, kuma ya kamat ta tashi ta roki Allah gafara a bisa laifin data yi
masa na kokarin daukan abinda ba na ta ba. Ta duba taga jinin da ake saka mata ya
kare, ta kashe ta chire daga jikinta. Ta mike zaune, duk jikinta babu kwari ga wani
jiri da taji yana neman daukanta. Motsin tane ya juyo da Shema'u, da sauri ta mike
daga kan sallayarta tana cewa "Alhamdulillah. Aisha ta tashi. Sannu bara in taimaka
miki" ta nufo ta tana kokarin kama ta, ta daga mata hannu fuskarta babu yabo babu
fallasa tace "nagode, zan iya tashi da kaina" da sauri auntu ta karaso itama tana
cewa "zaki fadi fa Aisha, jikinki babu kwari ki bari a taimaka miki, ina zaki je?
Ki bari a kira doctor a gaya masa kin tashi" ta kalli aunty tace "Salloli zanyi,
babu abinda zai same ni in na tashi" ta mike tana dafa gado da hannunta mai ciwo
sai kuma taji zafi ta dauke hannun da sauri, nan ma shema'u tayi niyyar taimaka
mata amma taki yarda. A haka tayi alwala tazo ta far jero sallolinta wadanda aunty

take ji. Tana idarwa doctor ya shigo yayi mata gwaje gwaje ya bata magunguna yace
ta koma ta kwanta. Bayan ta kwanta ne aunty ta tafi gida zata shirya ta kuma karbo

Amma ina so in fahimtar dake wani abu wanda nake sa ran zai sanyaya miki zuciyarki.
In baki mantaba na taba gaya miki cewa Khadija is a devil, yarinyar da ta iya juyar
da hankalin mijina just through phone calls banajin za'ayi mamaki dan ta juyar da
hankalin saurayinki ido da ido. Kuma tunda har Khadija ta dora ranta akan kamal to

ubangiji ba karamin sonki yake yi ba daya mayar da auren ya koma kanta. Dan da ace

mayar da rayuwar aurenki a living hell. Bansan irin bakin cikin da kike ji a

ya gudu da ita haka zai dauko ta ya dawo da ita gida, ki rike wannan a ranki zaki
tuna cewa na gaya miki" Aisha ta bude idonta tana kallon shema'u fuskarta sam babu

wannan Aishar bata san su ba. As far as i am concern bani da wata 'yar uwa a
duniya, ni kadai nake rayuwata. Daga yau na chire Khadija daga rayuwata, bansan
taba, ba kuma naso in san ta, ban damu da mai zai faru da ita ba ballantana wani

Episode 23-24 : Depressed
Kwanan Aisha uku a asibiti aka sallameta, dinkin da akayi mata a hannu ya dinku
kuma an kara mata enough jini dan haka physically bata da wani sauran problem but
mentally fa?
Babu labarin Khadija babu kuma na Kamal, dan shi tunda abin ya faru ma wayarsa a
kashe take amma ita wayarta a kunne take sai dai duk kiran da za'ayi mata ba zata
dauka ba, dan haka suka hakura suka rabu da ita. Tunda aka kwantar da Aisha kullum
sai yakumbo da Maryam sunje sun dubo ta, Maryam duk jikinta yayi sanyi sosai, ta
rantse musu cewa bata taba tunanin akwao wani abu a tsakanin kamal da Khadija ba
kawai dai tasan sun saba sosai.
Tun a asibiti aunty bilki tayi kokarin yiwa Abba bayanin da likita yayi mata, bai
gane me ciwon yake nufi ba amma shi kansa ya fahimci cewa Aishan bata da lafiya dan
gaba daya ta chanza sosai. Ko zaku wuni a gaban Aisha kuna hira ba zata daga kai ta
kalleku ba ballantana ta baku amsa, ko ita ake yiwa maganar ba lallai bane ta
kulaku ba, babu abinda take yi sai bacci sai sallah sai kwanciya, babu kuka babu
dariya, bata farin ciki kuma bata bakin ciki, wannan shine yafi komai dagawa aunty

Tana gama karantawa ta kashe wayar ta kuma cire sim card din. Washegari da safe ta
bayar aka siyo mata wani sabo ta jefa tsohon a shara amma bata gaya wa aunty abinda
ya faru ba. Tun daga lokacin shiru bata sake jin wani abu daga Kamal ba, amma ya
dawo mata da sabon tabon da yake zuciyarta dan har saida ta koma ganin therapist
dinta. Wadansu watannin suka sake shigewa a cikin su kuma Aunty ta kuma matsawa
Hafeez sosai akan auren Aisha, har abbansu shima ya fara shiga maganar, wannan yasa
Hafeez din kauracewa gidan gabadaya ya koma gurin kakarsa ta gurin uba wacce ita
kuma ta daure masa gindin ba za'ayi masa auren dole ba.
Wata rana da yamma Aisha tana dinki ita kadai a gida aunty ta tafi gidan biki,
Zahra ta tafi makaranta, kawai sai ga wani yaro ya shigo yace "wai ana kiran Aisha
a waje" ta yi mamaki saboda hakan bata taba faruwa ba, tace "kaje kace inji wa?"
Yaron ya dawo yace "yace baki san shiba sako aka turo shi ya kawo miki" da har zata
ki fita kuma dai bata san wanne sakon bane ba, dan haka ta tashi ta saka hijab
dinta da sauri ta fita, ta bude kofar gate ta leka waje amma babu kowa a kofar
gidan, tayi tsaki ta juya zata koma cikin gida taji daga gefenta ance "Humairah"
tun kafin ta juya tasan ko waye, amma kuma ta kasa juyawar, bata son ganin shi sam,
dan haka da sauri ta juya zata shige gida amma ya riga ta shiga ya tsaya a garage
"Humairah dan Allah ki saurare ni ko da rabin minti ne, nasan ban chanchanci ki
saurare ni ba amma ina hada ki da girman Allah ba dan ni ba badan halina ba, dan
wanda ya halicce ki ki saurare ni" ta juyo a fusace ta wanke fuskarsa da mari, ko
gezau baiyi ba , sai a lokacin ta kalle shi, Kamal ne dai amma kamar ba shi ba, ya
rame irin sosai din nan, yayi baki hasken fatarsa ya dusashe, idonsa ya fada ciki
kuma zagayen idon yayi baki alamar baya samun isashshen bacci, he looks older than
he is, ya matso "Dan Allah Aisha Humairah ki ce kin yafe min, shine abinda kawai
nake bukata daga gareki, in baki yafe min ba masifu ne zasuyi ta samuna a rayuwata,
rayuwata ba zata yi kyau ba, ta kuma juyawa ya sake tarar gabanta ya durkusa
gwuiwoyinsa a kasa, " Humairah dan Allah kiyi hakuri ki bani dama inyi miki bayani,
ba lallai ne ki fahimceni ba saboda ni mai laifine, na dauki laifina na san komai
ya faru laifina ne, amma dan Allah ki saurareni" ta sake kauce wa hanyar da yake,
ya rike kasan hijab dinta, ta juyo ta cire takalminta ta fara dukansa da iya kacin
karfin ta har sai da ya cika ta sannan ta shige gida da gudu ta rufe kofa. A bakin
kofar ta durkushe ta fara rusa kuka kamar ranta zai fita.
Sai dare Aunty ta dawo, tana ganin Aisha ta san babu lafiya, ta fara tambayarta
abinda ya faru amma babu amsa sai kuka, ta saka ta a gaba da tambaya amma kamar

rufe kofa. Washegari da kyar ta fito breakfast shima kuma tunda aka zuba mata

salati, suka tashi gaba daya suka yo kanta suna tambayar ta abinda ya faru, nan da
nan Aunty sai kuka, tace "Yakumbon Kamal ce, wai Khadija ta chaka wa Kamal wuka ta
gudu" duk suka dauki salati banda Aisha, ta tsaya kawai tana kallon su, sannan a
hankali ta sulale ta fadi kasa sumammiya.

gari a duk Fadin Nigeria. Ameen.Aisha_Humairah
