Episode 25 : Dr Mahdi
Aisha tana faduwa kasa gaba daya suka yo kanta suna salati, aunty kuka take kamar
ranta zai fita "innalillahi wa inna ilairir raji'un, wannan yarinya ubangiji Allah
ka dube ta da idon rahama, wannan masifa Allah ka yaye mana ita". Hafeez ne ya fita
da gudu ya nemo taxi yazo ya kinkimi Aisha Aunty da Zahra suna binsa a baya.
Asibitin Murtala suka kaita emergency, nan take aka karbe ta aka fara bata taimakon
gaggawa amma shiru bata farfado ba. Gashi suna ta complain din bp dinta yayi kasa
da yawa dan haka Aunty ta nemi izinin a tura su asibitin Malam (AKTH), tunda acan
Aisha take ganin likita. Nan take kuwa aka rubuta musu takarda aka tura su can.
Shima emergency aka kaita har saida ta farfado ta fara numfashi normal sannan aka
kirawo doctor dinta ya dubata yace a mayar da ita inda yake shi zai cigaba da kula
da ita. Ranar dai sai dare sannan Aunty ta samu ta zauna, sai a lokacin ta kira
number din Abba taji ta a kashe, har tayi niyyar hakura sai da safe sai kuma ta ce
bara ta gwada wayar gwoggo. Bugu daya ta dauka dan tana da number dinta itama,
cikin muryar kuka ta fara magana " Bilkisu ya muka ji da wannan bala'in daya same
mu? Yau naga tashin hankalin da ban ta ba ganin irinsa a duniya ba, wai yarinyar
nan ita ce zata iya daukan wuka ta biyo abokiyar zamanta wai sai ta halaka ta?"
Aunty tace "ban gane ba, akace min Kamal ta chakawa" tace "eh, ai shiga yayi
tsakaninsu, abokiyar zaman tayi niyyar illatawa ita da abinda yake cikinta, shine
mijin ya shiga tsakani ashe rabon shi zata illata" Aunty ta runtse idonta tana
kiran sunan Allah, sannan tace "yanzu tana ina?" Gwoggo tace "waya sani ne? A gaban
mutane abin ya faru dan haka kafin a tafi dashi asibiti har 'yan sanda sun zo, tana
jin jiniyarsu ta dauki 'yarta ta gudu babu wanda ya ganta, tun safe ake nema kuma
shiru babu labari, duk gidajen kawayenta anje bata nan" Aunty tace "to ya jikin
Kamal din?" Tace "da sauki za'a ce dai, amma likita yace babu tabbas dan wukar ta
shigeshi sosai. To ba wannan bama, Zayyan yana gurin 'yan sanda sun rufe shi" da
sauri Aunty tace "saboda me?" Tace "saboda Khadija ta gudu, kuma sjine yafi kowa
kusanci da ita shine suka zo har gida suka saka masa ankwa suka tafi dashi a gaban
mutane" sai kuma kuka "ni sadiya yau naga tashin hankali, sunce ba zasu sake shiba
har sai yarinyar nan ta kawo kanta da kanta, in ba haka ba kuma shi za'a yankewa
hukuncin da za'ayi mata, yanzu in yaron nan ya mutu bansan me zasu yi wa Zayyan ba"
nan kuma sai ga aunty ta koma bawa gwoggo hakuri har sai da ta daina kukan sannan
tace "ina Aisha? Tasan halin da 'yar uwarta ta jefa mahaifinsu a ciki kuwa?" Aunty
tace "Aisha babu lafiya, muna asibiti da ita ma yanzu bata ma san waye yake kanta
ba, dama shine dalilin neman da nayi miki dan in gaya muku halin da take ciki"
gwoggo ta sake sabon kuka "Zayyan yana ganin bakaken ranaku a gidan sa, wannan
wacce bakar haihuwa yayi ne lokacin daya haifi Khadija?" A haka dai suka yi ta
jajanta abin sannan sukayi sallama. Tana gama wayar sai ga abban Zahra tare da
zahran ya kawo ta da abinci sannan yace aunty tazo si tafi gida in yaso ita zahra
sai ta kwana tare da Aishan, saboda itama auntyn tana bukatar hutu. A hanya take yi
masa bayanin abubuwan da suka faru, ya jinjina lamarin sannan yayi alkawarin gobe
insha Allah zaije dutsen da kansa ya duba Kamal sannan ya police station ya binciki
yadda lamarin ya ke.
Washe gari da rana Aisha ta farfado, ta jima tana bin dakin da kallo sannan tunanin
ra ya fara dawowa, ta tuno duk abinda ya faru da maganganun da taji aunty tana yi
akan Kamal da khadija, ta lumshe idonta tana tuno zuwan da kamal yayi gurinta
shekaran jiya da abinda ya gaya mata, yace yana son yayi mata bayani amma bata
bashi dama ba, yanzu kam koma wacce magana ce zai gaya mata ya tafi da kayarsa
lahira. She loved him and she also hated him, bata san wanne ne yafi karfi ba a
tsakanin love da hate din, amma dai tasan duk biyun tana yi masa su masu tsanani.
Kuma duk ta rasa guda biyun saboda 'yar uwarta, saboda Khadija. Khadija. Ta runtse
idonta saboda wani irin sarawa da kanta yake yi, har wani dishi dishi take gani a
idonta. A hankali tunaninta ya fara tsayawa har sai da taji kanta ya zama empty
bata iya tuna komai, ta mayar da idanuwanta ta rufe.
Wannan karon Aisha tafi ko yaushe dadewa a asibiti dan kwata kwata doctor din daya
ke dubata kasa gane abinda yake damunta yayi, taki yin magana ballantana ya fahimci
matsalarta, bata uhm bata uhm uhm, babu cin abinci sai ruwa da ake kara mata, ko
tashi bata iyayi sai an kama ta. Gwoggo tazo ta duba ta har ta kwana biyu sannan ta
koma, a lokacin take gayawa aunty cewa har yanzu ba'a ga Khadija ba, Kamal yana
asibiti amma jikinsa da sauki yanzu, abba kuma har yanzu yana rufe sunki sakinsa
sunce sai Khadija ta kawo kanta tukunna, gwoggo tana kuka tace "kuma wallahi nasan
yarinyar nan ba zuwa zata yi ba, kome zasu yi masa ba zata zo ba. Har babur dinsa
aka siyar aka kaiwa 'yan sanda cin hancin ko zasu sake shi amma sun karbe kudin
kuma sunki sakinsa" Aunty ta jinjina maganar tace "Allah ya kyauta" da zata tafi
Aunty ta rako ta bakin gate, tace "to gashi zan tafi ban kawo muku komai ba, kuma
nasan ba karamin kudi kuke kashewa akan lafiyar yarinyar nan ba, ya kamata ace mun
kawo muku wani abu amma babu hali wallahi. Sai dai muyi muku addu'ar Allah ya saka
muku da mafificin alkhairi, Allah ya baku ladan zumunci" Aunty tace "Ameen".
Ba Aunty Bilki kadai ba, hatta sauran 'yan uwan umma da suke uba daya kullum cikin
zirya suke yi akan lafiyar Aisha, kullum kuma Aunty tana cikin tambayarsu ko Allah
ya saka wani a cikin su yaji labarin Khadija ko ta je gidan sa amma shiru babu
labari. A Dutse kuma a hankali Kamal ya fara samun sauki, yana fara dawowa
hankalinsa abinda ya fara tambaya shine ina 'yarsa? Nan Yakumbo ta rasa amsar da
zata bashi har sai da ya fahimci abinda yake faruwa, Khadija ta gudu da yarinyarsa,
tashin hankali wanda ba'a sakaasa rana, da kansa ya fara kokarin mikewa zai fita
neman yarinyarsa sai da aka rirrike shi yana kuka kamar ba namiji ba sai da
likitoci suka yi masa allurar bacci saboda kar dinkin sa ya bude. Yana sake farkawa
yace aje a sanar da cigiya gidajen radio da tv, kuma a fada cewa ya yafewa Khadija
shi kawai 'yarsa yake so ta dawo masa da ita. A lokacin ne yaji labarin Abba da
yake hannun 'yan sanda, nan ma yace a gaya wa police din shi ya yafe, babu shari'ah
tsakanin sa da Abba ko ba dan Khadija ba ko dan Aisha. Amma kiri kiri suka ki sakin
Abba, suka ce ai bayan hakkin Kamal akwai hakkin hukuma, dan haka ba zasu sake shi
ba sai sun tabbatar da cewa Kamal is out of danger, in kuma kafin nan Khadijan tazo
sai su kamata ita. Amma Khadija babu ita babu labarinta kamar wacce ta yi
disappearing, babu ko da wanda yace ya ganta, kaf kawayenta anje gidajensu bata
nan, sannan gidajen 'yan uwan abba suma duk bata je ba. Ranar da aka sallamo Kamal
daga asibiti a ranar ya rubuta takardar saki ya aika wa gwoggo yace ta ajiyewa
Khadija, duk sanda tazo gida ta bata.
A kano kuma dr ya kira aunty yace "am afraid Aisha has reached critical stage of
depression, da akwai yiwuwar zata iya samun mental problem" Aunty ta dafe kirji
tace "na shiga uku ni Bilkisu" likita yace "ai ba ce miki nayi already ta samu
mental problem ba, amma nace zata iya samu, kwakwalwarta zata iya tabuwa in bamuyi
wani abu akai ba" aunty tace "doctor yanzu mai zamuyi to?" Yace "ni dai nayi iya
kacin iyawata akanta, dan haka dole zan mayar da care dinta zuwa wani likitan shima
ya gwada nasa expertise din. Akwai likitan kwakwalwa da muke dashi, babban likita
ne sosai, amma kuma ba'a nan yake da zama ba, yana abuja sai dai yana zuwa nan din
duk bayan sati biyu yana ganin patients. Yanzu zan sallame ku ku tafi gida saboda
in muku saukin kudin gado da kuke ta biya, in yaso ranar Wednesday next week da
yamma sai kuzo zan hada ku dashi ya duba ta, insha Allah ina ganin za'a dace" aunty
tayi masa godiya sosai, sai kuma ya tambaye ta "ya zancen auren da mukayi kuwa? An
sami mijin?" Tace "har yau babu miji doctor, yaran yanzu ne ka haife su baka haifi
halinsu ba, naso hadata da babban dana amma yaki yarda" doctor yace "to Allah ya
kawo mafita" ya rubutausu takardar sallama suka dauki Aisha suka koma gida.
Bayan sun koma gida sun kwantar da Aisha akan doguwar kujera sannan suka fara aikin
gyaran gida. Hafeez ya shigo ya zauna a gefenta yana kallonta yace "shatu tsohuwa"
ta bude ido kawai ta kalleshi ta mayar ta rufe, aunty ta fito ta tsaya tana
kallonsa, yace "me doctor din yace?" Ta tabe baki tace "ina ruwanka? Doctor yana
iyakacin kokarinsa gurin samun lafiyarta, unlike wadansu 'yan uwan nata da suka ki
su taimaka suga ta samu lafiya duk kuwa da cewa suna da damar taimakawar" ya san
magana ta gaya masa, ya mike ya shige dakinsa ya rufe kofa. Da daddare tana ta
kokarin bawa Aisha custard din data dama mata yazo ya zauna karbi cup din ya cigaba
da bata, ga mamakinsa sai yaga ta karba wanda ya tabbatar da a cikin hayyacinta
take da babu yadda za'a yi ya bata abu a baki ta karba, dan shi kam bai taba ganin
mace mai kunya irin Aisha ba, ba tare daya kalli Aunty ba yace "na yarda zan aure
ta Umma, amma ina so a jira wannan crisis din ya wuce tukunna sai a daura auren".
Ai kuwa Aunty ba karamin dadi taji ba, da saurinta ta tafi tana gayawa abban su,
sai ga Zahra da Aminu sun zo suma suna ta murna, Aisha kuwa bata san me suke yi ba,
kawai binsu take yi da ido tana kallonsu, ita a gurinta ma sun dame ta da hayaniya.
A dutse kuma an samu da kyar an sallami Abba, shima sai da mutanensa 'yan siyasa
suka shiga maganar sannan aka fito dashi da alkawarin in dai Khadija tazo gida zai
mika ta a hannun hukuma. Abba ya rame ya lalace yayi baki kamar ba kyakykyawan
bafulatani ba, in yana tafiya kamar iska zata dauke shi. Yana shigowa gidansa ya
tarar hatta kujerun palo babu an siyar, dama dakin umma already babu komai a ciki
sai capet, ya bude dakin da gwoggo take ciki nan ma ya tarar babu komai a ciki,
wato gwoggo ta bar gidan kenan gaba daya. Ya bude dakinsa ya shiga ya zauna akan
gado, idonsa ya sauka a gurin da yayi staining da jinin Aisha wanda yaki fita tas
duk da wankin da aka yiwa gurin. Ya tuno da yadda rayuwar gidan take lokacin Rabi'a
tana da rai gidan was full of life amma yanzu ya zama kamar makabarta shine jigon
kashe gidansa. Babu abinda yake son gani a yanzu sai Aisha, gwoggo tace masa
ciwonta ya tashi suna asibiti, tun a lokacin yaso ko waya a barshi yayi da ita amma
aka hana shi, ya shafa aljihunsa yaji babu wayar, tun ranar da aka kamashi 'yan
sanda suka karbe wayar sa kuma yanxu da aka sake shi suka ce basu ganta ba, babu
waya kuma bashi da ko kwandala a aljihunsa, ko kudin da zai sayi abinci yaci bashi
dashi. Dole ya mike ya fita ya rufe gidan, da kafa ya mike ya kama tafiya tun daga
takur har gida dubu, inda gidan Farukun gwoggo yake dan yasan gwoggo tana can. Ai
kuwa tana ganinsa sai murna sai kuma kukan ganin irin yadda ya lalace. Ya zauna aka
kawo masa abinci da ruwa mai sanyi yasha sannan ya karbi wayar gwoggo ya kira
Aunty, a lokacin ne take gaya masa zancen sallamar Aisha da kuma ganin babban
likitan kwakwalwar da zata yi ranar laraba. Babu damar a bashi Aishan dan in an
bata ma ba magana zata yi ba. Sai da suka ajiye wayar sannan ya juya ya kalli
Faruku yace masa "ina so ka sami dillali ka bashi dillancin gidana, kuma kace ya
nema min dan karamim gida mai daki daya zan siya".
Ranar Wednesday da safe doctor ya kira Aunty ya tuna mata maganar zuwa ganin
likita, saboda yau zaizo in kuma ya tafi sai nan da sati biyu zai dawo. Duk da ance
sai la'asar zai ga Aisha amma aunty tun azahar ta dauki Aisha a adaidaita suka tafi
tare da Hafeez. Dan haka sune na farko akan layi, dan mutum biyar ne kadai likitan
zai gani wannan zuwan. Sai da akayi sallar la'asar sannan akace su shigo, Aunty ta
kama Aisha suka shiga tare.
Da sallama ta tura kofar office din. Ya amsa amma bai dago kai ba har ta zaunar da
Aisha akan kujerar gabansa sannan itama ta zauna a kujerar kusa da ita tana
kallonsa. Kana ganinsa ba sai an yi maka bayani ba kasan shuwa arab ne, kyakykyawa
ne na ajin farko, kallo daya zakayi masa kasan hutu da jin dadin rayuwa sun gama
chika ko'ina na rayuwarsa, Aunty ta gyada kai a ranta tana cewa wadannan Allah ya
basu duniya sai dai neman lahira kuma ya rage musu. Yafi minti ashirin yana karanta
file din Aisha dake gabansa sannan ya dago kai yayi gyaran murya yace "sannunku da
zuwa" da sauri Aunty ta dago kai ta kalleshi dan yadda taji hausa tas a bakinsa,
dan babu wanda zai kalleshi yace yasan kalmar sannunku da zuwa. Tace "yauwa sannu
dr" yace "sunana Dr Mahdi. Nine Dr da zai cigaba da kula da lafiyar Aisha daga nan
har zuwa sanda zata samu lafiya insha Allah. Amma kafin komai ina son in tuna miki
wani abu guda daya, ita samun lafiya da kuma rashin ta duk daga Allah ne, in ta
samu lafiya ba wai nine na bata lafiyar ba, Allah ne yayi zata samu lafiya ta
hannuna, in kuma bata samu ba wanda bama fata, to shima ki sani cewa Allah ne bai
kaddaro mata samun sauki ba. In dai zaku bani goyon baya a matsayinku na iyayenta
ni kuma zanyi iya kacin kokarina akanta. Allah yasa mu dace." Tace "Ameen" haka
kawai taji har ranta yayi mata, yadda yake magana cike da confidence da kuma yadda
ya jingina komai ga Allah ya burgeta sosai. Tabbas wannan likitan yasan abinda yake
yi. Ya juya yana kallon Aisha wadda ta sunkuyar da kanta tana wasa da tabon
hannunta, yace "ita ta yanka kanta?" Aunty tace "eh itace, shekara biyu kenan da
suka wuce". Yace "Aisha?" Aisha ta dago kai ta kalleshi yayi mata murmushi sannan
ta mayar da kanta ta sunkuyar. Yace "good. At least tana responding, ni sai naga ma
yadda naga file dinta ba haka take ba. Babu matsala insha Allah kar ki damu. Zan
rubuta muku tests din da zakuje lab dinmu ayi mata, za'a dauki hotunan kwakwalwarta
zaku kawo min in duba, daga nan sai in san a ina problem dinta yake, but I suspect
kwakwalwarta lafiya lau take" ya gama rubuce rubucensa ya bata takarda. Sannan yace
"gobe zan koma Abuja, bazan dawo ba sai nan da sati biyu, wadannan hotunan kuma ba
zasu samu a yau ba sai bayan kamar kwana biyu ko uku, dan haka in sun samu in kun
ga ba zaku iya jirana ba zaku iya bina can abujan, ga card dina nan" ya mika mata
wani kati, "idan kuma kuna ganin zaku iya jirana in dawo shikenan" ta kar ba tayi
masa godiya sosai ta saka a jakarta sannan ta kama hannun Aisha suka mike tsaye, ya
sake cewa "Aisha sai anjima ko?" Ta kalleshi ya sake yi mata murmushi, tayi sauri
ta kife fuskarta a kafadar Aunty.
Daga nan direct neurological lab suka nufa suka bayar da takardun da Dr ya basu. A
take akayi musu bill din dubu hamsin kudin hoto, aunty ta dafe kai, yau ina zata
samu dubu hamsin? Duk kudadenta sun kare, ta gaji da tambayar Abban Zahra kudi
tunda tasan yana iyakacin kokarinsa. Hafeez ne yace za'a samu a wajansa, dan haka
ya tafi ATM ya chiro kudin chif ya zo ya biya. Sai wajan 12 na dare suka gama da
asibiti inda akayi ta saka Aisha a cikin inji ana daukar hotunan kwakwalwarta, daga
baya aka ce musu su dawo nan da kwana uku su karba.
Washegari da safe Abba yazo, daya ga Aisha sai da yayi hawayen yadda ta koma, Aunty
tayi masa bayanin yadda sukayi da Dr Mahdi, Abba ya dauko kudade masu yawa ya bawa
Aunty sannan yayi mata bayanin gidansa daya siyar ya sayi karami. "Lafiyar Aisha a
yanzu itace tafi min komai, ita kadai ta rage min a duniya, dan Khadija na
sallamawa duniya ita, ban saka ran zata dawo nan kusa ba, ko ta dawo ma ni kam
munyi hannun riga ni da ita. Yanzu in sakamakon ya fito kawai mu dauki yarinyar nan
mu tafi da ita abujan, tunda naga kamar hankalinki ya kwanta da likitan" Aunty tace
"to shikenan, Allah ya kaimu, ita kuma Khadija Allah ya shirye ta a duk inda take,
ni yari yar data tafi nake tausayawa" Abba yace "sosai kuwa, baki ga yadda mahaifin
yarinyar ya tayar da hankalinsa ba" Aunty ta bude jakarta ta dauko card din da Dr
Mahdi ya bata ta karanta a fili "SULMOON neurological clinic" sai kuma address a
kasa da phone number.

Episode 26 : Abuja

A ranar Abba ya koma dutse, three days after that aunty ta karbo result din hotunan
Aisha, ta kira Abba ta gaya masa, sannan ta kira number wayar data gani a card din
Dr Mahdi. Three missed calls bai dauka ba, sai ta rabu dashi. Sai can bayan magrib
sai gashi ya kira ta, ta dauka da sallama sula gaisa sannan tayi masa bayanin
kanta, yace "ohh na gane, maman Aisha ko?" Tace "eh" sai kuma ta gaya masa hukuncin
da suka yanke ita da abba na kawo Aisha Abuja, tace "sai dai muna so kafin mu taho
da ita din a bamu breakdown na kudaden da kake tunanin zamu kashe saboda musan
abinda zamu tanada, kaga in munji abin yafi karfin mu shikenan sai mu hakura ba
tare da mun wahala ba" yace "in dai maganar kudi ce karki damu, shi wannan asibitin
private ne amma kuma kudin da zaku kashe tamkar wanda kuke kashewa ne a government,
sannan zaku sami best medical care anan fiye da yadda kike tsammani. Me asibitin ta
bude shine ba wai don ta sami kudi ba sai don ta taimakawa marasa lafiya masu
karamin karfi" aunty taji dadin jin haka sosai, tayi masa godiya, ya gaya mata cewa
duk sanda zasu taho ta kira shi ta gaya masa.

Washegari da daddare tayi wa abban Zahra maganar tafiya abuja, dama ta jima tana
tunanin yadda zata tunkare shi da maganar tunda shi ba mutum ne mai son yawan fita
unguwa ba ballantana ayi maganar tafiya wani gari inda basu da kowa a can. Tana
gaya masa kuwa ya bata rai yace "wacce irin abuja kuma Bilkisu? Ji nake ke kika ce
min Dr din nan yana iyakacin kokarinsa, to me yasa zakuce kuma lallai sai kun kaita
abuja? Lafiya ba'a hannun Allah take ba? Duk sanda yayi niyyar zaki ga ta samu
sauki ne ba wai a abuja saukinta yake ba" yana gama magana ya juya mata baya alamar
ya gama magana kenan. Ta jima a zaune a gaban gadon tana tunani, tabbas abban zahra
yayi iya kokarinsa, tunda ta dauko Aisha bai taba complain ba, bai taba nuna
gazawarsa ba ko kuma ya nuna cewa Aisha ba 'yarsa bace ba, duk harkokin asibitinta
dashi akeyi, duk abinda ya siya wa zahra sai ya siyawa Aisha, dan haka yanzu dan ya
ki yarda da tafiyarta abuja kai Aisha asibiti bai kamata tayi masa butulci ba. Amma
kuma ita kam har zuciyarta ta amince cewa kai Aisha abuja shine solution din
problem dinta, haka nan kawai take jin kamar wata sabuwar rayuwa ce take jiran
Aishan a abuja, kamar wani chance ne Allah ya bata wanda bai kamata a danne mata
shi ba. Amma kuma ta zata yi? Mijinta ya hana ta zuwa babu yadda zata yi taje, to
ko abban Aishan zata gayawa shi ya zo ya kaita da kansa? Amma kuma abba namiji ne
ba zai iya kula da Aisha a asibiti ba, in tace gwoggo taje tasan a zuwa zasu yi su
rikice ba lallai ne ma ta gane address din asibitin ba, ko kuma taje tayi ta rigima
da mutane a karshe ta salwantar da kudin da aka bata ta dawo ba tare da anyi
achieving komai ba. To yanzu ya zata yi? Wannan yarinya marainiya ce kanwarta uwa
daya uba daya ce ta haife ta dan haka hakkinta ne ta kula da ita.

Har safiya bata yanke hukunci ba, sai da yamma ta rubuta text ta tura wa Dr Mahdi,
tayi masa bayanin duk abinda yake faruwa na rashin wanda zai kawo Aisha Abuja, dan
haka ta gaya masa cewa sun hakura da zuwa abujan zasu ke ganin sa a nan kano duk
sanda ya samu zuwa. Bai mata reply ba kuma bai kira ta ba har wata safiyar, har ta
fitar da tsammanin ji daga gare shi sai kuma ga wayar sa ta shigo, ta dauka suka
gaisa yace mata yaga sakonta abubuwa ne suka yi masa yawa shi yasa bai amsa mata
ba, amma shi gaskiya hukuncin barin Aisha a kano bai yi masa ba, yace "idan kin
amince, kuma kina ganin babanta zai amince ni zan kula da ita, abinda zakuyi kawai
shine ku hado ta da wanda zai kawo ta gurina, ina da iyali da muke zaune tare dasu
anan abuja, in yaso sai ta zauna a gidana inke kaita asibiti duk sanda bukatar
hakan ta taso har lokacin da zata samu lafiya. Duk wanda zai kawo ta zai ga gidana
kuma zai ga asibitin namu, duk sanda kuke bukata zaku zo ku ganta" aunty tayi shiru
ta kasa bashi amsa, yacigaba "tunda kika gaya min yarinyar nan marainiya ce hankali
na gaba daya ya karkata kanta, kuma kamar yadda na gaya miki her case is not as big
as you think, cikin few weeks zakiga ta warke tas. Kuma na gaya miki cewa mai
asibitin nan ta gina shine saboda taumakon masu karamin karfi, dan haka Aisha ba
ita ce mara lafiya ta farko dana dauka na kai abuja ba kuma ba zata zama ta karshe
ba" a haka yayi ta convincing aunty har tace masa "to shikenan Dr, zan sanar wa
mahaifinta inji abinda zai ce" suka yi sallama ta ajiye wayar tana tunani, anya
kuwa ta yarda haka kawai ta barwa stranger 'yar marainiyar Allah wadda ba
isashshiyar lafiya ce da ita ba? Ta kira Abba ta gaya masa duk yadda suka yi da Dr,
tace "ya kake gani?" Yace "ina ganin ni zanzo in dauke ta muje can tare, sai in
ganshi in ga gidan nasa da ya fada, sannan in san ko zan iya yarda dashi ko akasin
haka". Haka kuwa akayi, Abba yazo kano ya kwana washegari aunty ta raka su har
tasha suka tafi abuja, da zasu tafi Aisha ta juyo tana kallon aunty, a ranta bata
son rabuwa da ita dan tafi yarda da ita akan kowa amma kuma bata yi magana ba sai
ido kawai. Aunty ta dafa kanta tace "kar ki damu Aisha, zanzo next week insha Allah
in ganki" da haka suka rabu.

Suna sauka a abuja, Abba ya samar musu taxi ya nuna masa card din Dr, drivern yace
yasan asibitin dan haka suka tafi, suna zuwa suka sake nuna card aka shigar dasu
har waiting room din Dr aka ce su jira. Anan Abba yayi iyakacin kokarinsa dan ganin
Aisha tayi masa magana amma ko kallon inda yake batayi ba, haka ya hakura ya rabu
da ita. Basu jima suna jira sosai ba sai aka ce su shigo. Da murmushi Dr ya tare
su, Aisha ta sunkuyar da kanta, yace "Aisha, welcome to Abuja. Baki taba zuwa ba
sai yau ko?" Babu amsa, yace "zauna to mana, ko a tsaye zaki tsaya?" Nan ma babu
amsa, ta fara fidgeting da fingers dinta, Abba ya zauna yace "Aisha ki zauna mana"
taki zama still, doctor yayi dariya yace rabu da ita, zata zauna ne dan kanta.
Sannan ya karbi file din hannun Abba da hotunan da aka dauka a kano ya duba, ya
dago yana kallon Abba yace "just as I expected, babu komai a kanta, I just have to
look for where the problem is and fix it before it reaches the brain, it won't take
long, so in kana so zaka iya zama ka jira mu gama da ita ku tafi tare, in kuma baka
so zaka iya tafiya duk sanda muka gama sai ayi maka magana kazo ka tafi da ita"
Abba yayi studying doctor sai yaji zuciyarsa ta amince da shi, yace "ina ganin zan
tafi kawai, amma zan fara ganin inda kuke da zama anan abuja din kafin in tafi,
yadda duk sanda nazo ganinta zan nemi gidanka" doctor yace "ba matsala, dama ai
kamata yayi ka kwana anan ma tukunna, gobe in ka huta sai ka tafi". Aka kaisu wani
daki sula yi sallah, aka kawo musu abinci da ruwa abba yaci Aisha kam ko kallon
abincin bata yi ba, abba ya fita ya zagaya asibitin ya dawo yana ta yabawa. Da
yamma nurses suka zo suka tafi da Aisja aka bude mata sabon file sannan doctor ya
rubuta mata wasu tests din aka turata lab, ita dai kawai kallonsu take yi kamar
zata yi kuka. Sai bayan magrib sannan aka gama da ita, doctor ya saka su a motar sa
yace driver ya kaisu gida shi ba yanzu zai taho ba.

Katon gida ne irin wanda Aisha bata taba gani ba sai a film, ita dai duk a tsorace
take, wannan gidan fa? Wannan ina Aunty ta turo tane? Me zasuyi mata? Ita bata son
wannan farin likitan gashi taji abba yana zancen shima tafiya zaiyi ya barta, ta
shiga uku mai yake faruwa da ita ne haka? Masu aiki ne suka zo suka dauki kayansu.
Aka shiga dana Abba bq ita kuma nata aka shiga dashi cikin gida, ta tsaya tana
kallon gidan, bene ne hawa daya an zagaye shi da flowers wadanda suka sha gyara,
sai part din baki babba daga gefen dama sai part din masu aikin gida daga gefen
hagu. Ta tsaya a gurin kawai har sai da wata budurwa ta fito ta kama hannunta suka
shiga ciki. A palo ta tsaya taki yin gaba, ta kwace hannunta daga na yarinyar a
dole ta rabu da ita ta shiga wani daki, bata jima da shiga ba sai ga wata mata ta
fito, kyakykyawa ce baka doguwa mai kyakykyawan jiki, ta tsaya a bakin kofa
fuskarta da murmushi tace "Aisha sannu da zuwa" ta dago kai ta kalleta sannan ta
sunkuyar da kanta tana wasa da tabon hannunta, matar ta sake cewa "me yasa ba zaki
shigo ba, ke fa bamuwa tace kuma ance bakonka annabinka ko? Ko kinfi so nima in
fito in tsaya a kusa dake sai mu gaisa a haka" ta sake kallonta sannan ta kalli
palon tana noticing irin yadda ya hadu babu ce kawai babu a ciki, matar tayi
noticing yadda Aisha take kallon palon, tayi dariya tace "karki damu, ba gidan 'yan
yankan kai bane ba, mijina likita ne, kinsan likitocin nan wasa wasa kudi ne dasu
suma" Aisha ta kalleta kawai, matar ta cigaba da magana "naji ance ke 'yar kano ce
ko?" Sai a lokacin Aisha ta girgiza kai tayi magana a hankali tace "dutse" but
yaushe rabonta da dutsen? Matar ta sake dariya tace "duk daya, da kano da jigawa ai
duk daya ne, ko baki san daga kano aka ciri jigawa ba? Ni 'yar kano ce, so
technically ni 'yar garinku ce, best friend dina 'yar jigawa ce though ba cikin
dutse ba, maybe wata rana zan kaiki gurinta kafin ki koma gida" still Aisha bata yi
magana ba kuma bata shigo ba, a lokacin 'yar budurwar nan ta dawo da baby a
hannunta ta mika wa matar, ta karbe shi ta dora a kafadarta tana lura da yadda
Aisha take bin babyn da kallo alamar sha'awa kiri kiri a fuskarta, matar tace
"wannan d'ana ne na uku, sunan sa Abrar, da akwai yayyensa namiji daya mace daya,
Annur da Anisa, suna cikin daki, will you like to come inside and see them?" Ta
fada tana miko wa Aisha hannunta, a hankali Aisha ta fara tahowa kamar wadda ake ja
da magnet har taxo ta saka hannunta a cikin na matar, tana murmushin nasara tace
"sunana Amira, welcome to my home".

Tun da ta shiga dakin take kallon yaran da suke ta faman homework dinsu, babban
zaiyi shekara takwas zuwa tara, macen kuma shekara biyar ko hudu, sai jaririn da
yake hannu. Amira ta lura da yadda take kallon yaran ta zauna a kusa da ita tace "
kina da 'ya'ya ne?" ta yi saurin girgiza kanta, ita da ko saurayi bata dashi ina
zata samu 'ya'ya? Ita da babu namijin da yake sonta sai ma wanda yazo ya yaudare
ta, dan 'uwanta ma Hafeez cewa yayi bata da siffar matar da yakr so ya aura, ita
bata taba ma mu'amala da yara ba, su biyu ne daga Khadija Umma bata sake haihuwa
ba, ita kuma ba mai zuwa gidan 'yan uwa bace balle taga yara a nan, gidan Aunty ma
babu yara dan haka ba zata iya tuna sanda ta dauki yaro ba ko kuma ma ta zauna
dashi a daki daya. Amira ta ajiye mata jaririn hannunta akan cinyarta tace "rike
min shi, ina zuwa" sannan ta fita. Aisha ta tsaya kawai tana kallon yaron da sak
yake kama da baban sa, ta kalli sauran suma duk da baban su suke kama sai macen da
tayi duhun fatar babarta amma ta fita haske, ga gashi ya sauko har tsakiyar
bayanta. Aisha ta lumshe ido tana tunani, this is not a place for someone as ugly
as me, wadanda ma basu kai wadannan haduwa ba suna kyamata ballantana wadannan? Am
sure korar kare zasuyi min, maybe basu yi realizing how ugly I am ba.

Washegari suka fara fita tare da doctor zuwa asibiti, kullum in sun fita zaiyi tayi
mata hira a hanya yana labarinsa yana dariya shi kadai, ko kallonsa bata yi, dan
ita a gurinta munafunci ne kawai yake yi, ya za'ayi kyakykywan mutum kamarsa wanda
bai rasa komai ba yake kula mummuna irinta wadda bata da komai, ita a ganin ta duk
ta gane lahon mutane, duk munafukai ne mayaudara ko sunce suna son irinta karya
suke yi. Da zarar su je asibiti kuma kullum abu daya ne, a saka ta a wannan engine
a cire a saka ta a wancan wani lokacin sai inta gaji ta saka musu kuka sannan su
rabu da ita ta huta sai a cigaba. Ga magunguna nan da allurai kullum sai doctor
yayi mata, har tsoro take in taji tsayuwar motar sa da daddare dan tasan allura zai
fara yi mata yana shigowa, Amira kam sai tayi ta mata dariya tana tsokanar ta.
Kullum da daddare zasuyi waya da auntyn ta, wani lokacin ita take kira wani lokacin
kuma doctor ne yake kiranta. Tun Aisha bata magana a wayar har ta fara magana.
Rannan kawai sai Aunty taji tace "aunty ina Zahra? Yaushe zaku zo?" Ranar sai da
Aunty tayi kwalla dan ko ba'a gaya mata ba tasan lafiya ta fara samuwa a gurin
Aishanta. Ranar nan kam sai gasu sunzo da Zahra da Hafeez, da tsaraba niki niki sun
kawo wa Amira da yara, duk kannin su sunyi mamakin chanzawar Aisha dan sosai tayi
musu magana tana ta tambayar Aminu wai shi yaushe zaizo ya ganta. Ko da wasa Aunty
bata yi mata maganar Kamal ba ballantana Khadija, sai da suka kwana daya sannan
suka koma, da zasu tafi Aisha har da hawaye, doctor yaji dadin ganin hawayenta
sosai yace "Alhamdulillah, Aisha lafiya ta fara samuwa". Sati daya bayan zuwan su
Aunty sai ga Abba shima yazo, a asibiti ya samesu, kallo daya Aisha tayi masa ta

ta zauna. Abba yayi ajjiyar zuciya yace "doctor ya jikin nata? Naga kamar babu
sauki har yanzu?" Doctor yayi dariya yace "da ace zaka leka waje yanxu ka ganta
tana hira da nurses da kayi mamaki, Aisha ta samu lafiya sosai. Wannan shi yasa
nayi mamakin yadda tayi treating dinka, ba kai ne mahaifinta ba?" Abba yace "eh ni
na haife ta, su biyu kadai Allah ya bani ita da 'yar uwarta, mahaifiyarsu kuma
Allah yayi mata rasuwa shekarun baya" doctor yace "to ina 'yar uwar tata, ko ita ce
rannan suka zo tare da auntyn su" Abba ya girgiza kai yana share hawaye yace " 'yar
uwarta ta shiga duniya, wata kusan hudu kenan amma har yau babu labarinta" doctor

kamar yana shiga lamarin daba nasa ba. Shima a gidan doctor ya kwana kuma ya yaba
sosai da irin karbar da akayi masa amma Aisha ko hanyar inda yake bata nufa ba, da
zai tafi ma da kyar Amira ta turo ta suyi sallama, ta tsaya kawai tana kallonsa,
yace "Aisha zan koma gida, su gwoggo duk suna gaisheki sunce suna duba ki da jiki.
Khadija kuma har yanzu ba'a ganta ba, ki ringa yi mata addu'a kinji? Allah ya dawo
mana da hankalinta gida ita da yarinyar hannunta" Aisha tana binshi da kallo tana
jin wani iri a zuciyarta, Khadija kuma? Ina Khadijan ta tafi? Ta fara tunani kamar
taji ance Khadija ta chaka wa Kamal wuka, amma kuma kamar a mafarki, kuma yanzu
gashi Abba yana maganar wai Khadija ta gudu da 'yarta, 'yarsu ita da Kamal. Tana
cikin tunanin taji Abba yana cewa "so nake ki samu lafiya ki koma dutse gurina, mu
hadu tare mu cigaba da addu'ah da kuma neman 'yar uwarki" ta dago kai tana
kallonsa, sannan a hankali tayi masa magana for the first time tace "no, I will
never go back there" sannan ta juya da gudu ta koma cikin gida. Tunda ta shiga daki
ta rufe kofa bata kara fitowa ba, tana kwance kawai akan gado kanta ya chushe ta
rasa tunanin da zata yi, everything seems puzzled, what really happened? What is
real and what is a dream? Amira tazo tana ta buga mata kofa amma taki budewa har ta
hakura ta rabu da ita, da dare Dr yazo shima yayi yayi ta bude taki, sai yasa aka
balla kofar ya shigo ya ganta a takure a gefen gado, jikinta gabadaya karkarwa
yakeyi, ya zauna a kusa da ita ya jingina a jikin gadon yana facing bangon kamar
yadda tayi yace "what is wrong?" Cikin rawar murya tace "I don't want to go back
with him" ya kalleta yaga yadda take a tsorace yace "waye yace miki zai tafi dake?
Shi yayi tafiyarsa fa tuni" ta dan sali jikinta kadan, yace "amma me yasa ba kya
son komawa gidan ku?" Sai kuka kuma babu amsa, yayi yayi tayi magana taki sai kuka,
Amira ma ta shigo taga ba zata iya ba ta rabu da ita ta fice.

Washegari doctor ya kira Aunty, bayan sun gaisa mata "duk treatments din daya
kamata inyi wa Aisha nayi mata, amma har yanzu bana jin ta chanchanci in sallame ta
saboda ina tsoron kar ta samu relapse. But, I am sure her problem is no longer
mental but psychological. She just need someone to talk to, someone to love" Aunty
tace "to doctor menene abinyi yanzu?" Yace "akwai oga ta a nan asibitin, a very
good woman, a neurologist as well as a psychologist, the best in her field. In kun
yarda I will transfer Aisha's case to her ta karasa mata treatments dinta yadda
zamu samu tabbas din ba zata samu relapse ba".

Ciwon Aisha ba wai ta same shi bane sanadiyyar abinda Aisha da Kamal sukayi mata
ba, a'a, Aisha ta dade da ciwon ta, ta same shine sanadiyyar kyara da tsangama da
take fuskanta daga mutane tun tana yarinya. Kasancewarta mai hakuri yasaka bata
fitowa ta fadi abinda yake zuciyarta take rufewa a ranta bata fadawa kowa
damuwarta. Depression is real, mutanen mu da yawa suna fama dashi though ba lallai
ne ya kai na Aisha ba tunda labarin Aisha fiction ne. A matsayinmu na iyaye kar
muke kuntatawa 'ya'yanmu masu hakuri just because suna da hakuri, at times gwara ma
a kuntatawa marar hakurin tu da shi zai fito ya nuna bacin ransa and by so doing
yana releasing stress dinsa, amma mai hakuri yana tarawa ne a ransa, duk wata bakar
magana da aka gaya masa yana ajiyeta a ransa kuma kullum tana damunsa amma baya
complain saboda yana da hakuri. Tsawa, mangari, ba'a, bakar magana da uwa uba nuna
kiyayya kiri kiri su ake kira da mental assault kuma suna leading to mental
problem. Allah yasa mu dace.

yaron ba. Duk kyawun 'yan uwan da take gani sai taga nashi kyan ya dusashe nasu.

Episode 28 - 29 : The Ghosts of the past

Aisha ta share hawayenta tana tunani a ranta, wannan wacce irin mata ce? Wacce irin
baiwa Allah yayi mata haka ta iya tsara magana yadda tasan dole zata shigi mutum,
idan tana kallonka kamar she is not looking at you but looking into you, idan tana

bata ikon ganin haske ya yaye mata duhun idanuwanta sannan ta nemi jagorancin
ubangiji akan dukkanin abubuwanda zata vigaba da fuskanta a cikin rayuwarta. Tana

itace; zata koma dutse gurin abbanta, zata nemi Kamal su zauna suyi magana, saboda

Babana shine VC na university din nan garin, If you want I can talk to him sai ya

Da la'asar Dr Mahdi yazo ya dauketa, da zata fita Atika ta biyo ta mota da leda a
hannunta ta saka a booth tace sakonta ne inji Mami. Bayan ta tafi Aisha ta lura
cewa Dr shi kadai ne a motar, for the first time sai taji tana jin kunyarsa wanda

shi ya amsa sannan ya tayar da motar, a hanya yana ta jan ta da hira akan yana so
yaji yadda suka yi da Moon amma taki sakin jiki ta bashi labari, shi kuma yaki

sosai, ya san just three days ago day abbanta yazo take ta kuka tana cewa she never

complete. Abu daya ya rage mata yanzu, ta samu happiness. A ranar da daddare ya
kira aunty ya gaya mata zuwan Aisha, tayi mamaki itama, ya hada ta da Aishan a waya
ta tabbatar mata da cewa ita ce mai son zuwa din. Kwana biyu bayan nan aka sako
Aisha a mota sai kano. Kwanan ta daya a kano ta tafi dutse. Tare suka je da Zahra,
washegari Zahra ta dawo ta barta a can.

A gidan Faruku ta sauka gurin gwoggo, gwoggo kam har da matso kwallar ganin Aisha,
nan take aka kira Abba aka gaya masa labarin zuwan Aisha sai gashi ya taho daga
kasuwa inda yake dan saye da sayarwar kayan gwanjo yanzu, dan ya rubuta retire ma
ya bar aikin government ya koma kasuwanci. Yana shigowa Aisha ta tsaya tana
kallonsa, tana kallon yadda duniya ta mayar da abban ta, lallai in baka mutu ba
baka gama ganin rayuwaba, ta tuna da abbanta dan gayu mai tinkaho da jiji da kansa,
ta tuna da irin kayan da yake sakawa a da, da yadda yake daga kai in ya shigo gida
yana amsa gaisuwar ta ko ta ummanta, Khadija ce favorite dinsa, itace komai daga
kan da yake yi in ya ganta zai murmusa. Lokacin yana ji da siyasa, lokacin suttura
ba komai ba ce ba a gurinsa, lokacin yana goga kafadar sa da Governor da 'yan
majalissu, lokacin sune masu fada aji a unguwa da garin baki daya. Ta kalle shi
taga yadda yake washe baki yana murnar ganinta, rigar wata shadda ce a jikinsa
wadda taji jiki har tana neman yagewa daga kafada, kansa duk yayi furfura wadda da
tasan bashi da ita, ya rame sosai yayi baki kamar ba farin bafulatani ba, lallai
rayuwa, ta tuna cewa ya gaya mata gidan ma ya siyar ya sayi karami, yanzu ko keken

rokawa 'yar uwata afuwa a gurinka. Allah ya bayyana mana su a duk inda suke" ya
zamo daga kan kujerar yana kallonta, yace "kin yafe min Humairah? Bansan me zance
miki ba. Allah ya yafe miki kema duk laifufufukanki, Allah yayi miki jagora a
rayuwar ki" tace "Ameen, nagode" Maryam ma ta sauko kusa dashi, zatayi magana Aisha
tace "baki yi min komai ba Maryam, in ma kinyi min na yafe miki, ina kuma nema wa
'yar uwata afuwa a gurinki". Kamal ya mike zai shiga daki, Aisha ta lura sai da ya
runtse ido sannan ya tashi kuma taga alamar yana dingishi kadan. Sai da ya shiga
daki tace da Maryam " har yanxu bai warke ba?" Maryam ta girgiza kai tace "wukar ta
same shi a kidney dinshi, shine har yanzu yake yi masa ciwo" Aisha tace a ranta
"Khadija ta barwa Kamal tabo da har abada ba zai manta ba". Bayan ya fito ya dawo
ya zauna yace "yanzu menene plan dinki a rayuwa? Me zaki yi yanzu?" Tace "yanzu zan
koma makaranta ne, daga nan kuma I will let my destiny lead me to wherever God plan
for me" yace "aure fa?" Tace "in yana cikin destiny dina I will welcome it".

Anan Aisha tayi sallar la'asar. Taci abincin da Maryam ta saka ta a gaba lallai sai
taci, sannan tayi musu sallama zata tafi, Kamal yace "nura yazo ina asibiti, he
wanted to kill me akan abinda nayi miki har sai da aka fita dashi daga asibitin"
Aisha tayi murmushi tace "Allah sarki Nura" Kamal yace "I hope one day you guys
will meet again" ta mike tsaye tana kallonsa tace "I hope one day you will find
peace in your life" ya dago yana kallonta idonsa yana shining kamar mai shirin kuka
yace "thank you, I shall never forget about you. I hope you find whatever it is you
are looking for a rayuwa".
Washegari Aisha taje FUD, ta zagaya makarantar sosai sannan ta tafi cafeteria, Mama
harda kukan ganinta, su binta duk suka zo suka rungumeta suna murna. Nan take ta
ajiye hijab dinta suka fara aiki tare suna hira, just like old times. Anan take jin
labarin sa ranar su za'ayi bikinsu rana daya. Tayi musu alkawarin zata zo insha
Allah. Sai yamma sannan tayi musu sallama, Mama ta hado ta da abinci da yawa ta
taho gida. Ranar da zata koma kano Abba yazo ya dauke ta zai raka ta tasha, sai ya
biya da ita ta sabon gidansa. Suka shiga Aisha tana kallon sabuwar rayuwar abbanta,
dan karamin gida ne da daki guda biyu sai toilet da kitchen. Daki daya kayan Abba
ne a ciki amma fa a hargitse yake, daya dakin kuma tarin kayan gwanjon da yale
sayarwa ne, kitchen din kacha kacha da kwanuka marasa wanki, jikinsa har rawa yake
yi ya dauko mata ruwa ya kawo mata, ta karba ta gode tana karewa dakin kallo, tace
"Abba yaushe zakayi aure?" Ya danyi dariya yace "sai na aurar dake tukunna". Taga
hotunan su a kananan frames a jere a bango, da hotonta, dana Umma dana Khadija, har
ta tashi zata fita sai ta dauki hoton umma ta saka a jakarta, har ta kai bakin kofa
kuma sai ta juyo ta dauki hoton Khadija shima ta saka a jaka. A mota ta kunna wayar
ta, ta dauko card din Dr Moon ta saka number dinta ta tura mata text kamar haka. "
Assalam. Na gama abinda zanyi a Dutse, na amince da shawarar zan cigaba da karatu,
kuma zan zauna a gidanki tare dake kamar yadda kika bukata. Aisha Zayyan" ta tura
sakon sannan ta kwantar da kanta a jikin kujera ta lumshe idonta, a ranta tana jin
cewa wannan journey din is like a transition in her life.

Episode 30 : The Starting Point
Sai da Aisha tayi wata uku a Abuja sannan transfer dinta ta gama kammala. A cikin
wata ukun nan ba karamin sabo tayi da Mami da yarantaba, mai gidan ne dai baya baya
saboda wani irin kwarjini ne dashi wanda indai har yana palon to Aisha bata iya
zama, dan ma dai ba sosai yake zama anan din ba yafi zama part dinsa. Abdallah
shine babban abokinta, dan sanda aka bashi labarin ta dawo gidan da zama ba karamim
murna yayi ba, nan take ya dage gurin koya mata yarensa kuma cikin ikon Allah sai
gashi ta fara koya, abinda vata iya ba kuma sai ta rubuta mishi a takarda. Tunda
Aisha take bata taba ganin yaro mai kwakwalwar Abdallah ba gashi dai ba zai wuce
four years ba amma abinda ya iya ko wani dan ten years din sai haka. Iyayensa ma
sun fahimci haka, dan haka suke bada himma sosai gurin karatunsa. Bayan Abdallah
kuma sai Basma, ita kuma kawancensu da Aisha ya fara ne few weeks bayan zuwan Aisha
gidan, tayi wanka ta shirya ta fito palo ta tarar da Basma tana kwance, ta daga kai
ta kalleta tace "Aunty Aisha kinyi kyau sosai, ina ma dai in na girma in zama
kyakykyawa irinki" maganar ta taba zuciyar Aisha sosai dan ita a idonta gani take
babu wanda ya kai Mami da iyalinta kyau, amma sai gashi yarinyar gidan tana yabawa
da tata halittar da take ganin bata da kyau. Tun daga ranar suka dinke, har Atika
ta fara mitar Aisha ta kwace mata Abdallah da Basma. Wanda bata fiya kulawa ba
shine Al'ameen. Wannan is totally his father's son, ba Aisha kadai bama har
ma'aikatan gidan basu fiye shiga harkar saba dan ko kallo basu ishe shi ba
ballantana yayi musu magana. Bashi da wulakanci amma kwarjininsa yafi karfinsa.
Wani lokacin Aisha takan yi mamaki in ta ganshi yana hira da wasa da dariya da
kannensa, amma in ya bata rai duk sai suja baya, maminsa ce kadai mai iya masa
wadda Aisha ta fahimci akwai shakuwa sosai a tsakaninsu, bayan ita kuma sai kakarsu
wadda suke kira da Ummee, wadda Aisha ta fahimci cewa matar sarki ce kuma a palace
din take da zama, dan most weekends yaran a gurinta suke zama sai dai Aisha bata
taba ganinta ba.
Dr Mahdi da Amira sunzo bayan dawowar Aisha abuja, inda Amira tayi ta yiwa Mami
mitar ta kwace mata Aishanta ai gidansu ya kamata ta zauna ba gidanta ba, suka yi
ta wasa da dariya daga baya kuma aka bar maganar, kafin su tafi Dr ya kirawo Aisha
gefe yayi ta tambayarta if she is comfortable and if she need anything, duk ta amsa
masa da cewa bata da problem, amma duk da haka ya jaddadaata cewa duk abinda take
bukata, ko menene da number dinsa nan ta kira shi, kuma ya dauki kudi masu yawa ya
bata yace saboda harkar makaranta, da taki karba amma ganin ransa ya baci sai ta
karba tayi masa godiya.
Kullum Aisha suna yin waya da Aunty tana jin halin duk da ake ciki, kuma kusan duk
wayar da sukayi sai auntyn ta gaya mata cewa ita bata son zamanta a abujan nan,
tace "yanzu ga maganar bikinku da Hafeez, shi yana kano ke kina Abuja yaya za'ayi
zaman auren kenan?" Aisha ta kan yi shiru ko kuma tayi dariya in tayi mata irin
wannan maganar, dan ita ko a kanta bata kawo cewa zata auri Hafeez, kuma shi kansa
Hafeez din bai taba yi mata magana wadda ta shafi wannan ba, auntyn ce dai take
kidanta kuma tayi rawarta ita kadai. Ita kuma Aisha tana jin nauyinta sosai, bata
jin zata iya yi mata maganar cewa bata son auren.
Tunda Aisha tazo bata taba fita ko ina ba sai ranar da aka ce mazo zata fara
registration, ranar kwana tayi tana zulumin yadda rayuwarta zata koma da irin
changes din da zata samu, amma kuma deep inside her she is ready, she wants to do
this and nothing will change her mind. Nothing. Ranar da safe kafin Mamu ta fita
office ta shigo dakin da Aisha take tace mata "are you ready for school? Ni zan
fita office, akwai abokin Sultan yasan kan makarantar sosai, nayi masa magana jiya
na roke shi yazo ya rakaki, ki shirya zai zo an jima ku tafi tare" tayi studying
fuskar Aisha sannan tace "don't worry, he is the nicest guy I have ever known". Tun
karfe takwas Aisha ta shirya ta zauna zaman jira, shiru shiru har karfe goma, ta
fiyo palo ta kwanta da jakar takardunta a gefe tana jira, a haka har bacci ya dauke
ta. Cikin baccin taji ana magana, baba gaji tana cewa "ka ganta nan, har ta fara
bacci bara in taso maka ita" taji muryar namiji yana cewa "rabu da ita kawai, vara
in koma, dama aiki yayi min yawa na zame da kyar na fito" Aisha ta mike da sauri
tace "na tashi, baba gaji kice masa na tashi" ya daga labulen yana kallonta yace
"cigaba da baccinki kawai, I tot you are ready shi yasa na taho, ashe ke baki

have been ready since 8 o'clock, inata jiran ka baka zo ba, Mami ce tace injiraka
dama da bazan jira kaba" ya shigo sosai suna kallon juna. Kato ne sosai mai

san hanyar gurin aski ba, yana kallonta yace "in baki jira ba kinsan hanyar gurin

yayi karamin tsaki yace "to kije ki tambaya din, I bet ko gate ba zaki iya kai
kanki ba. Daga ganin ki babu inda kika sani, babu abinda zaki iya yi da kanki sai

Taji haushi, ina ruwansa? Sannan ya nuna mata hanyar ta cigaba da tafiya tana mita

Tun daga ranar Amir ya mayar da gidan gurin cin abincin darensa, dama matarsa bata
nan ta tafi gida cikinta ya tsufa kuma ba zata dawo ba sai ta haihu a can. A

A hanya suna tafiya yana ta mata tambayoyi akan harkar makaranta tana bashi amsa.
Sai yace "naji kina zancen dutse kuma da kano, wai inane garinku a cikinsu?" Ya
dauke kanta tace "kai fa har yau baka taba gaya min komai akanka ba, babu abinda na
sani dangane da kai sai sunanka, shima kuma bana gaskiya ba dan Amir ba suna bane"

"it is not strange, akwai mutane da yawa masu sunan iyayensu ai, kamar Daddyn su
Abdallah, shima na fahimci sunan mahaifinsa ne dashi. Hakan yana nuna son da
mahaifanku suke yi muku" yayi shiru sannan yace "you are right, amma ni a nawa case
din ba haka bane ba. Ba sunan mahaifina ne dani ba, asalima ban san mahaifina ba"
ta juyo sosai tana kallonsa fuskarta da mamaki amma ta kasa cewa komai, yana kallon
gabansa ya ce "mahaifiyata ta yar dani a kofar orphanage a ranar data haife ni. An
saka min abdullahi sunan sarkin Abuja na lokacin, daga baya kuma sai yayi adopting
dina, dan haka nake amfani da sunansa a matsayin sunan ubana" har yanzu Aisha
kallonsa take yi tana mamaki ta kasa magana, ya juyo ya kalleta yace "bansan
iyayena ba, there is a ninety percent chance cewa am a bastard, there is a fifty
percent chance cewa ubana bai sanda zamana a duniya ba" cikin rawar murya Aisha
tace "am sorry, I don't know. Banyi taba tsammanin haka ba. Baka yi kama da haka
ba. You seem so happy with your life" da sauri yace mata "oh am happy, very happy
even. Menene abin bakin cikin a ciki? Tun kafin a haifeni Allah ya riga ya rubuta a
kundin kaddarata cewa a haka za'a haifeni. Kuma ya riga ya rubuta cewa zanga
iyayena ko kuma ba zan gansu ba. So why should I stress myself for something that I
have no power over? It is my destiny, I can't change anything. My only option is to
accept it and be happy".
Aisha ta juya tana kallon taga tana ganin motoci da bishiyoyin da suke shigewa a
guje. So this is it. This is all what life is about. Destiny. Happiness of someone
doesn't depend on anybody, be it his parents, friends, spouse, or his community.
Happiness of a person totally depends on himself. Kai kadai kake da ikon sakawa
kanka farin ciki ko bakin ciki. By accepting yourself, by accepting who you really
are, by accepting your DESTINY. In Allah ya halicceki baka kuma not as beautiful as
want to be, to ki sani wannan shine destiny dinki, Allah ya halicceki a haka for a
reason, dan shi yake rike da kaddararki kuma yasan physical beauty will not good
for you, ya danganta dake kiyi accepting kanki and be happy ko kuma kiyi rejecting
kanki and be sad through out your life. In Allah ya halicceki a matsayin mara
haihuwa, to hakan yana nufin haihuwar ba alkhairi bace a tare dake, kuma no matter
how hard you try in dai har destiny dinki ne haka to ba zaki haihun ba, the best
option is to accept it and be happy. Haka in Allah ya rubuta cewa ba zakayi arziki
na kudi ba, to kuwa ba zakayi dinba, you will just keep frustrating yourself,
hating yourself amma babu abinda zai chanza tunda Allah yasan kudin ba alkhairi
bane ba a gareka da sauran jama'a. Kowa da yadda Allah ya tsara masa rayuwarsa,
kowa da destiny dinsa, you either accept it and be happy or you reject it and be
miserable. The choice is yours. If you accept your destiny then Sky is your stating
point.

Episode 31: The Choices

"kince duk sanda nake neman shawara inzo gurinki, ina neman shawara yau" Mami tace
"ba yanzu zan baki shawara ba, ki fara tunani first akan maganar tukunna sannan sai
mu zauna muyi magana tare" Aisha tace "ba akan Dr Mahdi ne kadai ba" Mami ta dawo
ta zauna tace "bayan shi akwai wanda yake neman aurenki?" Aisha ta gyada kai sannan
ta bata labarin Hafeez, Mami tace "ikon Allah" sai kuma ta bata labarin Amir da
yadda sukayi dashi shekaran jiya. Mami sakin baki da hanci tayi tana kallon Aisha.
Aisha tace "Kai na ya chushe mami, ki bani shawara" .
Ikon Allah. Ashe ba kyau ne kadai yake attracting maza ba? Ashe kyawun hali ma yana
attracting maza na gari. Ko kin kasance kina da kyau to ki kasance mai kyan hali,
wannan shi zai kawo miki mazan kwarai masu sonki bamasu son halittar ki ba. To fans
din Aisha, a bata shawara.

Episode 35 : Destined for Greatness

Nura bai bata lokaci gurin hada lefe ba wanda kusan rabin kayan tare da Aisha suka

a wadace babu abinda babu, kuma komai ya dace da gidan kamar danshi akayi shi.

"an gaya miki zama zakiyi tayi babu aure? Ina kai Aisha gidanta zan dawo kanki
kema". Bayan sun koma gida ne Mami ta dauko kudi dubu dari biyar ta ajiye a gaban
Aunty, aunty ta bita da kallo tace " kudin menene kuma wannan?" Mami tace "inji
yayanta, Dr Mahdi, yace ga gudunmawarsa nan ayi mata kayan daki" Aunty tayi sauri
ta ture kudin kamarwanda zasu kona ta tace "gaskiya ba zamu karba ba, abin ai yayi
yawa, kun riga kunyi mata kayan daki ku gaya masa cewa kun tiga kunyi mata ya rike
kudinsa mun gode madallah" Mami tayi dariya tace "wallahi bazai karba ba. Tunda har
ya bayar ya riga ya bayar kenan, ni bama zan iya mayar masa ba yanxu sai muyi
rigima da matarsa, dama tace ai Aisha tasu ce mu muka kwace musu" Aunty tace "to in
ma mun karba me zamuyi da wannan kudin haka? An riga anyi komai, an siya mata
komai" Mami tace "sai kawai a bata kudinta, tayi duk abinda take so dashi" Aisha ta
zaro ido tana girgiza kai, mami sai dariya take tayi ganin yadda duk suka tsorata
da kudin, Aisha tace "akwai kudi a gurina, har bansan me zanyi basu bama" Mami tace
"kin taba ganin inda aka rasa me za'ayi da kudi? To bara in baki shawarar abinda
zakiyi dasu. Kinga, akwai ummee, mahaifiyar maigidana business woman ce, tana shigo
ta kaya daga kasashen duniya ko'ina tana kaiwa, zan hada ki da ita sai take shigo
miki da kaya, kayan mata irin su laces, atampopi, materials, mayafai, takalma,
jakankuna , sarkoki, dogayen riguna duk sai ta saro miki a kudi mai sauki, ni kuma
zan hada ki da mutane kawayena da sauran matan abuja yadda za ake zuwa har gida ana
siyan kayanki, ko kuma ta waya ma in kika tallata a social media zakiyi mamakin
irin cinikin da zakiyi musamman in kika saka kudi mai sauki mutane zasu fi siya
kuma Allah zai saka miki albarka a ciki" sosai aunty tayi na'am da wannan shawarar,
tace "nima zan hadaki da mutane a kano, duk wanda yake so sai ki aika masa dashi
can" ita dai Aisha jinsu kawai take yi tana mamakin ikon Allah, Allah an musawwiru
mai chanza ko wanne lamari zuwa yadda yake so. Kamar mami tasan tunanin da Aisha
takeyi tace "Aisha tana da baiwa, she is destined for greatness dan haka duk yadda
za'a juya wannan greatness din yana tare da ita. Babu wani sharrin mai sharri da
zai juya destiny dinta, wanda duk ya nufe ta da sharri ma sai dai ya koma kansa".
Haka ne, haka rayuwa take, in mutum mai kashin arziki ne to dole sai arzikin nan ya
same shi. Kun tuna Aishan nan wadda sanda tana jaririya har mutane zuwa suke
kallonta saboda muninta? Na tabbata a lokacin mutane da yawa suna ganin ba zata
taba archiving komai a rayuwarta ba.

Nura ne ya siyo musu kayan fitar biki shida Aisha, komai iri daya zasuke sakawa,
duk da dai ba wani grand biki za'ayi ba sabida garuruwan sun rarrabu. Dinner ce
kawai zasuyi tare ranar da za'a kawo amarya anan abuja. Aisha da kanta tayiwa kanta
dinkunan biki, Mami tana gani ta rike baki tace "dama haka kika iya dinki ban sani
ba? Shine kika barni ina kashe kudina a gurin tailors" Aisha tace "kin manta na
gaya miki na shiga makarantar koyon dinki da saka a kano?" Mami tace "to ya kamata
kike yi kuwa, dan wannan iya dinkin naki a abujan nan yanzu zaki zama mai kudi,
bara ki gani bayan biki in nemo miki customers". Aisha sosai take learning abubuwa
daga gurin Mami, irin yadda take shigarta, yadda take maganarta cike da ilimi,
yadda take kula da mijinta da yadda take tafiyar da rayuwar aurenta in general.
Shigar mami tana burgeta, very modest yet very fashionable, babu tsiraici amma kuma
kowa ya gani sai ya yaba. Ta lura da yadda bata rabuwa da sarka da dan kunne
awarwaro da zobe koda kuwa a gida take a zaune, kayanta kullum matching colours
take sakawa, bata chaba kwalliya a fuska in zata fita amma kuma sai kaga kamar tafi
kowa kyau a haka. Yadda take kula da tsaftar jikinta data 'ya'yanta data gidanta
gabaki daya. Gashi dai tana da 'yan aiki amma bata taba bar musu hidimar gidan a
hannunsu sai ta shiga anyi da ita saboda kar ayi mata ba dai dai ba, kuma bata taba
wulakanta mutum, ba dan aiki ba koma wanene zata yi masa murmushi kuma zata saka
rayanta su gaishe shi. A hankali Aisha take gwadawa, har tsayawa take a mirror tayi
ta murmushi ita kadai wai sai tayi irin na mami, wani lokacin har jotting take yi
na wasu abubuwan dan kar ta manta. So take in anyi aurenta itama ta zama irin mami.

Yadda aka tsara shine; washegarin da Aisha ta gama exams zata tafi kano inda za ayi
mata shirin biki sannan su tafi dutse. Kamu kawai za'ayi a dutse ranar Thursday,
Friday zasu dawo kano ayi yini a gidan Aunty, Abba ne yace ayi haka saboda yana son
ya faranta ran Aunty, ai kuwa taji dadin hakan sosai, Saturday za'a daura aure a
dutse kuma Saturday din za'a tafi da amarya Abuja inda za'ayi dinner da daddare,
daga gurin dinner din kuma sai a wuce da amarya gidan ta.

Komai ya tafi yadda ya kamata. Aisha tazo kano gurin auntynta ta kwana biyu sannan

cika, tayi musu korafin rashin tahowa da basuyi da yara ba, Mami tace "rufa mana

ran zuwan su har dutse ba saboda tasan yadda mami suke manne ita da mijinta basa
rabuwa.

Gidan bikin ya cika sosai, musamman saboda wannan shine kadai event din da za'ayi a

zuciyarta tana kara godiya da tasbihi ga Allah almusawwiru daya juya rayuwarta gaba
daya. Gwoggo sai faman kaiwa da komowa take yi tana jagorantar mutane suzo suga
amarya Aisha, in zata yiwa Aisha magana kuwa har sunkuyowa take yi kusa da ita

Khadija ce favorite dinta yanzu kuma ina khadijan take?

Duk abinda yake faruwa sai Aisha take ganin kamar wani second bikinta ake sakewa,

gurin event din, amarya da tawagarta sune na karshen tafiya. Kamar yadda tayi a
wancan bikin wannan ma da kanta tayi wa kanta kwalliya kuma ta wannan karon sosai
tafi ta wancan kyau saboda changin da ita Aishan ta samu, in ka ganta sai ga dauka

Hatta mami data kalle ta sai da tayi tasbihi ga ubangiji daga halicci Aisha, dan

Gurin taron ya cika fal da mutane, da wadanda aka gayyata da wadanda suka zo gulma,

Bayan sun koma gida taga missed calls din Nura har biyar, sai da tayi wanka tayi

Washegari da sassafe suka dungumo suka taho kano tare da sauran 'yan uwa, anan aka
yini ana shagali a gidan aunty, ranar Aisha taga gatan da bata taba tsammanin tana
dashi ba, 'yan uwa na nesa dana kusa kowa yazo kuma kowa in ya tashi zuwa sai ya

tayata godiya dan ita babu bakin magana ma. Da yamma DJ ya bude filinsa, aka sha
chasu aka kwaso shoki iya shoki, dole aka saka Aisha a tsakiyar fage aka sa mata
wakar indo indosa aka sakata tayi rawa, ita dai kunya da kyar ta dan taka kadan ai

za'ayi kamar yadda aka fasa wancan, wannan karon kam vata jin zuciyarta zata iya
dauka, wannan karon kam tasan zuciyarta bugawa zatayi ta mutu.

Yadda Aisha taga rana haka ta ga dare, kafin assuba har zazzabi ya fara rufeta, a
cikin daren kuma ta kira number din Kamal yafi ba adadi amma bai dauka ba. Tayi
sallar asuba ta zauna akan sallaya kuma sai ta rasa wacce addu'ah zatayi, idan har
fasa auren nan has already been written in her destiny to ta tabbatar sai an fasa
din, dan haka addu'ar da tayi kawai shine Allah ya bata juriya da karfin daukan
kaddarar duk da zata fado mata. Tana gama addu'ah taji karar wayar ta, ta dauka
taga bakuwar number tayi tsaki ta ajiye ta kwanta akan sallayar, tana ji mutane
suka fara tashi ana ta shirye shirye amma tayi shiru dan a ranta tana jin cewa
wannan auren ba daura shi za'ayi ba. Zahra ce ta shigo ta dauki wayar tata da take
ta kara ta amsa tace "bacci take yi bata tashi ba. To shikenan za'a gaya mata"

sai kace wanda za'a gudar masa dake?" Aisha ta bita da kallo kawai har ta fita tana
tunanin da gaske nuran ne yake kiranta? Ta tashi zaune ta dauki wayar tana kallon
sabuwar number din, sai kuma wani tunani ya fado mata a rai, kar dai yayi
misplacing wayar sa ne shi yasa bai kira ta ba tun jiya? Amma duk da haka bata gama
yarda ba har sai da ta kira shi. Bugu daya ya dauka "Naana?" Maimakon ta amsa masa
sai ta saka masa kuka nan take kuwa hankalinsa ya tashi ya fara rarrashi "Aisha
kiyi hakuri, wallahi ina sauri na bar wayata a yola, kuma naso mu tsaya a kano in
ganki amma tare da manyan mu muke kuma basu bani chance din zuwa in ganki ba, nima
raina ba dadin sa nake jiba, yanxu ma da assuban nan na nemo number dinki saboda
bana son har a daura auren nan bamu yi magana ba" ta share hawayenta tace "ba ka
fasa aure na ba?" Da sauri yace "what?" Tace "Kamal kafin yace ya fasa aurena daina
kirana yayi a waya, kaima ba aurena ka fasa ba" yace "how can you even think that
Aisha? Ni ba Kamal bane ba kuma ba zan taba zama Kamal ba. Ban fasa auren kiba kuma
ba zan taba fasa auren ki ba. Nura ba zai iya rayuwa in babu Aisha ba. It pains me
da har zaki iya tunanin xan fasa auren ki. Dan wani yayi miki abu ba yana nufin
kowa ma zai iya yi miki ba. Mutane Allah ya halicce mu mabanbanta kamanni kuma
mabanbanta halayya. You have to start trusting people, you have to start trusting
me" sai ya kashe wayar, daga dukkan alamu yayi fushi ne dan haka ta kira shi yaki
dauka sai ta rubuta masa sakon ban hakuri da kalamai masu dadi ta tura masa.

Karfe goma na safe aka daura auren Aisha da Nura. Taron ya samu halarta mutane da
dama daga bangarorin biyu, an daura a bisa sadaki dubu hamsin wanda waliyyin ango
ya damka a hannun waliyyin amarya wato yarima Abbakar Sadiq Abdallah, wanda shima
kansa baisan shike da waliccin ba sai da yazo sannan Abba yace shi ya bawa waliccin
Aisha, shine kuma wanda zai kasance a matsayin ubanta a garin abuja. Tunda aka yo
waya aka sanar da tabbatuwar daurin auren shikenan 'yan uwa suka saka Aisha a gaba
da tsokana, ita kam ta dunkule a guri daya ta rasa mai take ji a ranta, tasan dadi
ne amma ta rasa wanne irin dadi ne, yau Allah ya cika mata burinta ta zama matar
aure itama, matar nura, mutumin da take ganin ba zai taba cutar da ita ba. Mama ce
ta shigo duk ta kora 'yammatan da suka zagaye Aisha ta tashe ta zaune ta rungumo ta
jikinta ta fara jera mata nasiha akan zaman aure, zama da 'yan uwan da iyayen miji
da kuma makotan da Allah zai hada ta zama dasu. Nasihar ta ratsa Aisha sosai, ta
fahimci cewa secret din komai shine hakuri da danne zuciya a lokacin bacin rai,
tausasa kalamai yayin magana da mutane musamman wadanda suke sama da kai sannan da
jan girma da nuna kulawa ga wadanda suke kasa da kai. Hadisin annabi ne yake cewa
ita zuciya an halicceta ne a bisa son wanda yake kyautata mata da kuma kin wanda
yake munana mata, wannan ya nuna babu shakka in dai ka zamo mai kyautatawa mutane
to tabbas zasu kaunace ka. Aisha ta dago kai tana kallon Mama tace "Mama ya maganar
da mukayi lokacin bikin su Binta, maganar auren da kika ce zaki yi?" Mama tace
"Aisha aure ba sai miji ya zo ba tukunna? Nima tunda kika yi min maganar nake son
auren a raina kuma in dai Allah ya kawo min miji na gari to insha Allah zanyi aure"
Aisha tace "Mama to in na samo miki mijin zaki aure shi?" Mama tayi dariya tace "in
kuma shi bashi da ra'ayi fa?" Suna cikin maganar Aunty ta shigo itama suka cigaba
da yiwa Aisha nasiha sannan suka saka tayi wanka ta shirya tsaf, suka lullubeta da
katon mayafi, wannan karon ba kwalliya tayi ba sosai sai kamshin turaren da yake ta
tashi daga jikinta.

12 'yan daukar amarya suka zo, direct Abuja za'a wuce da Aisha tunda baban Nura
yace yana ganin amfanin ace sai an kaita har yola, yace a barta kawai daga baya sai
Nura ya kaita ta gaida 'yan uwa. Sai la'asar sannan suka isa Abuja, direct gidan
Aisha aka kaita anan aka zauna aka huta aka yi sallah aka ci abinci dangin Aisha da
dangin Nura, ana ta hira ana dariya abin sha'awa. Da dare kuma aka tafi akayi
dinner wanda abokan Nura ne suka shirya masa ita kuma sosai ta kayatar da mutane,
anan 'yan uwan Aisha suka ga Nura kuma sun yaba da yadda suka ganshi din. Daga
dinner mami ta rage wadansu bakin ta tafi dasu gidanta sauran kuma suka koma gidan
Aisha suka kwana a can. Dan haka ranar ma Nura sai gidan aboki ya je ya kwana.

Masoyana da masoyan rubutuna ina gaisheku a duk inda kuke, na kuma gode da bibiyar
lafiya ta da kuke yi, na dan samu matsalar charge ne shi yasa kuka jini shiru.
Yanxu ma naso in yi muku wanda yafi haka amma babu dama dan haka kuyi manage da
wannan din. Nagode Allah ya bar kauna.

Episode 38 : Still My Sister
A cikin sati daya Aisha ta sake sosai a gidan Nura. A cikin satin nan sai da Nura a
tabbatar ya cire fiye da rabin kunyar Aisha kamar yadda yayi alkawari, dan Aisha
ita kanta har mamakin kanta take yi wai ita ce har zata iya shiga toilet suyi wanka
tare da Nura. Babu abinda suke yi a cikin satin sai dai suyi sallah, suci abinci,
suyi wanka sai kuma su baje kolin soyayyar su. Sai a lokacin Aisha ta kuma fahimtar
hikimar Aunty na kin barin Zahra a gidan dan da tana nan kam da abubuwa basu gudana
kamar yadda suke gudana a yanzu ba. Bayan sun cinye satin farko suka shirya suka
shiga duk makotan su suka gaisa, suka kuma gabatar da kansu a matsayin sababbin
'yan unguwa, a take Aisha tayi kawaye sosai har sukayi exchanging numbers da
alkawarin kawo mata ziyara suma. Bayan nan kuma Nura ya dauke ta ya kaita gudajen
su Mami sukayi musu bangajiyar biki tare da karin godiya akan hidimomin da sukayi
mata, Mami tace babu godiya tsakanin su ai an riga an zama daya.
Satin Aisha biyu a gidan Nura suka tafi Yola. Wannan shine zuwan Aisha yola na
farko kuma sosai taji dadin zuwan dan ta samu karba mai kyau daga 'yan uwan Nura,
sai yanzu ta fahimci wani abu a tare da Nura, yana da zumunci sosai da sosai,
wannan yasa 'yan uwansa suke sonsa sosai kuma wannan son da suke masa shine ya
shafeta, duk inda suka shiga kokari ake aga an faranta mata rai. Innar Nura kam
kunyarta take ji kasancewar Nura dan fari, dan haka inta zauna dakinta sai dai suyi
zaman kurame, ita kunya Aisha kunya. Sanda zasu dawo Abuja kam sosai aka hada musu
kayan tsaraba, baga 'yanuwa ba baga makota ba kowa so yake yaga ya farantawa Nura
da matarsa, albarka kuwa ta ko'ina saka musu ita ake yi. Da zasu tafi Aisha tace da
Zainaba da Sa'adiyya kannen Nura su shirya su tafi tare tunda sunyi hutu, ai kuwa
nan take suka kama murna suna tsalle, Nura kuwa sai hararar Aisha yakeyi ita kuma
tayi kamar bata san yana yi ba. Sai da suka kebe yayi mata complaint tace "to ai ba
zama zasuyi acan ba, just for few days ne fa, kuma tunda muna da nisa in basa zuwa
ta yaya zamu saba dasu?" Ya nuna mata shi dai kamartakura masa tayi amma kuma a
idonsa taga alamar yaji dadi, yaji dadin cewa tana son 'yan uwansa har tana son ta
saba dasu.
Basu dade da komawa Abuja ba su Aisha suka koma hutun sabon session, yanzu ta shiga
year three, a lokacin ne kuma Nura ya sayi sabuwar mota. Kullum tare suke fita
makaranta kuma su dawo tare, ko daga nesa ka hango Aisha da Nura kallo daya zakayi
musu ka fahimci irin tsabagen kaunar junansu da suke yi. Aisha ma ta fara business
dinta kamar yadda Mami ta shawarta mata kuma saboda yadda ta saukaka kudin sai ya
zamanto nan da nan ta samu karbuwa a gurin mutane, kowa yaga kayanta yasan masu
kyau ne sannan kuma ga kudin mai sauki sosai, ba cikin Abuja ba har states din da
suke makotaka da su Aisha tana aikawa da kayanta, ballantana kano inda Aunty tayi
ta shige da ficen da sai da taga ta kafa Aisha sosai a gurin mutane da yawa.
Business din Aisha baya shiga karatunta sam, dan indai tana makaranta to bata
daukar wayar data danganci business sai dai inta dawo gida ko kuma da weekend. Masu
zuwa siyan kaya kuma har gida ko bata nan suna samun su Zainaba wadanda Aisha ta
sakar wa komai na gidan su suke gudanarwa in bata nan kuma ta same su masu rikon
amana sosai a bisa harkar gidan da kuma harkar sana'arta. Hutunsu yana gaf da
karewa kenan akayi wa su Zahra hutu, nan take Aisha tayi ta naci tana tunawa Aunty
alkawarin da tayi mata na kawo Zahra in sun sami hutu, da 'kyar, har sai da Nura ya
kira aunty da kansa ya taya Aisha roko sannan ta yarda cewa Hafeez zai kawo ta,
Aisha kamar da zuba ruwa a kasa dan murna. Nura yana yi mata dariyar tsallen da
take yi akan gado kamar yarinya yace "ke dai burinki shine kiga kin cika min gida
fal da mutane" ta zauna tana haki tace "to ai su suna kasa, kai kana sama, babu
ruwanka dasu in ba shigowa zakayi ba ko kuma in zaka fita". Da weekend Hafeez ya
kawo Zahra, da gudu Aisha ta fito suka rungume juna suna murna. Hafeez kam ko
fitowa bai yi daga cikin mota ba sai da Nura yazo ya fito dashi, nan fa sukayi ta
rigimar cewa shi ba zai shiga gidan ba dan a yau yake so ya koma kano, Nura yace
sam ba zata yiwu ba ko ruwa dai ai ya shiga yasha, yace "sai kace ba ka san girkin
Aisha ba? Ai in nine ba sai anyi min tayi ba ma da kaina zan ce ina abinci?" a haka
dai ya jashi suka shiga. Shi Hafeez gani yake yi a matsayinsa na wa bai kamata yaje
gidan kanwarsa ba, ballantana kuma tunda akwai wani abu tsakanin su a da, yana
gudun kar zuwan nasa ya bata wa Nura rai, amma sai yaga sam babu ko digon bacin rai
a fuskar Nura, sai ma wani kwarjini da annashuwa da yaga fuskar tana fitarwa,
lallai aure shine jigon nutsuwa da kwanciyar hankali a gurin both miji da mata. A
palon kasa suka zauna hira, yayinda Zahra ta kai kayanta dakin kasa inda su
Sa'adiyya suke, sai gasu sun fito tare da yake suma suna da faran faran da mutane,
nan aka zauna hira, Zainaba ce tayi saving dinsu abinci da drinks. Anan Aisha ta
lura da wani sparks da yake tashi tsakanin Hafeez da Sa'adiyya, da alama kuma ba
ita kadai ce ta lura da hakan ba dan Zahra har ta fara tsokanarta ita kuma tana
rufe fuskar kunya, sai ga Hafeez din da ake lallabawa ya shigo yana ki sai gashi ya
bararraje yana ta zuba zance, daga baya ma Nura yana yi masa tayin kwana sai ya
amince, dan haka ya zage ya cigaba da hirarsa har bayan sallah isha sannan Nura ya
kaishi masauki. Tun daga lokacin Hafeez da Sa'adiyya suka dinke, dan kafin su koma
Yola sai da Hafeez ya sake komawa Abuja ya cigaba da kafa gamnatinsa bayan wacce
yake kafawa kullum a waya. Aisha taji dadin hakan sosai har ranta.
Lokacin da su Aisha suka sake samun hutun semester, lokacin dutse kamal ya kaita ta
kwana biyu. A lokacin ne kuma Aisha ta bayyanarwa da Abba kudurinta na son taga
sunyi aure shida Mama, da farko ya nuna rashin amincewarsa saboda yana ganin kamar
cin amana ne ga marigayiya Rabi'a amma Aisha tayi ta kalallame shi tana nuna masa
cewa ita kanta umman in tana ganin su zata ji dadin hakan, ance the devil you know
is better than the angel you don't know, ballantana kuma Mama is an angel, a karshe
dai Abba ya amince amma da sharadin sai dai ita Aishan taje ta nemar masa auren da
kanta. Cikin murnar amincewar Abba Aisha ta samu Mama itama ta gabatar mata da
bukatar ta, ai kuwa rigima sosai suka yi da Aisha har saida Aishan ta nemo 'yan
sulhu, 'yan sulhun sune Aunty Bilki da kuma kanin wancan marigayi mijin Mama, an
jima ana bugawa kafin a samu maslaha kan cewa abar wa Allah zabinsa, idan da rabon
aure a tsakaninsu zasu dai daita kansu da kansu. A haka aka bar maganar Aisha ta
dawo Abuja.
Tun daga dawowarta abuja ta fahimci shigar ciki jikinta, direct ta sanar da Nura
abin da take suspecting ai kuwa ya kasa rufe bakinsa, murna sosai yake yi dan za'a
iya cewa duk son yaran Aisha nura ya fita, nan da nan ya fita ya siyo musu
pregnancy test strip. A tare suka shiga toilet din suka saka strip din a cikin
fitsarin Aisha sannan suka dawo daki suka zauna suka saka shi a gaba suka zuba
tagumi duk su biyun suna jiran suga result, ai kuwa ko five minutes din bai cika ba
sai ga second line yayi appearing. Aisha kusan numfashin tane yaso daukewa saboda
murna, ta kankame Nura tana murna "Husby, we are going to be parents, am going to
be a mother" shima kara matse ta yayi a jikinsa yana jin a take son abinda yake
cikinta yana ratsa zuciyarsa yace "yes wifey, and you are going to be an amazing
mother". Nura da kansa yaje yola ya sake dauko Sa'adiyya ta dawo gidansu saboda
take taya Aisha aikin gida, gani yake ko plate ta dauke kamar babyn yana wahala
shima. Babu wanda Nura kuwa bai bawa labarin cewa Aisha tana da ciki ba, tun daga
kan familyn sa har na Aishan har abokan aikinsa kowa yasan Aisha tana da ciki,
wadansu har kiranta suke a waya suna yi mata murna ita kam kunya ce take isarta in
ana maganar cikinta, cikin da ko wata biyu bai yi ba amma har an gama yamididi
dashi a duniya.
Ranar nan bata je school ba tana zaune a backyard dinsu tana karatu sai taji kamar
danshi a kasanta, danshi kuma ba irin normal wanda ta saba ji ba, ta duba ta
tabbatar babu kowa a kusa da ita sai ta daga zaninta ta leka, ai kuwa jini ta gani
a jikinta, ta mike da sauri amma sai taji kamar an bude famfo, kafin ta karasa
balcony har yana bin kafarta, daga kofa ta tsaya tana kwallawa Sa'adiyya kira,
sa'adiyya tana fitiwa ta yar da wayar hannunta tana salati saboda jinin har ya fara
kwanciya a kasa, bata jiran karin bayani daga Aisha dan haka ta dauki wayarta cikin
rawar jiki ta fara kiran Nura cikin tashin hankali ta gaya masa halin da Aisha take
ciki. Ranar ikon Allah ne kawai ya kawo Nura gidan, tun kafin ya karaso Aisha ta
tabbatar babu ciki a jikinta dan tun jini mai ruwa yana fita har manyan guda guda
suka fara fitowa. Yana shigowa suka hada ido da Aisha ta girgiza masa kai tace
"babu baby".
A asibiti aka tabbatar da fitar cikin Aisha, akayi mata wankin ciki sannan aka
kwantar da ita kwana biyu dan ta samu ta huta. 'Yan dubiya ta ko'ina bullowa suke
baga kano ba baga yola ba ballantana 'yan abuja da suka yi ta sunturi, musamman
saboda zuzuta cikin da Nura yayi tayi. Bayan an sallame su haka suka zauna jinyar
Aisha da kuma jinyar zuciyoyin su, suna rarrashin kansu da kara tabbatar wa kansu
cewa wani babyn yana nan zuwa. Ai kuwa, wata biyu bayan nan sai ga Aisha da wani
cikin, wannan karon bata gaya wa Nura ba sai da ta tabbatar tukunna sannan ta gaya
masa. Murnar da sukayi wannan karon tamkar tafi ta wancan ma,a take Nura yayi
updating status dinsa da cewa "the baby is back, Alhamdulillah". Wannan cikin da
alama yafi wancan laulayi dan Aisha tana samunsa ta rasa lafiyarta, bata iya cin
abinci ga amai da tashin zuciya, amma duk da haka ji tayi tana enjoying experience
din dan tasan mai wucewa ne kuma it will end with a baby on her lap. Amma me? Ranar
nan sun gama lecture kenan tana mikewa taji abu yana bin cinyoyinta da sauri ta
koma ta zauna, duk da bata duba ba amma tasan ko menene dan haka ta kifa kanta ta
fara rera kuka. Zainab ce ta lura da halin da take ciki nan take ta kira Nura a
waya. Yana zuwa bai damu da jinin da yake bin Aisha ba bai damu da mutanen da suke
gurin ba ya saka hannayensa ya daga ta chak ya fita da ita ya sakata a mota sai
asibiti. Wannan karon ma cikin bai tsira ba. Zubewar wannan cikin tafi ta wancan
daga musu hankali dan zama sukayi duk su biyun suna kuka an rasa me rarrashin wani,
sai da wani abokin Nura yazo yace " Haba Nura, me kenan haka? Zaka zauna ka saka ta
a gaba kana kuka kaima memakon ka rarrasheta? Da wanne zata ji? Da ciwon jikinta ko
da ciwon zuciyarta ko kuma da kukan daka saka ta a gaba kana yi kamar yaro?" Nura
tashi yayi ya fice daga dakin saboda bai san da wanne kalaman zai yi amfani gurin
lallashin Aisha ba.
A cikin shekarar farko ta auren Aisha da Nura, sai da Aisha tayi bari sau uku.
Wannan ba karamin daga musu hankali yayi ba, basu bama duk masoyan su sai da
hankulansu suka tashi. Duk kunyar innar Nura sai gata a abuja tazo takanas dan
kawowa Aisha magunguna. Farko data zo cewa tayi sai dai Nura ya nemi wani gidan su
tashi daga wannan gidan, saboda maybe aljanun gidan ne suke saka Aisha bari. Da
kyar Nura ya zaunar da ita yayi mata bayanin cewa babu mutum ko aljan daya isa ya
sa mutum ya haihu ko ya hana mutum ya haihu sai da iznin ubangiji, koma wanene sai
dai ya zamanto sila amma in ubangiji bai so hakan ba to babu yadda za'ayi hakan ta
faru. Dan haka barin da Aisha take yi rubutaccen al'amari ne kuma in lokacin da
zata haihu yayi to tabbas zata haihu din. Addu'ar ce kawai magani. Dole Inna ta
hakura da zancen tashi amma kuma ta hadowa Aisha magunguna tun daga kan na aljanu,
na sammu, na kambun baka har zuwa kan na mayu duk tace mata ta ringa sha.
Tun daga third barin Aisha kuma sai samun cikin ya tsaya, babu cikin ma ballantana
a saka ran haihuwa. Tun Aisha bata damuwa tunda tana ganin inta samu ma zubewa yake
har ta fara damuwa, at least sanda take samu tasan cewa she is capable of samun
cikin, yanzu fa? Rannan Nura ya shiga daki ya tarar da ita zaune gaban madubi ta
rike powder a hannunta kamar me shafawa amma sam hankalinta baya tare da ita, ya
saka hannu ya karbi powder sannan ta yi sauri ta kalle shi, da alama bata san ma ya
shigo dakin ba. Yace "na gaya miki, babu abinda na tsana irin in ganki cikin
damuwa, ke kuma babu abinda kike so illar ki saka kanki a cikin damuwa, menene
kuma? Me kike so? Ko menene kinsan in ina dashi zan baki" ta kamo hannu sa ta rike
a nata tana tausaya musu ita da shi tace "komai kayi min Husby, babu abinda ka rage
ni dashi. Kawai ina tunanin maybe bana daga cikin matan da suke da rabon haihuwa a
duniya ne, maybe kaddarata ce zama ba tare da haihuwa ba" ya bata rai ya kwace
hannunsa yace "wacce irin magana ce wannan Aisha? Shekara daya fa kawai da wata
biyu, amma har zaki wani fara lissafin rashin haihuwa? We know we are both fertile
tunda mun samu har sau uku, da ace bama samu ne shine zakiyi tunanin ko wani daga
cikin mu baya haihuwa. We are both young, we have a life time chances, dan haka
zamu cigaba da gwadawa muna cigaba da addu'ar kuma na tabbatar Allah ba zai juya
mana baya ba".
Kwanaki kadan bayan nan Abba ya kira Aisha da labari mai dadi, finally shida Mama
sun daidaita kansu zasuyi aure kamar yadda Aisha ta shawarta musu. Aisha kam ba
wanda ya kaita murna da wannan lamarin, jin irin murnar da takeyi ne yasa Abba yayi
mata warning, babu taro, babu wanda za'a gayyata, aure kawai za'a daura ta tare
shikenan. Aisha ta langwabe kai "haba Abba, ku barmu mana ko walima muyi" Abba yace
"sai dai kuyi kayar ku ku kadai amma daga ni har ita ba zamu je ba, yo wacce walima
kuma zamuyi da kai duk furfura?". Haka ita ma Mama taki yarda da duk wani taro, dan
haka aure kawai aka daura da yamma da daddare kuma kawayenta biyu suka raka ta
gidan Abba, su Aisha ne 'yan taryan amarya, bakin Aisha har kunne, har tana
tsokanar Mama wai tana kamshin amare. Ranar da zata taho daga dutse take tambayar
Abba "Abba are you happy?" Ya dan yi mata murmushi yace "na gode Allah Aisha, amma
how can I be happy bayan har yau bani da ko labarin Khadija? Ban sani ba ma ko tana
raye ko akasin haka, shekaru sai tafiya suke yi, shirun yayi yawa. Ki ringa yi mata
addu'ah kinji?"
Shekara tazo ta sake wucewa, har yanzu Aisha babu ciki. Arziki kam sai godiyar
ubangiji dan kudin da Aisha take samu ba kadan bane ba, business take yi a gida
amma kudin da take samu har yafi na wanda ya bude shago yake kasuwanci. Babu garin
da Aisha bata aikawa da kaya, hatta masu kananan shaguna suna saran kaya a gurin
Aisha saboda saukin kudin kayan nata. Aisha ta murje sosai ta zama cikakkiyar mace,
yanzu har mamakin yadda ake respecting dinta in ta shiga family take yi, lallai
kudi masu gidan rana, duk inda taje an ringa yin nan nan da ita kenan, duk shawara
ta family sai an hada da ita a ciki, duk kuwa maganar data fada sai taga an dauka
anyi amfani da ita. A bangaren Nura shima kudin yake yi sosai, in nace sosai ina
nufin sosai, dan yanzu har ya sai wata motar ya barwa Aisha tasa sannan ya sai
katon fili a abuja ya kuma fara tara kudin gini, baya son ya fara ya tsaya, so yake
in ya fara sai ya gama gabadaya. Matsalarsu daya shine rashin haihuwar da basu samu
ba, shima kuma basu fitar da rai ba dan duk asibitin da sukaje check up za'a
tabbatar musu da lafiyarsu kalau.
Wannan lokacin shi yayi dai dai da lokacin bikin Hafeez da Sa'adiyya, aure dai ya
tabbata, kuma sai ya zamana an hada dana Zahra wadda ta samu miji a cikin dangin
abban su. Aisha kusan za'a iya cewa itace uwar biki, tana dangin amarya kuma tana
dangin ango dan haka komai ta hannunta yake shiga kuma ta hannunta yake fita. Itama
ta fitar da kudi sosai tayi wa both Zahra and Sa'adiyya hidima har sai da Aunty
tayi mata fadan zata rushe jarinta a wannan bikin. Ita kam Aisha ko a jikinta, tana
ganin babu abinda zata yiwa Zahra ta fadi dan tana jinta a ranta kamar Khadija.
Khadija. Cikin 'yan kwanakin nan Aisha kawai take ta yawan tunanin Khadija hatta
nura ya lura da yadda take yawan mentioning sunan Khadija. Tana missing dinta, bata
taba tsammanin zata yi missing Khadija ba gashi tana yi yanzu. Lokuta da dama sai
Aisha ta samu kanta da tunanin a ina Khadija take? Wanne hali take ciki? Me ya faru
da yarinyarta? Yarinyar da har yanxu Aisha bata taba saka ta a idonta ba. Ta lumshe
idonta tana kwance akan gadon Aunty tana lissafin rabon da taga Khadija yau kusan
shekara shida kenan, ta ringa tuno yaruwarsu tare, babu wani dadi a cikin rayuwar
amma dai suna tare, su su kadai uwarsu da ubansu suka haifa a duniya, dan haka ko
Zahran da take cewa tana kallonta kamar Khadija sai dai ta tsaya a kamar Khadija
din amma ba zata taba zama Khadija ba. Khadija is arrogant, evil, selfish, self
centered but she is still her only sister. Ta bude idonta tana kallon Mama wadda
take nade sallayar da tayi sallah tace "Mama ni kuwa kina jin Abba yana maganar
Khadija? An samu wani sabon labari a kanta?" Sai da Mama ta gama abinda take yi
sannan ta zauna akan bedside tace "abbanku kullum bashi da wata magana wacce ta
wuce ta Khadija, babu ranar da zata fito ta fadi ba tare daya ambaci sunan ta ba.
Amma ya zaiyi? Babu wani labari, police ma har sun hakura da nema sun rufe file din
case dinta. Abinda nake gaya masa kullum shine; Khadija bata so a ganta, buya tayi,
laifi tayi ta gudu, finding someone that doesn't want to be found abu ne mai
wahala, ku barta kawai, muyi tayi mata addu'ah har Allah ya juyo da hankalinta
gida, ai ita ta san inda kuke, in dai tana bukatar ku da kanta zata neme ku. Maybe
ma duk halin da muke ciki ta sani" Aisha ta sake rufe idonta tana jin zuciyarta
tayi mata nauyi, maganar Mama gaskiya ce amma kuma what if Khadija tana son zuwa
gurinsu amma bata da damar zuwa? What if she is in trouble and she needs their
help? Ta tuno maganganun da suka yi da Umma na karshe a duniya "Aisha na bar miki
amanar Khadija, ki kula da ita, kiyi hakuri da duk abinda zata yi miki saboda duk
duniya baki da kamarta" Aisha ta mayar da zafafan hawayen da suke korarin zubowa
daga idonta, a hankali tace "Umma I tried, I really tried".
Bayan an gama biki ta koma abuja, tayi ta binciken kayanta har ta samo hoton
Khadija data dauko a dakin Abba rannan a dutse, ta saka duster ta goge shi sannan
taje palo ta rataye shi, ta tsaya a gabansa tana kallo tare da kara yabawa da
kyawun halitta irin na Khadija. Tana jin Nura ya shigo palon amma bata waiga ba har
yazo a tsaya a kusa da ita shima yana kallon hoton, a hankali yace "why?" Tace
"without a child, I need all the relatives I can get" ya maimaita kalmar without a
child din data fada, sannan yace "wai yaushe zaki daina irin wannan tunanin ne
Aisha? Yaushe ne zaki yadda cewa lokacin haihuwar mu ne bai yi ba? Baki san wadansu
suna shekaru fiye da ashirin babu haihuwa ba kuma sai kiga sun haihu?" Tace "ba
haka nake nufi ba fa, kawai dai ina missing Khadija ne" yace "missing? You must be
out of your mind. That girl is evil, she is a little devil" Aisha ta lumshe idonta
tace "she is my sister" yace "yes, I know. Hausawa suna cewa hannunka baya rubewa
ka yanke ka yar ni kuma nace they are wrong, sau nawa mutum yake zuwa asibiti ya
biya kudi a yanke masa hannunsa ko kafarsa ko wani sashe na jikinsa wanda ya
lalace? Ai komai kama wa take yi. Ni na yarda cewa Allah ya fitar da Khadija ne
daga rayuwarki saboda yasan cewa zamanta a ciki ba alkhairi bane ba, da can ma
lokacin da baki da komai ko yaya taga wani alkhairi yana shirin samunki sai ta yi
yadda tayi ta raba ki dashi ballantana yanzu? In kika dawo da khadija cikin rayuwar
mu ina tabbatar miki da cewa sai tayi iya kokarinta na ganin ta rabaki da komai da
kika mallaka. She will try to take away everything that belongs to you" Aisha ta sa
ke maimaita "she is my sister" Nura yayi ajjiyar zuciya ya juya ya hau sama ya
barta a tsaye.
