Episode 39: Malaysia
A watannin da suka biyo bayan wannan, su Aisha suka chanza doctor din daya ke
dubata, new doctor din ne ya dubata yace matsalar 'barinta shine bakin mahaifarta
ne bashi da kwari. A ka'ida idan mace ta samu ciki bakin mahaifarta yana rufewa ne
kuma ba zai bude ba har sai ta fara labour, to amma a case din Aisha sai ya zamanto
da zarar cikin nata ya dan yi girma kadan sai yayi wa bakin mahaifar nauyi hakan ne
yake saka wa ya bude, ya zarar ya bude kuma dole duk abinda yake cikin mahaifar ya
fito waje. Dan haka yayi suggesting da zarar ta samu wani cikin to suyi gaggawar
zuwa sai a daure bakin mahaifar yadda ba zata bude ba har sai cikin ya isa haihuwa.
Sannan ya basu magunguna da zasuyi boosting fertility dinsu duk su biyun. A watan
kuwa sai ga Aisha da ciki, dan haka direct gurin doctor suka je aka daure mahaifa.
Wannan ciki kam yaga gata dan duk son da Nura yake yiwa girkin Aisha cewa yayi ya
hakura, gwara yake siyo musu abinci ko shi yake yi musu girkin akan Aisha tayi
wahalar girki, ko kasa bata saukowa tana sama kullum dan Nura yace stairs din zasu
iya bude mahaifar. Sex ma cewa yayi ya hakura har sai cikin yayi kwari. Allah yasa
lokacin sun sami hutu mai dan tsaho dan haka Aisha ta mike kafafuwanta tana mulki a
sama, sai dai taci tayi sallah ta kwanta dan wanka ma nura ne yake yi mata kar ta

Zan iya cewa ma zata fini kula dashi sosai saboda ta fini saka ido da zafi" Aisha

Ranar har taje gida tana ta tunanin sister din Mami tana comparing dinta da tata

ba'a barin masu zaman kansu su zauna da yara, musamman yara mata, to ita kuma sai

zo ba aka samu wannan labarin da har garin zata je ta binciki maganar sosai, ai

wayar da take amfani dashi. Amma kuma tasan daga Kamal har Abba zasu yi iya kacin
kokarin su gurin neman labari, kuma tasan ma Nura ba zai daga tafiyarsu saboda

Ranar tafiyar su Malaysia tazo, kafin ranar duk sun kwashe kayan su daga gidan sun
bawa mai gidan abinsa, Nura ya bawa Moon construction company complete kudin ginin
sabon gidan su wanda in sun dawo anan zasu tare. Aisha kuma ta tattara business
dinta duk ta barwa Aunty ta cigaba da kular mata dashi kafin su dawo. 'Yan uwa da
abokan arziki da yawa sunyi musu rakiya zuwa air port, haka suka yi sallama cikin
farin ciki da kuma alhinin rabuwa da 'yan uwa suka shiga jirgi. Aisha zata tafi
kasar waje karatu. Ina Dr AbdulRazak? Ina Khadija? Kuma Aisha zata tafi ne ba'a
matsayin 'yar scholarship ba a'a a matsayin mace mai cin gashin kanta. In dai har
Allah yace "yes" no body can say "no".
A watansu na farko a Malaysia Aisha ta kuma samun wani cikin. Sam bata wani ji
farin ciki ba dan ta gaya wa Nura ne kawai saboda bata iya boye masa komai. Da kyar
ya lallabata suka je asibiti suka yi musu duk bayanin irin cases din aka yi ta samu
a da. Kamar a Nigeria, suma daure mahaifar sukayi sannan suka rubuta mata bed rest
na tsahon wata tara. Babu bata lokaci Nura yaje ya sanar a makaranta ya nuna musu
statement din doctors nan take suka yi mata deferring session din gaba daya da
sunan sai ta haihu sai ta dawo ta cigaba. Aisha kam ko a jikinta dan kullum ta
tashi ji take yi kamar ba zata kai dare ba cikin zai fita, in kuma ta kai dare sai
take jin ba zata kai safiya ba, amma ina, Allah ya riga ya rubuta cewa wannan cikin
rayayye ne. Kuma wannan yafi kowanne laulayi dan Aisha bata da ikon saka abu a
bakinta sai tayi amansa, sai dai taci fruits kawai. Sai rigima, kullum suna cikin
rigima da Nura dan haka kawai haushi yake bata ba tare kuma da yayi mata komai ba,
shima daya fahimci haka sai ya ja baya da ita duk kuwa da cewa hakan ba karamin
takura masa yayi ba. Wannan karon babu wanda ya gaya wa zancen cikin Aisha kuma
tunda basa gari babu wanda ya sani. A haka har ciki yayi wata uku, lokacin ne kuma
Aisha ta dan fara samun sauki, masifar ta ragu dan har tana barin Nura yazo su
kwana tare, sai kuma kwadayi, cin abinci take yi kamar gara dan haka ta hada uwar
kiba gashi cikin mai girma ne dan a wata ukun nan har ya fito. Anti Natal da kyar
take yadda taje, scanning kuwa cewa tayi bata so dole Doctor din da yake dubata da
kuma Nura suka hakura. Inta ga dama sai ta zauna ta yi ta kuka abinta, in ya
tambayeta dalili sai ta tuno masa da wani tsohon abu da yayi mata tun dadewa tace
shi ne ya sakata kuka, dole zai zauna yayi ta bata hakurin laifin daya manta ma
sanda yayi. Babban abinda Aisha ta tsana shine wanka, sai ta kwana uku ko hudu
batayi ba kuma ta dami Nura wai ita jikinta wari yake yi in yace tayi wanka kuma
sai ta haushi da masifar ita ba zatayi ba, haka zai hakura ya rabu da ita. Ciki
yakin mata, maza sai an kara hakuri damu.

By
Maman Maama
Episode 40: The Orphan
Cikin Aisha yana wata bakwai doctor yaga girmansa yayi yawa dan da kyar take tafiya
ya matsa mata lallai tazo ayi mata scanning, duk da dai yana kyautata zaton twins
ne amma so yake yi dai ya tabbatar. Tana kumbura tana turo baki haka Nura ya
lallabota suka taho akayi mata, alas, guda biyun ne kuwa. Sai a lokacin da Aisha ta
ga babies dinta a screen sannan ta fara jin feelings game da cikin, tana kallonsu
suna ta wasansu kawai sai hawaye, ko a haka ubangiji ya barta ya gama mata komai.
Da kyar ta bari doctor ya kashe screen din wai ita bata gama ganin su ba. Sai a
lokacin sannan ta bari Nura ya fara yi mata siyayyar haihuwa, ai kuwa kudi kawai
yake narkarwa har sai data ce masa ya isa haka. Ta warware sosai yanzu babu abinda
take yi sai addu'ar sauka lafiya da kuma nemawa yaranta albarkar duniya da lahira.
Sai da cikin ya cika wata tara sannan suka je asibiti aka kunce mahaifar. Ranar da
zata haihu tun da safe ta fahimci abin nesa yazo kusa amma bata gayawa Nura ba har
ya gama shirinsa ya tabbatar babu abinda zata bukata sannan ya tafi makaranta tare
da jaddada mata cewa ta tabbatar cewa slightest change in taji zata kirashi a waya,
tayi masa alkawari yayi kissing dinta ya tafi. Yana tafiya ta duba jakar tafiya
asibitin data hada ta tabbatar komai yana ciki. Tayo alwala tazo tayi sallar neman
sa'a a gurin ubangiji, ta jera adduoi sosai a kanta, mijinta, babies dinta da
al'ummar musulmi baki daya. Tana kan sallayarta har saida taji abinda hausawa suke
cewa za'ki ya fara fito mata sannan ta tashi ta nade ta. A lokacin da haihuwa tazo
miki an fi son ki kadaice kanki a gurin da babu mutane, babu hayaniya preparably ma
ace babu haske sosai. Wannan yana taimakawa wajan saka nakuda tayi progressing da
sauri. Mostly in mace ta fara labour to da zarar anzo kanta ana ta hayaniya ko kuma
an kaita asibii inda yake cike da mutane da nurses suna ta hira ga sauran masu
haihuwa wasu na ta kuka to mostly sai kiga haihuwar ta koma. Wannan animalistic
instinct ne. Da zarar anzo kanki ana hayaniya to jikinki zai yi reading environment
din ne as unsafe, gani zaiyi kamar da kin haihu wani bad thing zai samu baby din
dan haka sai jikinki ya tsayar da nakudar har sai kin je inda yake ganin is safe.
Mata da yawa zasu bada labarin sun fara labour sunje asibiti ciwon ya tsaya sai da
suka dawo gida sannan ciwon ya dawo, to wannan shi ya saka advisable gwara ki zauna
a gida a dakinki, in ma da yara ki tura su wani gurin but make sure wayarki tana
kusa dake, sai kin tabbatar ciwon yazo sosai da sosai sannan sai ki kira a kaiki
asibiti in haihuwar asibiti zakiyi, inta gida zakiyi ma ki tabbatar kin kirawo
wacce zata karbi haihuwar ita kadai tazo gurinki. But NEVER attempt to give birth
alone, it is very risky dan baki san yadda zata zo miki ba.
Da yake apartment dinsu a sama yake sai Aisha tayi ta hawa stairs din nan tana
sauka, in taji ciwon yazo sai ta zauna har sai ya lafa sannan sai ta tashi ta
cigaba. Wannan shi yataimaka mata wajan saurin budewa. Sai da ta gaji dan kanta
sannan ta koma apartment din su ta kunna wa kanta shower mai zafi tayi wanka sosai,
sai kuma taji ciwon ya lafa mata, amma tana dawowa daki kafin ta saka kayan data
tanada musamman saboda wannan ranar kawai sai taji ruwa kaman an bude fanfo yana
zubowa, tasan me hakan yake nufi dan haka ta kira wayar Nura, kafin ya dauka taji
wani azababben ciwo wanda ya saka ta yar da wayar ba tare data sani ba, tana jin
muryar Nura yana ta hello hello amma babu bakin amsawa, dama haka haihuwar take?
Dama haka ciwon yake? To ita mai yasa ma tayi cikin ballantana har tazo haihuwa?
Yaushe hakan ta faru? In haka matan da suka haihu sukaji to su kuwa menene ya saka
suke kara haihuwa? Ita dai daga wannan ta gama, wannan din ma tsautsayine, lol.
Ciwo Aisha take ji irin wanda bata taba tunanin akwai irinsa ba. Sai daya lafa mata
sannan ta sauke numfashi. Ta sake daukan wayarta da niyyar kiran Nura sai ga kiran
sa nan ya shigo, ta dauka tun kafin tayi magana yace "jikin ne Wifey?" Kai ta gyada
masa tana cije lebe kamar yana kallonta, yace just hold on gani nan zuwa, five
minutes " ji take yi kamar ta dora hannu aka ta rusa kuka, ita five minutes din nan
ai infinity ne a gurinta, why can't he come in two minutes tunda ba nisa ne da
makarantar ba. Amma sai da ciwon ya lafa sannan ta tuna cewa kafin ya fito daga
makarantar ma aikine.
Five minutes din daya gaya mata ita ya dauka, daga ganin yadda yake gaki tasan cewa
da gudu ya hawo stairs din. Yana zuwa ya fara jera mata sannu, da hannu tayi masa
alamar ya bata rigarta ta saka, ya dauko ya saka mata ba tare da ta saka komai a
ciki ba. Ya dauko jakar asibitin su sannan ya kamata ta mike suka fara tafiya a
hankali, in ciwo yazo a tsaya a huta yana mata sannu yana shafa mata bayanta, sai
ya lafa sai su cigaba. Kafin suje asibiti already ya kira ya fada cewa gasu nan a
hanya, dan haka kafin suje har an fito da gadon marasa lafiya ana jiran su. Ko dai
dai da minti daya Nura bai bar side din Aisha ba har dakin haihuwa, dayake dakin
single room ne daga ita sai shi sai mai karbar haihuwar, yadda take hada gumi shima
haka yake hadawa rigarsa ta jike sharkaf da gumi, in tayi masa wani rikon kuwa ji
yake kamar zata balla shi amma haka yake hakura dan yasan ita ciwon da take ji yafi
na karaya zafi. Da yaga abin babu sassauci yace da midwife din ko zata yi mata wata
allurar da zata tsayar da haihuwar ta dan samu ta huta, matar tana yi masa murmushi
ta gaya masa it is not possible, already ta kai 9cm yanzu dan haka minti kadan ya
rage mata. Mintuna kadan din kuwa Aisha ta fara nishi, ranar Nura yaga tashin
hankali, midwife din tace masa yazo ya leka ya gani in yana so, da sauri ya girgiza
mata kai, Nura ya kara imani sosai ya kuma kara son mahaifiyarsa (maza a daure ake
shiga labour room gurin haihuwar matan ku). Na farko yana fitowa aka dan dake
sshanye chanyara kuka aka dora shi akan kirjin Aisha, ga mamakin Nura sai yaga ta
saka hannu ta rike abinta, tana kokarin haihuwar na biyu amma tana rike da dayan,
uwa kenan.
Ana dauko na biyun Nura ya kai hannu zai karba baki har kunne amma Aisha ta hana
shi, haka ta hada duk biyun ta rungume. Shi so yake yi ma ya leka yaga mata ne ko
maza ne amma ta hanashi, matar tana tayi masa dariya tace "congratulations, you
have very cute identical twin boys" Nura hamdala kawai yake yi yana karawa, a
lokacin ya fahimci mai hausawa suke nufi in sunce mutum yana farinciki kamar ya
zuba ruwa a kasa ya sha, dan yasan da za'a zuba masa ruwan a kasa da tsaf zai kafa
bakinsa ya shanye. Bai samu daukar babies dinba har saida aka zo za'a gyara Aisha
dole ta bashi su ya rike. Kallonsu yake amma ya rasa dawa suke kama, sun dauko best
features of Aisha sun kuma dauko best features of Nura, dan haka sai suka fi su
kyau, dan shi badan a gabansa aka haifesu ba ba zai yarda cewa 'ya'yansu bane ba,

Nine Years Later
Taro ne ake gudanarwa a gidan marayu mai zaman kansa na Abuja. Taro ne wanda gidan
ya saba gudanarwa lokaci zuwa lokaci dan bawa mutane damar zuwa suga yaran su kuma
bada gudummawar da suke da niyya ba wai dan mai orphanage din ya gaza ba sai dan a
bawa mutanen gari dama suma su zama involved gurin harkar marayun. San nan wadanda
suke son adopting su zaba tare da cike duk takardun da suka kamata wadanda doka ta
tanadar dan tabbatar da komawar hakkin yaran gurin masu daukan nasu. A irin
wadannan taron ne kuma ake gabatar da bukatun orphanage din, sannan kuma ana bawa
mutane damar su kawo shawarwarin da zasu bunkasa gurin da kuma kyautata rayuwar
yaran.
Ana tsakiya ta taron ne wata katuwar mota ta shigo gurin, shugabar masu kula da
gurin ce ta mike da sauri ta fita, sauran ma'aikatan gurin ma duk suka mike suka
mara mata baya. Yaran da suke zazzaune kuma suka fara murna wadansu daga cikinsu
suna tafa hannayensu dan nuna jin dadin su. Motar tana packing mai tuka ta ya fito
da sauri ya bude kofar baya sannan ya durkusa yana gyarawa mai fitowa daga motar
takalminta. Saurin da yayi gurin fitowa zai saka mutum ya dauka driver ne, amma
kallo daya zakayi masa kasan cewa ba driver bane ba, shekarunsa ba zasu wuce
ashirin ba ko ashirin da daya, kyau, jin dadi tarbiyya da kuma kamar da yake da
wadda ta fito din zai sa ka tabbatar da cewa dan ta ne. Ta fito tana kare hasken
rana da tafin hannunta, kyakykyawar gaske ce wadda shekarunta basu rage ko kadan
daga kyanta ba, murmushin da baya barin fuskarta yana nan, ta saka hannu ta
hargitsa kwantaccen gashin wanda ya bude mata kofar shi kuma ya bata rai alamar
shagwaba sannan ya zagaya ya bude daya barin. Wata mata ce ta sake fitowa daga
kofar. Baka ce, wadda jin dadi da kwanciyar hankali ya kara fito da boyayyen
kyanta. Fuskarta dauke da sun glasses wanda ya kara kawata kyakykyawar fuskar tata,
ta saka dan yatsan da yasha adon zoben gwal ta lakuci kumatun wanda ya bude mata
kofar, ya sake bata rai har yana buga kafa a kasa ita kuma tana yi masa dariya. A
tare matan suka taka suka nufi inda 'yan taryan nasu suke tahowa. Shi kuma dan
saurayin ya juya zai koma seat dinsa inda ya bar kofa a bude saboda sauri sai yaji
anyi masa magana daga seat din kusa da driver "psst, aren't you forgetting
something Bassam?" Ya jefa mata harara tare da tsaki yace "ki shiga hankalinki
Basma. In kika bari na zagayo na shiga motar nan ba tare da kin fito ba sai jikinki
ya gaya miki wallahi" bata fito ba har ya zagayo din sannan ta bude kofar da gudu
ta fita ta bar masa kofar a bude ta juyo tayi masa gwalo shi kuma yayi mata sign
din I will kill you.
A cikin gurin taron bayan kowa ya koma ya zauna, mai gabatarwa ta gabatar da Dr
Maimoon Muhammad Dikko tare da aminiyarta kuma ta hannun damanta Dr Aisha Zayyan.
Daga nan kuma sai Dr Maimoon ta karbi mick ta yi jawabin godiya ga duk wadanda suka
samu halartar taron sannan kuma ta bayar da hakuri a bisa makarar da tayi ta kuma
bada hakurin rashin samun zuwan maigidanta "abubuwa sunyi masa yawa sosai yanzu,
tunda yanzu kusan shi yake gabatar da duk al'amuran masarautar mu saboda rashin
lafiyar maimartaba sarki. Dan haka from today ni zan cigaba da gudanar da duk
abinda ya shafi wannan orphanage din" daga nan kuma aka fara gabatar da bukatun
orphanage din, kusan basu da wata bukata tunda yawanci kafin a bukaci abu har Dr da
maigidanta sun aiwatar, abinda kawai suka nema a wannan taron shine gyaran wadansu
famfuna da electric appliances da suka lalace, wanda a take Dr Aisha tace ta dauki
nauyin wannan. Daga nan kuma sai aka bada dama ga wadanda suka yi applying for
adoption dasu zagaya su ga yaran su kuma zabi wadanda suke so suyi adopting.
An jera yaran ne according to their ages, ma'ana jarirai ne a farko wadanda aka
shirya cikin shiga mai kyau rike a hannun nannies, daga nan sai 1-3 year, bayan su
kuma 3-6 years a haka har 12 year wadanda da wahala yaro a wannan orphanage din ya
wuce 12 ba'a yi adopting dinsa ba saboda irin kulawa da tarbiyyar da suke samu.
Aisha tana daga zaune a high table take bin yaran da kallo tana murmushin yadda
suke ta doki suna so a zaba dasu suma su samu family, duk wanda aka zaba kuma sai
murna. Kowa a cikinsu yana murmushi kuma daga anzo kusa dashi sai ya durkusa yayi
gaisuwa dan ya nuna kyawunsa da kuma tarbiyyarsa dan ya samu a zabe shi. Aisha taji
tausayinsu a ranta, duk da dai ba abinda suka nema suka rasa amma kuma inside them
they are yearning for a family, Family. Ta jima tana son tayi adopting amma
maigidanta yana hana ta, shi gani yake kamar rashin 'ya'yan da basu dasu da yawa ne
yasa take son adopting ita kuma ba haka bane, dan twins dinta kadai sun ishe ta
duniya da lahira, abinda take so shine taimako, taimakon maraya.
A lokacin ne idonta yakai kan wata yarinya a can karshen baya. Daga farko ta dauka
ita ma a cikin bakin tazo, sai daga baya ta lura da tag din wuyan yarinyar irin na
sauran yaran ne, amma bata cikin kowanne layi saboda ta girmi kowa a gurin dan
kallo daya in kayi mata zaka iya kiranta da cikakkiyar budurwa, sai dai kuma in ka
kare mata kallo zaka gane cewa girman burodi ne dan ba zata wuce 15 ba, highest 16
years. Dogon hijab ne a jikinta wanda ya kai har gwuiwar ta amma duk da haka bai
biye cikar kirjinta ba, ta kankame jikinta da hannayenta tana ta rarraba idanu
kamar wacce take jiran abu kadan ta fita a guje. Tsabar tsoro ne a rubuce baro baro
a fuskarta. Aisha ta lura da cewa da yawa daga cikin mutanen basa ma karasawa kusa
da ita suke juyawa, idan kuma an samu wasu sun karasa gurin nata sai ta kara takure
kanta a jikin bango ba tare da ko gaishe su tayi ba. Dagabaya sai Aisha ta lura
cewa mutane da yawa a gurin suna kallon yarinyar suna maganganu kasa kasa.
A haka har taro ya kare, kusan duk wanda yazo adoption ya samu abinda yake so, daga
yaran har sababbin iyayensu suna ta murna. Bayan kowa ya watse ne sai suka tafi
office din director din orphanage din, nan suka zauna aka kawo musu abubuwan motsa
baki sannan director din gabtarwa da Dr Maimoon takardun da suke bukatar saka
hannunta, daga nan kuma suka maganganunsu akan gurin wanda Aisha ba gane wa take yi
ba dan haka ta juya gurin Basma suke hirar su. Ana cikin haka ne taji director din
tace "Dr saura kuma zancen yarinyar nan, kinga last adoptive parents dinta sun dawo
da ita suma, gashi yau ma naga babu wanda yako yi attempting daukanta" Mami tayi
ajjiyar zuciya tace "to yanzu menene shawara? Ya kike ganin zamuyi da ita?"
Director tace "we just have to let her go. Ai Allah ya gani munyi iyakacin kokarin
mu. Tayi girma da yawa ina gudun gurbacewar tarbiyyar sauran yaran mu" Da sauri

get muce mata go? Bayan munsan bata da kowa a duniya?" Director tayi shiru dan ta
fahimci shawarar tata ta bata ran Mami, Aisha ta matso tana tambayar wacce yarinya
ce, Mami bata bata amsa ba tace da director din ta kira yarinyar, sai da ta fita
sannan Mami tace da Aisha "yarinya ce kinga, ta jima a sabon orphanage dinmu na
lagos duk wanda ya dauke ta saiya dawo da ita, sai suka turo ta kano shima nan bata
chanza zani ba, yanzu shekarar ta biyu anan gurin mu kuma an kaita sama da gida
biyar kenan amma wani gidan ko sati bata yi suke dawo mana da ita" Aisha ta
tabbatar yarinyar data gani dazu ce. Suna cikin maganar sai gata ta shigo a bayan
director, ta samu gefe daya ta rakube kamar zata shige bango. Mami tana kallonta
tace "babu gaisuwa HUMAIRAH" ?
Ta dago dara daran idanuwanta wadanda suka rine kalar ja saboda kukan ta tun safe

murmushi tace "shigo mana Humairah. Daga yau ina son ki ke kallona a matsayin

gyada kai kawai, daga dukkan alamu ba yau ta fara jin irin wannan maganar ba. Ta
shigo ta ajiye jakarta a kasa ita kuma ta hawo can carpet din ta zauna a kasa.
Hakan da tayi ya burge Aisha, ya nuna cewa tana da hankali. Ummulkhairi ce ta shigo
tana yi wa Aisha sannu da zuwa, sannan ta koma ta kawo masu coconut juice da samosa
ta ajiye musu. Aisha duk weekend take yin snacks, samosas, spring rose, meat pie da
duk wani abu mai wahala ta daure su a lefa ta saka a freezer yadda cikin sati kawai
sai dai ta dauko in sun huce ta soya kayanta, as fresh as new. Aisha ta sauko kasa
kusada Humairah tana murmushi ta jawo musu snack din tace "nasan kema yunwa kike
ji, ni am starving" automatically Humairah ta fara cin abincin, fuskarta babu
alamar cewa tana jin dadin sa. A haka twins suka dawo, da gudu suka shigo alamar
race suke yi, suka zagayo each side of Aisha suka yi kissing checks dinta a tare,
nan aka fara musun waye ya riga kissing Mommy. Aisha tana ta dariya ta jawo su ta
rungume a tare tace "babu wanda ya riga wani, a tare kuka yi, and I love you both
very much".
Tunda suka shigo Humairah take kallonsu. They look exactly alike, like a photocopy.
Sai da suka gama dariyarsu da Mommyn su sannan tace " albishirinku, na samo muku
big sister " ta fada tana nuna Humairah, suka tsaya saroro suna kallonta kamar
yadda itama take kallonsu, sannan suka juya a tare suka kalli mommyn su suka hada
baki "sister? Dama muna da sister" tayi dariya tace "eh, from now on you have a
sister, sunanta Humairah, amma ku zaku ke ce mata big sister" a tare suka mika wa
Humairah hannu da niyyar shaking nata hannun, ta kalli Aisha wadda ta gyada mata
kai alamar go ahead, for the first time sai ta samu kanta da murmushi, wanda ya
kara lotsa clipped chin dinta, ta mika mudu hannu itama suka gaisa, tace "are you
twins?" A tare suka girgiza kansu sannan suka hada baki suka ce "nine babba" wannan
karon 'yar dariya tayi tace "waye babba" suka sake maimaita abinda suka ce, Mami
tana dariya tace "duk wanda sunansa Junaid shine babba, wanda kuma sunansa TJ shine
karami" a tare suka sake cewa "nine Junaid" yanxu Humairah dariya take sosai, wanda
ba karamim faranta ran Aisha hakan yayi ba. Sun jima suna drama da twins sannan ta
kora su dakin su su chire kaya suyi wanka suyi sallah sannan su dawo suci abinci
tare dasu. Bayan sun tafi ne da kalli Humairah tace "zaki banbance sune a hankali,
Junaid shinr babba, he is calmer and gentler, TJ shine fitinanne mai tsonaka da
surutu" Humairah ta gyada kanta kawai. Aisha ta kira Mero ta saka ta ta raka
Humairah sama dakin da basa amfani dashi. Humairah tana tashi Aisha ta bita da
kallo, she has a graet body, a body that remind her if someone, har ta taka stairs
Aisha tace "Humairah?" Ta juyo tana kallonta, tace "how old are you?" Direct tace
mata "eighteen" ta juya ta cigaba da tafiya. Aisha ta jingina kanta a kujera ta
lumshe idonta,18years? Ta dauka ba zata wuce 16 ba, ta tuno rayuwarta 18 years
back, lokacin tana karatu a FUD, lokacin suna soyayya da Kamal. Lokacin Khadija
tana gida. A hankali tace "she is not who I tot, how silly of me to even think
that?".
Gabanta ne ya fadi da wani tunani ya fado mata. Zuciyarta ta jata ta yanke hukunci,
hukunci babba ba tare da tayi shawara da mijinta ba first, abinda bata taba yiba
tunda suka yi aure. Kuma tasan how he feels about adoption. Farin cikin ta daya
baya gati yanxu yana kano BUK visiting lecturing da yake zuwa. At least she can
talk to him kafin yazo gida yaga yarinyar. Ta jawo wayarta tayi dialing number
dinsa tana jero addu'ar nasara a zuciyarta.

maigidan, dan taga family picture dinsu a main palon gidan. Ina ma ina ma, ina ma

ba zata iya lissafa su ba. Amma yanzu gashi ana ambata mata wani guri da sunan
home. Bayan sun sallameta ta tafi ne Aisha tace "so, ya ka ganta?" Ya shanye lemon
kofinsa yace "I don't like her. I don't like her a single bit" ta matso ta kama

Episode 43: Haunted
A tsorace ta farka with the feelings na cewa ta makara. Ta mike zaune da sauri tana
kallon hasken ranar da ya fara shigowa ta window sai kuma ta kalli agogon da yake

Romantic Writers Association

Aisha_Humairah

By

Maman Maama

Episode 47_48: Resolution

Kallon shi kawai Mami tayi, tana noticing yadda idonsa yayi ja, kuma tasan wannan
jan har cikin zuciyarsa haka abin yake. Ta mikar da Humairah tsaye suka fara tafiya
sannan tace masa "ka saka kayanka ka sameni a dakin Daddy". Tana rufe kofa ya kalli
jikinsa, he is almost naked, wani irin tururi zuciyarsa take yi masa, he has never
been humiliated like this in his entire life, shi mutum ne da baya son hayaniya
sam, baya son shiga harkar mutane kuma baya son a shiga tashi, he respect his
privacy sosai, yana kare tsiraicinsa fiye da komai dan ba zai iya tuna ranar da
wani, mace ko namiji ya ganshi babu riga ba, ballantana babu riga babu wando. His
younger siblings, his parents and that stupid stupid girl. What the hell was she
even doing a dakinsa? Dakin da ko siblings dinsa sun san ba'a shiga in ba da
kwakwkwaran dalili ba? Ta shigo har dakinsa unenvited sannan tayi masa ihu, ta
kulla masa sharrin da shi yanzu bai san ta inda zai fara warwararsa ba. Inda ya dan
ji dadi daya ne daya kasance family dinsa ne kawai suka gani, an he trust them to
keep it within them. Amma su din ta ya zaiyi convincing dinsu cewa abinda suka gani
ba shine abinda ya faru ba? Daddy shine babban tashin hankalinsa dan yasan bama zai
tsaya ya saurare shi ba. Da sauri ya dauki jallabiyyar daya cire kafin ya shiga
wanka ya mayar ba tare daya sama komai a jikinsa ba. Ya juya zai fita kenan ya lura
da tray akan table kusa da wayarsa. Ya bude bowl din kan tray din yaga damammen oat
ga madara a gefe da bowl din sugar. Shi ya manta ma ya saka Basma ta kawo masa oat.
Ya rufe yana ayyana abinda ya faru, "I will kill that girl" ya fada yana fita da
sauri daga dakin. Wato ita Basma saboda ta raina shi bai isa ya saka ta abu ba
shine ya saka ta ita kuma ta saka wata yarinyar daban, mahaukaciyar yarinya ma for
that matter. "I will kill them both" yayi deciding a karshe. Da sauri yake tafiya
kamar zai tashi sama har ya fiyo palo, yayi hanyar part din Mami da sauri, aka zai
dauki Basma ya kaiwa Daddy in yaso ita tayi wa Daddyn bayanin cewa ita ta turo
yarinyar dakinsa, daga kitchen yaji muryar Basma tana tambayar Bassam "Bassam kaga
Humairah?. Ni ina gurin Haiydar tun dazu kuma na jiyo kamar ihunta, naje daki kuma
ban ganta ba" Al'ameen yaja ya tsaya bai karasa ba, Bassam yace mata "am sorry
Basma, but ina jin zaman yarinyar nan ya kare a gidan nan" tace a sauri "what? Me
kake cewa?" Nan Bassam ya bata labarin abinda ya gani muryarsa can kasa yadda shi
kansa Al'ameen da yakr bakin kofa ba ji yake yi ba, dan dai ya riga yasan labarin
da ake bayarwar ne" Basma tace "No, ban yarda ba wallahi, not Ya Ameen. Ba zaiyi
haka ba wallahi" Bassam yace "I know that, amma abinda ido na ya gane min kenan,
and I don't know what to think. I just can't believe it, I don't want to believe
it. Dama yarinyar nan was behaving suspiciously tun zuwanta gidan nan. Ni ban yarda
da ita ba gaskiya. Wa ya sani ma ko turo ta akayi. Ni nasan Ya Ameen is not like
that, in ma he is like that ba zai yi a cikin gidan nan ba. No." Basma tace "ita
din ma bana jin tana da wayon da zata shirya sharri irin wannan. I don't know what
happened between them but am sure there is an explanation to all this". Al'ameen
bai karasa shiga kitchen dinba ya juya ya kama hanyar part din Daddy, haka kawai
sai yaji zafin zuciyarsa ya ragu, it is good to know that someone believes in you
and can stand up for you no matter what yaji akan ka ko ya gani a kanka. Ya san
akwai soyayya da yarda a tsakaninsa da siblings dinsa amma bai dauka ta kai har
after ganin abinda suka gani yau sannan still suyi believing in him with out even
demanding an explanation ba.

A palon Daddy babu kowa sai TV tana yi ita kadai, amma Al'ameen ya san suna ciki.
Ya zauna akan carpet ya dafe kansa da hannu biyu. He has never been humilited like
this. He has never hated anyone kamar yadda yake jin hatred din yarinyar tana
karuwa a zuciyarsa. Idan wannan storm din yayi passing zai binciki maganar Bassam
na cewa yarinyar is behaving suspicious. In ma turo ta akayi tazo dakinsa tayi masa
ihu to sai ta fada masa. Tun Al'ameen yana lissafa mintuna har ya koma lissafa
hours. One hour ta wuce, ya tashi ya dauki ruwa mai sanyi yasha wai ko zai danji
sanyi a zuciyarsa amma hakan bai rage masa komai ba. Ya koma ya zauna yana lissafa
situation dinsa. Daddy wuta ne, dan wani lokacin ji yake daddyn nasa tamkar yafi
wuta zafi, amma kuma komai tafasar da yake yi Mami tana controlling dinsa, dan haka
a yanzu Mami ce option din Al'ameen, in dai ya samu Mami ta saurare shi kuma ta
fahimce shi to tabbas zata shawo kan Daddy ko ba yanzu ba. To amma yadda zai yi
yayi facing Mami da wannan abin kunyar shine bai sani ba. A karshe ya yanke
shawara, abu daya ne zai fitar dashi a gurin Mami shine in ya gaya mata gaskiya, in
dai har yayi mata karya ko ya take to zata gane kuma tana gane yayi mata karya
shikenan ba zata yarda da shi ba. Tun yana yaro akwai wani link mai karfi
tsakaninsa da Mami, akwai fahimtar juna sosai a tsakaninsu wadda sam babu irinta a
tsakaninsa da Daddy. Wannan link din shi yake counting on. Two hours, sannan suka
fito a tare. Da sauri Al'ameen ya mike tsaye amma kuma sai ya kasa magana. Wannan
abin kunyar har ina? Direct Daddy ya tafi kujerar sa da yake zama akai ya zauna.
Al'ameen yaje gabansa yayi kneeling ya hade hannayensa biyu yace "Daddy dan girman
Allah ka saurare ni kar kayi fushi dani. Wallahi abinda kuka gani ba shine abinda
ya faru ba. Ka fahimce ni please, ka rsaya inyi muku bayani" kallo daya yayi masa

Episode 48: Friends

Duniya gaba daya ta yiwa Al'ameen zafi. Ya rasa dalilin da yasa Mami ta hada shi da
wannan aikin. Gashi kuma shi bai taba yiwa Mami musu ba ko kuma in ta saka shi wani
abin yaki yi ba. Ga kuma threat din da tayi na aurawa Abdallah wannan crazy
yarinyar, kuma yasan ta in tace zatayi abu to tabbas zatayi din. Amma shi ta yaya
zai fara kula wannan yarinyar? Haka kawai ma yaje yayi mata magana ta kara yi masa
wani ihun? Shi ko a makaranta yammatan da yake kulawa sai very classy irinsa,
wadanda basu da hayaniya kuma wadanda suka san abinda suke yi, ita kuma wannan fa?

Kasa kwanciya yayi ya tashi ya fita waje. In zaiyi tunani yafi son ya samu guri mai
fresh air yadda kansa zai bude sosai. Ya kwanta rigingine a saman mota yana kallon
yadda taurari suka yiwa sama ado. Tunanin labarin da Mami ta bashi dan gane da
rayuwar yarinyar ya fara yi, amma kuma duk wannan prediction ne tunda tace yarinyar
bata taba gaya wa kowa ainahin ya rayuwar tata ta kasance ba, but his mother is
very good in studying people, she is hardly wrong when it comes to things like
that. Dan haka chances are very high cewa abinda ta fada haka ne. Sai kawai yaji
tausayin yarinyar, yaji haushinta ya dan ragu kadan a zuciyarsa. Ya tuno babansa
tun yana matashi yayi dedicating life dinsa to helping mutane marasa gata, mutane
irin crazy yarinyar nan, to in har babansa zai yi why not him? He always wanted to
be like his father, maybe he can never be, but he can try. It is not as if soyayya
zasuyi, kawai dai kulata Mami take so yakeyi and ya zama nice to her. Ya mike ya
shiga gida yana tunanin ta inda zai fara. A ransa yace "ya ma sunanta?"

Washegari ya dawo daga office wajan karfe biyar. A gajiye yake sosai. Palo babu
kowa sai yaran gidan, suka bishi da gaisuwa ya amsa ta hanyar motsa bakinsa ba tare
da sun ma ji me yace ba. Part din Mami ya tafi, ya sameta a palo zaune tare da
'yammatan ta. Ya lura da yadda Humairah ta dauke wuta gaba daya ta fara jan hijab
dinta tana kara rufe jikinta. Ya gaishe da Mami sannan ya zauna a gefenta yace
"Mami na gaji da yawa wallahi" tace "gajiya kuma? Ni banga alamar gajiya a tare da
kai ba. Ai da ka gaji da gani zanyi kana ta hada gumi ko inga fuskarka tayi baki ko
something like that" ya shagwabe fuska "Mami" ta dungure masa kai "kai san jiki ne
da kai da yawa, kayi ta wani lallaba jiki sai kace mace". Basma tayi masa sannu da
zuwa Humairah ma tayi kamar yadda taga Basma tayi. Sai kuma ta mike ta kama hanyar
daki, Mami tace "ina zakije kuma kuna kallon ku? Ki dawo kiyi zamanki" dole ta juyo
ta dawo ta zauna tana satar kallon Al'ameen tana fatan Allah yasa ya tashi ya tafi,
amma maimakon haka sai taga ya gyara kwanciya akan kujerar ya lumshe idonsa. Nan ta
samu damar kallonsa, kamar yadda Mami ta fada babu alamar gajiya a tare dashi sai
tsabar hutu da fatar sa take bayyanawa. Humairah ta kalli fuskarsa da hannayensa
wanda anan ne kadai take ganin fatarsa, babu ko digon tabo balle wani patch na

dai dai da sajensa da akayi wa wani irin gyara mai kayatarwa sannan ya hade da
siririn gashin bakinsa daya zagaye jajayen lips dinsa. Perfect, komai nasa is
perfect kamar yadda rayuwarsa take perfect. Batayi aure ba taga idonsa a cikin
nata, tayi saurin dauke kanta tana wayancewa da kallon TV. Anan shi kuma ya samu
damar kallonta. Tunda tazo gidan bai taba wani zama ya kalleta sosai ba dan inda

Washegari bai je office ba saboda bashi da wani aiki, ya gaya musu in suna bukatar

Ya saka ta debo Irish, ya tayata suka fere, sannan ta yanka shi kanana kamar girman

Episode 49_50_51 : The Friends
A palo ta tarar da Basma tana kwance tana chatting a wayarta, ta dago kai ta bita
da kallo tace " daga ina kike ke kuma?" Bata amsa mata ba sai ta karaso ta ajiye
plate din hannunta a gaban Basman sannan ta zauna ita ma ta dauki tea din ta fara
sha, wani dadi taji, so refreshing ta lumshe idonta tana shakar kamshin tean. Basma
ta mike zaune ta dauki kosan ta saka a bakinta tace "waya baki wannan" Humairah
tace "ni na soya" Basma tace "what? Wai kina so kice min tun dazu kina kitchen tare
da Ya Ameen? Ni tun da naga ya tafi kitchen din na dauka kin fita kin koma daki ko
wani gurin. Tell me the truth, waye yayi wannan girkin?" Humairah tace "Ya Ameen ne
yayi" Basma ta bude ido, "wai kina nufin Ya Ameen ne da kansa yayi wannan abincin?"
Humairah tace "a'a bashi ne yayi ba nice nayi" Basma ta harde hannayenta a kirjinta
tace "wanne zan dauka a ciki, ke kikayi ko shine yayi?" Humairah ta danyi karamin
murmushi tace "tare mukayi ni da shi" Basma tace "wait, what?" Mamaki karara a
fuskarta. Humairah ta ajiye cup din hannunta tace "kinga, shi fa yana zaune, kawai
gaya min abinda zanyi yake yi ni kuma ina yi, a haka har muka gama" Basma ta dan
dake ta a kafada tace "that's my girl, you really made me proud tunda har kika iya
zama dashi a kitchen daya" Humairah tayi murmushi kawai amma tana jinjina maganar a
ranta, ya akayi ta iya zama daga ita sai shi har lokaci mai tsaho? Ya akayi kuma ko
a ranta bata yi wani negative tunani ba ballantana taji tsoronsa? Ita ma bata san
amsar ba amma tasan it has to do with yadda yake komai nasa a nutse, maganar sa a
hankali cikin nutsuwa, haka movements dinsa, kuma da yadda yayi keeping distance
between them dan tun da suka fara bai zo kusa da ita ba, in zata bashi abu ko zai
bata bai taba bari hannayensu sun hadu ba. Ga kamshin turarensa mai sanyaya zuciya.
Shima Al"Ameen a nasa bangaren bayan yaje daki yana cin abinci kawai sai yaji
abincin yayi masa dadi fiye da yadda yake yi masa ada. Mamakin ya akayi yayi
enjoying his time with her yakeyi, ya dauka mu'amala da ita will be the most boring
and annoying thing da zai taba yi a rayuwarsa amma sai yaga va haka bane ba. Komai
ya tafi smoothly ba tayi masa ihu ba ko wata hayaniya, she might be young and
unwise but she is very brilliant, kwakwalwarta tana ja sosai da sosai, dan duk
abinda yake gaya mata tana yi ne exactly kamar yadda yace mata. Ya kalli gurin da
suka sha kokawa rannan sai ya samu kansa da murmushi.
Kwana biyu haka ta cigaba da kasancewa, kullum Al'ameen in yana bukatar abu to
Humairah yake sakawa, tun tana jin babu dadi har ta fara sabawa da taga yazo zata
tashi ta dauko masa drinks tazo ta zuba masa ta mika masa, a hankali ta fara gane
wanne drink yake so wanne ne kuma baya so. In abinci zai ci ma ita take zuba masa.
Amma har yanzu dai baya baya take yi dashi, bata taba zuwa kusa dashi sosai kuma
shima baya zama kusa da ita, daga baya baya dai. Ya fahimci cewa the rules of zama
lafiya da Humairah sune; kar ka yi mata tsawa, kar ka je kusa da ita, and never
ever try to touch her. Ya kuma lura cewa, she is very religious, zai iya cewa bai
taba ganinta babu mayafi ko hijab ba saboda she is very conscious of her body, in
mayafi ne a jikinta daya shigo gurin zata fara gyara shi tana kara rufe jikinta,
wani lokacin ma tashi take yi ta dauko hijab ta saka, ta riga ta saka a ranta cewa
kowanne namiji kallonta yake yi. Most of the times in bashi da aiki a office kawai
sai ya dauko mota ya dawo gida dan yasan zai tarar da gidan babu kowa sai Humairah
da Basma, nan zai zauna tare dasu yayi ta kokarin yi musu hira duk da ba iyawa yayi
ba amma with Basma nothing is boring dan inta debo wani labarin sai ya dakatar da
ita saboda yasan ba zai kare ba. Kokarinsa shine yaga Humairah ta basu wani labarin
itama, something related to her past amma ko sau daya bata taba gwadawa ba. Shi
kuma baya son ya tambayeta saboda kar tayi tunanin bugun cikinta yake so yayi.
Ranar nan ya dawo daga office da wuri kamar yadda ya tsira kwanan nan, amma yau ya
taho da aikin wasu takardu daya ke so ya cike kafin gobe. Maimakon ya tafi part
dinsa yayi aikin acan kawai sai ya samu kansa da zama a dining, part of him wants
to do the work and the other part yana son zuwa suyi hira da humairah. Ya zauna dai
ya fara aikin kamar gaske sai kuma ya kura wata a cikin yaran gidan ya aike ta ta
kira masa Humairah, sai bayan 'yar aiken ta tafi kuma sai ya fara tambayar kansa
mai yasa ya aika ayi kiranta? Me zata yi masa in tazo? Bata jima ba sai gata, ta
tsaya daga dan nesa tayi masa sallama ya amsa ba tare daya dago ba, ta cigaba da
tsaiwa a gurin sannan ya dago yayi mata kallo daya. Doguwar riga ce dark green a
jikinta mai adon stones a kirji da hannayenta. Ta daura veil din mayafin a kanta a
matsayin dan kwali sai kuma tayi rolling farin mayafi, guskarta fes babu kwalliya.
Sai kawai yaji yana so yacigaba da kallonta, yace "have a seat. Ko soja kika zama
yau" ta karaso ta zauna a farthest chair from him, ya cigaba da aikin gabansa amma
yana jin idanuwanta a kansa, lokaci daya ya dago kansa dan ya kamata ai kuwa ya
kamata din, tayi saurin wayancewa da wasa da hannunta, yayi murmushi a ransa yace
"yarinya sai shegen kallo". Ya ajiye pen din hannunsa yace "na gaji Humairah. Ko in
baki ki tayani?" Ta girgiza kanta, yace "why?" Tace "ban iya ba ai ni" yace "kinsan
me yasa na kiraki?" Ta girgiza kanta, sai kuma ya tambayi kansa a ransa 'me yasa na
kirata?' A fili kuma yace "so nake kiyi min hira. Kinga aikin nan is so boring. Ki
bani wani labari mai dan dadi mana" tayi shiru tana tunani sai kuma tace da sauri
"bara in baka labarin film din da muka kalla jiya ni da Basma" ya bata rai yace "ni
bana son labarin film, film din bayan duk karyace a ciki, tell me something real,
something sweet kamar labarin rayuwarki" nan take yaga fuskarta ta chanza, yace
"ina nufin ki gaya min a ina aka haifeki, a ina kika yi nursery da primary, a ina
kika yi secondary" ta fara jujjuya hannayenta a guri daya, ya lura duk spirit dinta
ya bar jikinta. Ya gyara zaman sa yace "ina jinki, ko dama ke marowaciya ce ban
sani ba zaki yin rowar labarinki?" Ta hadije yawu tace "ban san a ina aka haife ni
ba nima. Ban kuma yi nursery school ba" ta yi shiru, yace "primary nko?" Tace "nayi
makarantu da yawa ai, ban san wacce zan gaya maka ba" yace "har nawa kika yi
makarantun?" Tace daga kanta tana tunani sai kuma ta fara lissafawa da 'yan
yatsunta sannan ta kalle shi tace "biyar" ya bude ido yace "only for primary
school" ta gyada kai, yace "why? Me yasa ake chanza miki makarantu har haka?" Ta
jima tana kallon hannunta sannan tace "we moved a lot. So duk inda muka koma sai a
chanza min makarantar da tafi kusa damu" a ranta kuma ta tuna cewa sometimes rashin
biyan kudin makaranta ne yake sawa a kore ta daga makarantar maimakon kuma a biya
sai a chanza mata wata. Ya tuno wata headmistress har saida ta kawo wa mamanta
police aka ce lallai ta biya kudin da ake binta a cikin satin, cikin dare ta hada
musu kayansu wani yazo ya dauke su a mota suka bar unguwar. Ya katse mata tunaninta
da cewa "secondary kuma fa? Guda nawa kika yi?" Shima ta lissafa sannan tace masa
"seven" ya bude baki kawai yana kallonta amma wannan karon bai tambayeta dalili ba
sai yace "ajinki nawa yanzu" ta daga kafadarta alamar bata sani ba, yace "ban gane
baki san ajinki nawa ba?" Tace "duk makarantar da aka kaini in sun yi min interview

Tsakanin gidan Yasaiyadi da gidan Mr Ojo akwai tazara sosai, amma haka na tafi a
kafa ni kadai, gashi dare yayi dan haka na ringa tafiya ina jin tsoro amma burina
daya shine in je gurin mamana, I didn't even care anymore akan me Ojo zaiyi min.
Ina zuwa unguwar na je har gate nayi knocking kaina tsaye, mai gadi ya bude ya

A bangaren Al'ameen kuma tunanin Humairah ne fal a cikin zuciyarsa. She have

komai sannan kuma sai ya hada ta dashi dan ya gwada shi yaga yadda zaiyi da ita?
Insha Allah shi kuma zai ci wannan jarabawar, he is going to share everything da
yake dashi a rayuwa with her, his family, his ilimi, his tarbiyya, his kudi and his
life.

Yasan akwai challenges da yawa da zai fuskanta kafin ya cika burinsa. Challenge na
farko shine yadda zaiyi convincing wannan stubborn girl din da take zaune kusa
dashi ta amince da bukatarsa, it is going to be a too challenge amma zaiyi iya
kokarinsa. Challenge na biyu shine family dinsa. Baya jin Mami, she is soft
hearted, yasan yadda zaiyi ya lallabata ta amince da bukatarsa, in dai Mami ta

shawo kansa. Wadanda yake jin tsoro sune grandparents dinsa, especially his

gurinsa ba, kuma yana cewa no then Daddy da mami suma zasu ce no dan basa taba
bijirewa maganarsa. Bayan shi kuma sai dragon lady, his maternal grandmother,

ballantana someone like Humairah, yasan kallo daya zata yiwa Humairah tayi
dismissing dinta musamman idan tayi wata kwabar a gabanta. Gashi kuma tun bayan
rasuwar mijinta 'ya'yanta sai wani ji da ita suke suna wani lallabata kamar kwai
dan haka maganarta tabbatacciya ce.

Bayan wannan kuma sai maganar da ya riga yasan ana shiryawa a family, Mommy is the
one behind it all. Yasan anyi masa mata kuma yasan wacece matar kuma baya sonta,
baya sonta a matsayin matar aure amma baiyi magana bane ba saboda har yanzu babu
wanda yayi masa maganar officially. Yanzu yasan shigo da maganar Humairah shine zai
tayar da waccan maganar.

A haka suka karasa gida, suka yi packing suka fito a tare ba tare da kowa yayi wa
dan uwansa magana ba saboda kowa yana lissafin abinda zasu tarar a cikin gidan.
Al'ameen ya kama handle din kofa ya murda sai yaji shi a bude, ya tura kofar a
hankali sannan ya dan leka yana karewa falon kallo, babu kowa amma fitila a kunne

shan coffee din, ai kuwa suka hada ido, tana zaune ta dira kafa daya kan daya
hannunta rike da cup ga wayarta kuma a ajjiye a gabanta. Mami. Humairah ma ta
ganta, dan haka ta tsaya chak tana boye fuskarta a bayan Al'ameen.

Mami ta ajjiye cup din hannunta sannan ta mike tsaye ta karaso gabansu tana
assessing dinsu, she took in kumburarriyar fuskar Humairah da jajayen idonta, da
kuma dattin da kafarta da kasan rigarta suka yi kamar wadda tayi gudu babu takalmi,
sannan ta mayar da kallonta kan Al'ameen, babu guilt ko kadan a fuskarsa sai ma
wani stubborn determined look wanda bata saba gani a fuskarsa ba ta gani, it makes
him look more like his father. Ta sake kallin Humairah tace "jeki daki, Aisha tana
nemanki" sum sum Humairah ta wuce ciki, she hates been assessed by those piercing
eyes.

Tana shiga ciki Mami ta juyo tana kallonsa, ya sauke idonsa kasa yace "Daddy fa?"
Ta koma ta zauna akan kujera sannan tace "yana bacci, bai yi bed check ba saboda
ana biki" ya karaso ya zauna a gefenta daga kasa sannan tace "daga ina kuke? Ina ka
dauki 'yar mutane ka kaita daga gurin dinner?" Yace "babu inda na kaita Mami. Muna
bakin titi a zaune" ta bata fuska tace "kuna zaune a bakin titi kuna me cikin daren
nan? Ina kuma wayoyinku suke?" Yace "we were just talking Mami, wayoyin mu suna

bace ba. When I asked you to befriend Humairah ban taba tsammanin something like

determination, ya maimaita "I am going to marry her. This is what I want" ta sauke

Episode 58: Facing the Challenges
A ranar kusan mutane hudu ne basu samu cikakken bacci ba a gidan. Na farkon su
Al'ameen. Tunda ya shiga dakinsa har yayi wanka ya kwanta yana tunanin maganganun
da sukayi da Humairah a ransa, ya maimaita conversations dinsu a kansa har ba
adadi, and the more he thought about it the more yake kara jin son aurenta. A
lokacin daya kwanta da niyyar yin bacci kuwa baccin kin zuwa yayi, lokacin da yazo
kuma sai yazo masa da mugayen mafarkai, in yayi mafarkin Humairah as she was
attacked by Mr Ojo, sai ya farka a tsorace, in ya koma baccin kuma sai ya yi
mafarkinta tana bin bola tana tsintar abinci. Next baccin kuma sai ya ganta a
kwance a kan kwali tana makyarkyatar zazzabi tana kiran sunansa. It went on and on
dole ya hakura da baccin dan har an fara kiraye kirayen sallah. Ya tashi yayi
alwala ya saka kayansa ya fita masallaci.
Humairah tana shiga dakin da Aisha take ta tarar da ita a zaune a bakin gado da
waya a hannu, fuskarta cike da tsananin damuwa. Tana shiga ta tashi da sauri ta
rungume ta tana sauke ajjiyar zuciya sannan kuma ta sake ta ta fara jero tambayar
"daga ina kike? 'Bata kika yi? Wani abin ya same ki? Tell me" Humairah ta sunkuyar
da idonta kasa tana jin babu dadi a ranta, tana jin bata kyauta wa Aishan ba da har
ta shagala da magana da Al'amee ta manta yadda Aisha ta damu da ita. Tace "babu
abinda ya sameni. Kiyi hakuri ban san dare yayi har haka ba" Aisha tace "to daga
ina kike?" Tace "muna tare da Ya Ameen, muna ta magana dashi bamu san dare yayi ba.
Kiyi hakuri Aunty Aisha" Aisha ta koma ta zauna a bakin gado tana kallon Humairan,
sai kuma ta sunkuyar da kanta kasa tana tunani "Al'ameen? Tasan Al'ameen tun yana
yaro, tasan irin upbringing dinsa amma hakan ba yana nufin ta yarda dashi 100% ba,
he shouldn't have kept Humairah with him for this long, amma kuma ba zata iya
accusing dinsa ba because of his family, familyn sa sunyi mata komai a rayuwa. She
will investigate menene a tsakaninsa da Humairah amma ba yanzu ba, ba cikin taron
biki ba. Later.
Mami bayan sun rabu da Al'ameen direct dakin Daddy ta tafi, tana jin wani iri a
ranta. Who is that girl? Really who is she? How can she change Al'ameen a cikin
awanni kadan? Me ta gaya masa? Me tayi masa? Ita dai a iyakacin sanin ta Al'ameen
bai taba boye mata wani abu ba, ko laifi yayi in dai ta tambayeshi to zai gaya mata
gaskiya, wani abun ma bata tambayeshi ba haka kawai zai zauna yayi ta bata labaran
abubuwan da yayi daga nan ita kuma sai ta bashi shawara mai kyau. Amma yau direct
yace ba zai gaya mata labarin Humairah ba, why? And then he said he wants to marry
her. Marry her. Ita tasan shi kansa Al'ameen yasan abinda ya fada din is near
impossible amma still ya fada with so much confidence. Look din data gani a
fuskarsa shine yafi komai tayar mata da hankali. He looked dead serious. She must
investigate yarinyar nan. Amma ba yanzu ba. Later. Haka ta kwanta tayi ta juyi ta
kasa bacci, ga tunanin rabuwa da 'yar guda dayan 'yarta gobe, ga kuma wannan
sabuwar maganar ta Al'ameen. A haka har Daddyn su Al'ameen ya farka yana tambayarta
abinda ya hana ta bacci, bata son tayar masa da hankali cikin daren nan dan haka ta
gaya masa cewa gajiya tayi da yawa. Da kansa ya tashi ya dauko mata paracetamol
tare da ruwa da maganin bacci bayan tasha kuma ya tabbatar tayi baccin sannan shima
ya koma.
Yau ne ranar daurin aure, kuma ranar da za'a kai amarya. Wannan yasa kusan duk
mutanen da suka kwana a gidan basu koma baccin safe ba. Kowa daga ya tashi sallar
asuba shikenan kuma sai a hau shirye shirye. Humairah ma haka. Tana tashi tayi
sallah tayi karatun alqur'ani kamar yadda ta saba sannan tayi morning azkar dinta.
Tana gamawa ta fara gwaran dakin da suka kwana ita da Aisha, a lokacin ita kuma
Aisha ta fita dan taya Mami hidimar kula da ba'kin ta. Ko da second daya abinda ya
faru jiya bai bar zuciyar Humairah ba, tayi iya kacin kokarinta gurin ganin ta
ajiye maganar a gefe dan ta samu damar fuskantar yau amma ta kasa. Babu abinda take
gani a idonta sai fuskar Al'ameen sanda yake cewa "will you marry me?" And she kept
repeating to herself "No" sometimes har a fili take fadar no din. Tana gama gyaran
dakin ta shiga wanka, ta fito ta shafa mai ta saka powder ta kashe maikon fuskarta
sannan ta saka lip gloss. She is not a make up person, dama duk kwalliyar bikin yi
mata akeyi yau kuwa a wannan mood din nata bata jin zata bari ayi mata wannan
kwalliyar. Ta dauko kayan data tanada saboda yau ta saka, doguwar riga ce ta
material mai laushi, cream color. Tana sakawa ta kalli kanta a madubi, abinda ta
gani baiyi mata dadi ba sam, gabadaya rigar tabi jikinta, ta dauko mayafin data
tanada saboda rigar ta yafa taga ko rabin abinda take so ya rufe bai rufe din ba.
Tayi ajjiyar zuciya ta zauna a bakin gado tayi tagumi, inama inama, inama mutum
yana chanza halittarsa ita dai kam data chanza tata, data mayar da siffar ta irin
na matan nan masu fasalin one wadanda maza basu fiya kallon suba, data chanza farar
fatarta zuwa baka yadda ba zata dauki hankalin mutane sosai ba. Inama inama. Sai
kuma tayi sauri tayi istigfar, ta tuna yasaiyadi ya taba fada mata cewa duk abinda
Allah ya halitta ya halicce shine saboda dalilin da shi kadai ya barwa kansa sani.
Ta tashi ta sake kallon kanta a madubi, idonta ya sauka kan hips dinta, kullum
kamar kara musu girma akeyi, ita ba girman nasu ne yake damunta ba irin yadda suke
rawa with every move da tayi making. Gaskiya ba zata iya yawo da wannan mayafin ba
dan haka tayi shawarar komawa dakin Basma ta samu wani mayafin a cikin kayan ta da
suke can. Tana fita falo tayi regretting decision dinta dan palon a cike yake fal
da mutane kamar ba yanzu gari ya waye ba, some of them already sun shirya wadansu
kuma suna shiryawar, wasu kuma har sun fara hidimar kai abinci cikinsu. Sai taga
kamar duk ita suke kallo, haka ta lallaba ta wuce su ta shiga part din Mami har da
turo kofa amma me? Can ma a cike yake, kofar dakin Basma a bude sai hayaniya ce
take tashi daga ciki. Ta shiga a hankali tare da sallama amma babu wanda ya amsa
saboda babu wanda ya lura da shigowar tata. Fiye da rabin 'yammatan babu kaya a
jikinsu, wasu zasu shiga wanka wasu kuma sun fito daga wankan suna shiryawa. Basma
bata dakin. Humairah ta tsallaka zuwa wardrobe ta bude ta dauko abinda take bukata
ta rufe sannan Basma ta shigo. Tace "Humairah jiya ina kika tafi? Ana cikin dinner
muka neme ki muka rasa mukayi ta kiran wayarki baki dauka ba. Ni dai har nayi bacci
baki dawo gidan nan ba ina kika je?" Sai da tayi tambayar sannan tayi regretting,
dan gabadaya hankalin 'yammatan ya dawo kan Humairah duk sunyi shiru kamar ruwa ya
cinye su suna jiran amsar Humairah, sometimes surutu ma dai baiyi ba. Humairah tayi
shiru tana kallon audience dinta, farko taji tsoro sai kuma taji to meye abin tsoro
a ciki? It is not as if tayi laifi ne. Ta cire karamin mayafin jikinta ta mayar da
babban data dauko sannan tace cikin nutsuwa "babu inda naje Basma, muna tare da Ya
Ameen" da sauri wata a gurin tace "tare da Ya Ameen? Doing what?" Humairah ta
kalleta cikin ido ta amsa "sitting by the road side, talking" ita ma kuma ta bata
amsa "Talking? Wacce irin magana kuke yi da Ya Ameen for hours?" Humairah tayi
hanyar fita daga dakin, a ranta tana cewa 'abinda mukayi magana a kansa is non of
your concern' tana jin yarinyar tana cewa "hey, am talking to you. Me Ya Ameen din
yace miki" ta juyo tana kallonta tace "I did most of the talking. Sai a karshe yayi
magana" yarinyar ta mike tsaye, zasuyi kusan tsaho daya da Humairah amma Humairah
ta fita jiki. Tace "yace me?" Humairah tace "He asked me to marry him" shiru dakin
yayi, Humairah zata iya rantsewa wadansu a gurin sun daina numfashi, tana lura da
yadda fuskar yarinyar gabanta tayi fari tas, ta kalli Basma wadda itama tayi
mutuwar tsaye a gurin da take tace "I said No" sannan ta juya ta fice daga dakin.
Sai da akayi kusan second goma bayan fitar Humairah babu wanda yace komai a dakin
gaba daya hankalin su yana kan yarinyar da sukayi magana da Humairah. Sunanta

nake yi ko matsayin friend a bani amma an hanani. Tace wai ba'a friends da mace da
namiji shine na kawo ta gurinki tunda ke macece sai ki zama friend dinta" Husna
tace "na kuwa gode, na karbi wannan babbar kyauta" nan ta kama hannun Humairah suka
shige ciki. An dan jima kadan sai ga maigidanta nan ya fito ya shiga da Al'ameen
shima.
Anan suka zauna, suka yi sallolinsu sannan suka ci tarin abincin da Husna tayi ta
lodo musu, nan ma dai Humairah da kyar taci gani take kamar Al'ameen ya saka mata
ido da yawa. Suna kammalawa yace ta tashi su tafi. Nan Husna ta jata gefe ta rike
hannunta duk biyun tace "I don't know you amma zan baki shawara. Karki yarda
Muhammad ya kubuce miki. Muhammad irin mazan da mata da yawa can do anything dan su
samu irinsa ne. He is a rare gym. Babu abinda mace take so a gurin namiji wanda
Muhammad bashi dashi, kuma to me zan iya cewa yana sonki dan ba mace ba ko namiji
ba kula mutane yake yi ba, nima yau nasan darajar kun shigo gari tare yana neman
inda zai kaiki kiyi sallah ne yasa yazo gidana amma dashi kadai ne koda wasa ba zan
saka ran zuwansa ba. Kar ki barshi ya kubce miki, like I said, he is a rare gym".
Har suka tafi Humairah tana ta juya kalaman Husna a ranta, a rare gym, wannan shine
babban dalilin da yasa ba zata karbeshi ba, he is much too much for her.
A gurin biki kuwa sosai ake shagali, dan masarautar kano ta shirya wa gimbiyar
masarautar Abuja tarba ta musamman. Tamkar wani sabon bikin ake sakewa. Cikowar
taron da hayaniya ne ya saka amarya Basma sam bata lura da rashin Humairah a tare
da ita ba. Ita kuma Aisha a gurin da aka sauke su a matsayinsu na iyayen amarya duk
a tunaninta Humairah tana tare dasu Basma. Amma duk wannan bai hana Khausar lura da
rashin Humairan ba. Tun lokacin da Al'ameen ya bata aikin kula da activities din
Humairah take nemanta amma ta rasa ta, a jirgi ma daya byan daya ta bi 'yammatan
amaryar amma sam babu Humairah a cikin su, duk wanda ta tambaya kuma amsar daya ce
"ban ganta ba wallahi". Har aka zo gurin reception din da aka shirya amma bata ga
Humairah ba, bata damu da rashin Al'ameen ba saboda dama tasan ba zuwa zaiyi ba,
shi ba mutum ne mai shiga irin wadan nan abubuwan ba. Ta samu guri ta zauna yadda
zata ke ganin duk masu shiga da fita daga gurin, a lokacin ne Bassam ya hango ta ya
taho gurinta ya zauna. Yace "kinsan dai ba zuwa zaiyi ba ko? Gwara ma ki saki jiki
kiyi harkokin ki ki manta dashi" ta juyo ta danyi tsaki tace "bashi nake nema ba
kai kuma, wannan yarinyar nake nema, Humairah take kowa?" Bassam ya dan bata rai
yace "me yasa kike nemanta?" Nan Khausar ta bashi labarin duk abinda ya faru,
abinda Humairah ta gaya musu da kuma abinda Al'ameen ya gaya mata. Gabadaya yanayin
Bassam ya chanza, tausayin Khausar yaji sosai har cikin ransa, wato ya Ameen
playing dinta yake yi, he shouldn't have, in baya sonta kawai ya gaya mata baya
sonta ba wai yake wasa da hankalinta ba, and that munafukar yarinyar Humairah,
munafuka, farkon xuwanta gidan sosai yake jin tausayinta saboda tare dashi aka
dauko ta daga orphanage amma tun ranar da ya ganta dakin Ya Ameen yaji ya tsane ta,
sam bai yarda da ita ba, gani yake babu alkhairi sam a tare da ita. Ganin da yayi
musu tare ita da ya Ameen dazu a Abuja yasa ya fara zargin akwai wani abu a
tsakanin su, yanzu kuma maganganun Khausar sun tabbatar masa da zarginsa, he must
do something, he must put and end to this.
Ya juya ya kalli Khausar yace "don't worry sweet Khausar, zan taya ki gadin ta, duk
abinda na gani zan gaya miki ke kuma sai ki gaya masa" ya dan dora hannunsa a
kafadarta yace "and don't worry, ba wadda zata kwaci Ya Ameen a hannun ki" ta kalli
hannunsa dake kan kafadarta sannan ta kalli fuskarsa, ya mike tsaye ya mayar da
earpiece dinsa sannan ya bar gurin.
Daga gidan Husna maimakon Al'ameen ya taho da Humairah palace gurin biki sai ya
tafi da ita yawo a gari. Su shiga ta wancan titin su fita ta wannan, duk inda suka
je sai yayi mata bayani, wani gurin tace masa ta sani, wani tasan sunan amma bata
taba zuwa ba. A haka suka yi ta zagaya gari, ga mamakinsa sai ga Humairah tana masa
hira har da dariya. A haka har suka hau titin zoo road, yana gaya mata tace "I
know, I lived here once" ya ce "ina ne gidan?" Ta fara yi masa kwatance tiryan
tiryan har kofar wani dan madaidaicin gida, suka yi packing tana ta kallon gidan,
yace "kina so ki shiga?" Ta girgiza kai tace "there is nothing left for me there.
It is just one home among others dana zauna a ciki" yace "hey" ta juyo suka hada
ido yace "kin gama zama a kowanne gida, kina jina? You are home now".
Daga nan sai ya shiga da ita Ado Bayero mall, yace tayi siyayyar abinda duk take so
amma taki siyan komai, shi kuma sai ya zama duk abinda yaga ta dauka ta duba sai ya
dauka ya saka mata a basket ko da kuwa bai san amfanin sa ba. Data gane abinda yake
yi sai ta daina ta ba komai sai kawai ya koma daukar mata duk abinda yaga yayi masa
kyau. A haka har suka je wani gurin kayan sawa, anan taga wata p cap red anyi wa
rim dinta ado da golden, a tsakiyar fuskarta anyi rubutu da golden "perfect" kawai
sai ta dauka ta saka a basket din, ya dauka yana kalla yace "wannan fa?" Bata juyo
ba tace "naga kamar zata yi maka kyau".
Har tayi masa nisa yana tsaye rike da hular a hannunsa yana murmushi. He is getting
somewhere, tunda har taga abu tayi tunanin zaiyi masa kyau then he is definitely
getting somewhere.

Aisha_Humairah
By
Maman Maama
Episode 60: The Brothers
Ina neman afuwar jina da kukayi shiru kwana biyu, na samu matsalar waya ne amma
yanzu alhamdulillah. Ku sani, na fiku damuwa da ganin mun kammala wannan littafin.
Kuma ku sani, duk abinda nayi inayi ne iyakacin kokari na. Nagode da soyayyarku
gareni da littattafaina. Allah yabar zumunci.
Tunda Aisha taje reception take baza idon ganin Humairah amma shiru. Tayi ta bin
kawayen amarya tana dubawa amma babu Humairah babu labarinta. Sai taji babu dadi a
zuciyarta, taji kamar tayi sakaci da lamarin Humairah, she should have made sure
Humairah ta taho kafin ita ta taho, dan a yanzu tunaninta yafi karkatuwa ga cewa
Humairah bata taho daga abuja ba, dan last ganin da tayi mata ma bacci take yi a
kan gado. Ta samu guri ta zauna ita kadai tana kara gwada number Humairah wadda har
yanzu bata shiga. Tana nan zaune kiran aunty Bilki ya shigo mata, ta dan yi tsaki
kadan, ba haka taso ba, taso ace ta nuna wa su aunty Humairah saboda tana so taga
yadda zasu yi reacting, shin suma zasuga abinda take gani a tare da yarinyar ko
kuwa ita kadai ce take gani?
Ta dauki wayar suka sanar da ita sun iso sannan ta fita ta shigo dasu. Suna ta
kalle kallen tsari da haduwa irin na gidan sarautar kano, duk da kasancewarsu
kanawa amma basu taba shigowa gidan ba sai yau, dalilin wa dalilata. A gurin
reception din ta samar musu gurin zama sannan ta tabbatar an gabatar musu da
abubuwan ci da sha sannan ta zauna ta gaishe da aunty, Zahra da Sa'adiyya kuma suka
gaisheta. Sannan suka kama hirar su ta zumunci, most hirar akan sabon gidan da
Aishan ta ginawa Abba a dutse ne, katon gidan ne flat mai dauke da parts uku, part
din Abba da Mama a hade, sai part din baki in anyi, sai kuma part din da Aisha ta
gina saboda ita da yayanta da mijinta in sunzo gari. A gaban gidan kuma Nura ya
gina wa Abba manyan shaguna guda biyu, daya na kayan masarufi, tun daga kan kayan
abinci zuwa duk abin amfani na yau da gobe, daya kuma na sitiru, atampopi,
shaddoji, laces, takalma, da sauran makamantansu. Yanzu Abba an daina saida gwanjo,
wannan mummunar 'yar tasa da baya so yanzu ita tayi masa rana, kyakykyawar kuwa
tana can yawon duniya. An gama komai har curtains an saka, mai furnitures ne yake
ta bata musu lokaci. Aunty Bilki tace "ni ban ma san dalilin da yasa kika bashi
aikin ba, da kin kawo nan anyi miki, menene banbancin kano da dutse? Minti nawa ne
an kai can din" Aisha taace "wallahi aunty Abba ne ya dage sai an bashi, wai
mutumin sane gwara a bashi shima ya samu dan wani abu" Sa'adiyya tace "ai kuwa
gashi nan ya nuna muku halin 'yan Adam, basu san alkhairi ba" Zahra tace "to yanzu
ya za'ayi maganar walima?" Aisha tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace "dole a daga ta, yanzu
nan da kwana uku zan koma India, zuwa lokacin da zan kammala in dawo ai nasan duk
abinsa ya gama by then, kinga sai a tare kawai". Walima sosai Aisha take so ta
shirya, so take ta gayyaci danginta na both barin uwa da uba saboda ayi zumunci dan
aiyuka sun mata yawa sam bata samun damar yin zumunci yadda ya kamata. Sannan tana
so ta gabatar musu da Humairah duk da bata san irin karbar da zasu yi mata ba, dan
bata ji dadin abinda Abba ya gaya mata a waya ba sanda ta bashi labarin adopting
Humairah da tayi. "Haka kawai dan nema wa kai Aisha sai ki kwaso yarinyar da baki
san ko wacece ba ki kawo ta gidanki? Idan kuma mayya ce fa taje ta kama su Junaidu
ta bar mu da salati? Ko kuma ta shirya miki makirci ta rabaki da mijinki? Gaskiya
ni dai ban amince da wannan batu ba, ku tattarata ku mayar da ita inda kuka dauko
ta" anan suka tsaya da maganar, kuma tasan yayi shiru ne saboda tafiyar da tayi
amma yanzu tana dawowa zai dora daga inda ya tsaya.
Bayan su aunty Bilki sun gama ne Aisha ta kaisu gurin Basma suka gaisa suka yi mata
fatan alkhairi tare da alkawarin zuwa suga dakinta in komai ya lafa, daga nan Aisha
ta musu rakiya suka tafi ita kuma ta dawo gurin taron.
Su Humairah basu zo fada ba sai da aka fara kiran magrib, suna zuwa gurin da aka
tanada saboda ajiye motoci yayi packing ya juyo yana kallonta tana ta kalle kallen
gurin da kuma mutanen da suke ta shige da fice a gurin, sai yaga fuskarta ta kara
yi masa kama data babies musamman yadda kwantaccen gashin daya kwanta a goshinta ya
zagaye fuskarta, ya dauke kansa yana jin wani abu yana taba zuciyarsa. Yace "ki
gyara dankwalinki, gashinki ya fito" nervously ta jawo dankwalinta gaba, sannan
yasa dankwalin ya sakwarkwace, Al'ameen ya danyi murmushin mugunta, a ransa yace
"at least she looks less desirable now". Sannan a fili yace mata "ki shiga ciki, ni
ba shiga zan ba" a take yanayinta ya chanza, ta kwabe fuska kamar zata yi kuka tace
"dan Allah Ya Ameen kazo ka rakani, ni wannan katon gidan ina zan dosa a cikinsa?"
Yace "ki kira basma sai ta gaya miki inda suke, ko ta turo a tafi dake" ta nuna
masa wayarta tace "wayata ta mutu fa" yace "OK. Kinga waccan kofar tanan zaki
shiga, in kin shiga cikin gidan sai ki tambayi inda ba'ki suke, simple" ya fada
yana nuna kofar da yaga mutane suna ta shige da fice daga ciki. Ta sake rikice masa
"dan Allah ka rakani. Inna shiga ni kadai koro ni zasu yi, kuma gashi babu waya a
hannuna, dan Allah ya Ameen kar ka tafi ka barni" sai kawai ya samu kansa da bude
kofa ya fito, sai kuma yaji haushin kansa, dan yasan da ace Basma ce take masa
wannan shagabar da sai ya hankadata waje sannan yayi tafiyarsa ya barta. Ya kalli
mutanen gurin, sam baya son a gane shi ballantana har hankalin mutane yayo kansa,
normally babu yadda za'ayi ya shiga wannan turmutsutsun amma gashi yau dole ta kama
shi, a hankali yace "things we do for love" sai kuma yayi mamakin kalmar love din
daya fada. Ya dauko hular da Humairah ta daukar masa ya saka, ya jawo ta kasa sosai

sauri. Suna shiga zauren farko yaji ta rike rigarsa ta baya. A haka suka yi ta
kutsawa cikin mutane, su shiga wannan soron su fito wannan shamakin har suka je na
karshe, suna zuwa waya mata mai hijab kalar kayan dogaran masarautar ta tari
gabansu tace da Al'ameen "nan ne inda maza suke tsayawa, in wata kake nema sai dai
ka aika a kira maka ita" ya dakata ya juya yana kallon Humairah yace "kinji dai ko?
This is my limit" ya kalli cikin gidan yaga katon fili ne mai cike da kayatattun
gine gine, part part, mutane suna ta harkokinsu a farfajiyar gurin. Ya lura da wasu
matan masu kayan dogarai a zaune a gindin wata bishiya can nesa da inda suke, ya
kalli Humairah yace "kinga wadancan matan? Go to them, ki ce musu ina ne inda
ba'kin abuja suke" ta dan yi shiru kamar ba zata tafi ba, sai da yace "I will be
watching you from here har sai kinje gurinsu" ta turo baki "ka rantse da Allah ba
zaka gudu ba?" Ya danyi murmushi yace "I promise" ta fara tafiya a hankali,
hannunta rike da jakar kayanta, yana tafiya tana waigensa har sai da taje gurin
matan. Yana kallo tayi musu magana sai yaga daya daga cikinsu ta tashi ta karbi
jakar hannunta tayi mata alama data biyo ta, still yana tsaye har yaga sun kai
karshen filin sannan matar ta shiga wata kofa. Humairah ta juyo ta kalli inda yake.
Yana tsaye straight da hannayensa a cikin aljihunsa, duhun magrib da duhun kayan
jikinsa sai suka saka fatarsa ta kara haske, tana iya hango golden rubutun jikin
hularsa "perfect" sai taga tayi mata kama da statue, ta danyi masa murmushi sannan
ta daga masa hannu ta shige inda matar ta shiga.
Aisha da Humairah basu hadu ba sai da daddare a gidan Basma. Tsayawa fasalta gidan
bata lokaci ne. What do you expect idan 'yar sarkin Abuja ta auri dan sarkin Kano?
A can gefe Aisha ta hango Humairah, daga ganin ta bata enjoying kanta, da sauri ta

ba, ina kika shiga?" Ga mamakinta sai taga Humairah ta rungume ta tana hawaye. Sam
bata ji dadi ba tunda suka rabu da Al'ameen, tana shiga gurin kawayen amarya aka
kaita wadanda suka nuna tamkar basu santa ba, babu wacce ta kulata ko magana tayi
babu mai amsa mata. Basman da take saka ran jin dadin daga gareta sam bata samu ta
ganta ba dan tunda suka dawo daga reception aka killaceta a wani guri na daban ake
shirya ta dan kaita gidan mijinta. Kuma tana tsoron ta fita neman Aisha kar ta bata
ta kasa dawowa. Dan haka ganin Aisha yanzu sai taji tamkar wata waraka ne daga
cuta. Aisha ta goge mata hawayenta tace "ina wayarki?" Humairah tace "babu charge"
Aisha ta dauko power bank a jakarta ta bata tace "ki saka ta a chagi yanzu, ki
daina barin wayarki babu chargi duk rintsi" Humairah ta gyada kai kawai. Daga nan

san har ta kai haka ba, bata san har Al'ameen yayi wa Humairah alkawarin aure ba.
Tasan Al'ameen tun yana yaro, tun baifi ten years ba, kuma a iya sanin ta bata ta

means it. But this is impossible, totally impossible. Tasan yadda daga iyaye har
kakannin Al'ameen suka dora buri akansa, tasan kuma maganarsa da khausar. For him

nake kallonki, I can give you anything indai abin mai amfani ne a gareki, daga
ranar dana dauko ki daga ranar kika zama 'yata legally, but not Islamically.
Especially not a idon abuja emirate. They already know who you are Humairah. Kuma
babu yadda zanyi in shafe wannan information din daga kawunan su. Abinda nake fada
miki anan shine, Al'ameen is totally not the right choice for you. Familyn sa sun

Kuma in na dawo daga India ina so inji wannan labarin da kika bawa Al'ameen wanda

Kamar yadda Aisha ta tsara haka ne ya kasance. Su Humairah suka tafi abuja ita kuma

kenan. Besides, zata ke dauke min kewar Basma kafin in saba da rashin ta" Aisha ta
bude baki zatayi protesting sai kuma ta kasa, tana jin nauyin mami sosai ta yadda
har bata iya yi mata musu. Ita kuma mami a bangarenta tayi haka ne saboda tana son
ta saka idonta akan Al'ameen da Humairah. Tana son kuma ta kara studying Humairah.
Haka washegari Humairah, Nura, Tj da Junaid suka raka Aisha airport suka dawo,
Humairah na kuka su Tj na kuka, Nura babu wanda ya kula a cikin su ballantana ya
rarrashe su dan shima da da dama da kukan zai zauna yayi.
Haka Humairah tana ji tana gani suka mayar da ita palace su kuma suka wuce gida.
Palace din da yanzu sam ba jin dadin zamansa take yi ba saboda abubuwa da yawa. Na
farko yadda take kin kula Al'ameen duk kuwa da yadda shi din yake nace mata. Na
biyu yadda Bassam kullum yake mata kallon tuhuma duk kuwa da cewa bata yi masa
komai ba, kullum in ta ganshi gani take kamar tayi masa wani laifi, kamar wanda ya
dana mata tarko yake jiran ranar da tarkon zai kamata. Sai kuma irin yadda mami ta
saka mata ido, ga yawan tambayoyi kamar wadda take bincikenta akan wani lamari da
batasan ko wanne ne ba.
Ranar da zata fara zuwa makaranta Nura ne yazo ya dauke ta ya kaita. The same
school dasu Junaid suke nan aka kaita secondary section din ta, makaranta ce mai
kyau da tsada. Haka Nura yayi mata registration da komai na both boko da islamiyya
sections. Suka yi mata interview suka saka ta a SS2 duk da Nura baiso haka ba, shi
gani yake tayi girma da SS2. Islamiyya ma kuma suka saka ta a ajin da suke ganin ya
dace da ilimin ta.
A palace aka bata driver din da kullum zai ke kaita da safe yana dauko ta da yamma.
Daga ta dawo kuma takan zauna a gurin Mami ta dan taya ta hira ko ta taya ta aiki
in ta tarar tana yi. Da magrib tayi zata gudu daki saboda tasan samarin gidan zasu
shigo cin abincin dare, ba zata sake fitowa ba kuma sai gobe in dai ba Mami ce ta
kirata wani abu ba. Al'ameen yasan tana gidan amma sam ya kasa samun ganin ta,
wayarsa ba dauka take ba tunda suka dawo daga kano. In ya tambayi Mami kuma sai
tayi kamar bata ji shi ba. Sai da Humairah tayi kwana hudu tana zuwa makaranta
sannan yasan ta fara zuwa makaranta. Abin yayi masa ciwo dan haka ranar daya dawo
daga masallacin assuba sai ya zauna a saman mota yana jiran fitowarta. Some minutes
after seven ta fito da uniform a jikinta riga da wando da hijab, kafadarta daya
rataye da jaka, hannun ta daya rike da flask daya hannun nata kuma rike da waya
tana tafiya tana dannawa, sai kawai ya samu kansa da jin haushin ganin ta da wando
duk kuwa da cewa hijab din ta ya kai kusan gwuiwarta. Bata lura da shi ba har tazo
zata wuce ta gabansa. Ya sauko daga saman motar a gabanta, wannan yasa ta tsorata
har wayar ta ta fadi kasa, a tare suka sunkuya dauka wannan yasa suka yi gware,
suka dago a tare kowa yana rike da goshinsa, ya fara dariya, har ta fara tayashi
kuma sai ta bata rai ta harde hannayenta a kirjinta. Ya dauko wayar ya mika mata
taki karba, sai ya ajiye akan mota ya saka hannayensa a aljihunsa yana kallonta,
yace "wato abin ya zama haka ko Humairah? Na koma dodo a gurin ki ko? Yanzu ace
harkin fara zuwa makaranta amma ban sani ba, banyi deserving haka daga gareki ba

nata da kallon. Dogayen fingers ne da ita masu dauke da dogayen nails wadanda suka

abinda na gaya maka tun a lokacin, aure na da kai ba zai yiwu ba, ta gaya min

Ta gyada masa kai a hankali. Yaji ransa ya baci, zuciyarsa tayi baki. Ya cire
hannunsa daga aljihu ya fara zagaye a gurin "ni kuma fa? What about what I want? Ba

anjima" ya bita da kallo har ta shige motar da take jiranta.
Ranar Al'ameen wuni yayi zuciyarsa babu dadi. Challenge din sa na farko shine ya
juyo da hankalin Humairah kansa, ya dauka ya fara winning battle din ashe aunty
Aisha zata zo ta warware masa duk tufkarsa. Me yasa mutane ba zasu fahimce shi ba?
Ina ruwan mutane da asalin wadda yace yana so ya aura? A haka har lokacin sallar
juma'a yayi, yaje yayi sallah ya dawo amma ya kasa komai. Ranar ma'aikatan office
dinsa sunsha fada ba tare da sunyi laifi ba. Karfe uku yaga abin ba zai yiwu ba dan
haka ya taho gida.
Humairah yau da wuri ta taso kasancewar yau juma'a. Bayan tayi wanka tayi sallah
taci abinci sai ta dauki takardun ta ta fita gefen gidan cikin bishiyoyi ta saka

amma sai yaga zane a gabanta. Ya saka hannu ya dauka yana dubawa. Zanen wata

Humairah you are an artist. A gifted artist. Me kike yi a sciences bayan ga inda

burinta, and I am going to fulfill it" Ya jingina bayansa a jikin table din,
drawing din still yana hannunsa yace "it is OK. But this, this is where your talent
is" bata ce komai ba. Yace "wacece wannan da kika zana?" Tace "ban santa ba. I just
pictured her in my minds eyes and drew her. Nasan tens of yara kamar ta." Sai kuma
ta rage murya tace "I was like her" daga nan ta mike kamar wadda aka mintsina ta
harhada littattafanta and without another word tayi hanyar cikin gida.
Akan veranda da zata sadaka da kofar Palo taga Bassam, hannayensa akan railers
idonsa a kanta. Da sauri ta wuce shi amma tana dora hannunta akan door knob taji
yace "hey! Come here" ta juya ta kalleshi, irin mugun kallon daya watso mata ne
yasa tayi saurin bude kofar palon ta shige. Bata kai tsakiyar palon ba taji

hannunta, duk kanin su babu wanda ya ganta. Bassam yace yana nuna kusa dashi "zo
nan" Al'ameen ya danyi karamin murmushi, shi yasan babu yadda za'ayi humairah ta
matso kusa da Bassam, bata motsa ba ballantana taje din, cikin fushi Bassam yace
"ba zaki zo ba dan ubanki? Ni abokin wasan kine? Kizo ki gaya min uban me kike yi a
gidan nan, waye ya turo ki gidan mu? Wanne munafunci kike hadawa?" Idonta fes a
cikin nasa, sai hawaye da suke ta zarya a kuncinta, a idon Al'ameen sai yaga tayi
masa kama da yarinyar jikin zanen ta, tace "babu wanda ya turo ni gidan nan, babu
kuma abinda nake hadawa" ya tako ya kara so kusa da ita yace "karya kike munafuka,
menene tsakanin ki da brother dina? Mai kika yi masa? Me kike shiryawa a kansa?"
Still idonta a kansa tace "brother dinka yace yana son ya aure ni, ni kuma nace
bana so, in banda wannan bansan komai a tsakanin mu ba" ya daga hannu kamar mai
dake ta sai kuma ya dunkule hannun ya naushi kujerar kusa dasu yace cikin zafin rai
"ke kin isa? Ke kin isa Ya Ameen ya daga ido ya kalleki? Ke kinsan waye shi kuwa?
Kinsan menene matsayinsa da har zaki ce yace zai aure ki? So kike ki hada shi da
iyayensa? What did you do to him, witch? Manyan 'yammata ma masu ilimi da asali
basu ishe shi kallo ba ballantana ke? Waye ubanki a garin nan? Nace ki fada min
waye ubanki a garin nan inji". Kafin Humairah tayi magana Al'ameen ya baiyana a
side din ta, fuskarsa jajawur kamar in ka taba zaka dangwalo jini.
Kyakykyawan mari Al'ameen ya sauke a side din fuskar Bassam na dama, kafin ya dago
kai ya sauke masa wani a hagu. Mami ta yar da spoon din hannunta ta kara so palon,
a daidai lokacin da suka ji muryar daddy a bayansu, very deep and very confident
"menene yake faruwa anan?"
Humairah ta tsorata, da sauri ta buya a bayan Al'ameen tare da saka hannayenta biyu
ta kankame rigarsa. A hankali tace "wayyo na shiga uku wayyo aunty Aisha".
Wanne hukunci kuke tunanin wadannan iyayen zasu dauka?

Episode 61: The Crown or The Girl
Automatically hannun Al'ameen ya kamo na Humairah ya rike, bata hana shiba illah

ni, ni 'kaninsa Bassam, akan wannan tsintacciyar magen" Daddy ya maida kallonsa kan
humairah, ya gane ta, wannan yarinyar ce da Aisha ta dauko daga orphanage din sa.
Yayi noticing yadda ta rike rigar Al'ameen da kuma yadda ilahirin jikinta yake
rawa. Kafin yayi magana Mami ta riga shi. Tace tana kallon hannun Al'ameen wanda ya

ubanta? Ta mike zaune tana share hawayenta da bayan hannunta, waye ubanta? Itama

Automatically yake tuka motar ba wai dan hankalinsa yana gurin ba, a haka har yaje
