iyalinsa, and so is aunty Hafsat, basu koma ba tunda su ka zo bikin Basma. He is so
not looking forward to this family meeting.
A Palo yayi sallama yaji shiru, babu kowa sai Khausar a kwance a kujera da earpiece
a kunnenta. Sai daya bubbuga kujerar sannan ta juyo, nan take murmushi ya bayyana a
kyakykyawar fuskarta, ta mike zaune "lah, ya Ameen kaine a gidan nan da safe haka"
ya zauna a gefenta yace "to ya zanyi tunda kakarki tayi kira" tayi dariya tace "da
fatan ba laifi kayi ba" ya daga kafada yace "wa ya san mata, ita ana wuce laifi ne
a wajanta? Allah dai yasa ta tashi ba zaman jira zanyi ba" ta mike tsaye tace "ta
tashi, yanzu ta gama break ta shiga wanka, bara in duba maka ko ta fito" ta shiga
wani daki a kasa wanda yanzu yake mazaunin na mommy tunda tace ba zata iya zirga
zurgar sama ba. Bata jima ba ta fito ta sanar masa tana zuwa sannan ta fara hidimar
loda masa kayan ciye ciye a gabansa, tana yi kuma tana tambayarsa ko da akwai wani
specific abun da yakeso "in ma babu sai in girka maka yanzu" yayi murmushi kawai
yace ya gode.
A haka mommy ta same su, ta kalle su ta kuma kalli lodin kayan da suke tsube a
gaban Al'ameen. Tayi karamin tsaki. Taci kwalliya, ga wanda bai santa ba zai iya
tunanin gidan biki zataje. Tana karasowa suka mike tsaye, sai da ta zauna sannan
suka zauna a kasa a gefenta. Al'ameen ya gaisheta, ta amsa masa ba tare da yaji me
tace ba, sannan ta umarci Khausar ta basu guri. Sai da Khausar ta hau sama sannan
ta fara magana "naji abinda kake niyyar yi mana Muhammad. Wato so kake ka debi kasa
ka watsa mana a idanun mu ko? To baka isa ba wallahi. Menene hadin ka da wannan
yarinyar da iyayenka suka kwaso suka kawo gidan?" Kansa a kasa yace "aurenta zanyi"
ta doka salatin da sai da ya firgita, tace "direct kake ce min aurenta zakayi? Ita
kuma Khausar din ka kaita ina? To wallahi baka isa ba kayi kadan, munga babanka ma
gurin taurin kai gashi nan yanzu dolensa ya sauko muna juyashi. To ahir din ka ka
kiyaye ni, zan saba muku da ga kai har iyayen naka" da sauri ya dago kai yace "babu
ruwansu a ciki mommy" tace "rufe min baki, tunda har suka kasa juyaka ai da ruwansu
kenan. To daga yau na yanke duk wata alaka da take tsakaninka da yarinyar nan. Kana
jina?" Yace "yes, mommy" tace "tashi ka bani guri" ya mike ya zuba hannayensa a
aljihu ya nufi stairs, ta bishi da harara tace "yana tafiya kamar mutumin kirki, da
wani tsahonsa kamar daren mutuwa".
A sama, dakin da ya san aunty Hafsat tana zama nan ya tafi. Yayi knocking yayi
sallama sannan ya shiga. Ta na zaune a tsakiyar gado da laptop a bude a gabanta.
Her favorite sitting place, shi bai san me suke ji ita da Mami in sun zauna a
tsakiyar gado ba. Ya zauna a bakin gadon ya gaisheta ta amsa ba tare data kalleshi
ba, a ransa yace itama labarin yazo mata kenan. Sai da ta gama abinda take sannan
ta dago kai ta kalleshi tace "manya manya, maganin kanana kanana" bai ce komai ba,
ta cigaba "sannu da aiki babana, ka kyauta sosai, abinda kayi kayi dai dai, ka nuna
mana cewa kaima ka girma ko? Wai yaushe aka haife ka ne Al'ameen? Ji nake rannan
aka haife ka muka je asibiti muka dauke ka dan mitsitsi a cikin blanket, amma yanzu
har ka isa ka ja mana layi kace ga abinda kake so ga wanda baka so ko? I can
remember ni na fara goge maka kashi, that sticky black stool" ya dora hannu aka
yace "mother!" Tace "don't mother me. Tunda ka nuna ban isa ba. Kawai daga ganin
yarinya sai kace ita zaka aura? Aure fa Muhammad? Wai kai nan har ka isa aure? Ko
don kana ganin kayi tsahon kafa? Yanzu so kake a rushe maganar Khausar ko me?" Yace
"Khausar fa dama ni ban taba cewa ina sonta ba, I don't know where you guys get the
idea cewa ina son Khausar" ta saki baki tana kallon sa "wato kai baka taba cewa ma
kana sonta ba. Lallai Al'ameen abin naka azimun ne" yace "wallahi da gaske nake, ni
ban taba cewa ina sonta ba, ban taba sonta ba" ta bata rai, she seems genuinely
hurt, tace "yanzu ka kalli cikin idona ka gaya min baka son 'yata?" Da sauri yace
"not like that, of cause I love Khausar, ina mata irin son da nake yiwa Basma, like
a sister, nothing more" Aunty Hafsat ta juya kanta tace "it is OK" ya zagayo ta
gabanta yayi kneeling a gaban gado, "please mother help me, it seems like babu
wanda yake goyon bayana a maganar waccan yarinyar, please ki goya min baya ko naji
dadi", ta girgiza kanta tace "I can't do that Muhammad. Innayi haka 'yan uwana zasu
iya jin zafina. Abinda zan iya yi maka dayane, I will take care of your Khausar
problem. Badan kai ba sai don ita, bazan bari a aura mata mijin da baya sonta ba,
bazan bari tayi zaman boranci a gidan mijinta ba" ya mike tsaye, at least an rage
masa wani nauyin. Yayi mata godiya bata amsa ba sai binshi da tayi da harara.
Ya sauko ya tarar da mommy da Khausar suna ta hirarsu suna dariya kamar kawaye.
Yana saukowa mommy ta bata rai, Khausar kuma ta mike tana murmushi, ta dauko wani
flask tace "baka ci komai ba, gashi na hada maka, ka tafi dashi gidan" yayi
murmushi yace "thanks, my sweet sister" sannan ya yi wa mommy sallama ya fita
Khausar ta bishi a baya zata raka shi. Suna fita mommy ta dauko waya ta kira ummie,
kakar Al'ameen ta bangaren uba, suka gaisa kamar yadda suka saba sannan tace "dama
so nake inji in mai martaba yana gari. Ina son inzo ne in ganku akwai wata magana
da zamuyi" ummee tace "Allah dai yasa lafiya, yana gari, zaki iya shigowa da yamma"
daga haka sukayi sallama.
A ranar da magrib Daddy ya amsa kira a gurin Takawa. Da safe Al'ameen ya amsa nasa
shima. Da kyar ya kai kansa cikin gidan dan jikinsa yana bashi ba lfy ba. A palon
mai martaba na ciki ya same shi shida Ummee. Yana kashingide a shimfidarsa ta
alfarma ita kuma tana kusa da kafafunsa tana matsa masa su. Ya gaishe su duka suka
amsa masa babu yabo babu fallasa. Direct Takawa yace "Muhammad munji duk abinda
yake faruwa, Fatima ta gaya mana sai muka kira babanka wanda yayi mana karin bayani
akan maganar. A gurin sa muka fahimci cewa ita yarinyar da kake magana a kanta ma
babu wanda yasan asalinta. Babanka yace ya kashe maganar amma muma zamu jaddada
maka. Ba zamu hana ka aurenta ba tunda addinin mu bai hana maka ba. Amma zamu baka
zabi. In dai har ka nace akan auren yarinyar nan to zamu shige maka gaba gurin
auren ta, amma kuma zamu dauke burin da muka dora akanka na gadon sarautar gidan
nan mu mayar kan daya daga cikin 'yan uwanka, dan ba zamu bari ya kasance
'ya'yanka, wadanda in ka aure ta zasu zamo basu da asali ta bangaren uwa, su
kasance wadanda zasu gaji gidan nan ba. Zabi ya rage naka. Mun gama magana" daga
nan ya gyara kashingidarsa,b
ya lumshe idonsa.

Aisha_Humairah
By
Maman Maama
Episode 62: Family
Tafiya kawai Al'ameen yake yi amma baisan inda yake jefa kafarsa ba. Zai iya cewa
tunda yazo duniya bai taba fuskantar wani abu makamancin wannan ba. Bayi, dogarai
da ma'aikatan gidan suna ta kawo masa gaisuwa amma bai masan suna yi ba har sai da
yasa kafarsa a farfajiyar gidan. Ya daga fuskarsa sama yana jin morning fresh air
tana dukan fuskar tasa, a hankali ya sauke doguwar ajjiyar zuciya sannan ya bude
idonsa yana karewa inda yake tsaye kallo. Sannan ya taka a hankali ya tafi inda
motar da yazo da ita take. Ya tayar da ita, ya dau hanyar komawa gida sai kuma ya
dauke kan motar zuwa gefe yayi packing. Ya fito ya hau saman motar ya kwanta
rigingine ya yi pillow da hannayensa ya rufe idonsa. This is his favorite place na
yin tunani.
Sosai, ya fahimci maganar da Takawa ya gaya masa, ya fahimci tarkon daya dana masa.
Zabi ya ba shi amma zabin dauki inga hankalinka ne. Ba zabi ya bashi tsakanin crown
da Humairah ba, a'a, zabi ya bashi tsakanin Humairah da Family. In har ya zabi
Humairah to Takawa ya samu hujja akan sa cewa ya zabi mace akan all what his family
stands for. And then, in ya fito fili ya zabi Humairah his parents will be
disappointed in him, very disappointed. Tunda suka haife shi training din da suke
yi masa kenan, to be the crown Prince of Abuja, to one day sit on the throne. Idan
ya zabi Humairah tamkar ya debi kasa ne ya watsa a idon mahaifansa, and that is
something he will never do. In ya zabi Humairah the crown will be taken from him
and be given to one of his brothers, but who? Bassam? Daga iyayensu har sauran
dangi sunsan cewa Bassam ba zai iya ba, saboda shi Bassam dan a shana ne aji dadin
rayuwa, sau da yawa yana cewa wai shi tausayin Al'ameen din yakeyi yana kuma murna
daya kasance bashi ne Al'ameen din ba, danshi sarauta haihuwarsa tayi amma ko a
jikinsa baya jinta. Ko kuma Abdallah? His physically challenged brother? In ya zabi
Humairah tabbas yaso kansa da yawa, shi kadai ne zaiyi benefiting tunda ita kanta
yarinyar ba wai sonsa take ba. Zai bata goma ne ba tare daya gyara daya ba. Amma
kuma zai iya? Anya zai iya rayuwa babu Humairah kuwa? Daga inda yake yana hango
quarters din bayi, suna ta harkokinsu, sai kawai yaji yana envying dinsu, sune Bayi
but at least they are free to chose wanda suke so su aura among themselves.
Sai da rana ta tarar da inda yake sannan ya tashi ya koma mota ya karasa gida. Yana
packing Bassam yana fitowa daga gidan, daga dukkan alamu makaranta zai tafi. Tun
daga yanayin fitowar Al'ameen daga mota Bassam ya san babu lafiya. Ya karaso kusa
dashi da sauri yace "ya Ameen lafiya? Are u ill?" Al'ameen yayi masa kallo daya ya
wuce shi, sai kuma ya juyo ya dan bubbuga kafadarsa yace "well-done Bassam, aikinka
yayi kyau kayi kokari" ya juya ya cigaba da tafiya, Bassam ya kuma tarar gabansa
yace "ya Ameen daga ina kake wai? Me ya same ka?" Al'ameen ya dan yi masa karamin
murmushi yace "inda kaje kakai karata, daga can nake. Kuma ina yi maka albishir da
cewa kaci nasara, congratulation" Bassam ya fara gane inda maganar ta dosa dan haka
sai ya fara kokarin kare kansa "ya Ameen komai nayi dan kai nayi shi. Yarinyar nan
bata dace da kai ba. Bata dace da future sarkin mu ba" Al'ameen yace "thanks to
you, am no longer the future king, you are. Congratulations, enjoy the crown" ya
tafi ya bar Bassam da sakakken baki. Sam bai san maganar zata yi zafi har haka ba,
shi tunani yake daga manya sunyi wa Al'ameen magana shi kenan maganar zata wuce. Da
sauri yabi bayan Al'ameen din amma kafin ya tarar dashi har ya shiga dakinsa ya
rufo kofa.
Ranar Al',ameen bai fito lunch ba, amma ba wanda ya damu saboda a dokar gidan zaka
iya missing lunch, dinner ce dai ba'a missing. Amma da lokacin dinner din yazo
shima sai ya zama kujerar Al'ameen empty ce. Nan fa Mami ta fara kiransa a waya but
all his phones are switched off. Amma sai taga Daddy kamar bai damu ba, ta turo
Bassam ya dubo ko motocin gidan babu wata amma sai ya tarar duk sunanan, hakan ya
tabbatar mata da cewa yana gidan kenan, nan take ta aika Abdallah dakinsa yaje ya
kirawo shi. Yayi knocking har sau uku babu amsa, sai ya gwada murda handle din ga
mamakinsa sai yaga kofar ta bude. Duhu ne ya bakunci idanuwansa, fitila a kashe
take kuma curtains gabadaya a rufe suke. Ya lalubi switch ya kunna, take haske ya
gauraye dakin ya bayyanar masa da Al'ameen kwance a kan gado yayi rigingine
kafafuwansa a kasa, idanuwansa a bude kuma tar a kan fuskar Abdallah, babu alamar
bacci ko digo a cikinsu. Nan take Abdallah ya duburburce kafin yayi bayanin me ya
kawo shi Al'ameen ya mike tsaye ya fara zazzaga masa masifar me ya kawoshi dakinsa?
Daga alama ya manta cewa Abdallah ba ji yake ba, haka ya tunkudo Abdallah waje ya
banko kofarsa harda saka key. Abdallah ya daga kafada alamar oho, shi bai san me
yace ba, ya koma ya bawa Mami labarin abinda ya faru. Har ta yunkura zata tashi da
kanta Daddy ya rike hannunta yace "let him be" dan haka dole ta hakura ta koma ta
zauna amma itama sai ta samu kanta da kasa cin abincin.
Washegari da kanta ta shiga kitchen ta shirya masa breakfast tasa aka kai mata
kofar dakinsa sannan taje tayi knocking tayi sallama. Idonsa biyu, yana kwance a
kasa a gaban gadonsa. Sam baya son magana da kowa, amma ba zai taba iya barin Mami
a tsaye a bakin kofa ba, dan haka ya mike ya bude mata kofa ta shigo tana karewa
dakin kallo, babu alamar an gyara dakin kamar yadda shima mai dakin ba alamar
jikinsa yaga ruwa. Ta zauna akan kujera ta harde kafafuwanta sannan tace masa
"dauko abinci a waje" ya fita ya dauko ya dawo gabanta ya ajiye, tace "xuba ka ci"
ba musu ya bude ya fara zuba faten dankalin turawa wanda yasha naman kaji da ganye,
ta sauko ta zuba masa kunu a cup ta mika masa, ya karba yana sha ita kuma ta kara
masa dankalin akan wanda ya zuba. A haka ta tsare shi da ido har sai da ta tabbatar
ya koshi sannan ta rabu dashi. Tace "ina jinka, me ya faru?" Nan ya bata labarin
yadda sukayi da mommy shekaranjiya da kuma yadda sukayi da takawa jiya. Tayi shiru
bata ce komai ba, yace "Mami say something please, ki gaya min yadda zanyi, kar ki
yi shiru ba tare da nasan menene a ranki ba" instead of tayi magana sai ta mike
tsaye tayi hanyar fita, da sauri ya tari gabanta ya yi kneeling yace "dan Allah
Mami kiyi magana, ki gaya min ya zanyi" tace "me kake so ince maka Muhammad? Bayan
duk abinda Daddy ya gaya maka, mommy ta gaya maka, takawa ya gaya maka, ni me kake
so in kara a kai eh?" Take yaji zuciyarsa ta kara sinking, dama the only hope daya
rage masa shine in Mami ta goya masa baya. Ya zauna dabas a inda yake, ta cigaba da
cewa "Abu daya zan tuna maka dashi, abinda na riga nasan cewa ka sani. Yarinyar nan
has suffered a lot, duk da bata taba gaya min labarinta ba amma nasan tasha wahala
a rayuwa. Ya kamata ace wahalarta a rayuwa ta kare, amma ina tabbatar maka cewa
daga ranar daka aureta tamkar ka yanke mata hukuncin daurin rai da rai ne a rayuwar
kunci".
Har wani daren Al'ameen yana dakinsa. Wannan karon Daddy ne da kansa ya aika
Abdallah ya kira shi. Abdallah ya kalli Mami ita kuma ta dauke kanta. Yaje tayi
knocking kamar jiya ya tura kofar ya shiga. Fitila yau a kunne take. Abinda
Abdallah ya fara noticing shine hargitsewar dakin. But unlike yesterday, yau
Al'ameen yana kan sallaya a zaune ya dora kansa a kan gwuiwoyinsa. Da wani drawing
a gabansa, drawing din yarinya mai kama da almajirai a bakin titi. Abdallah yayi
masa signing "food is ready. Daddy yace kazo" maimakon ya tashi sai ya kira
Abdallah da hannu, ya zo ya durkusa a gabansa, Al'ameen ya fara mishi signing
"Abdallah ina cikin matsala. Na fada cikin soyayyar Humairah, so mai tsanani yadda
bana jin zan iya rayuwa sai da ita, kuma kasan wacece Humairah, dan haka duk family
kowa yaki bin bayana akan maganar ta, Daddy, Mami, Mommy, Ummee, Takawa, Bassam duk
basa son alaka ta da ita, ita kanta Humairan ba sona take yi ba, please Abdallah,
kace min kai kana goyon bayana ko naji dadi, at least in na samu ko mutum daya ne a
bayana zan ji dadi a raina. Right now ji nake ji tamkar duk family na sunyi
abandoning dina, ji nake tamkar ni kadai na rage a duniya ta. Please Abdallah, tell
me you are with me". Tun daya fara maganar Abdallah ya yi shiru, ya saki baki, ido
da hanci yana kallonsa, bayan ya gama ma ya jima a haka kafin ya yi signing "pray.
Pray yaya Aminullah, and everything will be alright" sannan ya mike, jikinsa a
sanyaye ya fita, bai taba ganin yayan nasa cikin hali koda makamancin wannan bane
ba.
A palo Al'ameen yana fita yaga fitowar Humairah daga kitchen da plate a hannunta,
suka tsaya shiru suna kallon juna, rabon daya ganta tun ranar da sukayi rigima da
Bassam about 4 days a go, sai yaga kamar ta rame duk da hijab din da yake jikinta.
A hankali yace "how are you?" Sai data fara tafiya sannan tace a takaice "fine" sai
yaji zuciyarsa bata yi masa dadi ba sam, Humairah is not helping matters at all, da
ace tana goyon bayansa at least da sai yafi samun courage din fuskantar
matsalolinsa. A bangaren Humairah kuwa kuka ne ya taho mata shi yasa tayi saurin
tafiya daga inda Al'ameen yake dan kar ya gani. How are you din da yace mata ba
karamin taba zuciyarta tayi ba, she is not fine, dan kwana hudun nan a jere kullum
da kuka take yin bacci, tunda Bassam ya tambayeta waye ubanta har yanzu zuciyarta
ta kasa sakewa, har yanzu zuciyarta damunta take da addabar sanin waye ubanta? Ya
sunansa? Ya kamanninsa suke? Yana sonta ko baya sonta? Yasan da zamanta a duniya ko
bai sani ba? Sannan kuma sai tunanin Al'ameen da yake damunta kwana biyun nan, haka
kawai sai taji tana son tasan ya suka kare da iyayensa rannan, ita babu wanda ya yi
mata bayanin komai, babu wanda yace mata komai, it is as if babu abinda ya faru,
amma tasan something is wrong, Mami ta rage walwala, Al'ameen kuma tun ranar bata
'kara saka shi a idonta ba. Tana so ta tambayi Mami amma ta kasa. Sai yanzu ta
ganshi, kuma bata ji dadin ganin nasa ba saboda sai tagan shi tamkar wanda ya tashi
daga 'yar karamar jinya.
Kwana biyu bayan nan. Humairah tana zaune a waje gurin da ta mayar gurin karatun
ta, ta baza littattafai a gabanta yadda in wani ya gani zai iya dauka da gaske
karatun take yi amma in reality babu abinda take ganewa a karatun. A hankali ta
fara jin taku ana matsowa kusa da inda take, her heart lifted, tayi tunanin
Al'ameen ne amma sai taji different kamshi ba irin nasa ba, ta juya da sauri sai
taga Abdallah, yayi mata dimpled murmushinsa ita ma ta mayar masa duk da bai kai
zuci ba. Ya jawo kujera ya zauna yana facing dinta, mintuna suka wuce a haka. Sai
ya dauko notepad dinsa daga aljihu ya danyi rubutu ya mika mata, ta karanta "me
yasa ba kya son brother d'ina?" Tayi sauri ta kalleshi ya gyada mata kai, the smile
is gone now, kawai sai taji kuka ya taho mata, dama a kusa yake, neman wanda zai
mata magana tayi kuka take. Har ta yi kukanta ta gama ta share hawayenta Abdallah
yana zaune yana kallonta, sai da ta gama sannan ta janyo notepad din tayi rubuta
kamar haka "wayace maka bana sonsa? Ni a suwa zance bana sonsa? I love him. I love
Al'ameen so much. Amma menene amfanin soyayyar? Menene amfanin mutum yaso abinda
yasan ba zai taba samu ba? Al'ameen ya yi min nisa tamkar yadda stars suka yi min
nisa, kamar yadda bazan iya saka hannu in kamo stars ba haka bazan iya samun
Al'ameen ba. He is so perfect. He have everything while I have nothing. I don't
even have a father to begin with" sai kuma ta kifa kanta ta cigaba da kuka. It has
been hard on her. Hard to admit soyayyar ta ga Al'ameen. Amma yanzu data fada din
sai taji tamkar an bude famfo ne, emotions dinta duk suna kara shigarta kuma tana
kara tausayawa kanta, soyayyar abinda kasan ba zaka taba samu ba har abada.
Abdallah ya gama karanta rubutunta, his face still emotionless. Sai ya yi mata
reply "you are wrong. Very wrong. Na farko Al'ameen is not perfect, no body is.
Yanzu da za'a hada ki da Al'ameen a gurin ubangiji maybe kin fishi matsayi, maybe
ubangiji yafi darajantaki akansa. To wacce daraja ce tafi ta ubangiji girma? Ba
shine ya kamata yace kinfi karfinsa ba tunda girman darajarki tafi tasa? And don't
ever say you have nothing, you have everything tunda kina da Allah. Shin Allah
bashi ya bawa Al'ameen daukakar da yake da ita ba? Dan haka duk abinda Al'ameen
yake dashi; asali, mulki, family, kudi, kyau da sauransu duk in Allah yaso a yau
zai iya kwacewa gabadaya ya baki, tunda duk nasa ne, duk arzikinsa muke ci, kuma
yana iya juya lamuransa in an unexpected ways. Al'ameen needs you. He is set to be
the future leader na duk mutanen garin nan but bai san mutanen ba. Baya son mutane
tun yana karamin sa dan haka baya shiga cikin su, and you on the other hand, kin
sha gwagwarmaya a cikin mutane, kin san su sosai, don't you think you are a perfect
match for each other? Ni a ganina ke ce kika dace da shi, saboda ke zaki koya masa
son mutanen da zai mulka. Tayaya kike tunanin zai mulki mutanen da baya so? I am
the smallest in the family, dan haka bani da wani say a cikin wannan maganar, but
from me to you ina so kisan cewa I am 100% behind you. Gobe zan koma makaranta
hutun mu ya kare, I hope kafin in dawo I will be able to call you Yaya Humairah".
Tunda Al'ameen ya fito daga cikin gida ya kalli inda ya saba ganinta Thursdays and
Fridays. Sai gata kuwa ya ganta, amma ita da Abdallah. Yaja ya tsaya yana kallonsu
suna ta rubutu, a ransa yayi tunanin ko maganar me suke yi? Yana kallo Abdallah
yayi dogon rubutu ya mika mata sannan ya mike ya shige gida, har Al'ameen zai tafi
gurinta sai kuma ya dakata ganin kamar kuka take yi, sai yaga ita ma ta ajiye pad
din ta shiga gida da sauri ta kofar baya. Ya kara so gurin yaga duk takardun tane a
barbaje, da pad din Abdallah, sai kawai yaji yana son yasan maganar da suka yi,
yayi tracing hirar tasu sai sunansa ya dauki hankalinsa, ya karanta iyakacin gurin
"I love him. I love Al'ameen so much" ya ajiye pad din tare da rintse idonsa. Ji
yayi kamar iskar gurin d'aga shi tayi sama tana yawo dashi a cikin gajimare. Ya
jima a haka sannan ya bude idonsa ya yi rubutu a kusa da rubutunta "and I love you
too Aisha Humairah".
Daga nan dakinsa ya wuce, ya yi alwala yayi sallah. Sai ya daga hannunsa sama ya
fara addu'ah "Ya Rabbi" sai yaji an turo kofar dakinsa an shigo, amma bai fasa
addu'ar sa ba kamar kullum, ya yi ta bude zuciyarsa zuwa ga ubangijinsa, duk kuwa
da cewa yasan ubangijin yafi shi sanin menene a zuciyar tasa, yana cikin addu'ar
yaji an bude kofar an fita, sai daya shafa sannan ya juyo yaga babu kowa a dakin
amma kamshin da yaji ya tabbatar masa da waye bakon nasa. Daddy.
A dakin ta ya same ta a tsaye bakin window tana waya da Basma. Yanayin yadda taga
fuskarsa ya saka tayi wa Basma sallama ta ajiye wayar. Ta dawo ta zauna akan kujera
ta yi folding hannayenta a cinyarta tana kallonsa. Cikin takunsa na isa ya kara so
inda take amma maimakon ya zauna akan kujerar kusa da ita sai ya zauna a kasa a
gabanta ya harde kafafuwansa. Yace "Al'ameen son yarinyar nan yake yi" kai kawai ta
gyada masa duk da cewa maganar tasa is more of a statement than question. Ya 'bata
rai yace "amma dana tambayeshi me yasa yace zai aureta ce min ya yi taimaka mata
yake so ya yi" Mami ta sauko ita ma ta zauna a gabansa tace "Al'ameen ne fa, sanda
ka tambayeshi am sure shi kansa bai san dalilin ba, shi yasa yace maka taimako
zaiyi" Daddy ya mike ya fara zagaya dakin, yace "he is hurting, I know he is
hurting because I was there before. Nasan ciwon son abinda kake ganin ba zaka samu
ba. A lokacin babu abinda nake bukata fiye da support din iyayena, amma lokacin
bani da support dinsu, and it did hurt me so much. Amma shi yana damu, yana da
whole family dinsa behind him, me yasa ba zamu taimaka masa ba?" Ya dawo ya zauna
yana kallonta, ta girgiza kanta tace "wanne irin taimako zamu yi masa. In muka aura
masa yarinyar nan daga shi har ita ba taimakon su mu kai ba, ni ina tausayin
yarinyar nan sosai, kafi kowa sanin halin gidan sarautar nan, she will forever live
in agony, ga maganar Khausar, wannan zai kara mata kiyayya da dangin mijinta" ya
sake mikewa ya dan yi zagaye sai kuma ya juyo yana kallonta, his brown eyes
shining, yace "duk wanda kika gani a duniyar nan haifarsa akayi, babu wanda ya fado
daga sama, haka ne?" Cikin rashin fahimta tace "haka ne" ya dawo ya zauna ya rike
both hands dinta yace "hakan yana nufin Humairah haihuwarta akayi, tana da uwa kuma
tana da uba, tana da dangin uwa hakazalika tana da dangin uba. They are there
somewhere. As far as we know, they maybe looking for her right now, maybe 'bata
tayi, maybe ma sace ta akayi daga gidan ubanta" ya kara karfin rikon da ya yi wa
hannunta yace "Love, we have the money, we have the power, let's help our son,
let's look for Humairah's parents" ta dago kai suka hada ido, sai kuma a hankali
damuwar fuskarta ta fara kaucewa, murmushi ya bayyana a gurbin damuwar. Wannan
karon itace ta mike tsaye tace "yes, dama shine problem din, saboda ba'asan
danginta ba, in muka samo mata danginta ba Al'ameen muka taimaka ba ita muka
taimaka, kaga mun jefi tsuntsu biyu da dutse daya" yanzu kuma shine ya yi frowning
face dinsa yace "to amma ta ina zamu fara, it is like kamar ba'asan komai a kan
yarinyar ba" ta zauna a bakin gado tace "zamu fara ne ta inda aka tsince ta, zamu
fara ne ta Lagos, karkashin gada, daga nan muyi tracing zuwa inda ta taho, am sure
ba za'a rasa wanda yasan mahaifiyarta ba a gurin" ya zo ya zauna a kusa da ita yace
"it will be hard, but not impossible" tace "yes, it will be hard. Amma ta gayawa
Al'ameen labarinta baki daya, am sure zamu samu information din da zai taimaka mana
daga gareshi" yace "are you sure he will talk?" Tayi murmushi tace "believe me, he
will".

Aisha_Humairah
By
Maman Maama
Episode 63: Baby
Here is a long episode for you. Asha karatu lafiya.
Da assuba Humairah ta tashi kamar kullum, tunda ta farka take jinta babu dadi,
zuciyarta tayi mata wani irin nauyi kuma tana tunanin yawan kukan da take yi kwana
biyu shi ya jawo hakan. Wanka ta fara yi kamar yadda ta saba sannan tayo alwala
tazo ta saka doguwar riga da hijab ta tayar da sallah. Tun tana cikin sallar ta
ringa jin wani irin sanyi yana shigarta, sanyi mai shiga har cikin 'bargon mutum.
Ta idar da sallar ta daga hannu sai taji ta kasa gabatar da addu'ah kamar kullum,
ta kasa rokon Allah bukatunta kamar yadda takeyi kullum. Saboda yanzun duk ji take
yi bata da wata bukatar da tafi ta ganin mahaifinta, duk duniya yanzu babu abinda
take so irin taga babanta. Gani take yi ganin babanta shine tamkar warwarar sauran
matsalolinta na rayuwa. Rashin uba ne ya saka ta rasa komai a rayuwa, kuma rashin
uba ne zai saka ta rasa Al'ameen a yanzu. Ta shafa addu'ar ta ta jingina kanta
jikin gado tare da lumshe idonta, ta bude su a hankali ta sauke su akan hoton da
yake kan bedside din Basma. Family picture ne, kuma tsohon hoto ne dan mutanen ciki
basu kai yadda suke yanzu shekaru ba. Daddy ne a tsakiya, yayi famous murmushinsa
na gefen kumatu, Mami da Basma suna sides dinsa biyu kowacce ta kankame hannunsa.
Bassam yana kusa da Basma, ya rage tsaho ya jera fuskarsa a jikin ta Basma. Little
Abdallah a tsaye gaban Mami ta dora hannunta a gashin kansa. Sai Al'ameen, yana
tsaye a kusa da Mami, hannayensa duk biyun a cikin aljihu, ya dan juyar da kansa
gefe tamkar ba dashi za'ayi hoton ba, ya hade girar sama data kasa, dukkaninsu suna
murmushi hatta Al'ameen daya bata rai murmushi ne kwance a lips dinsa. This is what
is call a Family. Something bounded by blood, wanda babu ta yadda za'ayi a raba
shi, komai rintsi komai wuya dole akwai wani dauri a tsakanin family members wanda
baya kwancewa. Abinda Humairah bata dashi kenan. Ta kwanta akan sallayar ta lulluba
da hijab dinta tana kara jin sanyi yana shigarta, ta fara tunanin yadda rayuwarta
zata kasance idan da ace tana da family.
Misali ace tana da Mamanta da Babanta, da two sisters, no, three, sannan da little
brother. Kullum zasu ke zuwa school tare, in an yi break su ci abinci tare, sannan
in sun tashi babansu yazo ya dauke su kamar yadda take gani ana daukan yara tun
tana yarinya. A hanya duk zata bawa babanta labarin duk abinda ya faru a school, da
irin fad'an data tarewa kannenta, sai ya shafa fuskarta yace "am so proud of you
Baby". In sunje gida zasu tarar da Mamansu, duk suje su rungume ta suna rige rigen
kissing dinta, sannan sai maman ta rike hannunta tace "yau abinci specially dan ke
na dafa Baby, tuwon shinkafa miyar danyar kubewa saboda nasan kina son shi. Because
I love you so much Baby". Ta share hawayen da yake bin fuskarta yana kwanciya a kan
pillow, tana wondering menene ainahin abinda ya raba iyayenta? Menene ya saka
Mamanta ta zabi barin cikin danginta ta shiga duniya ba tare da tayi tunanin yadda
karshen rayuwarsu zai kasance ba?
Ta fara wassafa different scenarios a ranta. Misali; Mamanta 'yar wani hamshakin
maikudi ce a, babanta kuma talakane tikis bashi da komai sai teburin da yake siyar
da irin su ashana da Maggi. They fall in love amma iyayen Mamanta sai suka ki
amincewa da auren, wannan yasa suka gudu suka tafi can wani gari inda babu wanda
yasansu suka yi aure suka haifeta, daga baya talauci ya ishe su shine Babanta ya
shirya ya tafi Lagos neman kudi, tun daga nan babu wanda ya kuma jin labarinsa,
wannan ne yayi forcing Mamanta ta shiga cikin sana'ar da tayi, wannan kuma shi yasa
daga baya suka koma Lagos saboda Mamanta tana saka ran haduwa da Babanta a can. Har
ta mutu kuma bata ganshi din ba. Sai kawai ta kama share hawayen tausayin Mamanta.
Another scenario, babanta Prince ne kyakykyawa just like Al'ameen. Rannan ya fita a
mota sai ya kade wata 'yar talla ya dauke ta ya kaita asibiti yayi mata magani,
daga nan ya kaita gida sai yaga marainiya ce bata da kowa sai tsohuwar kakarta,
tausayinta ya saka ya aureta ba tare da amincewar iyayensa ba, sai daga baya iyayen
suka san labarin auren suka sa aka kori mamanta daga garin akace in dai ta dawo sai
an kasheta, duk basu san cewa mamanta tana dauke da cikinta ba. Wannan yasa mamanta
ta shiga yawon duniya har ta mutu bata koma gida ba, babanta kuma har yau yana can
yana ta nemansu kullum sai yayi kukan rashin samun labarin su. Itama sai ta kama
kukan tausayin kanta da tausayin Babanta.
Haka, haka ta ringa shiryawa kanta labarurruka iri iri dangane da asalinta, but duk
a cikin labaran ba'a haihuwarta sai anyi sure tsakanin iyayenta. Bata son koma
menene ya faru da mamanta ya faru da ita, kuma tasan indai har ta auri Al'ameen to
tabbas abinda zai faru da ita kenan. Ta kalli agogo taga time din makaranta yana
neman wucewa amma bata jin zata iya zuwa school yau. Ta jawo wayarta ta kira number
din aunty Aisha ta India. Bugu daya ta dauka. Da kyar Humairah ta bude baki ta
gaisheta. Nan take hankalin Aisha ya tashi ta fara jera mata tambayoyi, bata bata
amsa ba sai cewa tayi "dan Allah aunty Aisha ki kira Abbansu junaid kice yazo ya
dauke ni daga gidan nan" Aisha tayi shiru tana juya maganar, sannan tace "me akayi
miki anan din? Maganar Al'ameen din ce dai?" Sai ta kasa bata amsa kawai ta kashe
wayar, a lokacin hakoranta har haduwa suke yi saboda tsabar sanyin da take ji.
Gabadaya hankalin Aisha a tashe yake, ita kanta tana mamakin irin yadda take damuwa
da duk wani lamari na Humairah. Tabbas something is wrong, amma haka kawai ba zata
ce aje a dauke Humairah daga gurin Mami ba har sai tayi bincike akai, saboda tana
gudun abinda zai bata zumuncin su. Dan haka a take ta kira number din Mami, sai da
ta shiga sannan tayi realising cewa early morning hours ne a Nigeria. Sai da ta
kusa katsewa sannan mamin ta dauka da alamar bacci a muryarta, suka gaisa Aisha
tace "Na tashe ki da sassafe ko? Humairah ce ta kira ni yanzu tana kuka tace wai in
tura a dauke ta daga nan gidan. Shine hankali na ya tashi nace bara in kira ki in
gaya miki. Ko wani abun ya faru ne?" Mami ta jinjina maganar tace "tabbas akwai
abinda ya faru, amma banyi tunanin har zata tayar da hankalinta haka ba. Amma zan
tuntubeta inji ko da akwai wani abun bayan wanda na sani" Aisha tace "maganar
Al'ameen din ce dai?" Mami tayi dariya tace "ta gaya miki kenan" Aisha tace "she
mentioned it a lokacin bikin Basma. Na kuma gaya mata tun a lokacin nace ta fita
harkarsa" Mami tace "to ai shine yake shiga harkarta ba ita take shiga tashi ba.
Kema kinsan halin d'an naki ai. Jiya mun zauna da daddyn su munyi maganar. Ina
tunanin mun samu solution, da yau zamu kira both Al'ameen din da Humairah mu gaya
musu hukuncin da muka yanke amma sai nace a bari ki dawo tukunna in yaso sai ayi
komai a gabanku ke da Nura, tunda kune a matsayin iyayenta" Aisha tace "haka ne"
Mami tace "yaushe ne dawowar taki?" Aisha tace "in three days time zan gama abinda
nake insha Allahu" Mami tace "Ashe ma kin kusa, shikenan kawai za mu ajiye komai
har sai kin dawo din, in the mean time kuma zan tuntunbi ita Humairah inji menene
yake damunta" da haka suka yi sallama Mami tana tsokanar Aisha wai saboda tana
missing Nura ne yasa tayi rushing ta gama abinda take yi.
Mami tana ajiye wayar ta tashi ta saka doguwar riga da hijab ta tafi part dinta
dakin Basma inda Humairah take zama yanzu. Tayi sallama ta shiga dakin amma sai
taga babu kowa. Ta tsaya tana nazarin dakin. Bayan nutsuwa da kula da addini,
babban abinda yake burge Mami dangane da Humairah shine tsaftarta, duk da irin
rayuwar da Mami take hasashen Humairah tayi amma wannan bai hanata kasancewa mai
matukar tsafta ba, babu yadda za'ayi kaga wani abu daya danganci kazanta a tare da
Humairah. Dakin tsaf tsaf, sai kamshin freshener yake yi. Ko'ina a gyare in banda
saman wasu chest of drawers da suke a hargitse da takardu. Mami ta karasa gurin
taga duk takardun jottings ne wadansu kuma calculations ne a jiki, sai taji dadin
cewa Humairah tana mayar da hankalinta gurin karatu, ta fara jera mata takardun
kenan sai ta fara cin karo da drawings, abinda ya fara daukan hankalin Mami shine
kyan zanen, ta tabbatar ba tare da tantama ba cewa lallai Humairah is an artist,
sai kuma tayi studying drawing din, Palo ne da mata da miji da yara guda uku suna
zaune a kan carpet suna cin abinci, a jikin rigar mijin an rubuta "babana" rigar
matar "mamana" yaran guda biyu daya "sister" daya "brother" sai babbar kuma
"Humairah". Mami taji wani abu ya tokare mata makogwaronta, wani irin tausayin
Humairah take ji. Tayi sauri ta ajiye zanen ta juya zata fita taji kamar nishin
mutum daga can lokon gado, ta koma ta leka gurin, abinda ta gani shi ya tsorata ta;
mutum ta gani kwance a kasa a kudundune a cikin bargo, da sauri Mami ta karasa
gurin ta yaye saman bargon, Humairah ce, jikinta tamkar garwashin wuta, hakoranta a
sarke, idanunta a kakkafe, numfashinta yana fusga kamar zai bar jikinta. Salati
Mami ta saka tana kokarin jijjiga ta duk likitancinta ya gudu ya barta, bakin
Humairah ya motsa a hankali tace "Babanah" sannan ta karasa sumewa a hannun Mami.
Kwana hudu bayan nan.
A Aminu Kano international airport dake kano. Nura ne hannayensa biyu rike da twins
dinsa a tsaye suna fuskantar kofar da matafiya suke fitowa. Yaran sai tsalle suke
yi sun kasa tsayawa guri daya saboda d'okin son ganin mommynsu, basu jima ba akayi
announcing saukar jirgi daga India nan take yaran suka sake rikice masa har sai
daya tsawatar musu tukunna. Can sai gata ta fito, jikinta sanye da lace light blue
mai manyan flowers ta yafa red mayafi mai adon blue stones, ta rataya 'yar karamar
jaka red itama mai adon blue stones kafarta sanye da takalmi mahadin jakar. Babban
abinda zai dauki hankalinka zuwa gareta shine kyawun bakar fatarta, sai kyalli take
yi tana daukan ido saboda tsabar kula da take samu. Babu wanda zai ce wannan Aishan
nan ce wadda mutane suke kyamarta saboda muninta da suke gani. Da gudu yaran suka
kwace daga hannun babansu suka tsallaka barrier din da aka tare hanya da ita suka
tafi gurinta a guje, tana ganinsu itama ta durkusa kasa ta bude hannayenta suka
shige cike ta rungume su a tare tana sauke ajjiyar zuciya, su kadai Allah ya bata
amma bata bukatar kari, su kadai sun isheta komai. Ta sake su sannan ta bi su daya
bayan daya tayi kissing both cheeks dinsu, sannan kuma kamar an bude radio a tare
suka fara zuba mata surutu, kowa yana tambayar ta ko ta siyo masa sakon daya bata,
tun tana amsawa har ta koma tana binsu da kallo kawai. Nura ya karaso ya tsaya a
kanta yayi gyaran murya, ta dago kai tana kallon yadda ya bata rai yace "wato abin
'yar wariyar launin fata ce ko? In nace kinfi son yaran nan a kaina sai kice ba
haka ba, bayan gashi nan kina nunawa kiri kiri ko?" Ta mike tsaye tana dan nuna jin
kunyar sa, kawai sai taji ya jawo ta ya rungume a jikinsa, ta kwace tana rufe fuska
da mayafi. A ransa yace 'Aisha will always be Aisha, duk da yadda ta waye idonta ya
bude amma wannan kunyar tata tana nan, kuma itace take kara masa ganin darajarta
kullum, kullum in tayi kunyar nan kara kyau take yi a idonsa. A hankali ya rada
mata wata magana a kunne, suka yi dariya a tare, twins suka hada baki sukace "me
kace mata?" "Me yace miki?" Basu kadai ba hatta mutanen da suke kusa da su sai da
suka yi dariya. Sai kuma Aisha ta fara waige waige, Nura yasan me take nema amma
sai ya kama hannun twins suka yi gaba, ta biyo su da sauri tace "ina Humairah?" Bai
amsa mata ba yacigaba da tafiyarsa ita kuma bata hakura ba ta sake tambaya "ina
Humairah? Ko tana mota?" Suna karasawa inda motar take taje da sauri ta leka amma
babu kowa. Nura ya bude motar ya bude booth aka zuba mata kayanta sannan yazo ya
zauna a seat din driver, ta shiga kusa dashi, twins suna bata, ya juya tana
kallonsu yace "me ake fara yi in an shiga mota?" A tare suka ce "seatbelt" sannan
suka jawo suka saka, shima ya saka nashi, Aisha bata saka ba tana jiran bayani daga
gare shi. Sai daya tayar da motar suka fara tafiya sannan yace "Humairah bata da
lafiya, tana asibiti a kwance" Aisha ta rufe fuskarta da hannayenta for some
seconds sannan ta bude tace "tun yaushe kenan?" Yace "four days ago. Amma jikinta
da sauki sosai, sanda zamu taho da muka biya ta gurinta mun tarar ta samu bacci ma"
Aisha ta juya kanta tana kallon motocin da suke wucewa, tace "me ya sameta?" Yace
"zazzabi ne fa kawai, kuma nace miki taji sauki, she was even convulsing before,
mun dauka ma ba zata yi rai ba amma nace miki taji sauki sosai yanzu" Aisha ta goge
hawayen daya taru a idonta, wato wannan shine dalilin da yasa kusan kwana uku kenan
bata samun Humairah a waya, in ta kira Mami sai tace mata wayar ta samu matsala
kuma basa tare, taso tayiwa Nura mitar me yasa ba'a gaya mata ba amma tasan mitar
bata da anfani, an riga an wuce gurin, sai fatan samun isasshiyar lafiya ga ita
Humairan.
Ta kwantar da kanta tana jin dadin fresh air din da take kadawa. Ba haka taso ba,
taso suzo tare da Humairah, taso gobe ta nunawa 'yan'uwanta Humairah taji me zasuce
dangane da ita, kuma tasan ko giyar wake tasha ba zata daga walimar nan saboda
rashin lafiyar Humairah ba, aunty ma ba zata bari ba ballantana Abba da tun asali
ya nuna rashin amincewarsa ga alakarta da Humairah.
Direct dutse suka wuce, kasancewar tun jiya aunty da ahalinta sun riga sunyi gaba
dan gabatar da dukkan shirye shirye. Zuciyar Aisha duk babu dadi amma kafin su
karasa dutse twins da abban su sun mantar da ita komai. Sai dai still some part of
her tana jinsa babu dadi. A haka suka isa dutse, gidan already a cike suka tarar
dashi da 'yan uwa na nesa wadanda suka zo da niyyar kwana, suna zuwa guri ya sake
hargitsewa da hayaniya, 'yan uwa duk suka zagaye Aisha suna tayi mata murna tare da
fatan alkhairi. Sai dare sannan Aisha ta samu ta zame ta kira Mami, suka gaisa mami
tace "kin samu labari ko? Ni na roki Nura nace dan Allah kar ya gaya miki saboda
kar ki tayar da hankalinki kice lallai sai kin ajiye abinda kike yi kin taho bayan
in kinzo din babu abinda zaki iya yi mata sai abinda Allah ya riga yayi, besides,
the doctors here are doing their very best, muma kuma haka, Nura ma haka dan kullum
yana cikin zirga zirga gurinta, kuma masha Allah jikinta yayi sauki sosai, kawai
dai bata yi karfin da zata taho bane ba shi yasa mukace tayi zamanta kawai" daga
nan tayi wa Aisha murnar sabon gida tare da fatan ayi taro lfy a gama lafiya.
Bayan sunyi sallama ne Mami ta bawa Humairah wayar, can kasa Aisha taji muryarta,
daga ji kasan ba karamar wahala ta sha ba, Aisha tace "sannu Humairah kinji? Allah
ya baki lfy. Na dawo amma bansan baki da lfy ba, na zarto dutse gurin taron da nace
miki zamu zo tare, amma na miki alkawarin kina gama warkewa zan kawo ki kano da
dutse duk ki ga 'yan uwa na. Kinji?" Kai kawai Humairah ta gyada tamkar Aishan tana
ganinta. Aisha ta sake cewa "Allah ya baki lfy Baby" Humairah taji wani iri a
zuciyarta, Baby, when was the last time da aka kira ta da suna Baby? Cikin muryar
rashin lfy tace "my mother used to call me Baby" Aisha tace "I know, kin gaya min
rannan" Humairah tace "ban taba jin ta kira ni da sunana na gaskiya ba, ko sau
daya, I sometimes wondered why. I guess I will never find out tunda dai bata da rai
yanzu" Aisha ta rasa me zata ce mata kawai sai ta kashe wayar.
Washegari akayi taron walima. Da safe saukar karatu aka fara gabatarwa sannan akayi
wa Umma adduoin samun rahamar ubangiji. Yan uwa sunzo fiye da yadda Aisha tayi
tsammani. Wadansu 'yan uwan ma ta manta dasu sai yanzu take tunawa dasu, wadansu
'yan uwan kuwa da ko kallo bata ishe su ba yanzu kuwa har dan sunkuyawa suke yi in
zasu yi mata magana. Gwoggo nunawa take yi tamkar Aisha daga cikinta ta fito, itace
mai masaukin baki a dangin Abba yayinda Aunty take maimasaukin 'yan uwan umma.
'Ya'yan Mama ma kaf dinsu sunzo suda 'ya'yansu. 'Yan gari ma ba'a barsu a baya ba,
dan Abba sai daya tabbatar duk wadanda suke mu'amala ko ta arziki kota tsiya yasan
labarin abin alkhairin da yar sa tayi masa. 'Ya daya tamkar da dubu, haka yake cewa
Aisha yanzu. Aisha kuwa ta bude bakin aljihu ta ringa bayarwa, duk wanda yazo taron
nan babu wanda zaice ya koma gida hannu rabbana.
Da daddare suka hadu gabadaya a palon Abba wanda ya sha luntsuma2n kujerun da ko
sanda yana kantoma bai samu irin su ba, nan Abba yayi ta jero wa Aisha godiyar da
har sai da ta rufe masa bakinsa, sai kuma ya kama share hawaye yana bata hakurin
abubuwan da yayi mata a baya, Aisha kuka Abba kuka, ita ba kukan abinda ya farun
take yi ba, kukan tuna baya take yi, kukan missing ummanta, kukan missing khadija.
Khadija tana da wani gurbi a zuciyar Aisha wanda har yanzu babu wani wanda ya cike
gurbin, her only sister, blood din ummanta da abbanta.
Bayan an watse ya zamanto daga Abba sai Mama sai Aisha da Nura, sannan Aisha ta

haka, jiki nane dai yake ciwo nake so ayi min tausa" tana ganin murmushi ya bayyana
a fuskarsa amma bai ce mata komai ba. Har ta koma ta kwanta ta fara addu'ah taji

ya dawo daga masallaci yace mata "ki shirya zamu fara zuwa yola kafin mu wuce
abuja" tayi murmushi kawai tana jin dadi a ranta.
Basu tafi da mota ba, saboda yace driving zaiyi masa yawa, anan ya barta ya samu
drivern da zai kai masa ita abuja su kuma suka hau jirgi direct zuwa yola, daga

Inna, haka itama Aisha dan tana jin dadin surukar tata sosai. Ai kuwa sun samu
tarba mai kyau. Twins sai shan fura sukeyi suna cin soyayyun zabi. Sai da suka huta

Yakumbo sannan ta sanar da ita cewa tare suke da Nura. Maryam taje ta sanar da

ba kuma babu wanda ya taba gaya mata. Ta maimaita sunan "Humairah?" Ya juyo yana

Aisha_Humairah. I can still remember irin rigimar da khadija tayi a lokacin, yana

realized ban taba ganinta ba" ya saka hannunsa a aljihu ya dauko wallet dinsa ya

sunanta ne" ta karba tana kallon 'yar kyakykyawar jaririyar, with her round face

jaririyar tayi.

Aisha_Humairah

Episode 64: Knock Knock; Who is There?
Ta dago rikitattun idanuwanta ta sauke akan Kamal sannan ta kuma kallon hoton,

Mami tayi mata na cewa yau aunty Aisha zata dawo, dan tun jiyan ta roki mamin ta
hado mata kayanta daga can gidan idan aunty Aisha tazo kawai sai ta zarce gidanta.
Bata san komawa gidan Mami sam saboda bata son cigaba da ganin Al'ameen, bata son
ya cigaba da bata kulawa irin yadda yakeyi saboda tana ganin duk ranar da rabuwarsu
tazo zuciyarta zata iya fashewa. Tayi iyakacin kokarinta akan ya daina kulata kamar
yadda aunty Aisha tace amma yaki. Tun da ta farka a asibitin, kwana daya bayan an
kawo ta, shi ta fara gani a kusa da ita, a cikin zafin ciwo sau da yawa tana jin
Mami tana yi masa fadan ya tafi gida ko ya tafi office amma in ya fita din ma baya
jimawa zai dawo. Har Mariya, yarinyar da Mami ta ajjiye dan take kula da ita sai da
ta fahimci akwai wani abu a zuciyar Al'ameen din dangane da Humairah. Kullum yana
gefen gadonta a zaune, yasan lokutan shan dukkan magungunanta kuma shi da kansa
yake daukowa ya bata. Rannan cikin zafin zazzabi taji shi yana mata karatun
alqur'ani.
Basma sun zo takanas ita da angonta sun duba ta sun koma. Bassam shima yakanzo amma
mostly tare da Mami suke zuwa, tunda kusan duk inda Mami zata je shine yake kaita.
Duk tsaurin idonsa sai taga ganin halin da take ciki tamkar ya saka yayi sanyi, dan
rannan da jikinta ya rikice Al'ameen baya nan Bassam ne ya fita da gudu ya kira
doctor.
Tunda ta tashi yau take jin nauyin zuciyar ta ya karu, wani iri take ji a ranta, ta
kasa banbance ko excitement din komawa gida ne da ganin aunty Aisha ko kuma wani

daga ranta ta mike zaune daga kwancen da take. Hannu ta saka tana matsa kafarta da

ke ina tausa? Kar ma yallabai ya shigo yaga kina yi da kanki in shiga uku" ta fada
tana kashewa Humairah ido, murmushi kawai Humairah tayi dan tasan neman magana ne
Mariyar take yi, so take lallai sai taji ko akwai wani abu a tsakanin su. Bata jima

kallonta da yayi yana son ya karanci wani changi da yake tunanin ya gani a tare da

yoghurt sannan ya dauko kwalin biscuit din chocolate cookies din daya lura tana so,
ya zo ya mika mata sannan ya zuba mata yoghurt din a cup ya bata yace "kici wannan
sai kisha magani kafin Mami ta karaso da breakfast din ki" ba musu ta karba ta fara
shan yoghurt din a hankali tana jin dadin sanyin sa. Ya zauna yana cigaba da
kallonta, shi bai san cewa wadannan pierce eyes din nasa su suke takura mata ba?
Tana ajjiye cup din yace "pick it up" dole ta kuma dauka ta cigaba da sha. Yace
"yau zasu sallame ki. Kin sani?" Ta gyada masa kai. Sannan tace "yau aunty Aisha

kallon Humairah tare da tambayar ta saukin jikinta. Mariya kuma ta fita dan shigo

yana da shekaru, in baiyi sa'an Daddy ba kadan ne bai kai shiba, baki ne, bashi da
tsaho sosai amma kyakykyawa ne babu laifi. Daga ganin yadda yake al'amuransa zaka
san lallai hutu da jin dadi sun zauna masa. Al'ameen ya durkusa ya gaishe shi,
sannan humairah itama ta gaishe shi. Ya amsa mata da fara'arsa tare da tambayar ta
saukin jiki. Mami ta duba agogonta tace "in the next few hours zasu sallameta insha
Allah" ya kalli Al'ameen wanda ya jingina a jikin bango hannunsa a aljihu
idanuwansa akan Humairah, sai yayi murmushi yana kallon Mami yace "ko mun kusa yin
wani bikin ne?" Da sauri Al"ameen ya kalleshi sai kuma ya shafa kansa ya juya ya
fita da sauri. Mami ta bishi da harara sannan ta tabe baki tace "kai dai zauna nan

yake boyewa bayan duk irin daukakar data gani a tare dashi. Kawai dai taji tamkar
akwai wani invisible link a tsakanin su. Mariya ta dawo da basket din abinci.
Mutumin da aka kira da Abbas ya zuba abincin yanaci, Mami tana tsokanarsa cewa da
yawa da aure ai da bai fito daga gida da yunwa ba.
12 noon aka sallami Humairah, a lokacin ne kuma Aisha ta kira ta sanar dasu sun
sauka a airport, dan haka Mami tace su wuce kawai gidan Aishan su hadu a can.
Mariya ta fara hada musu kaya amma mami tace ta dauki abinda take so sauran kuma ta
bayar. Daga nan kawai motar Al'ameen suka shige ita da Humairah shi kuma yana
tukawa. Abbas kuma yayi wa Humairah sallama tare da fatan alkhairi ya shiga tasa
motar ya tafi.
Kusan a tare suka yi packing a kofar gidan su Aisha. Humairah ce ta fara fitowa
daga mota, wannan yasa twins ma suka fito a guje suka rungume ta suna murna, Mami
tace "hankali dai kar ku kayar da ita dan ba kwari ne da ita ba" kiri kiri babu
kunya Al'ameen ya fito ya cike su, sai da Mami ta harare shi sannan ya sake su.
Tace "shiga mota ka tafi, in na gama zan kira ka" haka ya juya ya tafi ba'a son
ransa ba. Aisha kuwa tunda ta fito daga taxi din data kawosu daga airport ta tsaya
take kallon Humairah. Is she or is she not? Dole a yau zata tabbatar. Humairah ce
ta karaso inda take tsaye, ta dora kanta a kafadarta tana hawaye, Aisha ta saka
hannu tana shafa kanta a hankali, tana jin wani sabon feelings akan yarinyar, cikin
muryar rada tace mata "it is OK. Am home now. Everything will be alright" hayaniyar
twins ce ta katse musu maganarsu, da karfi suka ja Humairah cikin gida wai tazo su
nuna mata tsarabar da mommy ta siyo musu daga India.
Gidan fes yake, tunda 'yan aikin Aisha suna nan, dan haka zama kawai Aisha da Mami
sukayi a palo aka gabatar musu da kayan ciye ciye yayin da twins suka ja Humairah

fuskarta yasa ta fahimci cewa maganar auren taji. Ta rasa abinda zata gaya mata.

jikinta 'yan kanti, ta rike bakin rigarta ta turo bakinta cike da tsiwa irin tata.

ya kawo shi cikin store room din ya ajiye. Da sauri ta dauki hoton ta fita,
Humairah tana nan tsaye a inda ta barta, Aisha ta tsaya dan nesa kadan da ita
sannan ta dago hoton ta nuna mata ba tare da tace komai ba.
Da farko Humairah kallon hoton kawai take yi, sai kuma lokaci daya gabadaya
fuskarta ta chanza tayi fari tas kamar babu jini, cikin rawar murya tace da karfi
"MAMA!". Sai kuma ta kwaso a guje ta karbe hoton daga hannun Aisha tana kalla cike
da rudani, sai kuma ta rungume hoton a kirjinta ta durkushe a kasa ta fara wani
irin kuka mai ratsa zuciyar duk mai sauraronta.
Aisha bata bukatar wata amsa kuma. Babu abinda take so a yanzu irin ta samu hawayen
da take rikewa tun a Yola su fito amma sunki fitowa sai zagi da suke karawa
zuciyarta. Ta durkusa a gaban Humairah a hankali tace "My Daughter" Humairah ta
dago idanu sharkaf da hawaye tace "a ina kika samu hoton Mama? A ina kika santa?".
Kafin Aisha ta amsa sukaji bugun kofa. "Knock Knock" Aisha ta juya ta kalli kofar
tace "who is there?" Akayi magana amma bata ji ba. Sam bata son abinda zai katse
mata moment din nan dan haka ta kira mai aikin ta tace taje waje koma waye yake
buga kofa ta gaya masa she is busy. Ta sake jawo Humairah jikinta tana tunanin ta

itace mamanki?" Kai kawai Humairah ta gyada mata, she looks very young a hoton,
amma babu tantama ita ce. Mai aikin ce ta dawo tace "mommy wasu mutane ne mace da
namiji, nace musu kina busy amma macen ta nace sai ta shiga, ni tsoro ta bani, wata
iri da ita. In kira mai gadi ya kore su?" Aisha ta danyi tsaki, shi maigadin mai
yasa ya barsu suka shigo in the first place? Amma kuma sai taji ta kasa cewa a kore
su din, ta mike tsaye tana kallon kofar, sai kawai ta fara tafiya zuwa kofar, sai
kuma ta fara gudu, da karfi ta bude kofar idanunta a waje.
Wata hargitsatstsiyar mata ce a tsaye. Kallon farko idan kayi mata zaka dauka
mahaukaciya ce sai ka kalleta sosai sannan zaka fahimci cewa da hankalinta, tsabar
wahala da talauci ne ya mayar da ita haka. Idanunta manya manya tamkar na mujiya,
fuskarta a mokade ga wani katon tabo a gefen fuskarta na dama. Ga uban hakora
yalaye da fatar bakinta ta kasa rufewa. Fatarta fara ce, amma inba kalla kayi sosai
ba ba zaka ce farar bace ba saboda tsabar yadda ta lalace, ta tsatstsage, ta kuma
yi dabbare dabbare. Ta russuna a gaban Aisha tace "Hajiya dan Allah nan ne gidan
Alhaji Nura? Wanda yake da mata Hajiya Aisha?" Aisha bata ba ta amsa ba, kallonta
kawai take yi tana jin kamar numfashinta zai bar kirjinta. Duk da yamutsewar
halittarta, duk da yanayin da take ciki a yanzu, wannan bai sa ta kasa gane 'yar
uwarta ba.

Episode 65: Together, again
This is a story of two sisters. Aisha da Khadija. Born of same parents. Daya
kyakykyawar daya kuma akasin haka. They started their life life's journey together,
inda iyaye da sauran al'umma suka dauki buri suka dora akan kyakykyawar, thinking
she will have a bright future with a perfect husban, yayinda 'yar uwarta kuma ta
fuskanci kyama daga al'umma hatta daga mahaifinta wanda yayi tunanin maybe sai dai
yayi sadakarta dan babu mai aurenta. Abubuwa da yawa suka faru most if which are
not good memories. Daga nan suka rabu. Kowa ta kama nata life journey din daban. A
yau, after almost 18 years, sun sake haduwa. Amma kuma Allah almusawwiru ya juya
lamuransu completely zuwa abinda ko a mafarki ba'a taba tsammanin zai faru ba sanda
suna yara. Kyawu, dukiya, mulki da shi kansa ran da muke takama dashi duk na Allah
ne ba namu bane ba, ya kan bamu ne dan yaga yadda zamuyi dashi, kuma yana karba a

aro? Kayan daba baki/ka ba?

duniya rayuwarsa yake living, babu wanda zai ajiye tasa rayuwar yayi living ta
wani" haka yayi tayi mata maganganu masu dadi har sai yaga ta saki ranta, sannan ya

koma magabar babanta, tana buga kafa a kasa tace "ni so nake inje gurinsa, so nake

tace zata kaini amma har yanzu shiru" yace "ki sake yi mata maganar, nasan ba
mantawa tayi ba amma ki sake tuna mata" daga nan kuma sai suka kama murna, Al'ameen
yace "dole yanzu inje in bawa Mami labari, nasan zata yi farin ciki sosai" Humairah

yayi musu godiya" sai da aka fara kiran sallar magrib sannan yayi mata sallama, ya
mike yana leken palon yace "in shiga in gaishe ta?" Ta tare kofar tace "ba yanzu
ba, sai mun shirya tukunna" ya juya ya tafi tana dariya, zuciyarsa fes.
Yana fita da mota Nura yana shigowa, sukayi clear, ya ga Nura yana driving da wani
a zaune a gefensa, amma ya juya kansa daya side din, duk da haka sai yaga kamar ya
sanshi. Ya daga kafada yayi tafiyarsa, Allah Allah yake yaje gida ya bawa Mami
labari.
A cikin gidan kuma Nura yana packing yaga Humairah tana kokarin dauke kujerun da
suka zauna, ya fito yace mata "bar su kawai Humairah. Bara muyi sallah zamu zauna

mana abinci nan" ta amsa ta shige, shi kuma ya juya yana tsokanar abokin nasa

ake kai maka office ne, gwara ma ka gaya mata kwano biyu zata yi min, da wanda

da juna sosai. Sai da suka yi sallah a masallacin unguwa suka dawo sannan suka

yana kan Humairah. Sai da suka tafi yace "wannan yarinyar dama anan take?" Nura
yace "wa kenan? Humairah?" Abbas yace "eh ita" Nura ya bata fuska yace "kasan ta
ne?" Yace "na taba zuwa dai na duba ta a asibiti, tare da matar yayana. Amma na
dauka a gurinta take shi yasa nayi mamakin ganinta anan" Nura yace "mata yayanka?
Wace matar yayanka?" Abbas yace "moon" Nura yayi murmushi yace "oh Mami. She is
like a friend to my madam. Sanda zamuyi tafiya ne muka ajiye ta gurinta kafin mu
dawo. Yarinyar niece din madam dina ce" har yayi shiru kuma sai yace "wait a

dariyar sannan yace "yayana ne. Baban mu daya dashi" mamaki ne a rubuce a fuskar
Nura, Abbas abokin sa ne gurin aikinsu daya kuma tasu tazo daya, ya tuno full name
din abbas, Abbas Sadiq Abdallah, amma shi duk ya dauka coincidence ne dan ko da

wulakanci baka taba gaya min kai dan sarki bane ba? Dan rowar kar inje palace wata
rana ince naxo gurin abokina ko?".
A cikin gida kuma Humairah taji shawarar Al'ameen. Sai data tabbatar Aisha tana
dakinta ita kadai sannan ta je tayi sallama ta shiga. Ta tarar da ita tana ta cike

ba, amma bata ce komai ba sai ta cigaba da durkuso a gurin. Sai da aka jima sannan
Aisha tace "zan kaiki gurin babanki amma sai kin shirya da babarki first tukunna.
Sai kin yace mata kinyi accepting din ta back into your life sannan zan kaiki
gurinsa" ta fada da finality a voice din ta, haka Humairah ta mike jiki babu kwari,
wato tarkon da aunty Aisha ta dana mata kenan?
Har sai da Aisha ta gama abinda take yi Nura bai shigo ba, ta kwanta kawai amma
bacci yaki zuwa. Gashi dai kamar abubuwa suna warwarewa amma kuma kamar kara
rikicewa suke yi. Tana jinsa ya hawo saman amma sai ya wuce dakin da take ya shiga
inda ya kwana jiya. Sai taji zuciyarta babu dadi, mai yasa Nura yake mata haka? Mai
yasa ba zai fahimce ta ba? Ta jima tana juyi da kyar bacci ya dauke ta.
Da safe yau ma bata rage wa Nura komai ba. Amma in banda gaishe shi da tayi ya amsa
bai ce mata komai ba. Duk zuciyarta babu dadi ita bata saba wannan zaman ba. Sai
daya kai bakin kofa zai fita palo sannan ya juyo yana kallon ta yace "yau ce ranar
ta ta karshe, make sure kafin in dawo tasan inda dare yayi mata" Aisha taji wani
kululu ya tsaya mata a makogwaro, ta bishi da sauri ta tari gabansa tace "do you
love me?" Ya tsaya kawai yana kallon ta, she looked so hurt. Yace "of cause I love
you. Duk abinda nake yi dan ke nake yi. Dan in kare ki ke da yaranmu nake yi" tace
"khadija is my sister. She is a part of me, in dai har da gaske kake sona to dole
ka soni gabadaya na. In dai har zata bar gidanka, to zan bita mu tafi tare".
Shin ko kuna son sisters dinku kamar yadda Aisha take son tata?

lokacin ne taji hayaniyar su daga kan bene.

"Na bazama sai dakin Maryam. Na same ta na tuhume ta akan uban waye yayi mata ciki?

"Abinda ya fara zuwa kaina shine labarin wata mata data kashe mijinta, akayi hangin

duniya sai Madam. Sai daya yi min laga laga ya ga da kyar nake numfashi sannan ya

daki da yake dashi a karshen gidan. Tunda nake ban taba shiga dakin ba, ina zargin
mutanen da yake kidnapping yake ajiyewa a dakin ni kuma ina ganin ba business dina
bane ba dan haka ban taba shiga ba. Yau sai gani a dakin a matsayin kamammiya. Ya
sunkuyo dai dai fuskata ya nuna min kansa, sai a lokacin na lura da ciwon da yake
kwance a kwalkwal dinsa. Yace "'yarki ce ta ji min wannan ciwon, rodi ta kwada min
aka, tukuicin duk abinda nayi muku a rayuwa" Ina jin haka na tuna da cewa na bawa
Humairah rodi nace duk wanda ya shigar mata daki yayi kokarin tabata ta kwada masa
aka, to me hakan yake nufi kenan? Does that mean Ojo ya shigar mata daki ya taba
ta? Nan take naji duk ciwon jikina ya warke, na fara jera masa tambayoyin me yayi
mata, and looked me in the eyes and said "I raped her".
Ta tsaya da maganar ta ta kifa kanta a bayan kujera ta ringa rusa kuka tamkar babu
gobe, Aisha ma kukan takeyi. Sai data gaji dan kanta sannan ta bari tace "My poor
innocent baby. Ta yaya zan ga laifin Humairah in tace ba zata yafemin ba? Babu irin
zagin da banyi masa ba, I kept repeating 'I will kill you, I will kill you' sai
kawai ya dauko wata karamar wuka a aljihunsa and he gave me this" ta fada tana nuna
katon tabon da yake kwance a fuskata, ta cigaba "yace yaga kyan da nake takama ina
dashi shi yasa nake ji na sama sama. Ya gaya min cewa Humairah ta gudu ammaya tura
a nemo ta duk inda take, kuma in ya sameta zai kawo ta gabana ya sake raping dinta
sannan ya kasheta a gaban idona yaga yadda zanyi."
"Duk addu'ar da tazo bakina yi nake yi, fatana daya kar Allah yasa aga Humairah.
Saboda nasan duk abinda yace zaiyi din to da gaske yake. Nayi nadama a lokacin har
bansan iyakacinta ba. Amma hausawa sunce kowa ya tuba dan wuya ba lada. Ina nan
kwance cikin jini sai ga masu neman Humairah sun dawo, babu Humairah, amma sun kamo
madam" ta share hawayenta jikinta har karkarwa yake, tace "he tortured her agabana,
wai sai ta gaya masa inda Humairah take, wai ance masa an ganta ta shiga gidan ta.
Ta ringa rantsuwa akan ita bata ga Humairah ba amma yaki rabuwa da ita har saida ta
kusa fita hayyacinta. Tsananin wahala yasa ta gaya masa zancen duk kudadensa da
nake dauka ina boyewa, da gidan da muka gina da kuma shirina na guduwa daga
gidansa. Ranshi ya baci sosai, kawai sai ya dauko bindiga a aljihunsa ya nuna ni
kamar zai harbeni sai kuma ya juya ta zuwa kan madam ya harbeta. I closed my eyes,
ina jiran in jini a lahira sai cewa yayi ba zai kashe ni ba, not then, sai ya kamo
Humairah ya kasheta a gabana tukunna. Ya dauko kaya ya cire min na jikina ya chanza
min, sannan ya tafi dani palo ya zaunar dani ya zauna yana kallona, wai jiran
Humairah yake yi, yasan she will come back for me kuma so yake in tazo ta ganni a
zaune saboda kar tayi tunanin wani abu. I was loosing consciousness saboda
ciwuwwukan jikina amma ko a jikinsa. Jira kawai yake yi. A haka akayi magrib, har
duhu ya fara shigowa Humairah bata zo ba. Instead, kawai sai mukaji harbe harbe a
waje, I was beyond care a lokacin, ina jinsa ya tashi ya fitada sauri, akayi ta
harbe harbe sai ga police sun shigo palon. Wani dadi naji ya kamani ina ganin
taimako yazo gareni. Amma me? Maimakon police din su tarairaye ni a matsayin wadda
suka zo ceta sai suka fara treating dina as a criminal. Suka jani a kasa a
wulakance suka buga min ankwa suka jefa a motar su suka tafi dani"
"sai daga baya na fahimci me ya faru, ashe sanda yaran Ojo suka je kama madam tayi
alerting wani saurayinta dansanda, shi kuma yaje yayi reporting. Dama kuma suna ta
zargin Ojo dinda mugayen aiyuka amma basu da kwakwkwaran hujjar da zasu kama shi,
yanzu kuma sun samu. An kama da yawa da ga cikin yaran Ojo, wadansu kuma sun gudu,
a ciki harda babbab yaronsa Musty. Bayan an tafi damu ne suka bincika gidan, sun
samu drugs da arms kamar banza, sannan sun samu gawar madam a booth din wata mota
ana kokarin fita da ita aje a yar. Tambayar da akayiwa Ojo ta farko akan kisan
madam sai cewa yayi nice na kasheta, wai gidan da muka gina tare ne nake so ya zama
nawa ni kadai shine na saka shi ya kamo min ita ni kuma na kashe ta. Ya kuma ce
nice babbar yarinyarsa dan haka duk deals dinsa tare muke yi."
Yaransa da yawa da suka ji azaba sukayi ta tona irin abubuwan da yake saka su suke
yi, da irin yawan mutanen da suka karkashe. Rival gangs kuma sukayi ta turo hotuna
da takardun drug deals masu dauke da saka hannunsa a boye. Nan dai aka tattara
bayanai aka tura mu kotu.
Bani da kowa, bani da komai, dan suna kama ni sukayi freezing account dina mai
dauke da duk abinda na tara a duniya, gidana ma an karbe, dan haka bani da kudin
daukan lawyer. Tunda aka kamani babu wanda yazo ya duba ni a cikin abokan bariki
na, yo me ya kaisu zuwa balle su shafawa kansu kashin kaji? Ana bani damar yin
magana a kotu abinda na fara cewa shine 'yata, tana can bansan halin da take ciki
ba. Babu wanda ya kula ballantana a dauki mataki a kai.
Ranar da akayi zaman kotun karshe a ranar aka yanke mana hukunci. Ojo an kama shi
guilty on several murder accounts, drug dealing, arm robberies and several accounts
of kidnapping. Aka yanke masa hukuncin kisa ta hanyar rataya. Yaransa ma duk kowa
an yanke masa hukunci dai dai da laifinsa.
Ni kuma. An wanke ni daga kisan madam saboda samun fingerprint din Ojo a murder
weapon din ni kuma ba'a ga nawa ba. Amma wannan bai wankeni daga kasancewa
associate dinsa ba saboda mutane da suka shaida cewa koda yaushe muna tare dashi,
sannan ga uban kudin da aka samu a account dina ba tare da ya kasance ina aikin
komai ba. Ga kuma zargin cewa ni na saka Ojo ya kashe madam. A karshe aka yanke min
hukuncin shekara uku a gidan yari. A maximum security prison. Tare da aiyuka masu
tsanani. Alkali yana gama karanta min sentence dina abinda na fara tunani shine
'ina Humairah take? Ina zata je? Me zai faru da rayuwarta? Will she ever forgive
me?"

Maman Maama
Episode 71: Loneliness
The day had been a bad day for him so far. Tun sanda ya tashi daga bacci ya shiga
toilet da niyyar yin wanka, yana kunna shower yaji ruwan sanyi ya zubo masa, da
sauri ya kashe. Ya duba yaga ashe water heater ba ta yi, ya kunna fitila ita ma
yaga bata kama ba. Yaja dogon tsaki dan yasan abinda ya faru. Power units dinsa ne
ya kare. Ya kuma yin tsaki yana jin duk ransa ya baci. Wai me yasa abin nan baya
yiwa mutum alarm ne in ya kusa karewa? Wani barin na zuciyarsa ya gaya masa 'da
kana da mata ai da ta taya ka dubawa' yayi saurin kawar da maganar daga ransa. Dole
haka ya kwakwkwara ruwan sanyin ya fito yana karkarwa. Da sauri ya shirya, har zai
fita ya juyo ya kalli bedroom din nasa, kaca-kaca. Ya kalli agogon hannunsa yaga
already ya makara. Da dan saurinsa ya shiga kitchen ya jawo kettle da niyyar dafa
tea sannan ya tuna bashi da wuta, ya kara buga wani tsakin ya jefar da kettle din
ya fice. Mota kawai ya shiga mai gadi ya bude masa gate ya fita, yana tunanin ya
tsaya a wani gurin yayi breakfast ko kuma ya zarce office kawai yayi order daga
can? Ya duba agogon hannunsa yaga 8:30, yana da lecture da students by 9 dan haka
dole ya hakura da cin abincin. Amma sai me? Baiyi nisa da gidan ba motar shi ta
fara misbehaving sannan ta mutu, yayi cursing under his breath sannan ya buga
steering da hannunsa. Sai kuma ya mayar da kansa ya kwantar a jikin kujera ya
lumshe idonsa yana tunanin rayuwarsa. It is a total mess. Mutane suna ganin tamkar
bai damu da rashin aurensa ba amma shi yafi kowa damuwa. Musamma yanzu da shekaru
suka ja masa. He is tired of being alone. He felt so lonely kullum. In yana gida he
is alone, in ya zo office ma dai alone yake zama. Tun farkon rayuwarsa bashi da
friends, babban friend dinsa shine Takawa. Shine babansa shine abokinsa shine role
model dinsa, tare suke zuwa ko'ina tare suke yin komai. Life had been so good then,
but then lokaci daya everything ya tarwatse. Komai ya lalace. Rana daya babansa ya
juya masa baya ba tare da yasan dalili ba, sannan daga baya rana daya aka kirashi
aka bashi wata tatsuniya cewa babansa ba shine babansa ba. Cewa shi din ba dan
sunna bane ba, dan gaba da fatiha ne, shege ne.
He can't even begin to describe the feeling. Babu wanda zai gane sai wanda ya shiga
ko yake cikin situation irin nasa. Badan zuciyar musulunci ba da babu abinda zai
hana shi daukan ransa a lokacin. Yaji ya tsani kansa, ya tsani rayuwarsa and most
importantly ya tsani mahaifiyarsa. Gani yayi itace silar komai. Dan haka ya yanke
duk wata alaka da ita kamar yadda Takawa ya yanke duk wata alaka da shi. Step
brother dinsa da da yake yiwa kallon kaskantacce wanda ba zai zama komai a rayuwa
ba shi ne ya dauke shi ya mayar dashi gidansa ya zaunar dashi ya bashi shawarwari
masu kyau sannan ya mayar dashi makaranta, makarantar da da baiyi ba saboda yana
ganin yin nata bashi da amfani.
Tun daga lokacin ya dukufa karatu, mostly saboda ya mantar da kansa halin da yake
ciki. Amma hakan ya gagara. He became bitter. Kullum cikin kunci kullum cikin fada
da mutane saboda yana ganin kamar kowa daya kalleshi zai ga sunan shege a rubuce a
goshinsa. A haka har ya gama first and second degrees dinsa sannan yayansa wanda
zuwa lokacin ya zama daya daga cikin wadanda ake ji dasu a Abuja ya nema masa aiki
anan university din da yayi karatu, with his name and the backing of his brother
bai sha wahala ba ya samu aikin. Then he decided to move out of the palace. So yake
yayi nesa da duk abinda ya shafi sarauta, maybe ko hakan zai rage zafin da yake ji
a zuciyarsa a duk lokacin da yaga babansa da ba ubansa ba, so yake ya sake sabuwar
rayuwa as the bastard that he is. Still wannan brother din nasa daya raina a baya
shine ya gina masa gida kyauta ya bashi bayan yayi iya kokarinsa na ganin ya hana
shi tafiya ya kasa, amma da yaje yiwa Takawa sallama ya gaya masa kudurinsa na
barin palace sai cewa yayi "to" kawai. Shi kuma wannan ya sashi ya kara zuciya da
duk abinda ya shafi gidan, hatta motocinsa da yake hawa sai ya ajiye keys dinsu ya
rataya jakarsa ya fice ba tare da waige ba. Shin dama soyayya a jini take kawai?
Shin dama dan da ka rike tun yana jariri har zuwa girmansa bai zama danka ba? Ina
shakuwar take ina kuma soyayyar take?
Daga nan kuma sai loneliness dinsa ya karu. Tun yana yaro ya kasance komai na
rayuwa yi masa akeyi, bashi da tunanin gyaran sutturarsa ko tsaftace muhallin sa ko
abincin da zaici, amma yanzu komai shi zai yi wa kansa, babu mataimaki babu abokin
shawara. Sultan ne kadai yake kula shi, ya kanzo har gida sometimes dan yaga halin
da yake ciki kuma baya jin dadin abinda yake gani din. Yayi masa hiring mai gadi da
kuma house boys da zasu ke kula da tsaftar gidan amma hakan sam baiyi improving
emotional state dinsa ba. Dan haka Sultan ya shirya reconciliation tsakaninsa da
mahaifiyarsa tare da hadin bakin sisters dinsu Fa'iza da Saratu. Kawai sai ganin
Hajiya yayi a gidansa, ya fara bambamin me ya kawo ta sai yaga ta durkusa a kan
gwuiwoyinta tana bashi hakuri hawaye wani na bin wani. He couldn't take that, dan
haka shima sai gashi akan nashi kafafuwan suna kukan tare, sai a lokacin ya lura da
irin yadda ta lalace, rayuwa ta juya mata baya gabadaya ga kuma kishiyoyi sun saka
ta a gaba. A lokacin ne ta bashi cikakken labarin yadda haihuwarsa ta kasance,
yadda saurayinta, class mate dinta a secondary school ya yayi mata ciki, lokacin
duk suna teen ages, ko secondary school basu gama ba daga ita har shi. Dan haka
aure ba zai yiwu a tsakanin su ba, kuma tunda ta gaya masa tana da cikin bai kuma
bi ta kanta ba balle saboda yasan dole familyn ta su hakura tunda suna gudun bacin
suna. A lokacin ne kuma ta gaya masa wanene asalin babansa.
Farko baiyi niyyar nemansa ba saboda yana jin zafin abinda yayi wa mahaifiyarsa,
sai bayan da Allah yayi wa mahaifiyarsa rasuwa sannan ya yanke shawarar neman baban
nasa da niyyar yaje ya tarwatsa masa family dinsa ya rama wa babarsa yadda ya
tarwatsa rayuwarta. Amma a ranar da yaje gurinsa a ranar yayi regretting decision
dinsa. Kudi ne da mutumin kamar kasa dan haka da kyar ya samu ganinsa a wani farm
house dinsa dake bayan gari. Yana zuwa ya tsaya a gabansa cike da tsiwa ya kare
masa kallo sannan yace "sunana Abbas. Ni ne dan da kayi wa mamana cikinsa shekaru
talatin da biyar da suka wuce" ya tsaya yana kallon fuskar mutumin mai kama da
tasa, yana jiran yaga bacin rai ko tashin hankali ya baiyana amma sai yaga
murmushi, sannan kuma sai dariya ta biyo baya, sai daya gama sannan yace "Abbas
kenan. Finally ta gaya maka kenan. Ai ni jira nake sai ka hau gadan mulkin Abuja
sannan zanje har fadar ince kai dana ne. Sai inga karshen gudun bacin suna." wani
kululun bakin ciki ya tsayawa Abbas a kirji, wato ya sani, all this while ya sani
amma bai taba nemansa ba saboda bai damu dashi ba. Mutumin ya mike tsaye still yana
dariya yace "am just kidding" da sauri Abbas ya juya zai bar gurin amma sai mutumin
yace "ina kuma zaka je? Kayi fushi ne saboda ban neme ka ba? Ka dauka bana sonka?
So kayi ace naje na fito da kai daga rufin asirin da kake ciki na fada wa duniya
asalin ko kai waye? Tabbas nasan kai dana ne amma banyi niyyar baiyana hakan a
yanzu ba, for your own good. So nayi ace sai ka taka wani babban matsayi a gidan
sarautar yadda zakaci moriya biyu. Look at all this Abbas" ya fada yana nuna gidan
gonar da hannunsa, yace "all this is yours. Kai kadai Allah ya bani dan haka duk
abinda na tara a duniya naka ne. It is all yours" ya fada yana dafa kafadar Abbas
din fuskarsa da murmushin da yake nuna irin son da yake yi masa. Abbas ya kwace
kafadarsa ransa a bace yace "bana so. Bana son komai daga gareka" ya juya ya fara
tafiya kuma sai ya juyo yace "besides, ni shege ne bani da gadon ka."
Abbas ya bude idonsa yana kallon motocin da suke ta rushing akan titi kowa yana
kokarin zuwa gurin aikinsa saboda ya makara. That has only been the beginning. Tun
daga ranar daya sadu da mahaifinsa tun daga sannan mutumin ya takura masa. A
shekarun da suka biyo baya babu yadda baiyi dashi ba amma yaki accepting dinsa, har
gidansa da office dinsa yake zuwa amma Abbas yaki kula shi. Gani yake da uba irin
sa gwara babu. Sai daga baya ya fahimci menene matsalar mutumin, loneliness, ba shi
da kowa, katon gidansa tamkar kango yake babu kowa sai 'yan aiki. Ga shekaru sunja
masa, yayi retire amma ko abokin hira bashi dashi, sai uban dukiyar data kasa siya
masa happiness. Sau da yawa in yazo gurin Abbas yakan ce masa "you are my only
future Abbas. Ta gurinka ne kawai nake saka ran samun zuri'a. So nake kayi aure ka
hayayyafa dan nima in san nabar jinina a doron kasa." Daga baya ne mutumin ya gano
lagon Abbas, Sultan. Brother dinsa da suke uwa daban uba kowa da nasa. Dan haka ya
je har palace ya samu Sultan din ya gabatar da kansa a matsayin biological fathern
Abbas kuma ya nemi alfarmar ya daidaita tsakanin su. Shigar Sultan cikin maganar
yasa dole Abbas ya sassautawa baban nasa yake dan kulawa dashi. A 'yan shekarun nan
ciwo ne yake ta fama dashi, duk ya rame ya lalace kuma Abbas din yayi yayi dashi ya
fita waje a duba shi sosai amma yaki. Kullum Abbas yaje dubashi zancen daya ne
"Abbas ka daure kayi aure. Ka samu nitsatstsiyar yarinya irinka ka aura. Tunda kai
kaki karbar dukiya ta so nake in kayi aure sai in bawa matarka ta ajjiyewa jikokina
tunda bana tunanin zan kai lokacin da zan gansu. Bana so duk wahalar da nasha
tsahon rayuwata na tara dukiyar nan ace ta zamanto ta bital mali".
Ya duba agogon motar yaga pass nine, bai san ya akayi ya zauna a mota yana
reminiscing about the past har ya makara haka ba. Ya sake yiwa motar key amma bata
da niyyar tashi dan haka ya kashe ta ya fito ya rurrufe ko'ina ya fara tafiya a
kafa yanayi yana duba taxi. Sai daya gaji likis sannan ya samu. Yau dai sam bai
tashi da sa'a ba. Sai after ten ya isa makaranta already har period dinsa tayi
nisa, dan ma double ce, haka ya lallaba ya jarasa musu one hour ya tafi office
dinsa ya zauna ya kira restaurant yayi order breakfast.
Abincin yana zuwa kira yana dhigiwa wayarsa. Number din babansa ce dan haka ya daga
babu bata lokaci. Amma ba murayarsa bace ba ta wani ne daban yana gaya masa baban
nasa bashi da lafiya har an kwantar dashi a asibiti a wani gari daban. Ya ajiye
wayar ya dafe kansa da hannayensa biyu yana tunanin yaushe har ya bar gari bai sani
ba? Ya ja tsaki for the hundredth time daga wayewar garin yau yana jin sam ba ma
shi da appetite din cin abincin da aka ajiye a gabansa. Na farko the call sounds
urgent, na biyu yasan mutumin nan bashi da kowa sai shi dan haka in baijw ba babu
wanda zaije. Na uku motarsa ta tsaya kuma ita kadai yake da ita dan shi a ganinsa
shi da ba iyali ne dashi ba mai zaiyi da motoci sama da daya? Ya dauki wayarsa ya
kira airport dan yayi booking flight amma sai aka sanar dashi babu jirgi yau, sai
dai gobe. Tomorrow may be too late, dan haka ya dauki abinda zai dauka ya kira
restaurant su zo su kwashe abincin su sannan ya fita. Yau zaiyi abinda bai taba yi
ba. Yau zai hau motar haya.
A tashar ya tarar mutum daya ne kawai a motar, yana shiga yace su tafi kawai zai
biya gaba daya. Sai bayan da motar ta tashi sannan ya lura macece a cikin motar. Ta
takure a jikin kofa, fuskarta tana kallon gefe. Amma daga inda yake yana iya hango
kumburarrun idanuwanta.
