Cikin sauri Aisha ta sauko daga sama hannayenta rike da wasu littattafai da take
tunanin zasu kara taimakawa Khadija gurin gyara rayuwarta. Ganin Khadija bata palo
yasa ta zarce dakin ta kai tsaye. Nan ma bata nan. Tayi knocking toilet tare da
kiran sunanta amma babu amsa. Zuciyarta taji ta fara bugawa da sauri, ta fita ta
koma palo tana kwala mata kira amma babu amsa, a guje 'yan aikinta suka shigo daga
backyard suna tambayar "lafiya?" a rikice tace "ina Khadija?" suka kalli juna suka
girgiza kai, daya tace "bamu ganta ba wallahi, muna baya muna wanki" dayar kuma
tace "ni dai ina shanya naji kamar motsin gate, na leka sai naga kamar fitar mace
da hijab a jikinta" Aisha ta zubar da littattafan hannunta ta yi gate da gudu yaran
suna binta a baya, mai gadi yana ganinta ya taso da sauri, kafin yayi magana ta
jefa masa tambayar "kaga Khadija ta fita?" ya sunkuyar da kai yace "ranki ya dade
naje bayan gida na dawo, ban sani ba ko ta fita sanda bana nan" a take zuciyar
Aisha ta karye, ta bude karamar kofar gidan ta leka waje gabas da yamma amma bata
ga ko alamar Khadija ba. Ta sake komawa cikin gidan da sauri ta shiga dakin da
Khadija ta zauna, ta bude wardrobe, kallo daya tayi mata ta mayar ta rufe sannan ta
dawo palo ta zube akan kujera. Khadija is gone. But gone where? Me yasa zata yi
mata haka? Bayan duk maganganun da suka yi me yasa zata yi mata haka. Ina ta tafi?
Ina Khadija ta tafi? Taji wani bacin rai yana taso mata nan take ta rufe idonta ta
fara adduoi har sai da taji nutsuwa sannan ta tashi zaune. A lokacin ne 'yan matan
suka dawo suna gaya mata sun duba ko'ina a gidan basu ga Khadija ba. Kai kawai ta
gyada musu sannan tayi musu alamar su tafi da hannunta. A lokacin ne idanta ya
sauka a kan farar takardar da iska take kadawa a hankali. Ta mike taje gurin ta
dauka ta karanta, ta sake karantawa amma ta kasa gane mai takardar take nufi. What
was Khadija thinking? A kan carpet ta zame ta kwanta, idanta a rufe, hannunta rike
da takardar tana so tayi making sense out of what just happened.
Ita kanta bata san tsahon lokacin data dauka a haka ba, har sai da taji tsayuwar
motar Nura a waje, batasan me ya dawo dashi ba, maybe mantuwa yayi. Tana jinsa har
ya shigo palon ya tsaya a kanta sannan ta bude ido tana kallonsa, sai kuma ta mika
masa takardar hannunta tace a hankali "she is gone".
Ya jima a tsaye da takardar a hannunsa yana dubawa, sai kuma ya ajiye ya hau sama
ba tare da yace mata komai ba. Nan da nan hawaye suka fara zarya akan kuncinta. Tun
da ya hau saman zarya yayi tayi a palo yana jin ransa babu dadi. He hates Khadija.
Tun farko ya tsane ta, baya sonta, tun lokacin da suke karatu, tun lokacin da yake
ganin ta tana barin maza suna tabata. Shi ya tsani mace marar kamun kai. Ballantana
kuma daya lura cewa bafulatana ce sai abin ya karu saboda kishin yarensa. Sannan
kuma abubuwan da tayi wa Aisha suka ninka tsanarta a cikin ransa saboda sonda yake
yiwa Aishan. Sannan tazo ta yawon duniya for fifteen years, only God knows dame
dame ta aikata a wadannan shekarun. Dan haka shi gani yajeyi korarta da yayi is the
right thing to do, but me yasa yaje jin babu dadi a ransa? Me yasa yake jin kamar
yayi ba dai dai ba? Ina ta tafi? Hopefully kano zataje gurin 'yan uwan mamanta.
Amma kuma bata san kan Abuja ba kuma ta fita ita kadai. Sai kawai yaji tamkar in
wani abu ya sameta alhaki yana kansa plus Aisha ba zata taba yafe masa ba. Da sauri
ya sake fitowa ya wuce Aisha ba tare daya ce mata komai ba ya shiga mota ya bar
gidan. Yana fita Aisha ta mike zaune ta sake karanta takardar Khadija. Tunanin ta
daya shine me zata cewa Humairah in ta dawo?
A haka dai ta lallaba ta shiga dakin kasa tayi sallar zuhr ta koma ta kwanta, yau
ko girki ma ita va zata iya ba. Tana nan a kwance har bayan la'asar sannan taji
tsayuwar motar Nura tare da hayaniyar su TJ. Gabadaya dakin da take kwance suka
shigo, fusjar Nura dauke da damuwa. Humairah tabi dakin da kallo kamar me neman
wani abu amma sai tayi shiru. Tj ne ya fara tambayar "ina Aunty?" Aisha tana kallon
fuskar Humairah tace "she is gone. Ta tafi, nima bansan inda ta tafi ba".
Humairah ta saki jakar kafadarta ta fadi kasa, Aisha ta mika mata takardar Khadija
ta bude tana karantawa. Nura yayi sauri ya fita daga dakin yana jin zafin zuciyarsa
yana karuwa. Ba tare da Humairah tace komai ba itama ta juya ta fita. Duhu take
gani a idonta kamar yadda take jin duhu yana mamaye zuciyarta. Ta shiga dakin su
Junaid ta zube a gado ta kifa kanta pillow amma hawaye yaki zuwa. She doesn't even
know what to think. Me yasa rayuwa zata mata haka? Mamanta da take tunanin ta mutu,
mamanta da tafi so fiye da kowa a duniya, sama taka sai gata ta dawo sannan kuma
lokaci daya ta sake tafiya ba tare da ko rungume ta tayi taji dadi a ranta ba. Ina
Mama ta tafi kuma? Tace ta koma inda ta fito kamar yadda Nura ya bukata, to ina ne
inda ta fito din? Daga ina Mama ta fito? Da sauri ta mike ta koma dakin data baro
su Aisha, ta same ta zaune a inda ta barta su Junaid sun saka ta a gaba sunyi jigum
jigum kamar wadanda aka yiwa mutuwa. Suka juyo a tare suna kallonta tace "I think
nasan inda Mama ta tafi".
************************
Abbas ya gyara zamansa a motar. Ya dauko wayarsa ya kira mutumin daya kirashi dazu
ya gaya masa ya taho yana hanya amma ba zai samu zuwa da wuri ba, amma duk abinda
ake bukatar yi a asibiti ayi kawai kar ace sai an jira shi. Yana gama wayar ya cire
hular kansa ya dora a fuskarsa da niyyar yin bacci. Amma bacci yaki zuwa saboda
kugin yunwa da cikinsa yake yi. Lokaci zuwa lokaci kuma yana jin kamar sheshshekar
kuka, farko ya dauka a radio ne sai kuma ya ji babu karar radio. Ya bude idonsa ya
kalli matar gefensa, ba yarinya bace ba, and she is not a beauty, not even close,
amma she has some kind of air around her wadda inka kalle ta sosai zaka fahimci she
was a beauty before, maybe rayuwa ce ta mayar da ita haka. A yamushe take tamkar
kazar mayu. Sababbin kayan jikinta sunyi daban da jikin nata. And she looks very
sad. Kamar mutuwa akayi mata. Ya juya ya daina kallon ta yake kallon gefen titi,
amma sai zuciyarsa ta kasa mantaya da kamannin matar. What her story? Ko zai iya
taimaka mata? Maybe talauci ne yake damunta, ko rashin lfy babu kudin magani. Sai
kawai ya saka a ransa cewa idan sun sauka zai bata wani abu. Ya sake rufe idonsa
yana so yayi bacci amma still sautin kukanta ya hanashi yin baccin. Ya gwada bata
hakuri yace "baiwar Allah. Komai kika ga ya sami bawa daga ubangiji ne, gwada shi
yake yaga karfin imaninsa. In wani abun kika rasa sai ki duba tarin abubuwan da
kike dasu wadanda wasu basu dasu sai ki gode Allah" baiyi tunanin zata kulashi ba
dama, kuma bata kulashin ba, shi kuma dama yayi ne a matsayin sadaka, tunda annabi
yace magana mai dadi ma sadaka ce. Ya koma ya kwantar da kansa amma bai rufe
fuskarsa ba ya shiga duniyar tunani. Kamar daga sama yaji tace "have you ever felt
lonely?" ya juya ya kalleta suka hada ido. She definitely looks sad and lonely. Bai
bata amsa ba ta sake cewa "ka taba ji a rayuwarka kamar baka da sa'a? Kamar komai
is against you? Kamar you don't belong anywhere?" farko murmushi ya fara yi sai
kuma yayi dariya, ta dauke kanta gefe tana jin haushin dalilin da yasa tayi masa
magana gashi nan ta ja wa kanta wulakanci. Ya daina dariyar yace "Pardon me. Ji
nayi kamar ni kike describing. Ko kinsan ni ne ban sani ba?" ya fada da wasa amma
bata juyo ba, yasake cewa "duk abubuwan da kika lissafa irin halin da nake ciki ne,
for twenty five years babu abinda na sani sai loneliness. Babu kuma inda nayi
fitting a rayuwa. So idan abinda kike going through kenan zan iya ce miki you are
not alone. You and Me are very much alike" tace "kuma kai ne silar shigarka halin
da kake ciki?" ya girgiza kai yace 'ko kadan bani na saka kaina a halin da nake
ciki ba. Kaddara ta ce tazo a haka" ta danyi murmushi tace "then you and me are
very different. Ni nice silar faruwar komai a rayuwata. Ni na tafka kurakuran da
suka kaini inda na samu kaina a yanzu. Ko da yake a wasu lokutan zuciyata tana gaya
min cewa akwai laifin iyayena, sune basu tankwasa ni ba a lokacin da nake danya har
sai dana bushe nafi karfinsu. Yanzu babu uwata a duniya ubana kuma fushi yake yi
dani yace kar in sake inje inda yake, yace babu ni babu shi bayan soyayyar dayake
mince ta rufe masa ido ya kasa gyara ni a lokacin daya kamata" Abbas yana kallonta
yace "yanzu ina zaki je?" ta juyo ta kalle shi cikin ido tace "gurinsa zanje. Gurin
Abba zanje. Inya ga dama ya saka kibiya ya tsire ni ko kuma ya tsine min, but that
will not change the fact that daga jikinsa na fito. Ni 'yarsa ce" Abbas ya girgiza
kai yace "iyaye are hard to deal with, most of the times. Sai mun zama very careful
in ba haka ba sai mu bata musu rai mu hadu da fushin ubangiji. Idan kinje gurinsa
ki sunkuyar da kai, ki nemi gafararsa kuma kome zaiyi miki karki rabu dashi har sai
yace ya yafe miki, kuma kema duk wani haushinsa da kike ji a zuciyarki ki goge shi
ki yafe masa ko da kuwa bai nemi yafiyar taki ba. Lokuta da yawa iyayen mu suna yin
abinda ba dai dai ba gare mu, amma dolen mu ne muyi musu biyayya in dai har hakan
bai sabawa ubangiji ba sannan kuma mu yafe musu saboda muna fatan...... " ta karasa
masa "saboda muma 'ya'yan mu su yafe mana kuma suyi mana biyayya. Duk abinda mutum
yayi shi za'ayi masa" ta fada tana tuna yadda Humairah ta kwace hannunta daga cikin
nata ba tare da tace ta yafe mata ba. Ya ce "exactly" haka nan kawai sai yaji duk
wani bakin cikin daya tashi dashi yau yana gogewa daga ransa. Yana jin cewa shima
ya yafe wa mahaifinsa abinda yayi masa, kuma for the first time, yaji yana so yayi
aure ya haihu ya tarbiyyantar da zuri'ar sa. A haka suka tayi wa juna nasihohi da
shawarwari drivern ma yana saka baki sometimes har suka iso dutse. Khadija tayi wa
drivern kwatancen unguwar da Aisha ta gaya mata tayi wa Abba sabon gida, godiya
miyatti, a unguwar suka yi ta tambaya har suka zo gidan, suna zuwa Khadija ta gane
shi saboda sabuntarsa da kuma manyan shagunan da suke kofar gidan. Sai kuma ta kasa
fita daga motar. Abbas yace mata "have courage. Babu abinda zaiyi miki, babanki ne,
akwai soyayya mai karfi a tsakanin ku" tace "haka ne, kawai dai shekaru na goma sha
biyar rabon da in ganshi" sannan ta bude kofa ta fita, ta leko ta window tace masa
"inayi maka fatan alkhairi, Allah ya baka abinda kake nema" sannan driver yaja mota
suka tafi. Har sun kusa barin layin ya juyo ya hangota still a tsaye a bakin gate
din gidan. Ya maimaita abinda tace masa, fifteen years rabon da ta ga babanta.
What's her story?

Aisha_Humairah
By
Maman Maama
Episode 72: Father's Love
Aisha ta mike tsaye tana kallon Humairah sannan tace "Ina ta tafi?" Humairah tace
"dutse. Cewa tayi ta koma inda ta fito, dutse shine tushenta dan haka can ta koma"
nan take fuskar Aisha ta washe, hakoranta suka bayyana dan nuna farin cikinta tace
"why didn't I think of that before? Khadija a yanzu babu abinda yake gabanta sai
neman yafiyar wadanda take ganin ta batawa, ke ce a farkon list dinta, sai ni sai
Abba, sai Kamal wanda da ta dauka bashi da rai. Ta samu tawa, she tried getting
yours, yanzu Abbane next, of cause can ta tafi" da sauri ta wuce Humairah wadda ta
sunkuyar da kanta tana jin babu dadi abinda tayi wa mamanta, mamanta da babu abinda
bata yi ba saboda ita, ji tayi babu abinda take so kuma kamar taga maman nata ta
rungume ta ta gaya mata ta yafe mata ita ma kuma ta nemi yafiyar ta.
Daga inda take tsaye tana jiwo aunty Aisha tana waya daga palo. "Assalamu Alaikum
Abba. Barka da yamma" sai kuma tayi shiru tana jiran taji ya fara mata fadan me
yasa Khadija ta taho gurinsa bayan yace kar ta taho, amma maimakon haka sai taji ya
kama tambayar ta ko ta kai Humairah gurin kamal? Tace a'a, nan take ya fara fadan
me yasa ba ta kaita ba? "ni na rasa number sa ne da tuni na kira shi yazo ya dauki
'yarsa, wanne irin jan rai ne wannan marar ma'ana? Mutum shekara da shekaru yana
neman 'yarsa kuma yanzu an ganta amma a kasa sanar dashi? Kunyi masa adalci kenan?"
tayi shiru, itama tasan bata kyautawa Kamal ba amma kuma tana so ta fara daidaita
tsakanin Khadija da Humairah ne, bata son ta kai ta gurin Kamal ya zamanto ta kara

ba sannan yace "Khadija kuma?" ba ta bashi amsa ba saboda yadda taji zuciyarta ta
karye, duk wani hope data samu sanda sukayi magana da Humairah ya fara narkewa yana
barin jikinta, wani sanyi yana maye gurbinsa. Cikin rawar murya yace "Khadijan ba
tana gurinki ba kika ce? Bana ce karta zo nan gurina ba bana son ganinta?" Aisha ta
zauna a edge din kujera tace "Abba Khadija 'yarka ce. Yes she is my sister but she
is also your daughter, your responsibility. Nura yace ta bar masa gida kai kuma
kace kar tazo gurinka to ina zata je? Koma gurin wa zata je ai bayanka yake Abba.
Yanzu ta bar nan gidan kamar yadda Nura ya bukata, mun dauka gurinka ta taho kuma
gashi kace mana bata zo ba, to ina ta tafi kenan? Baka ganin in ta koma 'yar gidan
jiya ba laifin mu bane ba? Mu da ya kamata mu kula da ita mune kuma muka sake
tunkuda ta?" Cikin in ina ya ce "Khadija ai ba yarinya bace ba. Duk abinda tayi ko
take yi tana sane, kuma kanta tayiwa ba mu ba, in ma ta koma ruwa mu tunda Allah ya
gani munyi iyakacin kokarin mu a kanta, babu wanda ya isa ya shiryar da wanda Allah
ya batar" Aisha tace "Abba wannan Khadijan ba wadda ka sani bace ba, wannan
khadijan is a changed person, ba zaka fahimta ba sai ka ganta da idonka, sai kaga
yadda duniya ta mayar da ita. Bata da wani buri a gabanta irin neman gafarar
wadanda ta bata wa. Ta bar nan tun safe, maybe tana hanya, maybe kuma ba nan ta
taho ba, amma ni dai ina rokar mata afuwa a gurinka, ina kuma rokon ka bata dama ta
roke ka gafara, kuma ka bude zuciyarka ka yafe mata ba domin halinta ba sai domin
saka ran gafara daga gurin ubangiji baki daya" tana gama magana ta kashe wayar ta
jingina kanta a jikin kujera, wani bari na zuciyarta yana bata hope din Khadija
tana kan hanya wani barin kuma akasin haka. Tayi tunanin kiran Aunty Bilki amma sai
ta fasa, dan tasan cewa tun suna yara babu jituwa tsakanin Khadija da aunty Bilki,
kuma ita tun zuwan Khadija gidan tun sanda taga yanayin da Khadijan take ciki ta
yanke shawarar ba zata gabatar da ita a gurin dangi ba sai ta koma haiyacinta
tukunna sannan zata kaita kowa ya ganta. Amma kaddara ta riga fata. Dan haka yanzu
indai har Khadija dutsen ta tafi da gaske dole kowa yasan zancen dawowarta. Dan
haka ta kudure a ranta cewa indai ta samu Khadija to zata shirya taro ta kira kowa
ayi solving komai. Har Kamal.
Humairah tana jin duk yadda ta kasance tsakanin Aisha da Abba. Duk da bata jin
abinda abban yake cewa amma ta fahimci cewa maman ta bata je gida ba. She may be on
her way kamar yadda Aisha ta fada but then she may not. Anya tayi wa mamanta adalci
kuwa? Anya tayi wa kanta adalci kuwa? Anya duk a cikin labarinsu da akwai wanda
yasha wahala kuma har yanzu yake shan wahala irin mamanta? Ta zauna a bakin gado ta
rufe bakinta da hannayenta tana kokarin hana kanta rushewa da kuka, ta dauko
handbag dinta ta fito da wayarta ta kira number din Al'ameen. Me yasa kullum in
tana cikin damuwa shine mutum na farko da take gayawa? Yana dauka tace "Ya Ameen
Mama ta tafi. Ta tafi ba tare da ko dumin jikinta naji ba".

A dutse kuma bayan Abba ya gama waya da Aisha, ya jima a zaune akan kujerar sa dake
can cikin shagonsa inda yanzu nan ne gurin zamansa koda yaushe, idansa ya kafa yana
kallon jerin kayan da suke jere a kan shelves din shagon amma ba wai kayan yake
kallo ba, tunani yake. A lokacin da Aisha ta kira shi ta gaya masa zancen zuwan
Khadija gidanta yaji bacin rai matuka, bacin ransa kuwa shine na kasancewar Khadija
tana raye all these years amma ko waiwayensu bata yi ba tana can only God knows
where tana yin only God knows what. Amma kuma daga baya sai wani side na zuciyarsa
ya kasa nutsuwa, ji yayi yana so ya sake ganinta dan da kyar ya hana kansa shiga
mota ya tafi Abuja, yana tuna wa kansa cewa tayi laifuffuka da dama ya kamata ya
nuna mata tayi ba dai dai ba, wannan son da ya ringa nuna mata tun tana yarinya da
kuma kasa kwabarta da yake yi ko da tayi ba dai dai ba sune suka kara assasa
lalacewarta. Amma yanzu gashi Aisha tace ta bar gidan ta tun safe, shi kuma bata zo
nan ba. Ina na tafi? Ko dai ta shiga gida ne yana zaune bai ga shigar ta ba? Ya
mike da sauri yana yiwa yaronsa bayanin zai shiga cikin gida.
A bakin kofar shagon ya tsaya yana kallon karamar motar hayar da tayi packing a
kofar gidansa. Sannan yaga wata mata ta fito, wata mata mai kama da irin almajiran
nan masu bi gida gida suna barar abinci. Ta danyi magana dana cikin motar sannan
motar taja ta tafi, sai a lokacin yaga fuskarta, da sauri ya koma cikin shagon
hannunsa a dafe da kirjinsa yana ganin duhu a cikin idonsa saboda yadda zuciyarsa
take neman fasa kirjinsa ta fito "Khadija?" ya furta a hankali, innalillahi wa inna
ilaihir rajiun. Sai yanzu ya fahimci abinda Aisha take nufi da tace in ya ganta zai
ga yadda rayuwa ta mayar da ita, yanzu Khadija n sa ce haka, 'yar lele 'yar gata
wadda samari har layi suke a kofar gidan sa saboda su samu magana da ita? Yarinyar
da tunda aka mika masa ita a cikin zaninta yake ganin tamkar duniya babu wani abu
da ya fita kyau a idonsa, lallai wannan izina ne baga Khadija kadai ba har gare
shi. Ji yayi tamkar shine silar komai, tamkar shine ya jefa rayuwar 'yarsa mafi
soyuwa a gare shi a halin da ta samu kanta a yanzu. Ina ma tun sanda take yin ba
dai dai ba a gaban idanunsa ya danne soyayyar da yake mata ya gyara mata rayuwarta?
Ina ma dai iyaye masu hali irin nasa zasu fuskanci ba gata suke yiwa 'ya'yansu ba
kuma zasu gyara tun kafin suyi mugun gani irin wanda yayi a yanzu?
Ya sake dawowa bakin shagon yaga tana tsaye har yanzu tana kallon gate din gidan,
gidan da 'yar daya wulakanta ta gina masa. Daga dukkan alama tsoro take ji, tsoron
shiga gidan take yi. Sai kuma ta karasa a hankali tayi knocking kofar, kofar ta
bude da kanta saboda dama ba'a rufe take ba. A hankali ta saka kafarta ta shiga
ciki tana bin gidan da kallo. Duk yadda tayi tunanin gidan ya wuce haka, dan
karamin part ne a farko mai kama da bq, daga gani part din baki ne dan babu alamar
motsi a ciki, sai kuma manyan parts guda biyu identical, daya a rufe daya a bude.
Na buden akwai takalmi a bakin kofa da kuma wastebasket a gefe. Nan taje ta sake
yin sallama, bata ji an amsa ba dan haka ta shiga palon. Hoton ummanta ta fara cin
karo dashi. Tasha lullubi ruf da ita fuskarta cike da annuri kamar ka kira ta ta
amsa. Nan take Khadija taji hawaye yana bin fuskarta. Tana missing umma sosai, tana
missing sanyin halinta da hakurin ta irin na Aisha, tasan da tana raye da zata yafe
mata kamar yadda Aisha ta yafe mata, da zata yi iyakacin kokarinta wajan ganin Abba
ya yafe mata. Ta tuna cewa da bacin ranta umman ta mutu kuma ba tare data nemi
gafarar ta ba. Lallai wata shari'ar sai a lahira.
Kamar daga sama taji ance "baiwar Allah lafiya?" ta juya taga wata 'yar karamar
budurwa wadda ba zata wuce 12 years ba, bata santa ba, tace "Abba nake nema yana
nan?" yarinyar ta harare ta cike da tsiwa tace "in bara kike ba sai ki tsaya a
bakin gate ba, ko kuma kije kofar shagon sa kiyi masa barar a can kya shigo wa
mutane gida har cikin palo dan salon sata kice wani Abba kike nema? Wallahi duk
abinda muka ga babu kece kika dauka." Khadija ta share hawayen da yake ta zuba daga
idonta ta sake kallon hoton Umma. Sai kawai taga yarinyar ta tuna mata ta yadda
take da lokacin kuruciya, bata damu da girman mutum ba zata gaya masa magana tayi
masa rashin kunya. Yarinyar ta sake cewa "Malama ki zo ki fitarwa mutane daga gida
nace" Kafin tayi magana mama ta fito daga wani daki, tsaf da ita, akwai girma a
tattare da ita amma da yake jikinta mai kyau ne sam bai nuna ba. Tace "Maama ke da
waye kike hayaniya haka?" sai kuma taga Khadija, ta danyi murmushi tace "ashe
bakuwa mukayi ma, sannu da zuwa" Khadija ta fahimci bata gane ta ba, sai ta durkusa
har kasa ta gaishe ta, tace "Abba yana gida kuwa?" Mama tace "bayanan, amma ban
gane ki ba baiwar Allah ko dai ba nan gidan kike nema ba? Dan makotanmu nan shima
maigidan Abba ake ce masa. Maama zo maza ki raka ta gidan su... " Sai kuma tayi
shiru tana kallon yadda idanun Khadija suke zubar hawaye, Khadija tace "Mama ni ce
fa Khadija. Baki gane ni ba ko?" Mama ta tsaya fakare tana kallonta sannan ta rafka
uban salati tace "Khadija? Ikon Allah. Khadija ke ce agidan nan yau?" Khadija dai
bata ce komai ba kanta yana kasa, Mama ta sake cewa "Maama yi sauri ki kira Alhaji
ashago kice yazo ga Khadija a gidan nan" Maama ta dau mayafi ta fita da sauri, Mama
kuma ta zauna ta rafka uban tagumi tana kallon Khadija tana ta nanata kalmar "ikon
Allah. Khadija?" a haka har Maama ta dawo tace ance ya fita yanzun nan. Mama ta
kira wayarsa tana ta ringing bai dauka ba daga baya ma sai taji wayar a kashe.
Khadija ta sha jinin jikinta cewa watakil yaga shigowarta shi yasa yayi tafiyarsa
ya kashe wayarsa saboda baya son ganinta kamar yadda ya fada.
Suna nan zaune jigum jigum har magrib tayi, amma da yake Mama wayayyiya ce kuma mai
hankali sam bata tambayi Khadija daga ina take ba ko kuma ya akayi ta koma yadda
take ba, sai daga baya sannan tace "bara in kira Aisha in gaya mata, tunda baban
naku yayi nisa, kinsan yanzu tana Abuja tana aure a can" Khadija tace "daga can
nake ai Mama, daga gidan yaya Aisha nake. Sai dai bata san nan na taho ba." Nan da
nan Mama ta dauko wayarta ta kira Aisha, sun jima suna maganganu wanda Khadija bata
fahimta sosai ba, sannan suka yi sallama. Mama tace "amma baki kyauta ba Khadija,
kin taho kin bar yarinyar nan cikin tunani? Da zaki taho ai sai ki gaya mata ko?
Suna can sun daga hankalin su ita da Humairah." Khadija taji babu dadi saboda ta
fahimci rashin kyautawar da tayi, amma sai tace "In na gaya mata ba zata barni in
taho ba, ko kuma tace zata taho tare dani. Ni kuma bana son su samu sabani da
mijinta saboda ni" Mama tayi mamakin jin wannan maganar daga bakin Khadija, anya
kuwa wannan khadijan data sani ce? Amma bata ce komai akan hakan ba sai tace "Aisha
tace in gaya miki, jibi Friday in Allah ya kaimu zasu taho gabaki dayansu ita da
Nura da yaran, zata kira yaron nan Kamal shima ya taho daga Yola, kinsan yanzu ya
koma can, sannan zata kira su Bilki suma su zo daga kano, Saturday duk za'a hadu
gabaki daya a nan. Ta kuma ce idan Abban ku yaki barin ki ki zauna anan in bude
miki part dinta ki zauna acan kafin tazo." Khadija ta girgiza kai tace "anan zan
zauna. Anan zan zauna har sai ya dawo, a kofar dakinsa zan ke kwana har sai yace ya
yafe min" Mama dai bata ce mata komai ba, ta saka yarinya Maama wadda Khadija ta
fahimci 'yar Binta ce, ta kai wa Khadija ruwa da abinci daki sannan ta ce da
Khadijan taje can tayi sallah taci abinci kafin Abban nata ya dawo.
Shiru shiru Abba bai shigo gidan ba, bai kuma kunna wayarsa ba, ita kanta Mama sai
da tayi mamaki saboda ba halinsa bane ba dan duk inda ya tafi zai fada yace ya tafi
guri kaza amma yau shiru. Har karfe goman dare tayi. A lokacin ne Mama ta yafa
mayafinta da kanta ta fita amma tun daga kofar part dinsu ta hango fitila a kunne a
part din bakinsu, tana zuwa ta tarar dashi shi kadai a zaune tayi tayi dashi yazo
yaga Khadija amma yaki, shi kadai yasan me yake ji a zuciyarsa, tana fita ya rufo
kofar sa yayi kwanciyarsa.
Khadija ranar bata yi wani baccin kirki ba, data danji motsi zata tashi ta tambayi
Mama ko Abba ne ya dawo? Sannan ga tunanin taron da Aisha tace za'ayi, she is not
looking forward to it amma tasan dole ne ta tsaya tayi facing demons dinta dan it
is the only way to move forward. Har gari ya waye bata wani runtsa ba kuma bata bar
su Mama sun runtsa ba, ita Mama har ta fara jin tausayinta dan haka gari yana
wayewa ta hada breakfast ta bata ta gaya mata inda Abba yake tace taje takai masa.
Taje taki knocking dakin, taki yin sallama saboda bata so tayi magana yaji muryarta
yaki budewa amma still da yazo bakin kofar sai ya tsaya ya tambaya "waye?" taji
muryarsa har cikin ranta, take hawaye ya taru a idonta tace "'yarka ce Abba.
Khadijan ka ce. Khadijan Umma. 'yarka ce mai tarin laifuffuka, wadda san zuciyarta
ya zamanto igiyar da take jan ragamar rayuwarta. 'yarka ce wadda ta tsallake ta
tafi ta barka a hannun 'yan sanda kana karbar hukunci abisa laifin da ita ta aikata
ba kai ba, 'yarka ce da ta tafi ta barka tsahon shekara goma sha biyar ba tare da
ta waiwaye ka ba" sai ta ajiye basket din abincin ta durkusa a kasa ta fara kuka
mai sauti tana cewa "Abba na tuba. Abba na tuba" ta jingina kanta a jikin kofar
tayi ta kukanta amma bai bude ba, da ta gaji da kukan sai ta zame ta zauna a gurin.
Ta kudure a ranta cewa babu inda zata je sai ya yi mata magana, ba zata rabu dashi
ba har sai ya furta da bakinsa cewa ya yafe mata, kamar yadda mutumin da suka hadu
a mota ya bata shawara. Haka tayi ta zama har rana ta tarar da ita amma bata tashi
ba. Mama ta aiko ta koma cikin gida amma taki. Tana jin motsinsa a ciki har ya gama
abinda yake yi sannan ya bude kofa dan shi a tunaninsa ta tafi, dai data bari ya
gama fitowa sannan tayi charaf ta rike kafafuwansa ta fara jera masa magiyar ya
yafe mata, kallo daya yayi mata ya dauke kai saboda baya son ganinta, zuciyarsa
zafi take yi masa. Yasa daya kafar da niyyar yin ball da ita amma shima sai ya
kasa, gani yake in yayi ball da ita kakkaryewa zata yi saboda ramar jikinta, kawai
shima sai ya saka kukan. Nadamar duniya duk ta saukar masa. Gani yake duk laifinsa
ne shi ne ya jefa 'yarsa cikin wannan yanayin, da ace ya bata darasin rayuwa a gida
da bata fita duniya ta koyo darasin cikin wahala ba. Dama hausawa sunce kaso naka
duniya ta kishi ka ki naka duniya ta so shi. Rayuwar 'ya'yansa itace typical
example of that saying.
A asibitin Rasheed Shakoni dake dutse kuwa, lokacin da Abbas yaje dakin da aka
kwantar da mahaifinsa bisa jagorar abokin mahaifin sa. Kallo daya yayi masa akan
gado yaji zuciyarsa ta karye, yaga ya kara wata irin rama ya kankance kamar karamin
yaro. Ya jawo kujera ya zauna yana duba file dinsa da aka miko masa. Ya jima yana
going through rubuce rubucen doctors wadanda ba komai yake fahimta ba sai yaci karo
dawata kalma data dau hankalinsa a cikin report na blood test da akayi masa, HIV
positive. Ya dago kai da sauri ya kalli mutumin da yake kwance a gabansa, a take
realization yayi hitting dinsa, tabbas yanayin ciwuwwukan sa sunyi kama dana mai
cutar aids, amma shi bai taba kawowa hakan a ransa ba saboda ganin yawan
shekarunsa. Da kuma tabbatar masa da yayi cewa tun akan mahaifiyarsa bai kuma
aikata alfasha ba, itama kuskure ne kuma yayi nadama tun tuni. Amma me wannan
result din yake nufi? Tun yaushe yake dauke da wannan ciwon ko kuma yanzu ya samu?
Ya akayi ya samu din ma? Ya ajiye takardun ya dafe kansa da hannayensa duk biyun ya
furta "Ya salam" a fili. Ya tuno da matar da ya hadu da ita a motar haya, ya tuno
abinda tace game da iyaye cewa wasunsu su suke jefa 'ya'yansu a halin kaka ni kayi.
A lokacin ya so ya bata labarin kansa, yaso yagaya mata iyayensa ne suka jawo masa
komai, yaso ya gaya mata iyayensa ne suka saka har yanzu yakasa aure. Amma sai ya
kasa fada mata din. It is not easy ka kalli idon mutum ka gaya masa cewa kai shege
ne. Kalmar shege wani mummunan tambari ne da ake bugawa mutumin da baiji ba bai
gani ba, mutumin da bashi da laifi.
Sau da yawa yakan gode Allah daya kasance cewa nashi asirin a rufe yake ruf, dan
very few mutane ne suka san koshi wanene, wannan ne ya saka yake kaffa kaffa da
alakarsa da mahaifinsa saboda gudun tonon silili. Wannan kuma shi yasa yaki aure
saboda yafi son harkar aure ta zamanto babu boye boye a ciki. And now this. Yanzu
in ma ya samu matar aure yayi mata bayanin cewa shi dan gaba da fatiha ne kaddara
ta aukawa mahaifansa aka same shi babu aure to da wanne ido zai kalle ta yayi mata
bayanin ubansa yana da cutar kanjamau? Abin yayi yawa wai shege da hauka.
A lokacin yaji motsin babansa ya tashi daga bacci. Ya bude jajayen idanunsa yana
kallonsa, wata zuciyar tana tunzira shi akan ya tuhume shi game da blood test
dinsa, wata kuma tana lallashinsa akan ya bari ya samu sauki tukunna sannan suyi
maganar. Ya ja kujerar kusa dashi yana yi masa sannu shi kuma yana amsawa cikin jin
jiki tare da yimasa godiyar zuwan da yayi da saka masa albarka. "Allah ya baka mata
ta gari Abbas, ya kuma baka zuri'a mai albarka wadda zasu kula da kai kamar yadda
kake kula dani". Abbas yace "Ameen Baba" sai kawai idansa ya hango masa matar da ya
hadu da ita yau, ko ya haduwarsu da nata mahaifinta ta kare. Sai kawai yaji yana
son ya sani.
Washegari da safe yaje airport yayi musu booking flight zuwa Abuja, sannan ya zo
yayi wa doctors din da suke duba shi bayanin zai mayar dashi Abuja tunda a can
likitocinsa suke, sai kawai yaji yana jin nauyin doctors din kamar kallonsa suke a
matsayin wanda babansa yake da cutar kanjamau. Wajan sha biyun rana jirginsu ya
daga. Ya kalli garin dutse, sai yaji kamar da akwai wani unfinished business daya
kamata ya dawo ya karasa.
A abuja. Aisha ta gabatar da kudurinta ga Nura, na taron data ke son shiryawa ranar
assabar mai zuwa saboda ayi komai a gama a gaban kowa. Bai ki ba saboda shi din ma
ba karamin relief ya samu ba na jin bayyanar Khadija a dutse, baya son wani abun ya
same ta ta sanadiyyar sa. Sannan yana son a hada Kamal da 'yarsa. Dan haka da kansa
ya kira Kamal din a waya, suka gaisa, sannan ya bashi Aisha yace zasuyi magana. Ta
gaishe shi sannan tace "in babu damuwa ina so ranar assabar mu hadu a dutse" yace
"dutse kuma Humairah? Lfy?" tace "there is someone I want you to meet".
Afuwan for keeping you guys waiting for long.

Aisha_Humairah
By
Maman Maama
Episode 73: The Meeting
Yola
Kamal ya ajiye wayar yana jin amsa kuwar maganar Aisha. "there is someone I want
you to meet" kuma wai a dutse. Bashi da ja a zuciyarsa yasan maganar menene, amma
waye someone din? A cikin mutum biyu yasan daya ce, ko dai Khadija ko kuma
Humairah, ko kuma Khadija da Humairah. Amma sai ya samu kansa da katse wayar ba
tare daya tambayi clarification ba saboda yana tsoron amsar. Yana tsoron ace masa
Khadija ce ta dawo amma ba tare da Humairah ba, yana tsoron ace masa wani mummunan
abu ya faru da Humairah. In dai kuwa har Khadija ta sake ya ganta va tare da
Humairah ba bai san me zaiyi mata bama, dan yana jin in ya shaketa sai numfashinta
ya bar jikinta.
Ya kalli agogo yaga karfe goman safiyar alhamis. Saturday tace masa zasu hadu a
dutse, tafiya daga Yola zuwa dutse kuwa ba karama bace ba dan haka dole yayi acting
very past. Ya san Alhaji yana gida dan bai cika fita ba indai ba wani muhimmin abu
bane ba sai kuma in zasuyi taron su na shugabannin Miyatti Allah, dan haka ya tashi
ya saka rigarsa ya kama hannun Amna suka shiga cikin gida. Dakin Inna ya fara zuwa
amma ya tarar bata nan tana dakin Alhaji. Daga nan sai ya shiga dadin Hajja Nene
abokiyar zaman Inna ya gaisheta ta amsa da fara'arta tana yiwa Amna wasa tana kuma
tambayar lafiyar mazajenta. Daga nan sai ya tafi dakin Alhaji. Ya tarar dashi a
zaune a palonsa yana cin dumamen tuwon alkama miyar busashshiyar kubewar da taji
nama da man shanu, sannan ga kunun tsamiya a gefe. Ya gaishe shi ya gaishe da Inna
sannan ya jawo plate ya fara saving kansa, Inna tace "uhum, matarka bata baka
abinci bane ba?" yayi murmushi kawai wanda bai kai ciki ba saboda tunanin maganar
da sukayi da Aisha dazu. Ya fara cin abincin a hankali yana tuna wani alkawari da
Aisha ta taba yi masa lokacin yana nemanta, alkawarin kullum zata ke yi masa tuwo
da daddare sannan da safe ta dumama masa, yayi saurin kawar da tunanin daga ransa.
Some things will never change. Bashi da problem what so ever da Maryam, duk da ba
auren soyayya akayi musu ba amma akwai kauna da shakuwa a tsakanin su ga kuma
'ya'ya biyar da Allah ya azurtasu dasu, kuma ko dan soyayya da Yakumbo tayi masa a
duniya baya jin zai iya wulakanta Maryam.
Sai da Alhaji ya gama cin abincin sa aka kawo masa ruwa ya wanke hannunsa sannan
yace "ya akayi ne Dan Yakumbo?" Kamal ya ture farantin daya ci abinci gefe sannan
ya zayyanawa Alhaji yadda sukayi da Aisha da kuma abinda yake tunanin shine
sanadiyyar kiran. Nan take Inna dake zaune gefe ta fara jero adduoi. "Allah yasa
karshen wahalar mu ce muda yarinyar nan tazo". Alhaji yace "Abinda za'ayi, ba zaka
tafi kai kadai ba, ka fita yanzu kaje gidan saleh k as kira min shi sai ku tafi a
motarsa, ku shirya a yau, gobe Juma'a da assuba sai ku dauki hanya. Idan har
yarinyar aka samu ku karbo ta ku taho mana da ita nan. Allah ya kiyaye hanya ya
kuma bada sa'a" Kamal yayi godiya sannan ya fita yana kokarin neman number din
yayansa Saleh, wanda shi yake bi a gidan kyma shine kusan tasu tafi zuwa daya
saboda sa'anni ne.
Assubahin Juma'a suka dauki hanya. Maryam tayi tayi ta bisu amma Kamal yaki, badan
komai ba sai dan baisan wanne labari zai tarar a dutsen ba, idan mummunan labari ne
kuwa he don't want her anywhere near abinda zai aikata.
Kano
A lokacin da aunty Bilki ta gama jin duk bayanan Aisha fada ta fara yi "yanzu Aisha
kina nufin kice min yarinyar nan kusan kwanan ta biyar a gidanki amma baki fada min
ba sai yanzu? Kina tunanin kinyi dai dai kenan? Sai data gudu tukunna ko? Da tabi
dare tabi rana ta yashe ki ta kara gaba aida sai dai ince miki Allah ya kara. Yanzu
ke ko a titi kika ga Khadija ban dauka zaki tsaya ki kulata ba ballantana har ki
ajiye ta a gidan ki tsahon kwanaki. Dama yaya Khadija take ballantana ta gama yawon
duniya shekara da shekaru in kikayi wasa ma mijin zata raba ki dashi. Wai ke me
'yar uwa ko?" haka tayi ta fada ita kadai Aisha tana jinta kawai, ta riga tasan
wannan shine abinda auntyn zata fada shi yasa tun da Khadija tazo ta ki gaya mata.
Ta tuna farkon guduwar Khadija aunty tace "ni fata na daya yarinyar nan ta mutu
kawai. Yo kar muje zunubinta ya hana Rabi'a kwanciyar kabari"
Dama yaya lafiyar kura balle tayi hauka? Dama ance mutum mai fada in girma ya fara
zuwa masa sai ya nunka yadda yake da. Ta rasa menene matsalar aunty da Nura akan
Khadija. Ita fa akayiwa laifin nan amma su sunfi kowa daukan zafi. Tace "aunty duk
ba wannan bane ba, komai ya wuce ai, in ana tuna baya ba za'a taba yin gaba ba.
Yanzu sai mu gode Allah daya dawo mana da su kuma mu jira muga abinda ya shirya
mana nan gaba" suka yi shiru tare. Sannan Aisha tace "dan Allah aunty ki zo" aunty
tayi ajjiyar zuciya tace "zanzo Aisha, amma ba dan Khadija ba sai dan Humairah"
Aisha tayi murmushi a ranta tace "duk daya"
Bayan sun gama wayar aunty Bilki ta jima tana jimanta abin, sannan daga baya ta
dauki waya ta fara kiran 'yan uwansu tana gaya musu labarin dawowar Khadija gida
sannan kuma duk wanda yake son zuwa ganin ta ya shirya Saturday da safe zasu hadu
gidan babban yayansu daga nan kuma su tafi dutse.
Saturday din kuwa da sassafe suka hadu a, maza biyu mata uku, sai Zahra, suka
dungumo sai dutse.
Abuja
Ranar Thursday din da Aisha ta sanar wa 'yan uwa labarin dawowar Khadija, a ranar
evening ne da ita, amma duk da haka sai ta fita da wuri da tafi office din Mami. Ta
gaya mata duk abinda ake ciki da kuma abinda ta shawarta sannan ta nemi shawararta.
Sun dade suna tattaunawa akan lamarin sannan Aisha ta wuce office dinta. But she
have one more person to break the news to, Humairah.
Sai dare ta koma gida. Dan haka sai bayan ta gama duk abinda zatayi tayi wanka tayi
shirin kwanciya sannan ta sauko kasa dakin baki inda nan Humairah ta tare bayan
tafiyar Khadija. Ta zauna akan bedside drawers tana kallon Humairah da take ta
flipping through littafinta amma kowa ya gani yasan ba karatun take yi ba. Tace
"Humairah gobe in Allah ya kaimu zamu tafi dutse. You are going to see your mother,
father and grandfather. Da kuma sauran wadanda suka samu zuwa" litrafin hannun
Humairah ya zame ya fadi kasa, ta dago manyan idonta ta sauke su akan Aisha. Aisha
tayi murmushi tace "yes, you are finally going to see your family". Sannan ta mike
ta fita ta barta.
Ta jima a zaune kamar wadda aka dasa ta sannan kuma wani adrenaline rush yazo mata
ta mike tsaye akan gadon ta fara tsalle kamar karamar yarinya, sai kuma ta fada kan
gadon rub da ciki ta fara kuka. All her dreams are becoming true a cikin sati daya.
Me zata ce wa Allah ita kam? Wacce irin godiya zata yi masa? Lallai gaskiya ne da
aka ce Allah yakan iya mayar da bawa ya zama sarki a dare daya. Ashe dama duk tana
da uwa tana da uba a duniya? Ashe dama itama tana da family? Ta tuno Abdallah da
abubuwan daya gaya mata ranar da zai koma makaranta. Sai data gama kukanta sannan
ta dauko wayarta ta kira the only number in her call history. Ya Ameen.
Kamar kullum in tayi kiranshi, sai data gama ringing ta katse sannan ya kirata
back. Tana dauka cikin muryar kuka mai hade da dariya tace "Ya Ameen gobe zamu tafi
dutse. I am finally going to meet my father" sai kuma kukan yafi karfin dariyar,
sai da tayi ta gama tukunna sannan tace "Ya Ameen kazo mu tafi tare kaji? Ina
bukatar support dinka" ya danyi murmushin da ta jiyo sautinsa sannan yace "am sorry
sweetheart. Ni ma zan so ace tare dani muka fara ganin Baba, but it is not my
place. Family affair ce bai kamata in shiga ba. But I promise to be with you a kan
wayarki har sai komai ya dai daita" ta share hawayenta tace "Ya Ameen nima ina da
family. Am no longer an orphan. I will no longer live on the streets. Ji nake kamar
mafarki nake yi. Am so happy bazan iya describing maka yadda nake ji ba" yace "babu
mafarki Humairah. Babu abinda yafi karfin ubangiji. And am so happy for you. Amma
fargaba ta daya? Da sauri tace "menene?" yace "ina tsoron kar su kwace min ke. Kar
su hanani aurenki. Yadda suka dade suna nemanki din nan da wuya su sake barinki
kiyi nisa dasu" ta turo baki kamar yana kallonta tace "wai kai komai sai kayi
maganar aure? Ni nace maka zan aureka ne?" yayi dariya a zuciyarsa yana hango yadda
tayi da fuskarta yace "indai ke ce mai sauki ne Humairah. Wannan bridge din kawai
nake jira mu gama crossing zan hado kayan yaki na gabadaya in yi yaki da zuciyarki
har sai kince min 'please Ya Ameen, Marry Me" ya fada yana kwaikwayon muryarta. Ta
fara bubbuga kafa a kan katifa tana cewa "Allah ba zan fadi haka ba, chafdi. Ni an
gaya maka zanyi aure ne yanzu?" yace "I can wait. No matter how long. Ai mahakurci
mawadaci aka ce ko? Nasan dai cewa zakiyi karatu ko doctor Humairah?" Ta dan bata
rai tace "I no longer want to be a doctor kuma" yace "a'a yaushe aka samu wannan
development din?" tace "you were right da kace min it is not my dream. It is my
mother's. To tunda yanzu ta dawo sai ta cika burinta da kanta. I want to be an
artist" yace "and I will support you har sai kin zama fitacciya a duniya. This I
promise"
Haka suka yi ta hirar su har lokaci yaja sosai sannan suka rabu. A daren Humairah
ta hada kayanta na tafiya tsaf. Sai kuma ta zauna taita practicing irin maganganu
masu dadi da kwantar da hankalin da zata yiwa mamanta, tayi kuma practicing yadda
zata taryi babanta in yazo, da abubuwan da zata gaya masa masu nuna irin sonda take
masa.
Washegari Friday tun kafin tayi sallah tayi wanka ta shirya tsaf cikin riga da
skirt na atamfa. Kayan sunyi mata kyau sosai kuma basu matseta da yawa ba. Ta yi
sallah ta shirya ta fito palo ta zauna da akwatinta a gaba. Lokacin da Aisha ta
sauko ta ganta dariya ta bata sosai. Ita kuma sai ta turo baki tana kunkuni saboda
ganin aunty Aishan a cikin kayan bacci. Dole ta tashi taje ta taya ta tashin twins
da shiryasu, sannan suka shiga kitchen tare, ita duk ranta ya gama baci dan bata ga
amfanin wannan girke girken da aunty Aisha ta tsiro dashi ba, dan me za'a wani
tsaya girka abincin da za'aci a hanya in anje can ba sai aci ba? Breakfast ma sai
da Aisha ta tsare ta da ido sannan ta cuccusa ba dan dadi ba. Bata saki fuskarta ba
sai da Al'ameen yazo. Sam bata yi tunanin zai zo suyi sallama ba ta dauka wadda
sukayi a waya shikenan. Aisha kawai kallonsu take yi tana mamakin rashin kunya irin
ta Al'ameen. Humairah tana dan mammazewa shi kuwa sai kara kulata yake yi. Sai da
suka shiga mota sannan yayi musu sallama ya tafi gurin tasa motar. Aisha tana
kallon Humairah har suka yi nisa tana waigensa.
Sai da suka dauki hanya sannan excitement din Humairah ya fara raguwa, ta fara kuma
jin tsoro. What if duk abinda ta lissafa bai kasance haka ba? What if baban nata ma
ba sonta yake ba? What if familyn nata suka kore ta suka kira ta da 'yar karuwa?
Sai taji duk jikinta yayi sanyi. Ta kwantar da kwanta a jikin kofar mota tana
kallon bishiyoyin da suke wucewa a guje. What if abinda Ya Ameen ya fada ya
kasance? Babanta ya dauke ta ya tafi Yola gurin familyn sa ya rabata da Mama da su
Aunty Aisha, ya rabata da Ya Ameen? Ta lumshe idonta. What if daga yau ba zata kara
ganin Ya Ameen ba.
Dutse
Kwana biyun da Khadija tayi a gidan Abba sai ya zamanto tayiwa kanta kulle. Tana
dakin Mama ko fitowa palo bata yi. Babu irin lissafin da batayi. Babban tashin
hankalinta shine wannan taron da za'ayi bata san ya zata kasance ba. Shin zata samu
abinda take nema ko kuma akasin haka? Shin zata samu yafiya daga wadanda ta batawa
ko kuma akasin haka? Tasan ba kowane yake da zuciya irin ta Aisha ba. Data kwanta
bacci sai tayi mafarkin wai mutane sun biyo ta a baya da gudu daga mai wuka sai mai
sanda zasu kasheta, Kamal shine a gaba.
Babban tashin hankalinta a yanzu shine yadda zasu kare da Kamal, ko ya yafe mata
tasan he is definitely going to take away his daughter, kuma tasan babu wanda zai
hanashi cos she deserves that, amma kuma ita ina zata iya rayuwa babu Humairah? In
ma kuma ta samu komai ya tafi mata yadda take so then what? What's next? Sanda ta
fito daga prison babban burinta kawai shine ta samu yafiyar wadanda ta zalunta bata
taba tunani beyond that ba, amma yanzu da abin yazo kusa yasan dole kota samu
yafiyar ko bata samu ba she is going to have a life after that, what is it going to
be?

Maman Maama
Episode 74: The Meeting 2
Safiyar juma'a Mama ta shigo tana bawa Khadija labarin su Aisha suna hanya, tana ta
dariyar wai ance Humairah tun asuba tayi wanka saboda doki. Amma maimakon Khadija
tayi murna sai taji faduwar gabanta ya karu, ta zauna tana ta kallon agogo tana
lissafin lokacin da ya kamata su iso. Lokacin taga kamar baya tafiya, da kyar
azahar tayi, lokacin Maama ta kawo mata abinci taci sannan tayi wanka ta hau gyaran
daki wai duk dan lokaci ya yi sauri, amma ina, da kyar la'asar tayi.
Tun safe dama Mama ta saka aka gyara wa Aisha part dinta sannan ta shiga kitchen da
kanta ta shirya musu abinci, wannan tsohuwar soyayyar tsakanin Aisha da Mama tana
nan har yanzu sai abinda ya kara gaba. Sai around 5pm sannan suka karaso. Lokacin
da suka shigo Khadija tana daki kamar kullum taji shigowar mota sannan kuma taji
hayaniyar su Mama. Ta mike da sauri taje window ta daga labule tana kallon su har
suka yi packing suka fara fitowa su Mama suna ta musu sannu da zuwa. Humairah ta
durkusa tana gaishe da Mama ita kuma ta dago ta ta rungume ta tana mata magana a
hankali yadda Khadija bata jiyowa. Ji Khadija tayi she can't wait any longer. Ta
fita da sauri ta wuce palo ta bude kofa sai kuma ta tsaya ta kasa karasawa, bata
san wacce irin tarya Humairah zata yi mata ba considering yadda sukayi a Abuja.
Amma suna hada ido sai taga ta saki Mama ta taho a guje bata tsaya a ko'ina ba sai
a kirjin mamanta. Khadija ta sauke wata ajjiyar zuciya wadda ta taho tare da wasu
hawaye masu zafi. Anya kuwa duk duniya akwai soyayya mai karfin wadda uwa take yiwa
'yarta/danta?
A hankali Humairah tace "Mama na yafe miki kinji? Duk abinda ya faru dani a

gareki. I was a bad mother to you" Humairah ta katse ta tace "ba haka bane Mama.
You were so good to me komai kika yi saboda ki kyautata rayuwata kika yi, duk halin
da kika shiga saboda ni kija shiga" Khadija ta sake mayar da ita kirjinta ta
rungume tace "you are wrong, komai nayi saboda kaina nayi saboda son kaina nayi.
Idan da saboda ke ne da sai in dawo dake gida cikin gatanki ba in barki cikin
rayuwar kaskanci ba. I took away your childhood from you. Na raba ki da kowa na

baya ko da kuwa hakan yana nufin zan rasa ki" ta fada tare da fitowar wasu sabbin
hawaye daga idonta. Wai hawayen mutum basa karewa ne?
A nan gurin mama suka zauna suka huta suka ci abinci amma banda Nura, shi can part
din su ya zauna wai ba zai iya zama anan ba (fillo). Sai yau Mama taga Khadija ta
sake har tana magana tana cin abinci sosai. Bayan sunyi sallar Magrib ne Abba ya

suka rungumeshi, Aisha tace da Humairah "ga grandfather dinki nan" sai Humairah

kwanon shinkafa take ci kullum ko?" duk suka kwashe da dariya, yace "ai ba abin

talauta ku, kuma yadda tayi saurin girman nan daga gani saurin tsufa zatayi, nan
gaba in kun fita tare sai an fara tambayar wacece uwar a cikin ku" Aisha tace

zan auri tsoho ba" ta fada tana bubbuga kafa a kasa, Abba yace "kaji tabararriya,

daya a cikin sati daya? In kinga na yarda ma to taimaka miki zanyi dan kar kiyi
kwantai" Humairah tayi narai narai da ido tace "wallahi ko kun aura min wannan ba

Abba.

Lallai kudi masu gidan rana. Anan suka yi breakfast gabaki dayansu. Sun gama kenan

Khadija daga cikin zuri'ar mu ba, kamar yadda ba zamu taba chanzawa tuwo suna ba.
Kaddarar data fadawa Khadija ba wai ita kadai ta fadawa ba, har damu danginta. Kuma

Gabadaya kowa jikinsa yayi sanyi. Yanayin lalacewar Khadija kawai ya isa ya
tabbatar musu da maganar Aisha haka take. Masu raguwar zuciya sai da suka yiwa
Khadija kuka ciki har da Aunty Bilki. Duk sun fahimci cewa kaddarar khadijan ce
tazo a haka. Akayi tayi wa Aisha tambayoyi game da yadda suka hadu da kuma yadda
suka hadu da Humairah, duk Aisha ta gaya musu, babu wanda bai yi mamaki ba yana
kara jinjina wa kudira da irada ta ubangiji.
Daga nan kananan mata suka shiga kitchen, Aisha, Zahra, Khadija, Shema'u, Humairah
da Maama suna tayasu hada abincin rana. Suna yi suna hirarrakinsu tamkar babu
abinda ya faru, ana ta updating Khadija akan abubuwan da suka faru lokacin da bata
nan, wane ya mutu wance ta haihu wane yayi aure. Wani ayi murna wani a jajanta.
Tamkar komai ya wuce. Amma agurin Khadija komai bai wuce ba. Not until she sees
Kamal. Sai da suka kusa kammalawa sannan Aisha ta kira Nura tace ya kira Kamal yaji
lafiya kuwa har yanzu basu karaso ba? Ba'a jima ba ya kira ta yace mata yace gasu
nan sun kusa shigowa.
Aka kaiwa maza abincin su part din baki mata kuma duka shimfida ledar cin abinci a
palo suka yi sallar azahar, masu bukatar wanka sukayi sannan suka zauna suna cin
abinci suna hirarrakin su da dariya. A lokacin ne su Kamal suka ka raso.
Nura ya kira a waya shi kuma yayi masa kwatancen gidan, da yake yasan gari basu sha
wahala basuka zo. Suna zuwa Nura ya shigo dasu ya wuce dasu direct zuwa part dinsa
dan su huta su kuma gabatar da sallolin da suke kansu. Amma Kamal sam hankalinsa
baya tare dashi. So yake yaji dalilin kiran. Bayan sunyi sallah ne aka aiko musu da
abinci daga cikin gida, sam loma kasa wucewa tayi ta makogwaron Kamal haka ya
hakura ya ajiye chokalin yace da Nura "Nura gayamin menene ya faru? Khadija ce ta
dawo ko? Ta dawo da Humairah?" Nura ya sauko daga kan kujera yana fuskantarsa yace
"Khadija ce ta dawo. Amma ba tare suka dawo da Humairah ba. Asali ma Humairah ta
riga ta dawowa gida sai dai dukkanin mu babu wanda yasan itace Humairah sai a ranar
da Khadija zata dawo" cikin rashin fuskanta Kamal da Saleh suka tambayi Nura a tare
"Kamar yaya? Me kake nufi?" Nura ya zauna ya warware musu zare daabawa tsaf. Tun
dauko Humairah da sukayi daga orphanage har zuwa bayyanar Khadija" Kamal ya mike
hawaye yana bin fuskarsa. He can't believe 'yarsa ce tayi rayuwa a karkashin gada a
Lagos, he can't believe 'yarsa ce tayi rayuwa a gidan marayu. Shi kam ta yaya zai
iya yafewa Khadija? Shi kam me zaiyi wa Khadija ya huce?
Ya bude kofar part din ya fito da sauri ya nufi part din da yake jin hayaniyar
mutane, yasan Khadija tana ciki yasan kuma Humairah itama tana ciki. Ji yake a
ransa ba zai barsu su kuma second daya a tare ba. Yayi knocking yayi sallama. Yaji
an amsa daga ciki dan haka ya tura kofa ya shiga. A ransa yasan in yaga fuskar
Humairah zai ganeta dan haka yana shiga ya fara bin fuskokin matan da suke cikin
palon da kallo daya bayan daya, amma babu Humairah kyma babu Khadija. Ya juya ya
kalli Nura daya karaso ya tsaya a kusa dashi yace "ina take? Ina Humairah take?"
daga ciki yaji an ambaci sunansa "Kamal" da wata murya irin wadda ya sani, ya juwa
ya kalli wadda ta kira shi din sai kuma ya dauke kai saboda bai santa ba, bai kuma
damu daya santa din ba shi 'yarsa kawai yake nema. Ya kama rigar Nura ya rike yace
"tana ina Nura? Kace min tana nan kuma banganta ba, please tell me ba wasa kake min
ba" aka sake kiran sunansa ya juya, wannan karon Aisha ce ta taso ta nufo inda suke
tsaye, ya saki rigar Nura yanufe ta da sauri yana cewa "Aisha da gaske Humairah
tana nan? Da gaske tana gurin ku watanni da yawa amma baku san ita ba ce ba? Aisha
ina 'yata? Ina Humairah?" Abinda kunnuwan Humairah ya jiye mata kenan lokacin da
take dawowa daga kitchen inda ta kai kaya. Babu tambaya tasan waye wannan wanda ya
rikice a palo yana nemanta, tace "Baba?" ya kasa karasawa gurin Aisha kuma ya juyo
yana kallon yarinyar data kira shi Baba. Idonsa yana sauka akanta yasan ita din ce
babu tantama. Humairah ce. Ta sake cewa "Baba" da dan karfi sannan ta zagayo ta
bayan kujeru da sauri ta shige cikin hannayensa daya bude mata. Ta sake cewa
"Babana" cikin muryar kuka. Ya rungume ta tsam a jikinsa kamar zai mayar da ita
ciki a hankali yace "it is OK am here now. Bazan kuma bari wani ya cutar min dake
ba." bai jira wata magana daga kowa baya saketa ya kama hannayenta yayi hanyar waje
da ita. Da sauri Khadija ta mike zata bisu amma Aisha ta rike ta ta zaunar da ita,
ta rufe fuskarta da hannayenta ta fara wani irin kuka mai ban tausayi.
Kamal yana fita da Humairah Nura da Saleh suka tarye shi suna tambayar sa ina
zaije, ba tare daya kallesu ba yace "yola zan tafi" sannan ya nufi motar da suka zo
da ita da sauri tana jan Humairah a bayansa. A lokacin ne su Abba suka shigo sun
dawo daga masallacin sallar la'asar. Abba ya karaso gurinsa yace "Kamal yaushe kuka
karaso? Yanzu nake so insa a kiraka aji me ya tsare ku a hanya haka?" Kamal yace

juya gurin su Saleh da suke tsaye suna kallon Kamal yace "bawan Allah ya daga zuwa
zaku koma kuma? Mutum ya taho tun daga Yola sannan ya juya ya koma ba tare da ko
hutawa yayi ba?" Saleh yace "ai ni kam babu abinda zai mayar dani cikin mota a
yanzu in kuma daukan hanya, in tafiya zaiyi sai dai ya tafi shi kadai amma banda
ni. Komai ba ahankali ake binsa ba? Da basu da niyyar baka yarinyar nab ai da ko
gaya maka labarin dawowar ta ba zasu yi ba". Haka mutane suka yi caa akan Kamal, a
dole ya hakura da tafiya amma yaki sakin hannun Humairah, da ita ya juya ya koma
gurin Nura da niyyar gobe da assuba zasu dauki hanya.
Bayan komai ya lafa 'yan kano suka yi sallama suka tafi, sannan 'yan dutse suma duk
suka kama gabansu. Da kyar Kamal ya bar Humairah ta dawo cikin gida bayan anyi
sallar magrib. Sai da akayi sallar isha akaci abincin dare sannan Aisha ta kira
Nura ta roke shi alfarmar tana son ganin Kamal. Ya gaya mata suna dakin bakin Abba
dan haka ta saka dogon hijab dinta ta fita ita kadai ta tafi can. Ta same su a
zazzaune akan kujeru su uku itama ta zauna. Sai a lokacin suka gaisa properly da
Saleh sannan suka gaisa da Kamal wanda ta lura yana ta bata fuska. Kawai sai gani
yayi ta durkusa a kasa a gabansa. Da sauri shima ya zamo daga kan kujerar da yake
yace "Humairah menene haka? Me kike yi haka?" ta dago tana kallonsa tace "Kamal ina
nemawa Khadija gafarar abinda tayi maka a gurinka, badan ita ba badan ni ba, ina so
ka dubi Humairah da Allah ya halitta a tsakanin ku sannan ka dubi girman Allahn
daya haliccemu baki daya ka yafe mata" ya mike tsaye ya fara zagaye gurin yana cewa
"haba Humairah ya zaki yi min haka? Ya zaki daureni da jijiyoyin jikina? Duk abinda
yarinyar nan tayi min, duk abinda tayi wa Humairah sannan kice in yafe mata? In na
yafe mata ke menene naki a ciki?" tace "babu komai nawa a ciki. Amma ina so ka sani
idan har baka yafewa Khadija ba ba zata iya rufe wannan chapter din ta rayuwar ta
ba, in har kuwa bata rufe wannan chapter ba bazata iya bude wata ba, zata yi ta
zama ne tana dwelling on the past" ya juyo yana kallonta sai kawai ya tuno da wani
abu, ya tuno da lokacin data taka da kafafuwanta taje har gidansa a nan dutse tace
ta yafe tun kafin ma shi ya nemi gafararta, daya tambayeta dalili sai tace tana son
tayi moving on ne, tana son ta bude sabuwar chapter a rayuwar tane. Ya dawo ya
zauna yace "ki gayawa Khadija na yafe mata duniya da lahira. Amma kuma ki gaya mata
am taking my daughter with me" Aisha ta mike tsaye tana murmushin jin dadi tace "no
body is stopping you. Yanzu in naje ma ni da kaina zan hada mata kayanta. Nagode,
Allah ya saka da alkhairi."

Maman Maama
Episode 75: The Next Level
Ba karamin dadi labarin Aisha yayi wa Khadija ba. Taji dadin cewar Kamal ya yafe
mata, bata taba tsammanin samun yafiyar sa cikin sauki ba amma tasan albarkar Aisha
taci. Sai dai kuma maganar tafiyar Humairah ta dagula mata sauran lissafinta gaba
daya. Dan haka ta samu guri ta zauna a bakin gado ta zabga uban tagumi da hannu
biyu. A bangaren Humairah kuma confusion ne a ranta, tana son Babanta sosai kuma
tana son zama dashi dan suyi making up for the lost time amma kuma bata son rabuwa
da mamanta da aunty Aisha, bata son rabuwa da Ya Ameen. Bata son ta sake wata
sabuwar rayuwar all over again. Ta gaji da chanje chanjen gida, ta gaji da chanjin
rayuwa, she wants to settle down. Dan haka itama sai ta samu guri ta zauna a kusa
da Khadija tayi tagumi kamar yadda tayi duk suka zubawa Aisha ido tana kara gyarawa
Humairah kayanta wadanda already dama a hade suke.
Humairah tace "kuma in na tafi yaushe zan dawo?" Aisha ta daga kafada tace "I don't
know" Humairah tace "to makaranta kuma fa?" Aisha tace "akwai makarantu a can ai"
sai Humairah ta fara sheshshekar kuka, sai da Aisha ta gama abinda take yi sannan
ta zo ta durkusa a gabanta tace "look at me Humairah. Ni kaina bana son tafiyar ki
amma ba zan iya hana babanki daukanki ba. Bana son shiga hakkinsa dan yana ganin
mutunci na sosai kuma bana son inyi crossing limit dina. Yayi min alfarma daya bana
son forcing dinsa yayi ta biyu. Kiyi hakuri ki bishi ku tafi, kije kiga 'yan uwanki

Gwoggo wance, haka dai har suka iso gidansu. Ta tsaya tana kallon gidan, katon

dai itace, to itama dai gata nan a cikin nata 'yan uwan.
Dakin Hajja Nene ya fara kaita, 'yar dattijuwar matar sai data tashi daga kan

su ta huta a can. Tun da suka shiga dakin 'yammatan suke ta mata labari a tare, ta

sosai, kauna irin ta 'yan uwantaka.
Ta jima anan kafin a kirata taje ta gaida Alhaji, suka tafi tare dasu saudat, suna

yace "ai kin riga kin zama, tunda har kika shigo gidana" sun jima anan yana
tsokanarta tana zuba masa yarinta ana dariya sannan yace aje a kaita gurin Inna.
A dakin Inna ne Humairah taga abin mamaki, anan ne taga fuska mai kama da tata dan

Inna ce tace "kai ku saketa haka nan mana karku ballata" amma Humairah sai ta kasa

zasu bace komai zai bace ta ganta back at the orphanage or worse back at the
street.
Sai dare sannan Humairah ta samu kanta. Ta kebe a uwar dakin Inna ta kira Aunty
Aisha ta sanar mata sunzo lafiya. Itama ta gaya mata sun koma Abuja sannan tayi
mata nasiha sosai akan zama da mutane da ka halayya ta gari. Sai da suka gama
sannan ta bata mamanta suka gaisa suka kuma gaisa da twins.
Har ta mayar da wayar jaka kuma sai ta kasa tashi daga gurin da take zaune. Taji ta
incomplete. Sai ta kara bude jakar ta dauko wayar tayi dialing number din Al'ameen.
Wannan karon bai jira ta katse ba dan bugu daya ya dauka yace "My God Humairah ina
kika shiga ina ta neman wayarki bana samu?" Tace "am sorry Ya Ameen, na kashe wayar
ne sai yanzu na kunna" yace "waye yace miki in za'ayi tafiya ana kashe waya, what

tana gushewa. Yace "how are you?" tace "am fine. Am home Ya Ameen" yace "home? Ina
kenan? Kun dawo Abuja ne?" ta girgiza kanta kamar yana kallonta tace "ina Yola"
yayi shiru kamar ruwa ya cinye shi, har sai data kira sunansa sannan yace "Aunty
Aisha fa?" tace "sun dawo Abuja ita da Mama" yace "wato dai fulanin Yola sai da
suka kwace mana ke ko?" ta danyi dariya tace "they are nice people, suna da kirki
sosai kuma suna sona sosai" yace "good. They better be in suna son zaman lafiya
dani" tayi dariya kawai. Yace "babu wani problem dai ko?" tace "babu, sai dai kadan
wani abu? Sanda naje dutse grandfather dina na can kawai sai yace wai yana sona zai
aureni, Aunty Aisha har da wani cewa wai ta bashi ni, ni kuwa nace wallahi bana
sonsa. Kuma wai muna zuwa nan shima wannan tsohon na nan gidan wai na zama
amaryarsa. Ni bansan me yasa tsofaffi zasu ke cewa suna sona ba. Ko nayi kama da
tsohuwa ne?" Tun data fara maganar Al'ameen yake dariya kasa kasa, sai data gama
sannan ta fahimci dariya yake mata tace "au dariya ma kake min ko?" Yace "Aisha
Humairah, wasa suke miki ba wai aurenki zasuyi da gaske ba. Wasa ne na al'adar

Alhamdulillah. Ina ganin yanzu duk abinda ya kamata mu fada a labarin nan mun fada.
