Episode 76 :The New Girl
Tunda jirgin su Abbas ya sauka a Abuja yake fama da babansa akan batun asibiti. Shi
so yayi daga airport ya wuce dashi asibiti shi kuma uban yaki yafi so a kaishi gida
in yaso likitansa ya bishi can ya duba shi. Dole hakan akayi yi. Duka tafi
tangamemen empty gidansa da babu kowa sai ma'aikata. Ya kaishi har bedroom dinsa
sannan ya kira doctor din a waya ya sanar dashi halin da ake ciki. Daga nan ya
zauna a kan kujera ya zubawa mahaifin nasa ido yana lura da yadda numfashinsa yake
fizga cikin jin jikin yanayin da yake ciki. Yana ta so yayi masa maganar blood test
dinsa amma kuma yana ganin this is not the right time. A haka doctor yazo ya same
su yayi duk gwaje gwajensu na likitoci, ya daura masa ruwa da duk abinda ya kamata
sannan yaja Abbas gefe yace "Ina ganin a shawarce ya kamata a fita dashi" Abbas
yayi saurin cewa "saboda me? akwai abinda kake tunani ne?" likitan yayi studying
Abbas a karshe ya yanke hukuncin he is strong enough to take the news sannan yace
"I am suspecting lung cancer, but am not sure. Kuma ya kamata ayi diagnosing da
wuri dan asan matakin da za'a dauka considering cewa jikinsa ba zai iya fighting
ba" sai yayi saurin karawa da cewa "saboda shekarunsa" Abbas yace "and because he
is HIV positive" doctor ya tsaya yana kallonsa, Abbas ya gyada kai yace "yes, na
sani. Amma abinda ban sani ba shine ya akayi ya samu? How?" doctor yace "bazan iya
gaya maka ba. Doctor-patient confidentiality." Abbas yace "OK. But at least tell me
tun yaushe yake dauke dashi?" doctor yace "shekaru goma kenan ina treating dinsa,
Yana shan magani yana komai dan haka bashi da problem."
Washegari Abbas yayi breaking news din to his father. Ya gaya masa kuma decision
din da doctor ya ke son dauka na fita dashi waje. A lokacin ne kuma ya gaya masa
yasan HIV status dinsa. News din cancer ba karamin girgiza shi yayi ba, dan tsoro
ne karara ya fito a fuskarsa. A ransa yace "so, this is it" Mutuwar dai gata nan
tazo amma kuma bai shirya ba, akwai abubuwa da yawa da yake so yayi kafin mutuwarsa
sannan yana si yaga 'ya'yan Abbas. Ya tabbatar cewa ya bar jininsa a doron kasa.
Tabbas bai shiryawa mutuwa ba saboda shi kamar yanzu ne ma yake jin dadin rayuwar.
Ya juya yana kalllon Abbas da yake zaune yana jiran amsar sa, he looks so pure, so
innocent. Yace "kace masa yayi duk shirye shiryen da suka dace na tafiyar" amma
Abbas ba wannan amsar yake jira ba, kuma shi uban ya sani amma sai ya gimtse ya
koma ya kwanta ya rufe idonsa yana jan numfashi da kyar. Wani kululu ya tsaya a
makogwaron Abbas, ya mike tsaye yana kallon tsohon yace "tunda na hadu da kai, abu
guda daya dayasa na yafe maka nake maka kallon uba shine dan ina sakawa a zuciya ta
cewa abinda ya faru tsakanin ka da Hajiya was a mistake, mistake din da babu wanda
yafi karfin ya fada kansa. Na saka a raina cewa daga nan duk kunyi learning
mistakes dinku kuma baku kara kusantar wata hanya makamanciyar wadda kuka bi da ba.
But right now I feel so ashamed. I feel so dirty. Shin kasan kuwa hukuncin da
ubangiji ya tanadarwa mazinacin da har ya tsufa bai tuba ba? Annabi cewa yayi ba
zai ji ko kamshin aljanna ba bayan ita kuma aljanna ana iya jin kamshinta har
tsahon tafiyar shekara dubu saba'in. Wanda duk baiji kamshinta ba kuwa to tabbas ba
zai shige ta ba" ya juyada sauri yayi hanyar fita daga dakin yana jin va zai iya ci
gaba da kallon tsohon ba. Har sai da ya kai bakin kofa sannan yaji daga bayansa
ance "have you ever wonder why bani da aure a shekaru na?" ya juyo amma bai ce
komai ba, ya cigaba da cewa "na samu ciwon nan tun zamanin kuruciyata tun bayan
kuskuren daya faru da mahaifiyarka. Ni kaina bansan yadda akayi na samu ba, zata
iya yiwuwa a gurin aski ne ko kuma a asibiti, ni dai kawai an gwada ni ance ina
dashi" Abbas ya dawo ya zauna akan kujerar daya tashi yana auna maganar tasa. Ya
cigaba da cewa "tun a lokacin nasan sakayya ce Allah yayi wa mahaifiyarka akaina ta
wannan hanyar, tun a lokacin kuma na kudure niyyar ba zanyi aure ba saboda bazan
shafawa wata ko wasu ciwon dani na dauko wa kaina ba. Daga baya nayi aurarraki
saboda surutun mutane amma duk matar dana aura in taji ciwon da nake dashi sai ta
ki zana dani ta gudu. Wannan yasa nake a yadda nake yanzu Abbas, alone. Babu mata
babu 'ya'ya ballantana jikoki. Sai kai kadai Abbas. Kai kadai nake da kai duk
duniya. Yanzu gashi rayuwata tazo karshe kuma zan mutu alone. Please Abbas ka daure
ka cika min burina kafin in bar duniya inga family dinka. I live a sad and lonely
life please don't let me have a sad and lonely death".
Ranar gabadaya Abbas wuni yayi yana tunanin maganar babansa kuma har cikin ransa
yaji ya yarda da maganar. Wani irin tausayinsa yake ji a zuciyarsa dan haka nan
take yaji yana son cika masa burin nasa musamman yanzu da rayuwarsa take a kan
gargara duk da cewa babu wanda yasan gawar fari sai Allah. A cikin satin suka gama
shirye shiryen fita dashi waje tsaf, amma kuma sai ya hana abbas din binsa yace
"bana son ka jawo hankalin mutane zuwa ga dangantakar mu, you have a good name and
I want you to keep it for you and your family." dole Abbas din ya hakura da binsa
ya tsaya a airport yana kallon jirgin da suka hau shida likitansa yana keta hazo,
anan ya yanke shawarar kafin ya dawo he will have a big surprise for him.
Bai bar airport din ba sai da yayi booking next flight zuwa babban birnin jahar
jigawa, garin da yake jin tamkar yayi ajjiyar daya kamata yaje ya karba. Washegari
kuwa jirgin nasu ya sauke su a garin dutse. Yayi shutter taxi ya ringa bin
kwatancen da suka bi rannan har yazo unguwar kuma yazo har kofar gidan, ya fito
daga motar yana kallon layin har sai da ya tabbatar baiyi kuskure ba amma sai ya
kira wani yaro ya tambayeshi "nanne gidan alhaji zayyan?" aja tabbatar masa da nan
din ne, sannan ya tura yaron yace yayi masa sallama da....... sai kuma yayi shiru,
sai yanzu yayi realizing ko sunanta bai sani ba, sunan babanta ma ya tuna ne sanda
ta tambayi wanda ya yi musu kwatancen gidan. Yace da yaron "kace ana sallama da
matar da tazo gidan nan last week daga Abuja".
Yaron ya shiga har ciki yayi sallama a kofar palo aka amsa masa ya shiga, Abba yana
zaune a kan carpet yana cin abinci Mama tana zaune a gefensa, ya gaishe su ya isar
da sakon da aka turo shi ya fada. Suka kalli juna sannan Mama tace "kace masa bata
nan. Ta koma Abuja" har ya juya zai fita Abba yace "Abdul. Kace masa ance ba nan
gidan bane ba. Babu wadda tazo gidan nan daga Abuja. Mu bamu da kowa a Abuja" yaron
ya amsa sannan ya fita. Mama tana kallon Abba da alamar tambaya a fuskarta. Yace
"ba zai wuce irin mazan da tayi mu'amala dasu ba ada. Sunji labarin zuwanta shine
zasu dara dawowa daya bayan daya. I won't let that happen."
A waje kuma mamaki ne ya kama Abbas sanda sakon ya iske shi. Shi dai yasan tabbas
nan ne gidan amma me ya faru? Tace masa gidan babanta ne dan haka babu yadda za'ayi
suce basu santa ba. Except, except idan bayan ya tafi fasa shiga gidan tayi ta koma
inda ta fito. In haka ne kuwa he is never going to see her again. Ya sallami yaron
ya koma cikin motar ya jingina kansaya rufe idonsa yana tuno yadda ya barta a tsaye
a gurin. She looked so scared, so sad and so repented. Bai taba ganin genuine
nadama ba irin wadda ya gani a fuskar matar a ranar. Bai san labarin taba amma
yasan ko ma me tayi to tayi nadama kuma ba zata sake ba. Drivern motar ya juyo yana
kallon sa yace "ya kamannin matar suke? Ni dan unguwar nan ne maybe nasanta" ya
bude idonsa yana kallon drivern yana tunanin me zai ce masa? Komadaddiya, mummuna
mai siffar almajirai? Sai kawai ya girgiza kansa yace "nagode. Kai ni hotel din da
zan kwana kafin gobe". Bayan motar taja ne ya juya yana kallon gidan a ransa yace
"maybe we are never meant to be" Maybe not.
Tunda su Khadija suka sauka a Abuja, the first thing da Aisha tayi shine sakata a
islamiyya. Sannan ta dauko keken dinkinta dana saka ta bayar akayi musu service ta
saka mata a dakin baki inda nan ne dakin Khadija a yanzu. Ita kuma Khadija kachokam
ta mayar da hankalinta kan karatunta da kuma koyon dinkin ta dan weekend din farko
da tayi a Abuja gaba daya sunyi spending dinsa ne gurin koyon yankan dinki, ita
kanta Khadija tana mamakin yadda take ganewa dan tasan bata daga cikin mutane masu
saurin fahimta, ashe dai babu abinda baya chanzawa? Ashe dai komai yana dangana ne
da karfin niyyar mutum?
Satin ta biyu kadai amma ita kadai tasan ta samu chanji sosai dan tana iya ji a
jikinta, ta samu cima mai kyau, muhalli mai kyau, ga kulawa ga kuma uwa uba
kwanciyar hankali. Abu daya ne yaje damunta shine rashin darling daughter dinta a
kusa da ita amma kuma kusan kullum sai sunyi waya da ita kuma ko daga muryarta zaka
tabbatar cewa hankalinta a kwance yake kuma tana enjoying inda take din, sai dai
itama tana missing dinsu.
Second weekend dinta a abuja ne suka yi surprise baki babu zato babu tsammani.
Kamal da Maryam da Humairah da yaran gabadaya. Sai a ranar ne Kamal da Khadija suka
hadu kuma haduwar tasu wasn't as Khadija expected dan ko kadan bai yi mata wata
mummunar magana ba ita ma kuma Maryam kyakykyawar karbar data samu daga Aisha ya
toshe duk wata maganar da tayi niyyar gayawa Khadija.
Sai da suka nutsu suka huta sannan Kamal ya fadi dalilin zuwan nasu yace "Abinda
nayi a dutse sam ba dai dai bane ba. Na fahimci kuskurena yanzu shi yasa na taso
nazo domin in bada hakuri in kuma yi godiya gareku Aisha da Nura bisa riko da
kyautatawar ku ga Humairah. Allah ne kadai zai iya biyaku dan ni bazan iya ba, ina
kuma rokonsa daya saka muku da mafificin alkhairin sa" gabadaya aka ce ameen.
Sannan yace "abu na gaba kuma Humairah tayi min bayanin wani family anan Abuja da
suka taka muhimmiyar rawa a rayuwarta, ina neman alfarmar ku daku gabatar dani
garesu saboda inyi musu godiya personally a gurinsu, Allah ya saka musu da
alkhairin sa dasu da duk wanda ya taimaka wajan kyautata rayuwar Humairah"
"Kuma maganar makarantar ta, ina neman alfarmar ta zauna anan tare daku ta karasa
karatunta saboda na fahimci chanje chanjen makarantar da akayi mata yayi yawa, kuma
ina saka ran cewa zatafi samun karatu mai kyau anan dan nasan a can ba lallai ne mu
sama mata makaranta mai kyau irin wadda take anan din ba. Dan haka zan bartaa
karkashin kulawarku in kun yarda taci gaba da karatu mu kuma sai take zuwa mana duk
sanda suka samu hutu" Nura yayi dariya yace "Humairah ai 'yar mu ce Kamal, babu
zancen neman alfarma a tsakanin mu" sukayi musabaha duk suna jin dadi a
zuciyoyinsu.
Kamal bai bar Abuja ba har Monday. A ranar tare suka tafi kai yara makaranta dashi
da Nura, saboda yace akwai wani abu da yake son yi a makarantar. A ranar Humairah
tana dawowa daga makaranta ta shiga daki ta rufe kanta ta kira Al'ameen. Ya dauka
yace "Humairah" tace "shsss. Ba Humairah ake cewa ba, you my dear, are talking to
the new girl" yayi dariya kawai yace "wacece New Girl din?" Ta zauna a bakin gado
tana karkada kafarta cikin Nuna irin farin cikin da take ciki tace "ni mana" yace
"ban gane ba?" tace "dazu tare da Baba muka je makaranta, and he changed my name in
the school register. Am no longer Humairah Mahmud. Daga yanzu sunana Aisha
Kamaluddeen Gidado Yola" sai Al'ameen yaji sunan yayi sounding new to him, so nice,
yet so strange. Yayi mata murna sosai suka danyi hirarsu akan zuwan da Kamal zaiyi
yau da daddare palace gurin daddy sannan suka yi sallama.
Bayan sunyi sallama Al'ameen ya dade zaune da wayar a hannunsa yana jujjuyata yana
jin wani abu a ransa amma ya kasa tantance menene. But it has to do with wani abu
da Humairah ta gaya masa yanzu a waya. Har ya gama abinda yake yi a office ya fita
bai fahimci menene yake pulling at his heart ba. Sai daya shiga mota ya fara tafiya
sannan maganar ta warware a kansa. "am no longer Humairah Mahmud" she is not
Humairah Mahmud dan haka she is not the girl he proposed to. She is not yarinyar da
aka kafa masa doka akayi masa dabaibayi akan neman auren ta, She is now a new girl.
A girl he is more in love with than waccan din.
Kawai sai ya samu kansa da dauke kan motar yayi hanyar gidan uncle dinsa Abbas,
yana jin zuciyarsa fes sai wani farin ciki da yake ratsa shi. Ta ci sa'aya same shi
bai jimada shiga gidan ba. Yana ganinsa yasan da magana a bakinsa yace "wannan
fuskar taka kamar gonar auduga nasan magana ce mai dadi ka kawo min, tell me, ko
dai sirika na samu?" Al'ameen ya sunkuyarda kansa yana shafa keya abinda ya
tabbatarwa da Abbas cewa maganar haka take. Nan fa ya saka shi a gaba da tsokana
har sai daya saki jiki. Sannan yace "to ya akayi? A ina na samu Surukar?" Al'ameen
yace "a yola. Sunanta Aisha Kamaluddeen. Abinda nake so uncle yanzu shine kaje
gurin Takawa ka gaya masa na janye maganar auren waccen yarinyar da na shigar da,
na fasa auren Humairah Mahmud, yanzu na samu wata Aisha Kamal, ita nake so ina kuma
neman amincewarsa da saka albarkar sa. Duk wani bayani da za'a nema dangane da
asalinta in akaje Yola duk za'a samu" a take Abbas yayi masa alkawarin insha Allah
gobe zaije ya gabatarda kudurin nasa, ya kuma taya shi murna tare dayi masa fatan
alkhairi.
Al'ameen ya koma mota ya dau hanyar gida yana taya kansa murnar yadda ya warware
damuwarsa. Tun lokacin da aka samu iyayen Humairah Al'ameen yake fargabar tunkarar
Takawa da maganar, dan yasan da zarar ya gaya masa cewa an samu iyayen wannan
yarinyar da yake so wadda ba'asan iyayenta ba, abinda Takawa zai fara yi shine
tambayar "how?" ta yaya aka samu iyayen nata? Kuma asali ma menene ya rabata da
gida har tsahon wadannan shekarun? Wannan tambayar kuma ita zata binciko sirrin da
shi Al'ameen din baya fatan kowa a familyn sa ya sani dangane da humairah. Amma
yanzu da zarar Abbas uaje masa da maganar wannan sabuwar yarinyar Aisha, it means
officially an soke maganar Humairah kenan as far as Takawa is concerned. Babu wani
sauran bincike akan mai yasa ta bar gida, abinda zai nema kawai shine asalinta
wanda yana aikawa Yola zai tarar da familynta wanda daga labaran da Humairah take
bawa Al'ameen ya fahimci babban gida ne. And that will close the case.
Shi yasa hausawa suka ce cikin karin magana "mai laya ka kiyayi mai zamani".
Happy Arfat day to you all. Allah ya sa muna da rabon zuwa next year. Wadanda kuma
suka je Allah ya basu ikon komawa.
Happy Eid in advance. Da fatan za'aci naman sallah lafiya.

Aisha_Humairah

By

Maman Maama

Episode 77: Two Worlds, One Family

Washegari, kamar yadda Abbas ya yi wa Al'ameen alkawari haka yayi, yana tashi daga
gurin aikinsa direct ya zarce palace gurin takawa. Kamar kullum cikin 'yan watannin
nan, a zaune ya same shi a palonsa na ciki inda nan ne gurin zamansa kullum, nan ne
inda yake ganawa da duk wani bako makusancinsa sai dai in bakon wanda ba za'a iya
shigowa dashi ciki ba kuma babban mutum ne wanda ba zai ki ganinsa ba sai ya fito
palon waje ya ganshi, amma zuwa fada kam sam ya daina ya barwa tilon dansa, Sultan.

Abbas ya durkusa ya gaishe shi cikin ladabi da biyayyar da akayi masa tarbiyya da
ita tun jarirantakarsa, kuma for the first time shima yau sai yaga ya samu fuska
mai kyau a gurin marikin nasa, daga dukkan alamu yau sarki Sadiq raha yake ji dan
haka cikin sauki ya gabatar masa da sakon Al'ameen. Sarki Sadiq ya tashi zaune daga
kashingiden da yake ya harde kafafuwansa yana kallon Abbas yace "kira min shi kace
yazo yanzu" da sauri Abbas ya dauko yawarsa yayi magana urgently da Al'ameen sannan
ya kashe yace "gashi nan zai karaso yanzu" sai kuma suka yi shiru, kan Abbas a kasa
yayin da sarki Sadiq ya ware idanuwansa a kansa yana studying dinsa, he obviously
looks disturbed kamar wani abun yana damunsa. Yace "kai kuma fa?" Abbas ya dago
kansa yace "na'am?" sarki Sadiq yace "kai kuma yaushe zakayi aure?" Abbas ya danyi
murmushi wanda bai kai ciki ba amma baice komai ba, yana tuno da wayar da sukayi da
likitan babansa dazu da safe inda yake tabbatar masa da cewa lung cancer ce take
damun baban nasa. Sarki Sadiq yace cikin hade rai "ya kamata kasan me kake ciki
hakanan, you are no longer young and you are not getting any younger. So kake in
tsufa ya kamaka ka kasance kai kadai a gidanka babu mai taimaka maka?" Abbas ya
tuno da yadda mahaifinsa yake zaune shi kadai a gidansa kamar maye, he definitely
don't want to end up like his father. Yace "za'ayi, Allah ya taimaki sarki, very
soon insha Allah" yace "good for you. Cikar mutum shine ya zama yana da iyali, aure
kuma shine cikon addini".

A lokacin Al'ameen ya shigo, yayi gaisuwa sannan ya koma gefe ya zauna. Takawa yace
"munji sakonka a gurin kawunka, kuma munji dadi sosai Allah yayi maka albarka.
Yanzu hakan baya fi maka ba? Ka kyautatawa kanka ka kuma kyautatawa zuri'ar ka?
Muma ka kyautata mana" aja danyi shiru sannan yace "ita wannan din a ina take?"
Al'ameen yace "a Yola take Allah ya taimaki sarki" yace "to sai ka gaya mana sunan
wani a danginta a yola din, ko kuma sunan unguwarsu, yadda zamu samu a bincika mana
asalinta sosai" Al'ameen ya shafa kansa yana tunani, dan shi kam bata taba gaya
masa sunan unguwar su ba, kuma babu sunan wanda ya sani sai sunanta sai kuma few of
cousins dinta da takan bawa yawa su gaisa sanda take can. Amma kuma ba zaice bai
sani ba dan haka yace "Kakanta, wanda ya haifi babanta sunansa Alh Muhammad Gidado"
Takawa yayi sauri ya kalleshi yace "Muhammadu Gidado Illeja?" da sauri Al'ameen ya
gyada kansa, he remember her mentioning something like that, fuskar Takawa ta washe
ya koma ya kashingida yace "ah to alhamdulillah, nasan Alhaji Gidado sosai, yana
daga cikin shugabannin kungiyar fulani ta Miyatti Allah, mu kan hadu dashi a gurin
tarurrukan da suka shafi harkar fulani. Mutumin kirki ne wanda Allah yayi wa
arzikin iyali" ya juyo yana kallon Al'ameen da yake gefe yana ta zuba murmushi yace
"babu komai. Zamu neme shi muyi magana" ya juya kan Abbas yace "kai kuma sai ka
samu yayanka ka gaya masa abinda ake ciki" daga nan yayi shiru, dan haka duk suka
yi sallama suka tashi.

A waje ne Abbas ya saka Al'ameen a gaba da tsokana wai ya kasa rufe bakinsa. Suka
shiga mota a tare suka tafi gidan daddy.

A gidan Nura kuma, yau ne Kamal zai ga Sultan. Dan haka tunda safe Aisha ta kira
Mami ta tambayi time din da zasu same shi agida ita kuma ta gaya mata da yamma. Dan
haka yammar nayi bayan an dauki yara daga school sai suka shirya gabadayansu na
niyyar zuwa gidan Mami amma sai Khadija ta zuke tayi kwanciyarta a daki tace bata
jin dadi. Babu wanda ya matsa mata dan duk sun san zuwan nata ba wani amfani ne
dashi ba in Kamal yaje yayi godiya bisa rakiyar Aisha da Nura ma ta wadatar. Ita
kuma Khadija a nata bangaren taki zuwa ne saboda she is not ready, physically and
mentally, saboda tasan alakar Humairah da Al'ameen dan haka tana gani duk aka tafi
aka barta daga ita sai 'yan aiki.

Suna zuwa Aisha, Maryam, Humairah da yara suka shiga ciki. Nura kuma da Kamal suka
tsaya a waje. Da gudu Humairah taje ta rungume Mami suna dariya, Mami tana jin son
yarinyar har cikin ranta. Ta dago fuskarta tana kallonta tace "ohh Humairah har
wani kyalli kike yi, lallai dutse tayi dadi, ko Yola zance ne?" Humairah tace "duk
biyun" Mami tace "to wanne kika fi so? Yola ko Dutse?" da sauri tace "Yola"sai kuma
ta kalli Aisha taga tana harararta cikin wasa sai tace "duk biyun" akayi dariya.
Sannan Mami ta juyo ta fara yi musu sannu da zuwa, Aisha tace "Munyi fushi, bayan
da hankalinki yana kan 'yarki duk kin ma manta muna gurin?" Mami ta shafa kan
Humairah tace "ayi hakuri, kinsan weakness din uwa shine 'ya'yanta" daga nan suka
gaggaisa, Aisha ta gabatar da Maryam a gurin Mami sannan aka kawo musu kayan motsa
baki yayin da Mami ta shiga ta gaya wa daddy zuwan bakin. Kofar palonsa na waje
yasa aka bude musu, ya shiga ya zauna sannan yace a kirawo su.

Lokacin da aka yiwa su Kamal iso suka shiga palon daddy, shi kadai suka tarar a
palon amma sai Kamal yaga kamar ya cika palon gabadaya saboda kwarjininsa. Duk
kallon da zaka yi masa ba zaka tantance shekarun sa ba kamar yadda ba zaka iya
tantance kamanninsa ba. Sai Kamal yaji ya kasa kallonsa cikin ido. Gani yake yi ma
kamar in ya gaishe shi ba zai amsa ba, amma ga mamakinsa sai yaga ya mike tsaye ya
karaso har inda suke tsaye ya miko musu hannu fuskarsa dauke da murmushi. Sai yaga
ashe ma ba wani girma ne dashi sosai ba dan bai cika tsayi ba amma jikinsa sam ba
irin wanda ya saba gani bane ba. Lallai sarauta daban take. Kuma jinin sarauta
daban yake.

Haka suka gaisa sosai. Nura yayi masa bayanin Kamal a matsayin mahaifin Humairah.
Ya sake bashi hannu suka sake gaisawa sannan ya taya shi murnar ganin 'yarsa da
yayi. Yace "I can't even begin to imagine irin halin daka shigaa shekarun nan. Kaga
ni 'yata mace guda daya ce,very talkative girl in dai tana gida sai ta saka min
ciwon kai da surutun ta amma kuma data fita waje zanji hankali na ya tashi, nayi ta
kiranta kenan har sai naga ta dawo gida lafiya sannan hankali na zai kwanta. The
very first time dana fara ganinta da saurayi kuwa, a ranar nace masa ya turo
iyayensa, I expected him to run ashe da gaske yake and he turned out to be from a
very prestige family dan haka kawai na bashi aurenta. Sai da na kaita dakin mijinta
sannan naji hankali na ya kwanta. So, babu wanda zai fahimci halinda ka shiga sai
wanda ya shiga irinsa".

A lokacin Mami ta shigo dasu Aisha da yara gabadaya. Aka sake sabuwar gaisuwa
sultan yana ta tsokanar Sadiq yana ce masa "kaga kai takwara nane kuma kai babana
ne. I wanted to name one of my sons Abubakar amma Allah baiyi ba sai muka samu
matsala a haihuwar autanmu abdallah, matsalar da ta kai har sai da aka cire
mahaifar Maimuna sannan shi kuma yaron ya zama kurma, gashi nan kuma har yanzu haka
rayuwarsa take" Kamal ya fara kokarin jajanta masa amma sai yayi dariya yace "don't
get me wrong, ba complain nake ba dan wadannan yaran guda biyu are more than I
could ever ask for. Sun ishe ni komai and am very proud of them". Kamal yace "haka
ne ranka ya dade. Dole ne mutum ya kasance mai yawan godiya a duk al'amuransa,
godiya ga ubangiji da kuma godiya ga duk wanda ya kyautata masa. Wannan kusan shine
babban dalilin zuwan mu gidan nan yau dan mu mika godiyar mu marar adadi zuwa
gareka kai da iyalinka a bisa taimako da kuma rikon da kuka yi wa Humairah. Babu
abinda zamu iya biyanku dashi illa muyi muku addu'ar dacewa da dukkan alkhairin
dake duniya da lahira. Allah ya biya ku" Daddy ya daga masa hannu ya dakatar dashi
yace "nagode da adduoin ka amma ina so ka fahimci cewa ba wai mune muka taimaki
Humairah ba, Allah ne ya taimake ta, shi ya bamu ikon daukota daga inda muka
dauketa din. Akwai yara da yawa irin ta, wadanda suke cikin irin halin da ta shiga
ko kuma ma haki wanda yafi wanda ta shiga amma Allah bai bamu ikon taimakon su ba
har yau." ya jingina kansa da jikin kujera yana kallon sama yace "da ace ina da iko
da babu yaron da zai kuma kwana a titi, da babu yaron da zai kuma kwana da yunwa,
amma kowa da kaddararsa, kowa da yadda Allah ya rubuta masa rayuwarsa. Ina ma dai
sauran mutane masu hali zasu fahimci irin alfanu da romon da yake cikin taimakon
marayu da marasa karfi? Ina ma masu hannu da shuni a kasar nan zasu kwaikwayi irin
abinda mukeyi? Ina ma labarin nan zau riski wani har yasa masa kwadayin taimakon
marayu?"

Sai kuma ya gyara zamansa yana kallon Kamal yana murmushi yace "kuma kaga da irin
wannan tamkar yiwa kaine, dan wanda zaka taimaka sai kaga ya zamanti wata rana ya
taimaka maka kaima, ko kuma kaga ashe akwai wani abu da Allah ya kulla a tsakanin
ku mai karfi. Kamar misali yanzu ita humairah, muka daukota muka riketa a gidan
marayu tsahon shekaru sannan daga baya Allah yayi kaddararsa sai gata zama ya
saneta a cikin gidan mu cikin iyalinmu, sannan kuma sai kashi Allah ya sakawa
babban danmu soyayyar ta mai karfi a ransa wadda har ta kaishi ga jan damarar yakin
neman aurenta" Kamal ya juya ya kalli Aisha fuskarsa cike da mamaki da kuma alamar
tambaya. Aisha ta gyada masa kai tace "Al'ameen, shine yake son humairah" Sultan
yace "yes, Al'ameen. Yace min yana tausayinta, sai daga baya na fahimci ba tausayi
bane ba soyayya ce. A lokacin nida maminsa muka kuduri aniyar yin bincike dan nemo
iyayenta ta yadda koda auren nasu zai kasance zai zamo ya kyautata. Amma Allah
cikin ikonsa sai gaku kun bayyana ba tare damu mun nemo ku din ba. Dan haka tunda
gani gaka a yau, ina nemarwa dana Muhammad auren 'yarka Aisha".

Kamal was dumb founded, irin feeling dinnan da zai barka speechless kama rasa
abinda zaka ce. Kamar yayi kuka kamar kuma yayi dariya. Ya kalli palon yaga idon
kowa yana kansa ana jiran amsarsa. Ya bude baki kamar zaiyi magana sai kuma maganar
ta kasa fito wa. A lokacin aka yi sallama aka shigo. Abbas tare da Al'ameen.
Al'ameen ya dakata daga bakin kofa yana jin kafafuwansa sun yi masa nauyi. Tunda
suka shigo gate din gidan ya lura da motar aunty Aisha data Nura, wannan ne ya saka
yaki shiga cikin gidan saboda baya son su hadu tunda yana tunanin Aisha tana tare
da Khadija, shi yasa ya biyo ta palon daddy dan yasan dabarar da zaiyi ya shige
part dinsa ba tare da ya hadu da bakin ba amma sai gasu a gabansa.

Abbas ya karasa ya gaishe da yayansa sannan suka gaggaisa da mutanen wajen, Nura
yana tsokanarsa cewa yau dai sun hadu a palace. Ya juya yace da Al'ameen "Al'ameen
karaso mana ka tsaya a bakin kofa" Kamal ya kalli yaron da aka kira da Al'ameen, he
is much more than what he wished for his daughter, dama haka lamarin ubangiji yake,
duk wanda akayi wa jarabawa mai tsanani irin wadda akayiwa Humairah kuma ya cinyeta
sai ubangiji yayi masa sakayya da abinda yake fiye da wanda yake tsammani. Tabbas,
Al'ameen shine sakamakon Humairah. Wannan hadin ubangiji ne, who is he to say no?

Kunya ce duk ta kama Al'ameen. Ya karaso da kyar ya gaishesu, shi duk a tunaninsa
Maryam ita ce Khadija sai da yaji ana yiwa Abbas bayanin bakin sannan ya fahimci ba
ita bace ba amma kuma ya gane Kamal shine baban Humairah. Abbas yana ta dariya yace
"ashe faduwa ce tazo dai dai da zama. Ai ni yanzu daga gurin takawa nake Al'ameen
ya tura ni" sai yayi musu bayanin sakon da Al'ameen ya tura shi ya fada da kuma
amsar da suka samu. Daddy da Mami suka kalli juna, sun gane wayon da Al'ameen ya
shirya wa kakansa. Daddy yace da Abbas "to nima ga tawa amsar, kaje ka gaya masa
cewa kazo zaka fada min sakon sai ka tarar dani tare da mahaifin Aisha. Abokina ne"
duk akayi dariya, Al'ameen yana jin zuciyarsa kamar takarda. Sum sum ya tashi yayi
sallama ya fice partly saboda ba zai iya zama a gurin ba partly kuma saboda yana so
ya shiga cikin gida yaga Humairah tunda ya lura bata gurin.

A cikin gida kuma Humairah tana palon Mami ita kadai tana kallo tana shan fruit
salad a cikin dan karamin bowl. Tana sane taki zuwa gaishe da daddy dan sai data
bari sunyi gaba sannan tazame ta shige part din Mami yadda ba zasu gane bata tare
dasu bama sai sunje gurin. Kawai yanzu kunyarsa take ji musamman idan ta tuna da
scene dinsu a dakin Al'ameen da kuma ranar da tace ta dauka Al'ameen sex zaiyi da
ita. Ita anya ma kuwa zata iya kara hada ido dashi?

Tana nan zaune Al'ameen ya shigo amma saboda yadda ta mayar da hankalinta kan
kallon sam bata ji shigowarsa ba. Shi kuma ana shi bangaren da yayi sallama yaji
bata amsa ba, ya shiga a ganta a zaune a can carpet tana kallo, yayi niyyar yayi
knocking kofar dan tasan da zuwansa amma sai hot youthful blood dinsa ya saka ya
fasa yayi using damar wajan kare mata kallo tun daga kan tafin kafarta har zuwa
fuskarta. Bata da kiba sosai kuma sam ba za'a taba saka ta a jerun sirara ba,
babban abinda yasa akafi saka ta a layin masu kiba shine yadda komai na halittar
jikinta yake a cike dam dam babu rama, fatar jikinta kuma smooth babu tattara ko
dabbare dabbare balle kuraje. Dan kyakykyawan madaidaicin wuyanta wanda yake sanye
da siririyar sarkar data zauna kamar a gurin aka halicceta, cute round face dinta,
manyan fararen idanuwanta masu kama dana barbie doll wadanda suka sha kwalliyar eye
liner, madaidaicin hancinta daya dace da round face dinta, sai dan karamin bakinta
da yake motsawa a hankali wajan tauna fruit din da take ci. A hankali idanunsa suka
sauka akan yatsun hannunta, longing to see lalle irin wanda ya gani rannan amma sai
yaga yau babu amma hakan ko kadan bai ga ya ragewa hannunta kyau ba. Dogayen
yatsunta da dogayen fararen faratanta, ji yayi babu abinda yake so irin ya zura
nasa yatsun a tsakiyar nata. Yayi sauri ya girgiza kansa sannan yayi kyaran murya
da dan karfi.

Da sauri ta kalli inda yake tsaye sannan ta fara kokarin kyara mayafinta, ya danyi
murmushi a ransa yace 'too late' sannan ya taka a nutse, hannayensa cikin aljihunsa
ya karasa inda take. Ta gaishe shi kanta a kasa, bai amsa ba sai zama da yayi a
kasa shima kusa da ita kadan. Ta kara matsawa. Ya kalli TVn sannan ya kalleta yace
"wato Basma ta bar miki gadon kallon wadannan finafinan ko? Bayan ku kanku babu
abinda kuke ganewa a ciki" tace "muna ganewa mana, sosai ma kuwa" yace "ta yaya
zaku gane bayan duk 'yan film din kamarsu daya, sunayensu kusan iri daya, ni bama
na gane waye namiji wace mace a cikinsu" tayi dariya tace "Kai Ya Ameen. Kai dai
kawai baka son Koreans din nan, amma kalle su fa ka gani, suna da kyau wallahi" ya
danyi tsaki yace "babu wani kyau da suke dashi, ni duk cikinsu banga wanda za'a iya
hada ki dashi ba, duk kin fi su kyau amma kin tsaya suna wani burgeki" ta rufe
fuskarta tace "Laa, ni ina na kaisu kyau?" yace "kin fi su, kin fisu komai da
komai. Koni na fisu kyau ballantana ke" ta kara rufe ido tana dariya, yace "ko baki
yarda ba?" tace "kai kafisu kyau dama amma banda ni" yace "to bude fuskarki in nuna
miki wani abu" kamar ba zata bude ba sai kuma ta bude ta kalle shi, suna hada ido
ya sakar mata wani murmushin da yasa ta sake jan mayafin ta ta rufe fuskarta tana
dariya tana cewa "ni bana son kake min irin wannan murmushin wallahi" shima yayi
dariya yace "saboda me? Menene dashi?" tace "wani iri nake ji inka yi min, kawai
kake min irin wanda kake wa sauran mutane" ya rage murya can kasa yace "ai ke ba
irin sauran mutane bace ba" ta dunkule a guri daya tace "ni ka daina yi min magana
irin haka, ka bude muryarka sosai in zakayi min magana" ya sake rage murya "haba?
Saboda me Aisha Humairah?" shigowar Mami ce tasa yayi saurin yin shiru yana rarraba
ido kamar marar gaskiya. Ta bata fuska tace masa "tashi ka fita, baki zasu shigo
suyi sallah in kuma a gabanka zasuyi sallar to" ya tashi zai wuce ta kusa da ita
tace "marar kunya".

A waje kuma bayan mata sun shigo ciki ne suma mazan syka fita da niyyar zuwa
masallaci dan gabatar da sallar magrib. Suna futa compound Bassam yana shigowa a
motar sa. Yayi packing da sauri sannan ya fito yazo ya gaishe su da niyyar shima
yabi bayansu su tafi mosque tare. Daddy ya kalle shi ya nuna Kamal yace "Bassam ga
baban Humairah. Ubanta mahaifi wanda ya haifeta" yadda ya fadi maganar ya saka
Bassam yaji tamkar kasa ta tsage ya shige ciki saboda kunya, yasan purposely daddy
yayi introducing baban Humairah a gurinsa saboda gorin daya taba yi mata. Ya sake
gaishe da Kamal sannan Daddy yace da Kamal "wannan shine second son dina, Bassam".
Daga nan suka dunguma gaba daya suka tafi masallaci.

Bayan sun dawo suka hadu gabadaya a babban palon gidan akayi dinner, kowa cikin
farin ciki da annashuwa. They are from two totally different worlds but now they
are like one family.

Episode 78 : The Price
Washegari Kamal da iyalinsa suka koma Yola, zuciyarsu fal da farin ciki, bakunansu

Episode 81: The New Life
Abbas
Tun sanda yaji ta ambaci sunan babansa rai a bakinta yaji gabansa ya fadi, tun
kafin kuma tayi masa bayani yayi guessing cewa sanayyar tasu bata alkhairi bace ba,
wanan yasa yaji tamkar ta dauki bulo me inchi goma ta buga masa a tsakiyar kansa.
Sannan ya zauna yana sauraronta yana jin yadda take yin filla filla da duk kannin
tubalan daya gina rayuwarsa akai tun ranar da aja ruguza masa waccan rayuwar daya
faro tun haihuwarsa, aka rusa masa ita aka tilasta masa fara gina wata tun daga
foundation, foundation din daya dora kacokam akan mahaifinsa, ashe bai sani ba
foundation din na tokane, ashe bai sani ba foundation din na karya ne.
Har ta kai iya kacin inda take ganin ta gama ta tashi ta shiga gida bai iya yace
mata komai ba, bai kuma iya daga idonsa ya kalle ta ba. To da wanne idon zai kalle
ta? Da wanne harshen zai yi mata magana? Me zai ce mata? Ko bayan shigarta gida ma
ya jima nan zaune yana kalon yadda shuke shuken da suke farfajiyar gidan suke juyi
a kansa suna zagaye shi, sai daga baya ya fahimci ba sune suke juyawarba kansa ne
yake juyawa a tare da rayuwarsa gaba daya. Da kyar ya mike tsaye ya dafe bishiyar
da suka zauna a karkashinta, kawai sai zuciyarsa ta raya masa ina ma shine wannan
bishiyar? Ina ma zasu iya exchange ya koma ita ita kuma ta koma shi? Da shikenan ya
huta da zafin da yake ji a zuciyarsa.
Ba zai iya tuna ya akayi yaje gidansa ba, shi dai kawai ya ganshi ya shiga gida
sannan ya ganshi ya shiga dakinsa ya rufe kofa sannan ya kwanta a kan carfet a nan
bakin yayi rigingine yana kalon silin idanuwansa a bushe babu ko digon hawaye. He
wished yana da zuciya irin ta yayansa Sultan yadda zai farfasa dukkan wani abu
wanda hannunsa zai iya kaiwa ko zaiji sanyi a zuciyarsa, amma shi ba haka yake ba,
shi ba shaye shaye yake ba ballantana yaje ya huce haushinsa a can, sai dai ya rufe
kansa away from everyone and everything har sai sanda zuciyarsata huce, which can
be forever.
Haka kawai sai yaji sam bashi da shakku a duk maganganun Khadija, sam baya bukatar
jin side din Dr a labarin. To mai zaiji? A ranar bai bude kofar dakinsa ba duk kuwa
da bugun da cook dinsa yayi tayi masa dan ya sanar dashi kammaluwar abinci,
washegari ma haka har dare bai fito ba. Wannan yasa shugaban hadiman gidan ya yanke
shawarar zuwa har gida ya sanar wa da Sultan halin da kanin nasa yake ciki. "Tun
jiya da rana ya shiga daki ya rufe kansa baci ba sha har yanzu. Mu ko motsinsama
bama ji. Gwara kazo da kanka dan muna tsoron ko wani abun ya sane shi bamu sani ba.
Mu muna tunanin ma kuwa anya ba anjana ce ta aure shi ba?" Sultan ya daga masa
hannu yace "ka koma gidan zan shigo in anjima koma menene zanji".
Har lokacin da Sultan yaje gidan Abbas bai fito ba dan haka yaje kofar dakin yayi
magana yace "Abbas ka bude kofa Sultan ne" amma shiru babu ko motsi, ya sake magana
nan ma shiru, wannan yasa yaja da baya da niyyar ya balla kofar sai yaji motsin key
sannan kofar ta bude Abbas ya bayyana a gabansa. Amma wannan ba wancan Abbas din
bane mai walwala da fara'a da barkwanci, wannan Abbas din looked tired, broken and
totally defeated. He looked tamkar an sauke masa duk nauyin duniya a bisa
kafadunsa. Sai kawai Sultan yaji ya kasa tambayarsa abinda yake damunsa kawai
abinda yake bukata shine yadda zai taimaka masa. Nasiha ya zauna ya rinka yi masa
akan rayuwa sannan ya bashi shawara daya rungumi alqur'ani damin shi waraka ne ga
dukkanin wata cuta kuma sauki ne ga dukkanin tsanani. Bai bar gidan ba kuma sai
daya tabbatar Abbas din ya saka wani abu a cikinsa amma sai da suka kai ruwa rana
tukunna har sai da sultan yace in bai ci ba zaije ya gaya wa Takawa cewa yana
kokarin committing suicide in yaso sai yaje yayi wa takawan bayani da kansa. Wannan
yasa Abbas ya danci abincin kadan saboda duk duniya babu wanfa yake gani da girma
irin Takawa, har yanzu wannan soyayyyar da shakuwar da aka dora shi akai sanda yana
yaro har yau tana nan a cikin zuciyarsa.
Sanda sultan zai fita ne ya juyo yakalleshi fuskarsa cike da tausayinsa yace "are
you going to be alright?" Abbas ya danyi 'yar dariyar data tsaya a iya makogwaronsa
yace "I dont know".
Bayan tafiyar sultan ne kiran Dr ya shigo wayar Abbas, for like the hundredth time.
Sai daya bari kiran ya katse dan kansa sannan ya dauki wayar ya tattara dukkanin
numbobin Dr da na likitocinsa dana duk wanda ya shafe shi ya jefa su a black list
sannan yayi deleting dinsu baki daya. Ya goge shi daga rayuwarsa kamar yadda ya
goge Hajiya lokacin daya fahimci gaskiyar labarin haihuwarsa, amma unlike hajiya,
wannan karon baya jin zasu shirya dashi da Dr.
Two months later
Khadija tana kan hanyarta ta dawowa daga islamiyya. Tun da ta dauko hanya jikinta
ya bata ana binta a baya amma bata kula ba taci gaba da tafiyarta kanta a kasa
kamar yadda tasaba. Sai data sha kwanar gidan Aisha sannan ta waiga kamar yadda
tayi tunani kuma bin nata akeyi a cikin wata katuwar mota. Ta kara sauri motarma ta
kara sauri, ta rage tafiya ita ma ta rage tafiya, sai kawai tayi murmushi taja ta
tsaya a wata inuwa tana son taga yadda mai bin nata zaiyi dan there is no way da
zata yadda ya bita har gidan Aisha dan bata san ko wate ba ballantana ta san
intentions dinsa kuma tasan mutane da yawa basu da good intentions. Life has taught
her that.
A hankali motar takaraso kusa da ita ta tsaya, tinted glasses dan haka bata ga waye
ba sai da aka sauke glass din baya a hankali. At first gani tayi kamar ba kowa a
gurin sai daga baya ta lura da mutum a zaune yana kallonta da jemammun idanunsa. Dr
abdulrazak. Ya kara motsewa fiye da ganin da tayi masa kanan baya. Ta kara hade rai
ta bude baki da niyar yi masa takara akan ya futa harkarta sai taji ya tari
numfashinta yace "where is my son?" Ta jefa masa hararar da bata yi niyya ba tace
"ka bani ajjiyarsa? Menene nawa a cikin tsakaninka da danka? Kaje ka neme shi a can
inda ka ajiye shi dan ni bansan inda yake ba" ya dauke kansa daga kallonta yace
"shin kinsan kuwa irin zafin da uba yake ji idan ya rasa dansa? His only child?" Ta
danyi murmushin takaici tace "believe me I know. Gwara kai naka dan ba yaro bane he
can take care of himself ni kuwa sanda na rasa tawa yarinyar 'yar karama ce da take
defending totally on me, and it was all thanks to you. Ta yaya kake tunanin ko da
ace nasan inda Abbas yake zan gaya maka?" Yace "saboda bazanyi giving up ba, zanyi
ta binki ne duk inda kika shiga har sai kin kaini gurinsa" tace "kar ma ka fara. Ni
bansan inda danka yake ba, asali ma rabona dashi wata biyu kenan da kwanaki kuma
bana jin zamu sake haduwa ni dashi dan haka please bana son in kara ganin fuskarka,
kar ka sake biyo ni ballantana har kaje inda nake. Ta yaya akayi ma kasan unguwar
da nake" ya juyo yayi mata kallon wulakanci yace "akwai abinda kudi ba zai iya
samarwa ba?" Ta danyi dariyar takaici tace "akwai mana, you of all people should
know that. Kudi ba zai iya siya maka lafiya ba, bazai siya maka farinciki ba,
sannan ba zai iya siya maka soyayya ba musamman soyayyar wadanda ka yaudara ko ka
munafinta, musamman wadanda suke close to you. Da ace zai siya maka da baka zo
gurina kana neman Abbas ba wanda rabona dashi tun ranar dana fada masa gaskiyar ko
wacece ni, ranar kuma dana fada masa gaskiyar ko wanene kai". Irin horror din da
taga ya bayyana a fuskar Dr kadai ya isa duk wani revenge da take fatan dauka a
kansa, dan haka bata kara ce masa komai ba ta juya ta cigaba da tafiyarta cikin
nutsuwa fuskarta dauke da madaukakin murmushi.
Amma kuma ranar wuni tayi hankalinta yana kan Abbas. Ina ya shiga? Tunda ya tafi ba
amo ba labari kuma ita tana jin nauyin ta kira shi a wayako kuma ta tambayi Nura
amma kuma kullum hankalinta yana kansa tana so tasan halin da yake ciki. How is he?
Shin anya ma kuwa tayi dai dai data gaya masa wannan labarin? Amma kuma more than
70%na zuciyarta yana assuring finta cewa tayi dai dai.
Kamar amsa ga matsalarta washegari suna tare da Aisha sai ga Nura ya dawo daga
office. Duk suka gaishe shi ya amsa sai ta fara shirin barin palon kamar yadda ta
saba yi a duklokacin daya shigo amma sai maganar daya farayi ta dauki hankalinta.
"Aisha kinsan mutuminki kuwa abinda yayi" Aisha ta mike zaune daga kwanciyarta tace
"wa kenan?" Yace "Abbas mana" nan take ta washe baki tace "aure yayi?" Nura yayi
tsaki yace "da aure yayi ai da albishir zanzo in yi miki ba complain ba. Yayi
transfer daga office din mu. Ya bar Abuja gaba daya" Aisha ta dafe kirji tace
"saboda me?" Ya juya yana kallon Khadija kamar ita yake gayawa maganar yace "Allah
masani. Tun wata biyu da suka wuce ya dauki sick leave a office, I thought da gaske
bashi da lafiyan nine har da zuwa dubiya gidansa na tarar baya nan ashe processing
transfer din yake yi a lokacin" Aisha tana girgiza kai tace "amma banji dadi ba
wallahi. Haka kawai ga inda ka taso cikin 'yan uwanka cikin gatanka sai ka tafi
wani gurin da ban? Ina ya koma kuma?" Nura yace "Federal university wukari. Taraba
state".
Khadija ta tarkata kayanta tayi daki ba tare da ta nuna taji maganar da suke ba.
Amma zuciyarta tayi mata nauyi sosai. So, wannan shine consequence din abinda tayi,
Abbas ya ajiye komai nashi ya rabu da kowa daya sanshi ya tafi wata uwa duniya inda
babu wanda yasan shi zai fara sabuwar rayuwa a can. Sai ta samu kanta dayi masa
adduar Allah ya saka hakan shine alkhairi a tare dashi. But some part of her is
telling her that, maybe shikenan, maybe ba zata sake ganinsa ba. Sai dai kuma har
tayi shirin bacci taji shigowar text wayarta. Ta duba tana ganin number dinsa
gabanta ya fadi. Sai data zauna sannan ta bude ta karanta. "I have moved on. I have
started a new life. Will you mind joining me?" And then she knew, wannan shine
destiny dinta as it is his. They are destined to be together and she is going to
accept it.
Sanda ta gayawa Aisha decision dinta she was shocked, irin sosai dinnan, musamman
ma da taji waye wanda ake magana akansa din. Automatically ta tambayeta "dama kin
san shine? A ina kuka hadu?" Anan Khadija ta bata labarin haduwarsu a motar haya da
kuma sanda yaje gurinta a dutse. She was tempted, very tempted akan ta gayawa Aisha
dangantakar dake tsakanin Abbas da Dr amma sai ta danne zuciyarta taki gaya mata
bawai dan bata yarda da ita ba sai dan ta fahimci hakan bashi da amfani. As far as
Aisha is concern Abbas kanin Sultan ne to it's better to let it be. Kuma tana ganin
in ta gaya wa Aisha tamkar taci amanar abbas ne tunda sanda ya gata mata labarin ya
gaya mata cewa amana ne kuma maybe in ta gaya wa Aisha ita ma a matsayin amana zata
iya ta gayawa mijinta Nura a matsayin amana shima kuma ba zai rasa wani aminin a
office ko a yola da zai gayawa ba, a haka har magana zata zagaya mutane duk da
sunan amana. Dan haka barin maganar yafi alkhairi akan fadarta.
Kusan babu wanda yafi sultan murnar auren Abbas, dan haka bai bata lokaci ba ya
garzaya ya sanarwa da Takawa wannan daddadan labarin. Takawa yace "Masha Allah.
Hakan ya faranta ran mu matuka. To Alhamdulillah, yanzu dai daga kai har Abbas ba
yara bane ba na tabbatar Abbas yasan me yakeyi, mu zamanin mu ya wuce yanzu, mun
kusa tafiya mu barku ku cigaba da kula da kanku da sauran familyn mu. Kaje kuyi duk
abinda kuke ganin ya dace. Allah yayi masa albarka kuma Allah ya saka albarka a
cikin auren".
Sanda labari yazo gurin Mami taji dadi sosai, musamman dataji cewa mahaifiyar
humairah ce Abbas zai aura. She was so happy for humairah dan tasan yanxu
hankalinta zaifi kwanciya idan mamanta tayi aure ta nutsu a guri daya. Kuma daga
dukkanin labaran da take samu daga gurin Aisha ta fahimci cewa Khadija ta shiryu,
dan haka tayi musu fatan alkhairi ita da Abbas baki daya, a ranta tace "so Abbas
got his wish at last".
An nema an bayar an kuma saka ranar tariya. A tsarin Abbas so yayi a ce babu wani
taro da za'ayi kawai za'a yi daurin aure ne a kai masa amaryarsa direct Taraba.
Amma sultan yace lallai sai an fara kawo ta palace 'yan uwa sun ganta kuma taje ta
gaishe da Takawa da Ummee. A dutse akayi daurin auren a babban masallacin juma'ar
garin. 'Yan uwa da sauran mutanen gari wadanda suka san Khadija sunyi mamaki matuka
na ganin yadda tayi saurin auruwa kuma ta samu miji nagaryacce, wadansu suka ce
rufa rufa tayi masa tayi amfani da hatsabibancinsu na karuwai ta yaudareshi,
wadansu kuma sukace asirce shi tayi amma wadansu sai suke ganin Allah ne kawai ya
tarfa wa garinta nono ya dubi zuciyarta ya bata karshe mai kyau. Inama sauran
jama'a zasuyi tunani irin wanda mijin Khadija na yanzu yayi? Ina ma za'a daina
wulakantawa aibatawa tare da nuna wariya ga duk wanda ya aikata ba dai dai ba a
rayuwa kuma yazo ya tuba ya dawo hanyar dai dai? Ina ma zamu ke karbar su da hannu
bibbiyu mu nuna musu cewa komai ya wuce muma mun yafe musu kamar yadda Allah ya
yafe musu, dan shi ubangiji idan bawansa yayi masa laifi kuma ya tuba tuba mai kyau
da niyyar cewa ba zai sake aikata wannan particular laifin nan ba to Allah yana
yafe masa wannan laifin ne completely, to me yasa muma ba zamuyi koyi da hakan ba
ko dan muma mu samu Allah ya yafe mana namu zunuban? Ina ma labarin nan zai kai
kunnuwan masu aikata laifi kuma suna so du tuba amma suna tsoron yadda al'umma zasu
karbe su? Well am sure there are people like Abbas out there, people that will not
look at your past and judge you but only your present self and future and love you.
People that will love you for who you are not for who you were.
Mutum uku ne suka zo daukan amarya, Mami, Ummee da kuma Hajiya umma matar galadima
kuma kanwa a gurin Hajiyar su Abbas. Gwoggo tana ganinsu tace "Khadija na yafe miki
kinji? Ai naka naka ne babu yadda zakayi ka yanke hannunka ka yar". Fir abbas yaki
yarda abba yayi wa khadija kayan daki, yace ya riga ya zuba komai a gidan da zasu
zauna kuma yana ganin ai wahala ce ace za'a debi kaya tun daga nan a tagi dasu har
taraba. Amma duk da haka sai abba ya kira aisha gefe ya debi kudi masu yawa ya bata
yace " ki hau jirgi kiyi gaba, kije kiga gidan nasu sannan ki duba duk abinda ya
dace ki siya mata, ki sai mata kayan gara suma ki ajiye mata a gidan" aisha taji
dadi sosai amma sai ta yi kokarin mayarwa da abba kudinsa da niyyar ita zatayi amma
sai yaki karba yace "am her father. Its my responsibility".
Abuja aka kaita first kamar yadda Sultan ya fada, taje ta gaisheda Takawa wanda ya
saka ta a gaba daga ita har da nasihaakan rayuwar aure da kuma rayuwar duniya baki
daya. Sai da Khadija tayi kuka saboda tasan baiwar da Allah yayi mata mai girma ce.
She was jealous of Aisha cewa tana samun daukaka aduk abinda ta saka a gaba without
knowing cewa itama tata daukakar tana nan zuwa nan gaba. Lokaci ne baiyi ba.
Whatever is meant for you will never go to someone else. Kayi hakuri ka barwa Allah
komai tabbas zaka ga ranar ka tazo.
Sai data kwana palace gurin ummee sannan Abbas ya dauke ta da niyyar zasu tafi
Taraba daga nan, haka ummee ta hada mata sha biyu na arziki ta bata, mami ma haka,
tare da alkawarin zasu zo ganin gida. Driver Abbas ya saka zai kaisu airport su hau
jirgi tunda Abbas din kusan ya siyar da komai basa dake garin abuja, har sun dauki
hanya sai Abbas ya saka drivern ya dauke kan mota ya chanza hanya zuwa wata unguwa
da Khadija bata sani ba, zuwa wani gida da bata sani ba amma suna tsayawa jikinta
ya bata inda suka zo. Ya juyo yana kallonta yace "are you ready? Gurin Dr na kawo
ki kamar yadda nayi masa alkawarin zan kawo masa matata ya gani kafin ya bar
duniya, ke kadai zaki shiga amma" ta kalle shi with concern tace "kai kuma fa? Me
yasa ba zaka shiga ba?" Ya dauke kansa yace "am not ready, not yet".
Har dakin da yake kwance aka shigar da ita. Ya bude ido a hankali ya kalleta sannan
ya mayar ya rufe ba tare daya ce mata komai ba. Ta karasa ta zauna a kan kujera
tana fuskantarsa itama tayi shiru, sannan yace " ina yake?" Tace "yana waje a mota,
yace ba zai shigo ba, not now" ya gyada kai kawai sannan yace "burinki ya cika ko?
Kin auri dana" tace "burin danka ya cika, ya aureni. Abinda nake so ka fahimta
shine; ni bani nake running after Abbas ba, shine ya nemi aurena kuma na amince
kuma aka daura bisa sadaki da waliyyai da shaidu. Ni matarsa ce yanzu, ni surikarka
ce, uwar jikokin ka, uwar dukkan zuri'arka, katangar gidan ka" ya lumshe idonsa
taga hawaye yabi gefen fuskarsa. Tayi sauri ta dauke kanta ta mike tsaye tace "zan
tafi, yana waje yana jirana yanzu zamu bar gari. Dama ya kawo ni ne saboda ya cika
maka alkawarin daya daukar maka na kawo maka matarsa kafin ka bar duniya" har ta
kai bakin kofa taji yace "why my son? Mai yasa Allah zaiyi furnishing dana akan
laifin dani na aikata bashi ba? Mai yasa ni ba za'a hukuntani ba sai shi?" Ta juyo
tace "ban sani ba, abinda na sani shine Allah yafi mu sanin komai, yafi mu sanin
menene dai dai da mu, ya fimu sanin hukuncin daya dace da duk laifin mu. Amma baka
ganin yayi hakan ne dan yasan cewa kafi son Abbas akan yadda kake son kanka? Iyaye
sunfi son 'ya'yansu akan kansu. Besides kai rayuwarka ta kare shi kuwa da
sauransa". Sai tayi sauri ta fita amma tana jin zuciyar ta babu dadi. Da gaske ne
aurenta da Abbas kamar punishment ne a gurinsa?
Bayan ta koma mota ya lura da changing yanayin fuskarta amma bai ce komai ba saboda
dama yayi expecting hakan. Amma sai yagahar sunyi nisa bata saki ranta ba kamar

kallonsa tace "amma just thinking kamar amincewa da nayi da aurenka naso kainada
yawa. I don't deserve you. Bana so in nan gaba kazo kana regretting aurena ko kuma
in zama silar kasancewarka kullum cikin bakin ciki. I just want you to be happy"
yaji maganarta ta taba ransa sosai, sai yayi murmushi yace "define happiness" sai

kuma suke yi mata. Lallai wannan shine happiness din. Being with the person you
love and love you back. Ta kalleshi idonta da kwalla tace "happiness shine ka zauna
tare da wanda kake so kuma shima yake sonka" yayi murmushi yace "then you have your
answer. All I know is that I love you and I believe you are going to make me happy"
tace "then I will make you the happiest man on earth".
Taxi suka hau daga airport har zuwa gidansu wanda yake cikin staff quarters ta
federal university wukari. A gajiye suke tikis amma suna zuwa gidan suka tarar da
Aisha da Humairah a can. Sun gyara musu gidan tsaf sun siyo komai da babu sun zuba
sun cika kitchen da kayan abinci a matsayin gara sannan sun girka musu abinci da
zasu ci. Khadija ta hada su ta rungume a jikinta kawai sai ta saka kuka. Kukan
dadi. Nan Abbas ya fara tsokanarta wai kukan amare take yi, ya zuba abinci ya fara
ci yace "gaskiya zanyi missing abincinki Aisha" Aisha tace "kar ka damu, nayi mata
duk training din daya kamata, who knows? Maybe ma kaji nata yafi nawa dadi". Sai
washegari sannan sukayi musu sallama Abbas ya kawo su har airport a sabuwar
motarsadaya siya. Nan Humairah ta fara kukan rabuwa da mamanta amma haka ta hakura
suka tafi saboda duk da yarintarta tasan cewa wannan shibe the best thing that her
mother could have ever wish for.
Sabuwar rayuwa Khadija da Abbas suka fara shimfidawa a taraba. Lafiya suke zaune
sun dauki duk past lives dinsu sun ajiye a gefe. Sam bai taba kallonta a matsayin
wadda tayi yawon duniya ba, kallibta yake a matsayin mace ta farko da ya fara gani
yaji yana so, macen da a yanzu ta zama sanyin idaniyarsa take gwada masa soyayyar
da bai taba tsammanin irinta ba, bai taba tsammanin haka aute yake ba, baya kuma
jin zai samu farin ciki fiye da wannan a gurin ko wacce mace. Ita ma kuma Khadija a
bangarenta bata taba kallon Abbas a matsayin wanda aka haifa babu aure ba, a
gurinta kallonsa take a matsayin namiji na farko daya fara sonta bawai dan kyanta
ko wani abu nata ba, namijin daya fara mata true love kuma ya aure ta dukda irin
labarin data bashi na past life dinta. Dan haka kamar yadda tayi alkawari hakata
zage damtse taja damarar mayar dashi happiest man on earth, bata da buri illa taga
dariyarsa.
Karku manta Khadija kyakykyawar macece tun asalinta, wahala ce ta juyar da
kamanninta dan haka yanzu jin dadi da kwanciyar hankali sai suka sake mayar da ita
tauraruwa, wani lokacin in ta cakare ta chokala daurin nan a gaban goshi sai Abbas
ya tsaya kawai yana kallonta yana mamakin dama haka take? Gashi ne dai har yanzu
bai koma kamar da ba amma duk da haka tana gyara kayanta ta shiga makota a rangada
mata kitson ta.
Ta kama sana'arta sosai ta kuma kama makotanta suna zumuncinsu. Takan yi kewar
Aisha da Humairah amma suma tunda kullum suna waya bata damuwa sosai. Watan ta biyu
da tariya ta fahimci shigar ciki jikinta, ta gayawa Abbas amma yaki yarda yace sai
sunje an duba, ai kuwa ana dubawa sai ga ciki dan sati hudu da kwanaki, murna a
gurin Abbas har ba'a magana. He indeed feel like the happiest man on earth.
Suna komawa gida ta kira Aisha tayi mata albishir, itama tayi murna sosai sai kuma
ta fara addu'ar Allah yasa itama nata zargin ya kasance gaskiya. Tana ajiye watar
direct toilet ta shiga ta dauki pregnancy test strip ta gwada fitsarita tazauna
tayi tagumi hannu bibbiyu tana kallonsa, a hankali first line ya bayyana sannan
bayan what seems like an eternity sai ga second line shima ya fito. Hawaye kawai
taji yana bin fuskarta dan ita completely ta fitar da ran sake haihuwa ashe sauran
blessings suna gaba, ashe uta taskar ubangiji bata taba karewa.
Wadannan labaran ba karamin dadada ran duk masoyan Aisha da Khadija yayi ba.
Humairah cewa tayi wasu twins din ne za'a sake haifa. Ai kam dai kamar ta fada dai
dai dan Aisha ce ta fara haifar santaleliyar 'yarta sannan washegari Khadija ita ma
ta haifi tata, dan haka babu wanda yaje ya taya dan'uwansa zaman jego. Khadija taso
suzo gida, dan a gida ma taso haihuwa amma Abbas yaki, dole ta hakura tayi masa
biyayya. Ranar suna jaririyar Aisha ta ci sunan aunty Bilki washegari kuma Khadija
ta kira Aisha tayi masa albishir da samun takwara. Aisha tace "takwara kuma?
Already ai kinyi min takwara ko?" Khadija tace "a'a. Ni banyi miki takwara ba Kamal
ne yayi miki, wannan tawa ce ta musamman. Da ace son samu ne ma da duk macen da zan
haifa sunanta Aisha dan inyi ta jaddada miki irin yadda nake jinki a raina. Kinyi
min komai 'yar uwa. Fatana Alah ya kara daukaka ki ya kuma kare ki daga dukkan
sharri" Aisha tace "Allahumma Ameen Khadija".
A kara hakuri dani dai kamar yadda aka saba.

Ga wadanda Aisha Humairah yaki budewa a wayarsu. Na raba muku shi biyu. Maybe in ya
rage nauyi zai bude.

maganar. Al'ameen ya kira Humairah har charge dinsa ya kusa running down, a karshe
ya kira Khausar ya roke ta ta fito masa da Humairah amma humairan taki fita, har
sai da bakin suka zo tafiya sannan ta fita rakasu. Anan ya ganta, har hade
hannayensa yayi alamar roko akan tazo su gaisa amma tayi kamar bata ganshi ba. Ta
dai gaisa da balaraben data fahimci shine Ayaan, sannan ta gaisa da bayaraben data
fahimci shine AbdulShakur, babban yayan su Muhibbat. Kuma ta lura da sparks a
tsakanin Ayaan da Khausar, sannan kuma taga anyi doguwar gaisuwa tsakanin Saudat da
AbdulShakur.
Takanas Aisha ta dauki Humairah suka je gidan Dr Mahdi suka kaiwa Amira IV. Duk
kuwa da cewa tasan dole Mami zata gaiyaci best friend dinta zuwa bikin babban danta
amma wannan nata special ne. Humairah ma ta tafi wa da Amal da Anisa nasu IV din da
kuma ashobin yammata.

akan kujerar, ya karaso ya tsaya a gabanta, data kalle shi sai taga kamar ya kara
girma sai ta rufe idonta ta fara magana kasa kasa, ya sunkuyo yace "rashin kunya
ko?" tayi saurin girgiza kai tace "na daina wallahi, Allah ya baka hakuri" sai kuma
ta jishi shiru, taji ta daina jin kamshinsa, ta bude idonta sai ta ganshi akan daya
kujerar yana saka sim a wayarsa. Bata ce komai ba har ya gama yayi dialing number.
Daga daya bangaren Mami ta dauka ta fara fada "ka kyauta Muhammad. Wato ka mayar
damu kananan mutane ko? Mu tara mutane masu karbar amarya kai kuma sai ka dauke ta
kuka bar kasar ka bar mutane suna jira ko? Wato ka nuna mana bamu ida daku a ko?"
tunda ta fara ya lumshe idonsa baice komai ba har ta gaji dan kanta tayi shiru
sannan yace "sorry Mami. Wallahi na gaji da bikin ne I just wanted to rest" tace
"kuna ina yanzu?" yace "St Lucia" tace "to yaushe kuma zaku dawo?" yace "in about
six to eight weeks" tace "what? Six to eight what? Baka da hankali?" yana jiyo
dariyar Daddy a kusa da ita yace "rabu dashi, in kudinsa ya kare da kansa zaki
ganshi ya dawo" Al'ameen yace "I love you too, Mami. Please a baya su Aunty Aisha
wannan number su kira in zasu yi magana da Humairah" daga haka suka yi sallama.
Cikin kwanciyar hankali suka ci abinci suka koshi, sukayi sallar Zuhr sannan suka
duba kayan da Al'ameen ya siyo musu na amfani suka lissafa abubuwan da babu, yace
mata suyi wanka su shirya sai su shiga gari su siyo, daga nan sai suyi yawo suga
gari. Humairah ta kalli toilet din dakin, bashi da kofa, bashi da katanga, kawai
wani thin curtain ne aka zagaye shi dashi dan kusan duk abinda kake yi ans hangoka,
dazu ma da kyar tayi tsarki sanda zata yi alwala. Ta bata fuska tace "ni ba zanyi
wanka ba" ya daga kafada ya shiga yayi wankansa, yana fitowa yaga bata dakin ta
gudu balcony. Ya shirya cikin shirt da wando marasa kauri, ya saka agogonsa da
takalminsa tsaf sannan yaje balcony yace mata taje tayi wankan ya bar mata dakin,
haka tayi wankan a tsorace, ta fito ta duba kayan daya taho mata dasu taga duk
kanana ne, da kyar ta samu loose riga da wando ta saka, sannan ta dora kimono akai
tayi rolling veil ta je ta same shi a zaune a balcony yana jiranta. Ya dago kai
yana kallonta, she looked so fresh, kuma yaji dadin shigar jikinta, babu kwalliya
sam a fuskarta sai kwalli da kuma kyallin daya hango a lips dinta. Ya mike ya nutse
ya tsaya a gabanta, yana lura da yadda ta hade rai ta turo baki, ya saka hannu ya
warware rolling din da tayi ya sake mata wani wanda ya sauko ya rufe kirjinta
sannan ya kama hannunta yace "lets go".
Basu suka dawo hotel din ba sai dare, haka suka dawo a gajiye dan da kyar suka samu
suka yi wanka kowa ya zube ya kama bacci, gajiyar biki data yawon da suka yi ta
tarar musu. Sai da suka kwana biyu babu aikin da suke sai bacci sai cin abinci sai
wani baccin. Gwara ma Humairah sometimes tana fita balcony ta yi kalle kallenta
amma Al'ameen daga gado sai gado. Sai daya fara warewa sannan kuma ya fara takurawa
Humairah, duk da dai mostly tsokanarta kawai yake ganin yadda take tsoronsa, hardly
yake taba ta. Ita kuma tun tana tsoronsa tana tunanin abinda zaiyi mata ganin they
are now married and living together in the same room har ta fara sakewa tana
tunanin maybe shima baya so kamar yadda bata so. But that is totally not the case a
gurin Al'ameen, he so much want to touch her but something is tugging at his heart.
Farkon sanda yace zai auri Humairah har cikin ransa bai damu da rayuwar da tayi a
baya ba, but now, now that she is his wife, sai yake jin komai ya kwance masa.
Tabbas ta bashi labarin ta, tun kafin yace zai aureta, ta bashi labarin irin
attacks din data ringa samu daga gurin maza akan mutuncinta, but bata gaya masa in
details ba, bata gaya masa if one of those men was able to do it ba, and now the
thought of it nearly break his heart. He is afraid, afraid of me zai tarar in ya
kusanceta. Lallai ya fahimci heart break din maxan da suke samun matan su ba
complete ba bayan sun gama saka ransu cewa matan su are intact, cewa babu wanda ya
ta ba koda hannunsu ne, sai kuma su zo su tarar cewa even the innermost most
reserved area dinsu an ta ba. Sai ya dage yayi ta addu'ah, ba addu'ar Allah ya
chanza abinda ya riga ya rubuta ba a'a addu'ar Allah ya bashi karfin zuciyar daukan
duk abinda ya tarar. And then on their fifth day a hotel din, he decided wannan ita
ce ranar, itace ranar da zaiyi facing demons dinsa.
Kamar kullum bayan sun gama dinner ya ce taje tayi wanka ta kwanta gashi nan zuwa.
Yana jinta har ta gama ta fito tana gyara gado sannan ya shigo dakin ya fara shirin
shiga wanka, da sauri ta ajiye pillow din hannunta ta fice balcony. Yayi dariya
kawai ya shiga wankansa. Daya fito ya tarar still bata nan dan haka ya karasa gyara
gadon ya goge jikinsa yayi duk shirin daya kamata sannan ya bita balcony din. A
tsaye ya tarar da ita ta juyawa kofa baya, babu hijab a jikinta, daga ita sai
doguwar rigar bacci wadda bata da shara shara sosai amma ta kama jikinta. Kanta
babu dankwali dan haka iska ta samu damar wasa da gashinta. Ya karewa siffar
bayanta kallo yana jin wani irin abu yana taso masa sannan ya tafi a hankali ya
tsaya a bayanta. Ba zato babu tsammani taji ya saka hannayensa ya zagayo cikin ta
ya jawo ta jikinsa. Gashin kirjinsa ya tsikarar mata baya. A tsorace ta saki
wayarta ta fadi kasa ta hadu da glass ta tarwatse. Yayi chuckling, yace "finally,
dama na gaya miki wata rana zaki fasa wayarki" jikinta ya fara karkarwa tace "dan
Allah ya ameen ka rabu dani, please ka cika ni" bai cika taba sai jin hannunsa tayi
a places din da bai taba taba ta ba, ta fara hawaye. "please Muhammad Ameen. I
don't want to have sex" ya juyo ta da sauri tana facing dinsa, abinda ta gani a
idonsa ya saka tayi saurin rufe nata idon. Ya kawo fuskarsa dai dai tata yace "it
is not called sex. It is called love making, and I am going to do it to you, today,
tonight" kuka take sosai ta roko amma shiru "dan Allah dan annabi, dan Mamin ka da
Daddyn ka" da taga wannan taki ci sai takoma kokawa, sai a lokacin ta fahimci cewa
ashe da duk ba karfi yake saka mata ba dan yanzu riko daya yayi mata ta ji duk
karfin jikinta ya tsiyaye ta guiwowinta, babu abinda ya rage mata sai kuka kuma,
hawaye wani yana bin wani. A hankali ya saka bakinsa yayi kissing hawayenta sannan
kuma slowly ya dora bakinsa akan nata. Anan kukan shima ya kare.
Al'ameen was dumb founded lokacin daya tarar da wannan barrier da yake muradi. He
was beyond grateful amma bai samu bakin magana ba sai daga baya, sai da gari ya
waye bayan ya gama jinyar shagwababbiyar sa sannan yace "but how? All those men,
that first man, I thought.... " ta bude kumburarrun idanuwanta tana kallonsa tace
"He didn't. I didn't let him" ya rungume ta tsam har sai da tayi kara sannan ya
sassauta rikon yace "I love you. I love you Humairah so much" tayi murmushi kawai,
ya rike fuskarta a hannunsa yace "babu amsa?" ta sunkuyar da kanta tana dariya.
Al'ameen an kai ziyara la la land, daga nan kuma babu sarki sai Allah. Tun Humairah
tana koke kokenta da guje gujenta har ta hakura ta daina, ta biye masa suka shiga
duniyar ma'aurata. Soyayyar su kawai suke zubawa basu da wata damuwa. Babu wanda
suke gani sai room service da suke zuwa twice a day su gyara musu daki sai kuma
masu kawo abinci. Komai tare suke yi, wanka, bacci, sallah, cin abinci, sometimes
suyi kallo curled together on the sofa.
Rannan dai ya fita ya siyo mata set din kayan zane, sai da yayi nadama dan ta rage
lokacin sa ta koma zama a balcony tayi ta drawing view daga nan. A karshe sai gata
tayi producing zane so perfect that sanda zasu bar hotel din ya bawa manager shi as
a gift. Nan da nan kuwa aka saka shi a frame da sunanta a kasa aka rataye a
reception.
Daga Saint Lucia, like he promised sai da ya kaita kasashe bakwai. She drew the
seven wonders of the world. The Great Pyramid of Giza a Egypt; The Great Wall of
China a China; Petra a Ma'an, Jordan; The Colosseum, a Rome, Italy; Chichen Itza, a
Yucatan, Maxico; Machu Picchu a Peru; Taj Mahal a Agra, India; da kuma Jeju Island
a South Korea, amma sam Humairah bata tuna da Lee Min Ho ba. Sanda suka gama
lokacin aikin hajji yayi dan haka suka tafi saudiyya ya kaita ta sauke faralli
sannan suka dauko hanyar gida.
Suna sauka a airport ta tafi da gudu ta rungume Aunty Aisha, sannan ta gaishe da
Mami, shima yazo ya gaishe su. Mami ta kalleta tace "Al'ameen ya naga Humairah ta
rame? Hope ba wani abu kake mata ba" ya daga kafada yace "ni ba abinda nake mata,
gata nan kuma ki tambayeta. Itace bata son cin abinci komai tace bata so, in taci
ma kuma sai ta shiga toilet tayi amai. To ba dole ta rame ba?" Aunty Aisha blushed,
Mami ta dafe kai.
Ba'a kaita gidanta ba, sai da Mami ta saka ta zagaya duk iyayen da aka bari suna
jira ranar kawo amarya ta gaishe su, sannan daga nan ta tura ta Yola ta gaishe da
mamanta duk da kumburin da Al'ameen yake yi. Sai data dawo sannan Aunty Aisha da
Aunty Maryam suka kaita gidanta. Aunty Saratu da Aunty Amina suka karbe ta. Suna
gama adduoin su suka tafi Al'ameen ya shigo ya kama hannunta "come let me show you
something" ta bishi da sauri suka shiga wani daki sannan ta tsaya baki bude tana
kallo, sai kuma ta kama tsalle.
Dakin cike yake da kayan zane, sannan a bangon dakin an kafe zanunnukan da tayi na
seven wonders of the world. Ta juyo da sauri ta rungume shi tace "ohh I love you, I
love you so much" yace "wow, that's a first. For all the years da nake ta faman
dakon soyayyar ki, sai yau kika amsa min" ta sake chusa kanta a jikinsa cikin jin
kunya, ya dago fuskarta yace "tell me more. Me kike so a tare dani?" ta kalle shi
cikin ido tace
"your eyes, are like two pools that I fear if I dive in I might never come up for
air. And your smile makes the sun hid behind the cloud knowing it cannot shine as
bright. Everything about you is as perfect as perfect goes. That is why in my mind
I called you Mr Perfect. My Perfect Man. My Perfect Husband".
This is not the end. As I believe every ending of a story is just the beginning of
another one.
Alhamdulillahi
Anan na kawo karshen labarin Aisha Humairah. Abinda na rubuta dai dai Allah ya bamu
lada ni da na rubuta da kuma ku da kuka karanta. Abinda nayi kuskure Allah ya yafe
mana baki daya.
